1b1(mdo sde): nan sgra ldan / nang//
1b2(mdo sde):
1b3(mdo sde): brgyan drug bo da zhes phyi'i theg chen po'i mngado//drim po deng 'o//sang sa rgyas dang
1b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a1(mdo sde): dang /gzugs med pa dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/sangs
2a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stug po na stobs mnga' ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod
2a3(mdo sde): po/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/byang chub sems
2a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang /byang chub sems
2a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos
2b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
2b2(mdo sde): gzigs kyi dbang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po brnyes pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang
2b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i
2b5(mdo sde): bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shugs 'dzin dang /de dag lnga sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul /
2b6(mdo sde): tu phra ba bye bo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa sems dang /
3a1(mdo sde): ming dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sman gno'i spyod stsal lus yongs su 'dus /ye shes dang yang
3a2(mdo sde): lus su gnas gyur pa/sgyu ma lta bu dang /dpa' bar 'gro ba dang /chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang /ting nge 'dzin drang ldan pa/sangs
3a3(mdo sde): rgyas du ma'i phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad+mo
3a4(mdo sde): tshon po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de na mur 'dug dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu
3a5(mdo sde): ba med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde//
3a6(mdo sde): bar spyod pa bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs
3b1(mdo sde): du ma ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so//bzhengs nas kyang pho brang 'ja' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang /lhab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste//
3b2(mdo sde): zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang steng du gshegs so//gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rgyan seng ge'i gdan dam pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang
3b3(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs so//bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir gzigs te gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen
3b4(mdo sde): po'i 'od zer stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas byung ste/'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi brgyan gcig
3b5(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar yongs su snang bar gyur to//mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang ngo //sangs
3b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stug po'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi ring bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang /gza' dang /zla
3b7(mdo sde): bo spangs pa ste/'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi/gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang /nam mkha' dang ma
4a1(mdo sde): brtags par 'gog pa lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /spangs
4a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan
4a3(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu phyung ba de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa
4a4(mdo sde): la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sten po la bka' stsal pa/rnam par dgod pa yang
4a5(mdo sde): dgra pa ji lta bu bzhin du ston pa stug po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can du
4a6(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang /ma rig pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas gyur pa'i phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
4a7(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi lus stongs dang /mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang gis brgyan pa/gsob med po/ring du gnas pa/zla ba dang /nyi mdang
4b1(mdo sde): nor bu dang /glog dang /'ja' dang /b+hu ru dang /bap+pa dang /ldong ros dang /mtshal dang /mgo nag gi 'bru dang /king+ga ka dang /in+d+ra go pa dang /gser dang /tsam+b+ha ka dang /pad+mo dang /dung dang /
4b2(mdo sde): rma bya'i mgul dang /mdongs bu me long gi ning na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu bo nas sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu
4b3(mdo sde): bsngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta
4b4(mdo sde): bzhin du ston pa stan los langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yos pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag btsal te/
4b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la cu
4b6(mdo sde): bkrus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na badreg gis zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
4b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang /ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smos shig/de nas
5a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /bcom ldan/
5a2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das
5a3(mdo sde): te gnas sam/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa dang /'du
5a4(mdo sde): shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do//rigs kyi bu 'di nas pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag
5a5(mdo sde): brgya 'das pa'i steng gi phyogs chan tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /de bzhin du sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin
5a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang /skor ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
5a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
5b1(mdo sde): gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa shin tu yangs shing che ba drug yod de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag
5b2(mdo sde): gri so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang /mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang /yi ge dang bral ba de bzhin
5b3(mdo sde): nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'dug na par ston te/de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/de ni gang rnam par
5b4(mdo sde): dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa dri'i lan du nges 'di smras so//rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
5b5(mdo sde): bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mi blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems par ma zad kyi/byang chub sems
5b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'di'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang spyi gtsug ched med pa
5b7(mdo sde): la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
6a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/spyi gtsug/
6a2(mdo sde): tshad med pa'ang ma mthong ste/des ma mthong ba dang /ngo mtshar du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /spyi gtsug ltar tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par
6a3(mdo sde): rjes su dran zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas sangs rgyas rnams nam
6a4(mdo sde): mkha' dang mnyam par shes te mngon par bstod nas/bdag gis so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song ste gnas
6a5(mdo sde): par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sa dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa phra ba dang dmigs su phebs pa dang /rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa
6a6(mdo sde): stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na bder thal mo sbyar bas phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
6a7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la zhu bzhus pa lung bstan
6b1(mdo sde): pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshugs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris
6b2(mdo sde): shig dang /ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
6b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang /'chang rgya bar bgyi ba
6b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang /
6b5(mdo sde): gzugs dang /mtshan nyid dang /yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang /rdul dang /gces pa dang /
6b6(mdo sde): dbang po dang /phyogs dang /dus dang /nam mkha' dang /bdag dang /yid dang /dbang po dang /don nye bar 'du ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/
6b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ma rig pa dang /sred pa dang /las dang /mig dang /gzugs dang /snang ba dang /de la skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang /gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i
7a1(mdo sde): shes pa can dang /rgyu dang /de ma thag pa dang /dbang dang /dmigs pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang /yod pa dang /med par
7a2(mdo sde): smra ba'i rtog pa can dang /chos 'ong ba'i phung po dang /gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi rang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/chos kyi
7a3(mdo sde): dbang po thob par 'gyur gyis bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la sogs//mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par//sangs rgyas blo dang shes bya dang //
7a4(mdo sde): ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing //shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams//thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te//chos rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na//mya ngan 'das dang mnyam gshegs po//
7a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba/rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par
7a6(mdo sde): byed pa dge'o//rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ba/sangs rgyas dang 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'dra'i zhog ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang /rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag
7a7(mdo sde): kyang don 'di la ltad mau byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig/ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/'on te gzugs las
7b1(mdo sde): gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'am/de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang 'jig pa'i
7b2(mdo sde): chos can gyi phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir shes rab dang /ye shes dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul te/mnyam par bzhag pa'i
7b3(mdo sde): thugs kyis yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo//kye rgyal ba'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas
7b4(mdo sde): pa de dge'o//kye rgyal ba'i bu de ngas na dge bar shin tu nyon te yid laM gyis shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das dga'o zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po
7b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma
7b6(mdo sde): yin/phung po las gzhan yang med de/phung po la gnas pa'ang ma yin/phung po'ang gnas ma yin/skye ba dang 'jig pa'ang gnas ma yin/shes par bya ba'ang ma yin shes
7b7(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin/don kyang ma yin/dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /yul rnams ni mno bsam med pa'i phyir te/de bzhin
8a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las nang ngam phyir yang mi blta'o//gzugs ni spyod pa med cing sems med pa ste/'byung ba med pa'i chos can/mthar 'jig pa/rtswa dang shing
8a2(mdo sde): dang bong rdo dang 'dra ba/shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o//tshar ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o//'du shes ni bum pa dang /snam bu dang /cod
8a3(mdo sde): pan la sogs de'i rgyur sa byung ba ste/de'ang gnyis las skyes pa'i smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i
8a4(mdo sde): rlabs lta bur rlab cing ro dgas dang bya skom gyis nyen cing chu 'tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed do//de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/de'i bdag nyid
8a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes pa/dpyod pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shig tu mi dmigs pa/bong bu'i rwa dang /mo
8a6(mdo sde): gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad pa ste/rmi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o//dper na rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba sad pa'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa dang //
8a7(mdo sde): bud med bzang mo'ang dmigs su med do//de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba'ang mngon par sangs rgyas na mi dmigs so//'du byed rnams
8b1(mdo sde): ni chu shing gi snying po lta bu ste btsal na/lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis ni rnyed do//rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid med
8b2(mdo sde): pa ste/sgyu ma byed pa'am/de'i slob mas nan tan du rtswa dang shing dang pong rngo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po dang /rta dang /shing rta dang /mi
8b3(mdo sde): dang /rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang /gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'ang rnam pa
8b4(mdo sde): gzhan du 'dug la/rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtog ste de'ang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar
8b5(mdo sde): dradang 'dra bar phyir ldog go/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan po ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
8b6(mdo sde): snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang /nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang /byung ba dang /'byung ba'i sangs
8b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung /chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /
9a1(mdo sde): chos skyon med pa nyid po 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o//rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni'ang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o//rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa na
9a2(mdo sde): nyes pa thams cad dang bral por ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang 'jug go/skyon med par 'da' bo ni byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid
9a3(mdo sde): du myos te/sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson
9a4(mdo sde): 'grus btang zhing snying rje chen po dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par byed cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ting nge
9a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi 'dam du glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing rdzogs par mi byed par
9a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya zhing /ma reg pa dang /nye bar mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o//de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo
9a7(mdo sde): bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam po sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa/sprul pa'i yul can/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor ba/sa brgyad pa las 'das
9b1(mdo sde): pa/chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te
9b2(mdo sde): thams cad du 'gro ba ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/lhun gyis grub pa/rtag pa/ther zug pa/brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/rdo rje'i dbang po so la dbang du rnams 'a 'phrul
9b3(mdo sde): ba'i 'jug pa ston par 'gyur te/gnas gyur pa/yid bzhin gyi ye shes drang ting nge 'dzin can/stobs dang /mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang la spyod pa/ngang pa'i rgyal po dang
9b4(mdo sde): 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu bo zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/blta ba'i don yod pa/mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bar 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis spangs
9b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro//'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang /dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9b6(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i mthar thug par bsku ba grub
9b7(mdo sde): pa'i sngags 'chang ltar mi snang zhing khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer dang /'phrul paso sprul pa la spyod cing 'bri'o//
10a1(mdo sde): song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
10a2(mdo sde): 'di dag gsungs so//dbang po phung po sprul yin te//sred dang ma rig las kyang yin//bag chags kyis bcings mi bzad pa//yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung //rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags
10a3(mdo sde): rnams//zhags pa sems bskyod de yin no//khro ba mi lce mnyam pa ste//zhe sdang drug gi dngos po yin//thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyis//'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te//phung po rnams/
10a4(mdo sde): ni dor ba'i phyir//rnal 'byor con gyis rnal 'byor spyod//gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te//phung po lkog ma gzugs med pa//ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang //grib la sdong dum la sogs
10a5(mdo sde): med//mkha' la rlung gzugs mi snang dang //bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni//mkhas pas so so rang rig pa//yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'//tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni//sangs rgyas
10a6(mdo sde): dngos po mi snang ste//sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das//mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te//rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na//de ni bsnun du mi nus pa'o//rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste//yod dang med kyis
10a7(mdo sde): rnam par spangs//rdob phye mor btegs pa la//gser ni yod par mi snang ste//sbyang ba'i las kyi khyad par gyis//gser ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin//gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs
10b1(mdo sde): //mya khas pas drang po lhag ma dang //khanas dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang //rnam par shes dang dang podag/gcig dag dad ngas pa 'ang //rdul phran rnam par basbyangs na//dngos pas sa
10b2(mdo sde): rgyas yod pa min//sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te//rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong //mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can//gang na sdug bsngal de na bde//de nyid la ni snang ba yin//sangs rgyas
10b3(mdo sde): med ces mi bya ste//sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag pa yod//rgyu yisangs rgyas dge bcan//rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste//'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang //yang dag rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //'di dag sangs
10b4(mdo sde): rgyas lngar gsungs so//sprul po'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod//mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can//de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste//rnal 'byor can gyi thub pas mthong //khams
10b5(mdo sde): rnams gsum po 'das pa dang //rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing //de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing //rgyal sras bzang pos kun tu gang //de na thung chen sangs rgyas bzhugs//mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas
10b6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag/chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes//de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad//shes rab ma shes shes byed la//stug po de na rnam par spyod//stug po de yi sems can
10b7(mdo sde): su//sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun//skad cig 'jig par shin tu 'das//ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos//dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul pa gang //rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong //sdug
11a1(mdo sde): po nas gshegs glang ngo ste//sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug na bzhugs//sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te//sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis//de bzhin gshegs
11a2(mdo sde): pa mnyam bzhag pa//chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang //sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni//tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes//de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na//mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par mdzes//
11a3(mdo sde): thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar//gcig dang tha dad spangs par te//dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni//skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyen//rdul las ma yin dus las min//dbang po las min
11a4(mdo sde): gces las min//rkyen gyis mi yin 'jig rten dang //sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa//rgyu yi tshul du sangs rgyas ni//'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes//'jig rten skul 'khod bu ste//rgya mtshor
11a5(mdo sde): dang shing dag dang //de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas//mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes//byi ba thams cad phyi nang du//gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams//phyir yang phyag gi mthal bkod de//
11a6(mdo sde): yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'dzud pa//sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'//thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o//'jig rten rnams la byed pa med//sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste//'byung ba gsum po/
11a7(mdo sde): 'di dag kun//sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul//rab rib mi shes myos mdongs pa'i//rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin//bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i rnams//yod dang med pa'i smra bas
11b1(mdo sde): bcom//'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang //cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams//'di la med dam cung zad dam//bdag dang bdag med ga la yod//sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na//rnal 'byor
11b2(mdo sde): mkhan po rnam par mdzes//dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams//ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na//rmi lam rnam pa sna chags gzugs//ri dgas rnams la smig rgyu bzhin//de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dang /
11b3(mdo sde): bdeg la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang //rlung ldan sogs pa'i theg pa bzhin//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen gyi mchog/mi la 'khrul 'khor bskor ba ste//rgya mtsho'i skye ba 'dzin pa 'dra//sdug
11b4(mdo sde): po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i
11b5(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
11b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /'phags pa spong ba rnams dang /mnor med pa la gzhol ba rnams dang /ma dang pa
11b7(mdo sde): la snying ring ba rnams dang /tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang /ba lang dang /dgum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor
12a1(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
12a2(mdo sde): las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang /zang zing gi sbyin pa'o//chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan
12a3(mdo sde): btags par 'gyur ro//zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang /skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo //chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin
12a4(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to//'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin
12a5(mdo sde): ba dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/bzhon pa sbyin pa dang /gdugs sbyin pa dang /dar sbyin pa dang /gos sbyin pa dang /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms
12a6(mdo sde): dang /mal tshe dang /stan dang /nod kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro//'jam dpol yang sems can la la mtshams med pa
12a7(mdo sde): lnga dag gam/dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gim/'phags pa spong ba dag gam/mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gom/bskal par gnas pa dag gam/sems can gang la la dkon mchog
12b1(mdo sde): gsum la snying ring ba'am/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa'am/tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/chung ngu na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung /phyag dar ba'ang rung /smre
12b2(mdo sde): sha can yang rung ste/'jam dpal sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang /'dri ba dang /'drir 'jug pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kun
12b3(mdo sde): chub par byed pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgya char yang dag par ston pa dang /chung ngun yi gre gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang /su'ang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang /nang par langs nas ng+ge
12b4(mdo sde): phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang /lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i
12b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro//'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam/de'i dur ram/ro 'am/ro bam pa zhig yod la/de'i ngo mthong
12b6(mdo sde): na'ang mtshums med pa'i las lnga rnams byung bar 'gyur ro//'jam dad la rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de//yi dgas de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi
12b7(mdo sde): bzang pa'i tshor ba yod do//'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro//'jam dpal sus mdo sde rin po che 'di ma gror byes te/
13a1(mdo sde): me tog dang /bdug spos dang /mar me dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i ba dan gyis mchod
13a2(mdo sde): pa dang /chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed na'ang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o//chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas drang/
13a3(mdo sde): bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//ri
13a4(mdo sde): dgas dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/de la nem nur dang /the tshom dang yid gnyis mi bya'o//sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
13a5(mdo sde): pa/sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las yongs su ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro//
13a6(mdo sde): thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro//mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra//
13a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog/dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa//chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs//bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i//de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te//thub
13b1(mdo sde): pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams//kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin//yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral//sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med//blo dang shes bya bral ba ste//tshad dang dbang po spangs pa yin//
13b2(mdo sde): sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin//de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul//mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste//de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang //dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad//mnyam
13b3(mdo sde): par bzhag cing gos pa med//g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med min//chags med lam la gnas pa ste//lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang //dri za lha min mi 'am ci//thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis//
13b4(mdo sde): bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo//de la ngo mtshar sred pa med//'gro ba gang na'ang g.yo ba med//sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi//de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis//
13b5(mdo sde): bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis//mthong yang de dang 'di na med//ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra//rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni//dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong //rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams//
13b6(mdo sde): gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa//de la de lta'i chos ston te//rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis//rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing //rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag/rgyal po'am rgyal po'i 'khor
13b7(mdo sde): rnams dang //rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang //dka' thub tshul dang zhing rnams kyi//phun sum tshogs pa de las byung //lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang //rin chen 'byung khung rnam dag pa//lha yi
14a1(mdo sde): lha yi mthu yis na//phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin//'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang //rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis//gang rnams byed bzhug byang dag/
14a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras su//de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi//dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang //gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba ding //gar ma ngan rnams la rtag tu'o//dga' ldan gnas
14a3(mdo sde): babs 'jig rten gyis//mthong ba bud med 'bro dang bcas//'brog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang //cod pan can dang lag na gzhur//dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong //stug po nas ni de ma dral//
14a4(mdo sde): yul 'di thub pa de yis te//thams cad na yang shin tu snang //rang rib can gyi rab rib bzhin//ri dgas rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra//'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la//rdo ltar gzhan du mthong
14a5(mdo sde): ba dang //rmi lamA nA yang gzhan du ba'i//rmi lam bzhin du bris pas mthong //khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni//rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin//lce yi lha yi yul yin te//de yi sras kyi
14a6(mdo sde): dus kun tu//mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang //sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'//sa non gzhon nu ser skya dang //ni tsi la sogs rnams bsams kyang //de yi yul la rnam par bslad//de dag rnal
14a7(mdo sde): 'byor gyis mi mthong //thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang //byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa//de dag yul na dang yang min//lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i phyir//sa dang sar ni rnam spyod par//
14b1(mdo sde): rje'i snying po de la bstan//lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi//sdug pa'i zhing na yod pa yis//'di dag rdo rje'i snying pode//mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan//rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul//ni ltar gang /
14b2(mdo sde): gis 'byor pa dag/dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag/bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni//gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste//brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min//skye bdag ni chos tsam ste//ldog par
14b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo//kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi//yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags//mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa//rgyu rnams dgos pa grub pa dag/mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de//'jig
14b4(mdo sde): dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o//'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang //yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med//rkyen du bya rnams med par yang //brtags pa'i dngos po gang yang med//rkyen rnams yin te 'dus
14b5(mdo sde): pa la//dngos po yod pa ma yin te//rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur//yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang //med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin//phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags//phung po rdzu ma ras la
14b6(mdo sde): sogs//ri dgas skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin//rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste//gtsug lag nor pa drug dang bcas//rab tu sla ba sum brgya yis//'jug pa dag dang snang ba yin//mkhas pas rmi lam
14b7(mdo sde): gang mthong ba//skye ba med cing 'chi med par//slar sad nas su sems pa ni//bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no//ji ltar ri dang de rnams kyi//grib ma kun tu snang ba bzhin//de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang //
15a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam//ji ltar skyes bu nyul ba zhig/bud med lhan cig rtse dga' mi//sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang //lha rab btsun mo mnyam pa dang //gzhan yang sna
15a2(mdo sde): tshogs dngos po de//sad nas rnam par sems pa ni//ci zhig bde no nam rmi lam yin//rmi lam bud med lhan cig tu//rtsis nas phyir ni bdag sad de//'di brdzun bus pa slu ba yin//de bzhini
15a3(mdo sde): bdag gi gnyen pa kun//rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no//dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang //ma dang phu nu po dag kyang //rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste//rnal 'byor sbyar bar cis mi bya//dka' thub tshal dang
15a4(mdo sde): zhing rnams dang //ri dang ri yi sman gshongs dang //'o ma 'byung dang ma la ya//lhun po byin dang dbang chen dang //gangs kyi ri dang ko las//char 'bab dag la'ang gang gnas dang //dzam+bu 'bras bu'i khu
15a5(mdo sde): ba dang //gang dag bdud rtsi za ba dang //phan du ka ma bal pa ra ya dA//ko bi dar na gang 'khod dang //ri rab nang na gang gnas dang //bsam dpag shing la gang gnas dang //rang rgyal rgyal ba'i
15a6(mdo sde): sbasras rnams dang //nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //thams cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di//gang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste//pad+mo gnas su brtan bcas te//skyil mo krung du mnyam bzhag
15a7(mdo sde): cing //rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis//'dod dang bde las rnam par dang na//dbang po dbang po'i don gyis rnams//thams cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing //lcags lus glang po ji bzhin du//
15b1(mdo sde): sems ni mnyam par bzhag par gyis//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge/'dod dang dga' ba dben la sogs//yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang /khyad
15b2(mdo sde): par du yang gzugs med dang //'du shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams//nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang //'du shes yod min med min rnams//nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs//pad+mo dang ni 'od
15b3(mdo sde): 'dra zhing //nam mkha' ri mo me 'dra bar//rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong //'di dag thams cad spangs nas su//snang ba med par rab tu gnas//gang tshe mtshan med rnal 'byor can//rnam par
15b4(mdo sde): mi rtog chags med na//sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong //zhing dang zhing na mnyam bzhag pa//de dag phyag gi dbang bskur bar//de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te//sangs rgyas sa la bzhugs pa dang //
15b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung //sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas//kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur//stobs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'thob//gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin//
15b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyin 'byung gnas 'gyur//thub pa rnal 'byor skyed pa'i yang //gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzigs shing //mchog rdul yan cad nyid dben phyir//yod las med par 'gyur ba ste//bong bu'i bu
15b7(mdo sde): lang rwa mthong zhing //cha shas med cing cha shas cen//phung po las ni phung can med//dengs las kyi 'bras gyur pa//'di ni sgyu ma'i 'bras byas bzhin//'di na las med 'bras bu med//las kyi
16a1(mdo sde): grub pa'ang yod pa yin//'jig rten byed pas ma byas te//byed pa byed pa ma yin no//byed la byed pa yod na ni//'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur//bung med byas pa'i nyes pa
16a2(mdo sde): yis//thub pa dri ma can du 'gyur//de ste lam rgyud sna tshogs rnams//chu dang nam mkha' sa gnas pa'i//lus can kun la kun gnas te//skye ba bzang po gnas su s+ho//ris su 'gro ba yod pas na//
16a3(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'gro//dbang po so so bya ba yang //ji ltar 'dod par yul 'dzin te//'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba//zho mar ji ltar 'o mo las//de bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig/las kyis/
16a4(mdo sde): byas par gyur sems na//rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin//brag ca dang ni glog 'dra ba//smig rgyu ri dgas sred pa ltar//dngos po rnal 'byor rnal 'byor can//thog ma med nas bsags pa yi//mi yi rnam
16a5(mdo sde): spros bag chags kyis//sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang //sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags//dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin//yul rnams rmi lam phyir ldog dang //mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang
16a6(mdo sde): med//de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po//log pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa//lus dpe med pa/dpung rgyan dang /cod pan dang /
16a7(mdo sde): gtsug gi nor bu dang /se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/theg pa gsum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'gal
16b1(mdo sde): ba/lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i
16b2(mdo sde): mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang /rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan can dag la chos ston pa yin te/de'i phyir rgyal ba'i
16b3(mdo sde): sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyis bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
16b4(mdo sde): spyod po'i gnas ston cig/des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste/yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu
16b5(mdo sde): la dbang sbyar zhing stobs dang /mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang gi gzhal mod khang gi gnas gyur te/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa spangs te/sna tshogs kyi lus yid
16b6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang stug por stug po na spyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro//rdo rje snying pos smras pa/rgyal po
16b7(mdo sde): smros shig dge' dge'o//cod pan can la khyad par du//chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa//stug po'i rkyen ni rab ston pa//sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na//rnam
17a1(mdo sde): rtog don las phyir ldog pa//'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te//'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang //ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur//chos kyang ba nyid bstan gyis//
17a2(mdo sde): ngal de nyon cig/dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin pa//de yi rnam pa 'gro ba 'di//mtshan bzhi mtshan mar+g+ha rnams las//rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog/blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te//rtogs bye de yi khyad
17a3(mdo sde): gyur pa//gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa//nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas//sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min//tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med//rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste//rnam par
17a4(mdo sde): rtog pa rnam mi brtag/shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa//sems tsam de ltar yin na ste//shes bya sems tsam yin pa ni//rtag tu tsam la shes yod min//sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid//gang zag
17a5(mdo sde): ngag dang g.yo ba rnams//gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na//rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin//brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur//dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te//bcu la sangs rgyas
17a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis//dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin//rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang //mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro//nam mkha'i zed dang 'dra ba ste//sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te//
17a7(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing //rtag cing zhi bang de ba brtan//'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te//stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes//rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste//sna tshogs gzugs
17b1(mdo sde): kyi rin chen bzhin//de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bus ma med//sdug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa//ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu//rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin//gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste//rdul yang
17b2(mdo sde): mchog phra'i de bzhin du//dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la//rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin//zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi//rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o//ji ltar shing les mi 'byung ba//phyis
17b3(mdo sde): kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya//de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me//phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya//gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing //sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa//chags pa med pa'i ye
17b4(mdo sde): shes ro//sdug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes//bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs//sa la gnas pa ma yin pa//lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i//bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //rgyud kyi rgyun
17b5(mdo sde): rnams chad pa'i phyir//'jig pa med cing 'byung med pos//lta ba thams cad zag byed pa//bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //zhir gyur zhi bzhir ma byas//zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du//lta ba thams
17b6(mdo sde): cad rnam dag phyir//bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni//bdag med pa la bdag med pas//mi rtag thobs bcom pa dang //rnam par ston pa'i mangs kyang ste//bsreg
17b7(mdo sde): pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du//bdag nyid nor 'gyur de nyid du//de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te//bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa//lta ba'i chos la 'dir gnas kyi//so so rang rig spyod yul
18a1(mdo sde): la//thog ma med nas nyes dri med//'phags pa rnams kyis la gnas//'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te//'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas//sems kyis
18a2(mdo sde): las rab gyur te//stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes//mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams//thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa//rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon//gang la skyabs su mchi bar
18a3(mdo sde): bgyi//sangs rgyas yid min med pa min//phung po'i skye shing rnam bsregs te//dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas//stug po sangs rgyas so la gnas//shes bya dri med zhi ba la//skyabs
18a4(mdo sde): su song shig grogs po dag/rtag dang chad las bral ba ste//blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin//stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can//de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so//rnal 'byor can
18a5(mdo sde): rnams kun gyi zhing //zhing mchog bzang ba sdug pa'o//rnal 'byor pa ni mang pos gang //stug po dri la skyabs su song //spros pa kun dang bral ba ste//lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs//ri mo'i thag thug
18a6(mdo sde): lta bu dang //rmi lam mo gsham bu 'byung dang //rmi lam dud med bzang mo ltar//thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong //dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin//skra phung mgal ba bskor ba ltar//smig rgyuri
18a7(mdo sde): dgas sred mtshungs su//yod dang med pa rnam par spangs//sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang //'phrul pa'i sprul par de dag ni//'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste//sa dang sa la thub pa rnams//bsngor
18b1(mdo sde): med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa//sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar//sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang //thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong //rdza la sogs pa'i bzod zung ltar//'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung //
18b2(mdo sde): yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang //chos lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang //'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni//bdag med mo gnyis brgyan pa ste//bag chags thog ma med pa yi//sems kyi gnas ngan len byung
18b3(mdo sde): yod//'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni//kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin//rlung gis ji ltar 'od ba la//phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na//dba' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med//'od pa'ang med par
18b4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te//snga mi dpag chags gnas can rnams//'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag/sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni//rnam par tha dad ma yin te//dus gcig tu yang de dag 'byung //
18b5(mdo sde): bar bar du ni rim gyis so//thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa//skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang //lo me me tog 'bras bu dang //ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la//rtag tu ngus gcig 'jug pa ste/
18b6(mdo sde): rim gyis kyang ni shes par byos//yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul//mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin//lus kyi 'jug pa rim gyis kyang //srog la brten cing 'byung ba yin//rdzas dang grangs dang
18b7(mdo sde): chos rnams la//tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste//mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la//tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min//ro dang dri yi rnam pa la//rim gyis tha dad 'byung ba yin//rim gyis kha
19a1(mdo sde): dog khyad par gyi//sna tshogs la yang dus gcig tu//rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab//rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste//rdo ba rnams kyi gser
19a2(mdo sde): bzhin gnas//yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung //yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te//rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang //sa yi khyad par byed pa'o//bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu//sa bon kun pa'i kun
19a3(mdo sde): gzhi ni//kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i//rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis//de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs//nges dang ma nges dge ba yin//rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni//rgya mtsho'i rlabs/
19a4(mdo sde): dag ji bzhin du//tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su//de bzhin kun gzhis khyab par byed//sa dang sa la rnam dag cing //gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes//yang dag ji bzhin don ston la//rdo rje
19a5(mdo sde): snying pos yang smras pa//mthong zhing thos te shes pas na//sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis//spobs pa can la bstan par gyis//khyad par du'o khyad par bdag/khams phran rnams kyi khams
19a6(mdo sde): rnams dang //sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang //kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na//sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin//dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba yi//'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro//dga'
19a7(mdo sde): ldan la sogs gzhal med du//mche ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur//dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te//dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no//'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag/gzugs khams
19b1(mdo sde): bdag po'ang de bzhin te//gzugs med 'du shes med sems can//bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang /yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas//yang dag mtha' la ma reg par//'jigs med seng ge'i
19b2(mdo sde): sgra sgrog cing //dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan//bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms//de ni stug por smon pa yin//khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis//chags med mnyam par bzhag pa ste//
19b3(mdo sde): mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su//rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar//chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te//rten las gzhan du gyur cing bde//rtog pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos//stug po'i dkyil na sras dang
19b4(mdo sde): bcas//chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes//'jigs pa med pa mi yi mchog/mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa min//mur 'dug rnams kyis jir brjod bzhin//mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi//rgyal po bcu po'i
19b5(mdo sde): las rnams kyis//theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste//stug po 'tshol ba'i khyad par yang //rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur//sa dang sa la gnas pas so//'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur//'chi ba rnams
19b6(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin te//rgyal po 'jig pa mthar ma yin//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku//sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba//de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na//sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang //
19b7(mdo sde): sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur//sems can khams rnams zad gyur na//rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med//mya ngan 'da' med shes bya med//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med//me mar
20a1(mdo sde): bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang //sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gi/rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams//lus can rnams la thar pa ston//yod dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis//thar
20a2(mdo sde): pa'i bde las de dag ring //bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de//lugs su 'jug dang bzlog ba dag/gzugs med 'du shes med pa dang //mngon pas dbang dang stobs rnams dang //mnyams
20a3(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa dang //chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa rnams//sa yi khams la mkhas pa dag/mi yi dbang po stug por 'gro/yod dang med pa 'jig pas ni//de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste//phrad
20a4(mdo sde): pa gsum po 'jig med cing //rgyu dang dmigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang //de ma thag dang dbang yang ste//sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag/mig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te//phrad pas gang rnams
20a5(mdo sde): 'jug gyur pa//gzugs rnams mngon byed ye shes dang //de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur//phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni//phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste//yod dang med pa'i lta ba las//de
20a6(mdo sde): ste grol nas 'jig na ni//sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyir//rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te//mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing //de'i rang bzhin mi gnas la//gang tshe dmigs pa
20a7(mdo sde): spang ba la//rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing //gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te//rtog med rtog pa spangs pas na//de tshe sems ni mnyam par bzhag/'gro ba rnam rtog med par mthong //
20b1(mdo sde): gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste//bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas//brten pa las ni gyur pa ste//ye shes gnas ngan len pa spangs//yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni//sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan
20b2(mdo sde): pa ste//sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing //rgyal po stug por rab tu 'gro/gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung //mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas//nang dang phyi yis rnams dang //tha dad rnam par rang mthong
20b3(mdo sde): ning//sa sor gi ye shes rmongs//lto ba'i chos la rnam par gnas//rgyal ba drug por 'dong ba ni//ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor no//mtshan ma ming dang de bzhin nyid//rnam par rtog dang ye
20b4(mdo sde): shes dang //yang dag mtha' yi gnas pa yis//so so rang rig spyod yul du//rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu//rnal 'byor sems dpa'i rnal 'byor can//rgyal po sdug par 'dong ba na//sangs rgyas
20b5(mdo sde): bstod pa'i zhing du'o//phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te//bdag gi phyogs la 'phags gyur na//phyogs las nyams pas 'jig pa ni//rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro//ma grub pa dang yang dpe
20b6(mdo sde): yi//rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur//rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i 'chang //de dag rnam pa sngar 'gyur ro//phrad pa gsum po sun 'byin pa//chud zos bung ba ji bzhin du//de bzhin 'jig rten sun
20b7(mdo sde): 'byin pa//yang dag ma yin rtog pa smra//del nyes pa rnam paste//rtog pa bslang pa'i mig can la//'dra chos mi 'dri'i chos skyon can//nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang //bdag gi phyogs la ma nyams
21a1(mdo sde): pa'i tho//pha rol phyogs la brten pa dang //lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni//thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o//sems can+da rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'//rgyal po yod pa ma yin te//
21a2(mdo sde): kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag/'byung ba dog par rgyug pa'o//de dang de yi lam rgyud du//thugs rje dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs//sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis//zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor/
21a3(mdo sde): sde ma'i las dang tshul mthun par//pa skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad//rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la//chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te//de ste mya ngan 'da' 'jig na//rgyal bas yon tan
21a4(mdo sde): ci zhig brnyes//dbang sgyur gsum po rnams dang yang //rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong //rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dang //dran pa nyer bzhag stong pa nyid//tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang //'dri
21a5(mdo sde): la lung bstan pa rnams dang //dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag/rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te//gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang //dbang po stobs rnams bcas pa yang //mngon par shes dang
21a6(mdo sde): drad rnams dang //rngam par shes dang de rgyu dang //'dus byas mi byas chos rnams dang //byang chub yan lag gang zag dang //rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad//sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang
21a7(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang //ye shes mngon du chud pa bcu//sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang //sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog/sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes//'dus
21b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi chos shes dang //'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang //'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang //'gog pa dag la chos shes dang //'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang //'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang //
21b2(mdo sde): lam la chos kyi shes pa dang //lam la so sor rtog pa dang //lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes//shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu//brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang //rigs las rigs dang lan
21b3(mdo sde): cig 'ong //bar chad gcig po gang zag dang //bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang //gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang //mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang //steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te//rgyal po de dag
21b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang //ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs//rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te//tha ma mchog dang bar ma'o//byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du//mchog dang bcas par de la sgom
21b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas ni dbu mar te//nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o//bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa//lnga gsum bco lnga dag tu yang //sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni//rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed//
21b6(mdo sde): gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin//sems ni rang bzhin 'od snang can//zag pa gang yin de sems min//sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'ang med//ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin te//da ltar byung ba gnas/
21b7(mdo sde): pa med//sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par//'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba med//bsam gtan bzhin sems med de//'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa med//'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te//yid dang rnam
22a1(mdo sde): shes lnga pa'o//rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas//dba' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin//brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba//thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o//yod dang med las lha
22a2(mdo sde): rdzas su//gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing //stug po dang ni sdug dkyil du//zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes//de ni mi 'jig bde bar gnas//sdug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas//tha dad ma yin
22a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mkhyen//ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur//bsam yis rnal 'byor yul can te//rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod//rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'di//rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi//
22a4(mdo sde): rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir//khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog/'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang //tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang //gzugs med shes med sems can du//rgyal po khyod ni
22a5(mdo sde): dbang por gyis//stug por 'dod pa'ang 'thob par te//bzang po'i sdug por smon pa'i phyir//rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams//bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur//chos dang rjes su 'gro shes
22a6(mdo sde): dang //pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang //sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang //'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang //byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang //khong bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te//sha kun
22a7(mdo sde): ta la'i rgyal rigs dang //mig shwa khu dang si mo'i rigs//yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog/khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags//do yi rigs su khyod skyes shing //zhum pa med par
22b1(mdo sde): stug por song //lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi//rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du//sdud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing //'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste//rnga drug bzhin du lus phyed kyis//'gro zhing 'ong ba byed
22b2(mdo sde): popa ni//thams cad lus la yid yin te//sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas//sgyu mi'i shing ltar shin tu snang //chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du//smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams//skyur bas rgyal po bzhin
22b3(mdo sde): du rtse//sems dang sems las byung dang yid//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med//sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste//kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di//bag chags
22b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su dkris//sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang //'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du//lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul//de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin//lu ma'i pad+mo lta bu
22b5(mdo sde): dag/dri med drang pa'i rgyal po bzhin//gsal ba gdon mi za ba'i rigs//sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas//mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste//mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin//mtshan/
22b6(mdo sde): ma ming dang 'brel ba yin//rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags//mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag las//rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung //rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yis//rgyu la rnam pa
22b7(mdo sde): gnyis su gsungs//phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang //bag chags yid kyang de bzhin to//sems dang lhan cig ldan pa ni//khang pa la ni gnas pa yin//yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni//
23a1(mdo sde): rnam shes lnga yi sgyu yin te//rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis//'jig rten rgyu la rnam par lta//de ltar byed dang bya ba med//de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min//thams
23a2(mdo sde): cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid//phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste//rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar lta//de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong //rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni//chos rnams
23a3(mdo sde): chos nyid de yin te//brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du//chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa//stong pa ngo bo nyid med de//yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa//sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang
23a4(mdo sde): 'dra//dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste//sgra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin//du ba sprin sdug lta bu ni//mtshan ma tshul dang dbyings rnams kyis//ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi//tshig dang yi ge mang po
23a5(mdo sde): dang //ming rnams mang po la yang ste//kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin//gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan//yid don dbang po 'dus pa las//sa bon kun can bag chags dang //tha dad/
23a6(mdo sde): ma yin sems dang bcas//rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung //gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang //phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so//so so rang rig shin tu phra//mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa
23a7(mdo sde): ste//rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//'phags pa'i rang bzhin thugs chud pas//sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras//rang bzhin yongs su
23b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa ni//yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na//skye ba zad ces rnam par gsung //tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces so//byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med//phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes//sdug bsngal
23b2(mdo sde): kun las rnam par grol//g.yo ba thams cad shin tu byung //bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na//rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing //bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni//chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste///
23b3(mdo sde): sa bon rnams dang bral bas na//sems kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go/thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i//yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i//spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas//mya ngan 'das pa
23b4(mdo sde): lcags bsregs bzhin//ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags//bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med//de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang //me zad bzhin du bsil ba yin//zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings
23b5(mdo sde): su//zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na//rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas//ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pa//mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing //mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas/
23b6(mdo sde): rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul//rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis//de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas//stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste//sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas//zhing ge
23b7(mdo sde): mchog ni stug po'o//de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms//rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis//ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung //mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste//mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog
24a1(mdo sde): 'byung //grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par//rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i yul//phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams//rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di//skye ba la ni rgyu yin no//
24a2(mdo sde): khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste//gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed//'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi//gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye//ring po thung ngu//nga dog dang //rtsub pa dag dong 'jam pa'i rnams/
24a3(mdo sde): sgrodang dri la sogs pa'i yul//mngar dang khe dang tsha ba dang //yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul//ji snyed dag dang mi dge dang //'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas//mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes yul//
24a4(mdo sde): skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung //byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste//de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro//rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung //yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas//khab long lta bur shin tu
24a5(mdo sde): 'khor//kha gnyis sbrul ni ji bzhin pa//yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te//kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed//gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung //yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas//rgyu yi dgos
24a6(mdo sde): pa byas nas ldog/bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed//bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed//lus la drod kyang skyes pa ste//sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod//zas dang skom dang longs spyod
24a7(mdo sde): dang //gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang //mchong ba dag dang rgyug par yang //mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin//gor dang gad mo rtsed mo dang //yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste//sgra tshogs mgol
24b1(mdo sde): pa bskor ba dang //dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang //smig rgyu la'ang de bzhin du//rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/bab pa kun tu 'khor ba'i sems//bdag sems khong du mi chud pas//lus dang snod kyi rnam
24b2(mdo sde): par yang //pa ma nyug ltar gnas pa'o//nyam chung snying po med pa ste//rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa//bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod//mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin//rgyal po
24b3(mdo sde): rnam shes sa bon ni//lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste//bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed//'phags la ma yin sa yi bdag/rgyal po rnam shes gsum po yi//'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste//'di rnams
24b4(mdo sde): dang bral grub pa yi//rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no//bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams//shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang //'phags pa maud+gal bu yis kyang //lus dang lus tshe mdzes pa rnams//de
24b5(mdo sde): dag las ni 'di dag 'phags//stug po'i zhing na 'o sa'i bdag/thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa//de dag dpa' mchar mi rung //bde ba yod dang mngon dga' dang //'og gi zhing rnam bye ba dag/de dang de na gang
24b6(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i//sangs rgyas de dag sdug la bstod//sdug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med//rang byung 'phrul pa de yin te//zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas sa//'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas//de ni
24b7(mdo sde): 'di nyer len med//khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral//bar drug mchog tu rtag pa ste//brtan pa stug por 'dus ma byas//yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu//'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu/
25a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su//sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de//de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas//sangs rgyas sprul pa bya ba yis//rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam
25a2(mdo sde): par bzhag/sprul pa dag dang thabs cig rol//thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar//gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba//de la de ltar 'byung ba ste//'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang //sa bcu pa yi mdo
25a3(mdo sde): mchog dang //sdong pos brgyan dang dru ma yi//gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo//dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang //rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang //sgyu ma dpal las 'gro ba sogs//mdo sde rnam
25a4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs dag/stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par 'byung //stug po'i rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di//mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin//rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang //rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas
25a5(mdo sde): gyis//gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang //'du shes med pa de bzhin te//gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang //bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na//pad+mo 'dra ba'i
25a6(mdo sde): gzhal med khang //gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na//lha rdzas smad kyi ye shes te//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis//rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang //de na bcom ldan thabs/
25a7(mdo sde): cig bzhugs//stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs//sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la//de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa//rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis//
25b1(mdo sde): de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pas//gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi//thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams//gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing //
25b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnal 'byor can gyis bstan//nga bla gser dang zla 'od tsam+ba ka/rma bya'i mgrin pa pad+mo 'dra//de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha//lha yi gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste//de gzugs lha rgyal go
25b3(mdo sde): paka dag glog dang 'ol ma byu ru'i 'od bzhin du//la las bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtswa la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs par//mthong de nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la//
25b4(mdo sde): thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs par mthong //thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro yi mgo bo klad pa bzhin du ste//la lar gzugs ni rdo rje an+da rnyil
25b5(mdo sde): gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro//la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong //la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong //lha rdzas
25b6(mdo sde): phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing //khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin pa lang mig par shong bar mdzad//sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i
25b7(mdo sde): gtsug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing //la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams na mkhas gyur cing //chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug pa'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba
26a1(mdo sde): ni//thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste//rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing //la lus
26a2(mdo sde): gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang //dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin skye mnga' bar//la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig pa'i blo
26a3(mdo sde): yi byad gcod par te//'di dang gzhan med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro//snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das//la las
26a4(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pa'i mchod sbyin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste//sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin tu mthong //bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog den skyes
26a5(mdo sde): bu yod pa de dag ni//mngol nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste//lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor can gyi bdag/lha rdzas 'od
26a6(mdo sde): bzang de dang gang yang mi nad rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul//de dag pargya char mi phong rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po dag gi dri bde la//gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing
26a7(mdo sde): gi mi de dag/mtha' yas 'ad kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can//rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang //rnam patha
26b1(mdo sde): dang sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga sbyangs pa'i gnas tshal shing //lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam par mdzes//gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog pad+mo de ni/
26b2(mdo sde): mchog tu rab tu brgyan//'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yi nang po med de kun mi yang bad+mo skyes//thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan ma ngas la sangs rgyas la ni rab tu mos//bdag gi ston pa la ni bdag
26b3(mdo sde): bstan yid can pa dri dag las skye ba ste//sangs rgyas// gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi nI zong po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan//dpe byad bzang po bcas byas rmad du 'brar ba'i lus can dpal gyi dre'u dang
26b4(mdo sde): bcas//yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pos dri med rngub pa dag go//de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe btsom du gyur//srom rdul phrin shin tu phra ba'i sgra yi brgyad cha'i gzugs
26b5(mdo sde): su'ang de bzhin gyur//la lar bdi gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang //gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhini de 'dir gzugs kyi khyad par dag/rnal
26b6(mdo sde): 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas tshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs//de skad bshad nas yang smras pa//sna tshogs gzugs che rgyal po'i sras//sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang //mnyams
26b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang //sgyum lta bu ting 'dzin dang //de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste//gzungs dang rdzu 'dru'i rkang pa dang //rnam zer tha dang yang dag rig/stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang /
27a1(mdo sde): phung po khams rnams zag med pa//'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob//rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo //chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang //rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams
27a2(mdo sde): dang //bdag med gnyis por ba rtogs nas//gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur//yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag/sbrum dpa' bar 'gro ngas bskor//mi zad smon lam bcu po dang //lam gyi
27a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis shin tu sprul//rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam//chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams//sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang //rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan
27a4(mdo sde): bzhugs pa//rgyal po'i sras kyis mdun du byas//yod dang med pa phyogs bral ba//rdul phran rnam por 'jig rnams kyis//dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang //lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs//
27a5(mdo sde): ri rab sa la 'dod rgyu zhing //nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang //ji ltar snang bar ma gyur pa//de bzhin rgyal sras gces pa'i rnams//rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo //rnam pa sna tshogs
27a6(mdo sde): gzugs dang ldan//sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na//rgyal po mchod la mngon pa mos//smon lam dbang la gnas pa'i rnams//pad+mo'i khang par rab tu skye//dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag/
27a7(mdo sde): zhing dang shing du mya ngan 'da'//ting nge 'dzin las smyos pa ston//lhun gyis grub par thams cad du//chur byung rnab 'dra bar te//nyi ma lta bur byed med pa//snang ba sems can spyod du
27b1(mdo sde): du//yang dag mtha' la mi reg par//ting nge 'dzin la rab tu ldog/glu la gnas pa'i bud pa dag/gang chen mtsho la 'gro bya bzhin//gang du gru 'gro der rgyug sde//dpag tshad shin tu mang bar yang /
27b2(mdo sde): thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i lus//sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du//de dag 'byung ba rab tu ston//phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste//'jig pa dag kyang rnam mkhyen nas//zad pa'i dus
27b3(mdo sde): su mi gnas pa//gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams//gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams//gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na//mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med//'khor ba'i rgyan/
27b4(mdo sde): gyis khyer ba'i rnams//yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin//bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la//gcig la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltor yang //byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong //'ju ba'i gnas dang rten
27b5(mdo sde): med par//de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnamaso//sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa yi//rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams//sa yi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir//rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang //
27b6(mdo sde): sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung //'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyi chos//rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis///'phags pargyan stug po//bam po gnyis pa//kun tu bzang
27b7(mdo sde): po mi yi bdag/gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches//rdo rje'i snying po la smras pa//mthun pa dag la dbang byed dang //lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag
28a1(mdo sde): dang //rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na//gang yang sdug po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i//rgyal skyas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag/gang gis sdug ces bya thos te//thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams/
28a2(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol bdag/gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul zos shing //ting 'dzin de yi tshul song //srug por ring por mi thogs 'gro/sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos//'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs
28a3(mdo sde): 'dzin dang //'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang //mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang //zla ba la sogs gzungs dbang rgyal//blo gros shin tu zhi ba dang //lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig/dru ma nam mnga'i
28a4(mdo sde): bdag po dang //phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang //rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams//gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas//chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams//stug po'i rgyal la gzhol ba dag/rgyal ba
28a5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang //khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste//rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso//sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras//rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris//'jigs med rdo rje snying po la//rin
28a6(mdo sde): chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //dbang sbyar khang pa bzang por yang //ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas//sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smros//dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid//'gro ba dag gi yang rab
28a7(mdo sde): 'byung //rjel sogs pa'i dngos pa dag/ji ltar chu 'ji mthal sbyar las//lis su bya ba thams cid bskyed//'gro ba 'di dag de bzhin byas//rnga dang pi bang sgra la sogs//las su bskyed las
28b1(mdo sde): dbyangs 'byin te//de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ci//bskyod pa'i las las kun 'byung ngam//rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du//dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas//sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du//dngos dang
28b2(mdo sde): dngos la rab tu gnas//de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ci//dngos po gcig la rab gnas sam//gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang //khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yer bcas//dga' ldan mtshe ma rab rnams dang ///
28b3(mdo sde): dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci//mi 'am ci dang dru ma dang //gya nom snang bas byas sam ci//'og min thor tshugs can gyis sam//'on tam gzugs med rnams kyis byas//lha rnams bdag po thams
28b4(mdo sde): cad kyis//gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam//'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam//rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzod dam//'on tam rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams//zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam///
28b5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor la mkhas rnal 'byor can//sangs rgyas zhing du zhugs rnams kyis//sa rnams thams cad byas sam ci//gang la nor pa rab tu gnas//gang 'di nor pa snang ba dag/smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin/
28b6(mdo sde): te//rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin//'gro ba gang gi phyogs la gnas//yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can//yon tan med dang yon tan gnas//ma yin phan tshun 'brel pas na//yon tan
28b7(mdo sde): tshogs su rnam par gnas//nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du//ga' 'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam//'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams//sa rnams la ni gang snang ba//'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba
29a1(mdo sde): 'am//'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam//khyu mchog gis sam sngun zas sam//ser skya yis sam rang gis sam//gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa//rang bzhin gyis sam dbang
29a2(mdo sde): pos sam//dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa'am//'on tam ma rig sred pas sam//lha yi drang song the tshom za//lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te//grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams//sa la gnas pa'i
29a3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can//'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul lam//'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam//rmi lam yin nam smig rgyu 'am//sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam//gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang //
29a4(mdo sde): kha gnyis sbrul bzhin gnas pa 'am//'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam//'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam//mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba 'am//'on tam skra'i tshogs lta bu 'am//byed dang
29a5(mdo sde): las kyis mi byas shing //dbang po ku be ras ma byas//mchod sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'bras sam//sbrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam//sgyu rnams shin tu phal che bas//nan tan rtag pa ma yin te//'gro//
29a6(mdo sde): ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min//rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste//'gro bango ba nyid kyis grub//las kyi bag chags rnams las byung //rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni//kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste//des ni sna
29a7(mdo sde): tshogs 'di dag kun//rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor//til bkru ma til mar ji bzhin du//lan tshwa'i tshe bro ji lta bar//gzugs la mi rtag nyid ji bzhin//skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas//
29b1(mdo sde): ji ltar bsung la sogs las dri//yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan//nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin//de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin//dgos dang byed pa med pa ste//yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs//
29b2(mdo sde): gcig dang tha dad med pa ste//mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs//rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med//nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste//grol ba'i so so rang rig pa//sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can d+hi//
29b3(mdo sde): gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste//snga med sems dang sems byung gis//rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste//nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o//de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin//phan tshun mtshan nyid tha ma
29b4(mdo sde): drad//'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste//de yi ldan pa rig pa min//ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang //rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin//mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong //rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan
29b5(mdo sde): gyis min//de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams//de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas//rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong //sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin//des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang //ji
29b6(mdo sde): ltar nor bu phug pa rnams//skud la brgyus dang 'khor lo bzhin//las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa//ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang //lag dang thal sbyor bskor ba yis//kun tu bskor cing snod byed pa//yon tan
29b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par ldan//de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi//khams kyi gzugs brnyan lhan cig tu//sa ni rnam par byed pa ste//phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams//gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun//nam mkha' skam
30a1(mdo sde): tshogs ji bzhin du//gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas//rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor//ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams kyi//rjes ni snang ba ma yin te//bar snang yod pa ma yin
30a2(mdo sde): na'ang //bya rnams rgyu ba'i byed pa med//de bzhin rnam par shes pa mi//bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min//rnam dag par snang 'dra ba dang //dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung //bag chags rnam
30a3(mdo sde): pa'i nyes pa yis//mi chags pad+mo'i zla ba bzhin//pad+mo la ni chu med min//chu la zla gzugs med pa yang //chu song zla ba yod pa ste//pad+mo'i 'dab la de bzhin chu//mig la bud med gzhon nu dag/
30a4(mdo sde): mig gis mthong ba jir mi 'gyur//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes//las rnams cig car byed pa ste//'gro ba dag gi lus la ni//khyab gnas sa bon kun can no//stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar
30a5(mdo sde): yang //sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas//tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog/dod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis//sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang ston//
30a6(mdo sde): rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la//spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o//ba lang sogs pa'i rwa mthong zhing //bong bu rwa ni med pa ste//ma mthong bar ni med pa med//ba lang rwa yi med pa yang //phyin ci log tu dmigs pas
30a7(mdo sde): med//phyin ci log tu mnar sems la//shin tu phra ba'i rdul gshig na//yod pa de dag med par 'gro/med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te//med pa yod ces rtog pa ni//yod pa med las bltas pa ste//
30b1(mdo sde): pan tshun bltos pa'i rgyu las so//blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste//khong du chud pa skye ba med//mgal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min//ji ltar sgra tshogs mthong ba bzhin//dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag/ci zhig mthong
30b2(mdo sde): nas 'byung ba bzhin//blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par//yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa//rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed//lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te//ming dang 'du shes 'brel pa dang //rang bzhin gnyis
30b3(mdo sde): kyi bag chags kyi//mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung //grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o//thog ma med pa'i dus na bsagaso//gnas ngan len gyi yul las byung //rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las//sems kyi tshogs
