30b4(mdo sde): ni 'byung bar 'gyur//gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang //kun tu skye ba mi yi sems//rdzu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs//snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te//'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas//rtogs
30b5(mdo sde): bya'i dngos po yod pa min//bro dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni//bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste//byis pa rnams kyis mi rigs pa//bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams//rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang /
30b6(mdo sde): dus gcig tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur//sngon med bag chags ldan pas na//kun gzhis don thams cad can//rgya mtsho'i dnga' rlabs ji bzhin du//rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar//gar byed cing ni rab tu
30b7(mdo sde): 'byung //rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do//blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag/yul dang rig pas bskul ba'i phyir//sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis//bdag la bdog gir 'dzin par byed//ji ltar sa
31a1(mdo sde): la rnam rtog med//'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs//dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni//de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o//ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis//rang gi
31a2(mdo sde): lus la mnyed pa dang //phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la//bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang //ji ltar shed can la la dag/bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa//de bzhin blo ni brtags don la//
31a3(mdo sde): don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o//blo yi yul du bya ba 'di//khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas//phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang //rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin//sangs rgyas rnams
31a4(mdo sde): kyis 'di kun gzigs//sa la ji snyed sdang ba dag/rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs//sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so//chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang //rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa//mi
31a5(mdo sde): smra'i dngos la dgar gyur te//bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi//lha yi bsam gtan mi g.yo ba//sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa dang //stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs//mthong nas
31a6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor lam gnas pa//thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus//rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so//'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med dang //'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi//mun pa'i
31a7(mdo sde): tshogs nas phyir byung ste//stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so//sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas//sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas//gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi//sangs rgyas sku yang
31b1(mdo sde): rnam byung nas//mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul//su dro ci 'dod pan par ro//stug po yi ni ming phyung nas//rgyal ba'i skyes po thams cad kyang //phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te//gcig la gcig
31b2(mdo sde): ni rab smras pa//stug po dri med bsod nams te//sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed//rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul//yu bus de yi sgra thos te//thos nas
31b3(mdo sde): bdag cig dga' ba'i yid//stug po rnal 'byor ca ni gnas kyi//brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya//'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can//gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa//zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad
31b4(mdo sde): mo dang //sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang //tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su//gtsang ma'i gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams//de dag thams cad sems pa ni//tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi 'gro/tshangs pa
31b5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor chen po can//mun pas de dag bslad par gyur//thub pa mi shes thub rig gi/ji ltar gnas ni thob par 'gyur//tshangs pa de na kun tu sems//blo yis tshangs pa rig pa'i mchog/'dod
31b6(mdo sde): dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag/rgyu ba de na med pa ste//nam mkha' khang pa gnas rnams dang //'du shes med pa de bzhin te//mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi//rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro//
31b7(mdo sde): bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci//bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur//bdag 'gro'ang brtan zhing rtag pa yi//ther zug 'dus ma byas sdug tu//gal te yang na thub pa de//rnal 'byor mnga' ba
32a1(mdo sde): lha'i yang lha//mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi//pho brang stug po der 'gro 'am//thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo//de skad smras nas thor tshugs can//mthong ba shin tu
32a2(mdo sde): 'bar ba yi//sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams//gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i rnams//khyed la ci 'tshal ci gyis shig/sangs rgyas dbang po bkra' stsal gsol//stug po ji ltar
32a3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur//gzugs yul 'di las phyir log cig/der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams//stug po de ni thub chen yul//bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing //'du shes med pas ni 'thob/
32a4(mdo sde): ste//de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gi/mur 'dug gzhan na grags pas kyang //rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob//tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos//mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste//
32a5(mdo sde): do ni de nas phyir log ste//tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo //de yi phyir na der 'gro ba//tshangs pa yis kyang mi thob pas//gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams//der 'gro yod pa yod ma
32a6(mdo sde): yin//ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed//stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang //rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur//sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul//rnal 'byor
32a7(mdo sde): can gnas stug pa de//'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos//de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad//sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni//thub can rdo rje snying po yi//rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis//rgyal
32b1(mdo sde): ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod//dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis//gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig/mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan dang //gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams//thub pa'i ga' nim
32b2(mdo sde): lus par//smra bar su zhig nus pa yod//gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams//thub chen thub pa bsnams pa dag/sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab//mchog gi gtso bos sangs rgyas kyi//rnal 'byor
32b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor med pa la//su yis ji ltar bstan par nus//mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang //dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag/gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te//gsungs shig gsungs shig/
32b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras//rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dpal dang //byams pa mi 'ami hri yi bdag/rnal 'byor ca ni gzhan gang de ni//de dag smra ba smros shig sgrogs//nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste//lha drang
32b5(mdo sde): sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang //de nas shin tu rnga brdungs pa//gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras//de dag de skad smang na//thor tshugs can gyi tshangs pa 'od//su 'khod kun las smras pa ni//
32b6(mdo sde): stan gyi mchog la 'dug nas de//ngo mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhing //thub pa rnams kyi tshogs 'khor na//rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang //skyob ma mkhas pa de dag kyang //khyu mchog thub la 'dri ba
32b7(mdo sde): 'dod//rgyal sras rdo rje dbang po la//skabs 'di ji zhig su zhig la//rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa yin//ku ru bu dang di li pa//'khor lo 'khor ba man mtha' te//yang na yob na shwa la/lha rna
33a1(mdo sde): mi yi gtam brjod dam//gnyi gu mig shwa ku la 'am//de bzhin gzhu stong bdog pa la'ang //'on tam gnas srung po la 'am//'khor lo 'khor ba gzhan dag la'ang //'dod nga /
33a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang gzugs med la'ang //'du shes med gnas gnas pa la'ang //nam mkha' mtha' yas rnam shes sam//'on te cung zad med pa dag/thub chen rang sangs rgyas dgal 'ang //nyan thos rgyal
33a3(mdo sde): ba'i sras la'am//sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa yi//rgyal dbang rnams la gtam 'di'am//'di ci lha min lha rdzas sam//'on te skar ma'i de bzhin nam//ji ltar gyur pa khyod kyis gsungs//
33a4(mdo sde): bdag cag slob ma phyogs su nyan//bla ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang //rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad dag/phan tshun shin tu dpyod par byed//dri yi ting 'dzin 'gro song rnams//rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig
33a5(mdo sde): thos pa//thor tshugs can las mngon du ste//slob ma bcas par nyan 'dod pa//gtsang gnas bdag po nyid kyang yin//thar zla blo gros mi zad dang //nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin//mthu
33a6(mdo sde): chen spyan ras gzigs dbang dang //rnal 'byor shes pa gzungs kyi dbang //lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang //gtsug na rin chen blo gros shing //lag na rdo rje zhi ba'i blo//lag na rin chen b+h+yo
33a7(mdo sde): chen dang //'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag kyang //bye ba'i zhing rnams kun nas 'ongs//rdo rje'i snying po blo can la//de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas//pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa'i rnams//rgyal ba'i
33b1(mdo sde): sras la gsol ba 'debs//blo chen rab tu bshad par gyis//rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod//'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul//da ltar byung ba'i gang tshig kyang //rgyu dang dpe yis rab gsal bar
33b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi zhal nas byung ba rnams//gdon mi za ba'i tshig 'dri yang //khyod kyis rgyal bde zhal nas//thams cad ma lus thos pa ste//skyon med de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen//ting 'dzin dbang sgyur rgyal
33b3(mdo sde): po yis//thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas//rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis//rnal 'byor can la tshig smras pa//rgyal ba'i gsung rab ma lus par//smra bar sus kyang nus pa med//de yi byi ni brlangs
33b4(mdo sde): ma gtogs par//sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi//sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal te//sangs rgyas byin gyis brlangs pa dag/nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang //dbang sgyur gnas bzang
33b5(mdo sde): 'khod rnams la'ang //ye shes dad pas smra bar bya//sangs rgyas rigs byed tshul yin te//nga las 'di dag thams cad nyon//de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes dge/rgyal po rnams lag tam 'di
33b6(mdo sde): min//mi bdag mchog rnams 'das pa yang //'di ni sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtam//sdug dkyil phun sum tshogs rnams kyi//rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul//sangs rgyas kun gyi phun sum
33b7(mdo sde): tshogs//de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes phra//rtog med rtog pa spangs pa ste//so sorang rig mkhas pa'i yul//brjod pa dang ni rnam par bral//de ni smra bar dad pa med//bdag gis de yi
34a1(mdo sde): mthus thos pa//lha rdzas kyi ni ye shes dang //ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog gis//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa ni//stug po'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag pas//thams cad phyogs
34a2(mdo sde): las rnam grol zhing //yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa//yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang dral//dbu ma'i lam ni dge ba ste//gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha rjes tshul//sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par byed//
34a3(mdo sde): dbu ma'i lam po de nyid kyang //mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa ste//rnam par rtog med dmigs med pa//sdug na gnas pas shin tu mthong //thub chen de nyid lam shes pa//bdag med ye shes
34a4(mdo sde): mkhas rnams kyis//bla ma'i tshig 'di thob pa dang //rnal 'byor can rnams thams cad kyang //rkang pa gnyis la mnyam btud nas//rdo rje zhes la smras pa ni//rnal 'byor can rnams nyan par brtson///
34a5(mdo sde): /skom pa rnams ni chu 'tshal bzhin//khyod kyi zhal nas btung 'dod pa//tshig gi sbrang rtsi bung ba bzhin//rnal 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs//rgyal ba'i sras rnams shin tu nyan//rnal 'byor can rnams
34a6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor to//ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen rnams//zhing gi bdag po rgyal chen rnams//rnal 'byor lam la rtog byed pa//bde gshegs bka' ni nyan par ro//khyed kyi zhal nas rnam byung ba
34a7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra//khong du chud byed mtshan bzang dang //tshangs pa'i yang dag gshegs pa dang //dbang po'i don brags khyad par du'o//sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung //sgra yi don la
34b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa yi//de phyir bdag ni smar ma mos//brtag bya rtog pa rnam par spangs//bar snang ri mo ji bzhin dang //grib ma stong la sogs pas spangs//de ste snang na rmad du rung //de bzhin gshegs pa thub
34b2(mdo sde): pa'i bka'//mkha' la bya rjes ji bzhin du//blta bar shin tu dkon pa bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'//de ni bstan par mi nus so//sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis//dpe yis kun tu
34b3(mdo sde): rab bstan gyis//dpe dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid//thub pa'i zhal nas rnam par byung //de yi tshig la dpe med de//rmi lam lta bur bdag la snang //rab rib mgal pa bskor ba dang //skra yi tshogs dang
34b4(mdo sde): de bzhin 'dra//ji ltar sgyu ma'i grong khyer dang //rlung ni shin tu blta dka' dang //sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba ste//rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs//'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs pa//thub pa'i gsung ni de
34b5(mdo sde): bzhin te//bdag gis rnal 'byor can dbus su//bshad par de phyir dad pa med//'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste//de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams//sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa//
34b6(mdo sde): de phyir smra bar dad pa med//'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams//sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'//dpe med sems dang yid las rnam par
34b7(mdo sde): 'das//ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing //lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin//snying ku thub pa'i mchig rnams kyis 'thungs te//de yi 'thungs lhag bdag gis de ring bshad//
35a1(mdo sde): de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang //bstan par nus pa ma yin la//lha yi lha yi yul yin te//mkhas rnams dge ba 'phel bar byed//mi yi gzugs su byas nas su//sangs/
35a2(mdo sde): rgyas zhes ni mtshan ldan pa//cod pan can dang gzhan la snang //gzhal med khang gnas gzhan la yang //'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang //mtshan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs su//sa la
35a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs snang ba ni//mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel//dus rnams bzhi po thams cad du//sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la//stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te//rnam par bye ba
35a4(mdo sde): rab tu mdzad//bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang //gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang //de dag tu yang ci dgos pa//sa la lus can rnams kyis te//ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad//stud po'i
35a5(mdo sde): dkyil na bzhugs shing ste//stug po de ni dri med gnas//sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi//ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol mtshams//thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas//dri med stug na rnal 'byor//
35a6(mdo sde): ldan//zla ba bzhin du 'gro la snang //sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis//sna tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni//gang la gang snang gang gis kyang //ji ltar gang la de bde ba//de dag de
35a7(mdo sde): la thams cad du//de phyir cha yis mig le gnas//shes can yul can thub pa ni//rnal 'byor mkhyen pa shes pas snang //dbang po che gzugs gzhan dag dang //'jug 'dod kyi dang
35b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gzhan//ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste//thub pa la ltar mkha' bzhugs pa//shes byed shes la yang dag snang //sa nadas nAn dan la//sa nang gzhon nu me dag dang //sgra gcan mi
35b2(mdo sde): ci tum bu ru//ig sh+lo ku dang zla ba'i rigs//thams cad sa yi rgyal po la//thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste//sU ni su su ci 'dod bzhin//la lar mur 'dug spyod sprul te//ston pa 'gro
35b3(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis mthong //tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par yang //ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing //rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang //zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khrung dong //ro nye zha nye mu tig dang /
35b4(mdo sde): pad+ma ra dang an+da rnyil//bai DUr+ya dang shel dag dang //asma garba mu sa ra//tshul dang rtag pa thams cad ldan//mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang //gang gis lus can su su tsir//sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin
35b5(mdo sde): de la de bde thams cad du//thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung //lha yi bu mos mi skyod do//de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis//'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang //de bzhin klu yi bud mod kyis//
35b6(mdo sde): mi ci lha min bu mo dang //gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no//de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal//gzugs can rnams kyi yul de bzhin//nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang //cung zad med
35b7(mdo sde): pa'ang de bzhin te//'du shes yod min ma yin gyi//gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med//kun tu la sogs 'di dag lam//rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos//ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag
36a1(mdo sde): kyang //srog chags rnams kyis yod pa//lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul//stug na gnas la stug na med//zhing de dri med bsod nams te//stug po snying po shin tu
36a2(mdo sde): mdzes//de bzhin thar pa ther shes la//zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste//stug po de ni yun du rtag/mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang //stobs dang mngon
36a3(mdo sde): mkhyen ting nge 'dzin//yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus//sangs rgyas de na rnam par mdzes//sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te//rnamathar bden pa stong pa nyid//mtshan med smon pa med pa dang //
36a4(mdo sde): pa rol phyin drug de bzhin te//bsgom dang sbyin deng tshul khrims dang //shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thog/yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi/'dus ma byas pa sangs rgyas sku'o//rtog med
36a5(mdo sde): rtog dang bral ba ste//bdag med yid dang dbang po rnams//shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing //michen gyis kun nas shin tu bsags//sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs kyi//dkar po'i
36a6(mdo sde): las rnams byas pas na//sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog/stug po'o ngos su 'thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas gnas//nyi zla rnam par spangs pa ste//rgyu skar skar
36a7(mdo sde): phran sdang ba dang //zla ba dus dang ltad mo med//rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'chang dang //sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang //kun nas bzang po'i stug pa de//nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang //
36b1(mdo sde): dus kyi 'bri ba de na med//nad rnams gang yang yod pa min//'chi rga med pa'i gnas yin te//stug po de ni zhing gi mchog/thams cad gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas//dri med mthong ba'i chos can gyi//
36b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing stug bsod nams te//lha rnams kun gyis smon par bya//rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du//sa dang sa la gnas pa dag/sems tsam rang bzhin dngos po rnams//gang phyir rab
36b3(mdo sde): tu bstan pas na//yid dang sems dang kun bzhi'i tshul//rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te//chos la bdag med rang bzhin dang //gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ste//lus ni shin tu gnas
36b4(mdo sde): gyur pas//thub pa rnams ni der 'dong ste//rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/stug po zhing rab dam par ro//stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o///lus ni rdzas dgu'i
36b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin can//'dus byas rdul phran tshegs yin te//yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs//'byung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te//khu chu khrag las kun 'byung ba//sngon med rnam par
36b6(mdo sde): 'phel ba ste//steng gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin//sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thig mi med//las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g.yogs//dug gi shing gis sa bzhin du//dpa' dang rdul gyis de
36b7(mdo sde): bzhin du//mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste//lam rgyud dog par shin tu 'phyan//dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye//yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni//phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas//klu dang
37a1(mdo sde): yi dgas sha za dang //'bar ba lha yi nang du yang //skye 'am lha min 'jig rten nam//sngags 'tshong rigs su de bzhin te//'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su//bsam
37a2(mdo sde): gtan zhig cing mngon skye ba//'khor lo 'khor rigs dam par yang //ba raro bar du ni skye bar 'gyur//skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni//gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na//su yi gang gi gang tshe las///
37a3(mdo sde): lhan cig skyes pa rab byung zhing //lhan cig skyes pa'i las tshul gyis//lam dang la mo du rab tu 'jug/brtag med rtog dang bral ba yi//gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na//thar pa rnams kyi
37a4(mdo sde): thar gsum ste//yi ge yi ge med byas pa'o//'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs//de ni 'od snang mchog yin te//yang dag bla nas slar sbyangs pa//stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas//bye
37a5(mdo sde): ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis//sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas//de ste de shes yod na ni//dog pa'i lam nas 'grol bar 'gyur//de lha'i skyes bu skyes pa ni//khyad par shes zhes rnam
37a6(mdo sde): par brjod//lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs//rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing //mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba ni//byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi//ma rig sred dang las skyes min//nyon mongs
37a7(mdo sde): las las shin tu byung //mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing //mtshan ma med las rab 'das te//yi ge med pa de byung nas//spros pa thams cad rab bral zhing //stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro///
37b1(mdo sde): danigs las sems zhig 'gyur ba ni//rnal 'byor can gyi sgra rmongs pas//rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang //mtho sa bung med bsnyen rmongs kyis//gang che chub chen ma 'dug pa//de tshe sems ni 'byung /
37b2(mdo sde): bste//lam las spyod ces bya ba yi//tid 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa//gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na//ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye//sems can 'du shes ming song na//ting nge 'dzin
37b3(mdo sde): las bral bar 'gyur//nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi//ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur//rgyas la gang tshe thub dbang gyur//gnyis dang bral bas byung ba yi//sems ni mngon par ni 'jung
37b4(mdo sde): /ngongo//de bden don rnal 'byor te//bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin//bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya//de ste sdug dkyil 'dod na'o//mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste lo'u
37b5(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i///rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems//mi rig 'jig rten rgyu yin te//'don sems dang sems 'byung mthu//gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o//de yi mthus kyang
37b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa ni//rnam shes rnams dang dbang po rnams//mi rig la sogs rnam pa 'di//rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa//yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang //'byung ba rnams dang 'byung
37b7(mdo sde): gnas dang //yul dang dbang po 'jig rten dang //skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no//thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa//rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi'o/
38a1(mdo sde): ba dbang por bcas pa 'di//'jig rten btsal bas ma bskyed de//bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa//nang dang phyi dag rtag par te//'gro ba gnas dang g.yo ba dag/lha yi lha
38a2(mdo sde): yi yul yin te//sa la sus kyang mi mthong ba//mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste//thub grags mtshan ma can gyis so//phan tshun bcings pas bcings pa ni//srid pa sna tshogs rnam pas te//
38a3(mdo sde): rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na//sems kyi rnam par mi rtogs so//lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi//mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs pa'i thabs//thob nas slar du ldog pa ni//sa ma yi ru rigs sems pa//
38a4(mdo sde): 'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang //gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang //mir gzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang //gang gzhan mchod sbyin 'bras bu dang //phyugs bcing ba yi 'bras bu yang //tshangs pa'i 'jig
38a5(mdo sde): rten nas ldog go/chos gsum can gyi 'gro ba dag/ci nyes mi rig thor tshugs can//yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba//chu skyes bzhin du snying po med//'di yis tha dang mi rnyed pa//stug po de
38a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas//de ni rnal 'byor gyis 'thob ste//stug po rnal 'byor rig pa'i gnas//de bas tshul gcig tshangs pa'i bdag/rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug brtson par//'di la bdag
38a7(mdo sde): gnyen gang dag kyang //skye zhing 'chi ba yod med de//mi tshad gzhig tu med pa ni//lus can kun gyi rnam par shes//bag chags kyis ni mi gos pa//sngon med dus nas byung bas so//yid kyi
38b1(mdo sde): gnas ngan len bsags pa'i//spros pas kyang ngocir mi 'jug/ji ltar lha rdzas chu skyes dang //nam mkha' la yang phyag dang dang //sprin gyi drims nyi bra la//de bzhin mgos rnal 'byor can//mA
38b2(mdo sde): bshol rab tu brjon par gyis//thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs//rnal 'byor bde gshegs lha yi rdzas//rnal 'byor can gyi tshul bskyed pa//tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te//ye
38b3(mdo sde): shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing //mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang //'khor ba las ni 'da' bar gyis//'di la khams rnams gang yong med//phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang //ming dang
38b4(mdo sde): gzugs dag rgyur byas shing //lus can rnams kyi yid kyang skye//ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis//'bar te 'bar bar rtog pa med//de bzhin phung po shing rta steng //ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//
38b5(mdo sde): dwags sred dang dri za yi//gnas dang sna tshogs snang ba ru//ri dgas ngus pa la sogs mthong //yang dag ma yin lhas bskrad pas//de bzhin yul las byung ba'i sems//khabu long lta bur 'khor
38b6(mdo sde): skyegang yang 'di la dngos medang //'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba ba'i//g.yo ba dra ba bshes par//brus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog/'byung ba sems kyi chags las na//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug
38b7(mdo sde): mi bya//ji tsam ma zhig lus yod dang //ji tsam du ni blo 'byung ba//de bar rnal 'byor ye shes la//ma bshol bsam gtan rab tu gyis//thams cad sgyu marmi lam ltar//'byung ba gsum kun rab tu
39a1(mdo sde): ltos//smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ni//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//ji bzhin dri za'i grong khyer na//'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang //de bzhin lus la phung po'i spyod//ci phyir rnal
39a2(mdo sde): 'byor 'jug mi bya//rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs//ji ltar rmi lam rmi bas mthong //de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs//'dus
39a3(mdo sde): pa rdul gyi phung po yin//'di sems sems byung tshogs yin par//rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig/'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams//phan tshun kun nas 'dus pa ste//gdeg pa la sogs
39a4(mdo sde): ldan pa yin//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos//ro bslas lta bur gnas pa ste//byed pa gang yang yod pa min//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//dbu ba'i gong bu
39a5(mdo sde): lta bu kun//'gro ba gnas shing g.yo ba'i rnams//smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su//rdza la sogs pa shin tu rtogs//tshor ba chu bur lta bu ste//bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin//chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du
39a6(mdo sde): byed rnams//zhig pa grugs pa snying po med//rnam par shes par sgyu ma 'dra//de yi dngos la gnas pa med//rtswa shing gnas pa ji bzhin no//ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya//'di ni rmi lam rnam myos
39a7(mdo sde): 'di//'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'did//'di dag thams cad smig rgyu ste//de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer ro//gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi//khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba//de kun blo yis rtogs bya ba//
39b1(mdo sde): 'jigs ni nga rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis//nyes pa'i rkyen ni rtswa dang bcas//ye shes me yis rab bsregs na//lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro/rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang //'jigs med 'di ni
39b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med//mtshan ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can//mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde//mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo//sems kyi spyod yul bden pa min//bden pa blo gros spyod yul te//sems ni
39b3(mdo sde): shes rab spyod yul te//mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o//kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin//gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste//mtshan ma ming dang yul rnams dang //sgra la sogs pa kun
39b4(mdo sde): brjod pa'o//dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni//lus can rnams kyi 'ching ba'i rgyu//'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu//gang 'grol gang gis 'grol ba dang //thar dang thar pa'i bde ba dang //mthong
39b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos la gnas pa dang //bdag med pa ru shes nyid kyang //'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o//de nas mi bdag rin chen gtsug/blo chen byang chub sems dpa' yis//rnal 'byor can
39b6(mdo sde): kun dbang la smras//rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la//bye ba'i zhing rnams thams cad la//rgyal sras khyod ni brtson pa ste//rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshad de//rnal 'byor can la nye bar gnas//rnal 'byor
39b7(mdo sde): the tshom cod pa ste//dpe rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir//brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag/lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa//tshul ni sgra yis brjod par mdzod//tshig tu brjod pa ri cir mi bgyi//
40a1(mdo sde): gnad dang zur gyis rnam par mdzod//mi zin pa yi rgyu rnams dang //bag bzungs dor gyis gzhom par gyis//phung po'i rgyu rnams bsal bar mdzod//yang dag 'gyur//
40a2(mdo sde): ba med pa dang //dge ba yis kyang mkhas pas so//ring po mi thogs thar pa 'thob//phung po'i rgyu rnams bsregs nas su//chos min chos kyi tshe 'byung ste//'di dang gzhan du'ang 'thob par
40a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//shes pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol//sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings//mi shes las dang sred pa yis//lus can rgya cher shin tu byas//gzugs dang snang ba yid
40a4(mdo sde): byed dang //rnam shes yul la mngon gyur pas//myur phyir khong du mi chud pa//spyod yul du ni sems rgyu ba'o//yid sngon 'gro ba chos rnams te//lus can kun gyi de bzhin no//yid 'gro
40a5(mdo sde): yid na gces pa dag/yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad//gang dang gang gi rdzas kyis so//mi rnams stug por 'grub pa yi//des ni de yi dngos 'gyur ba//sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin//
40a6(mdo sde): ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs//tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes//rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin//de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis//dbang sgyur po drang dge ban//thams
40a7(mdo sde): cad dag na snang ba ni//rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas//mya ngan 'da' dang myi ngan 'das//stug po mthar mchog ye shes te//chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang //sdig de rnal 'byor can gyi
40b1(mdo sde): gnas//de ni mtshon gyis mi chod de//de ni mes kyang mi tshig pa//mi chod pa dang mi byed pa//de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o//de ni chus kyang mi gsher te//rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo//de ni rnga ltar 'jig
40b2(mdo sde): pa dang //nan tan byas shes byung ba min//rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig pa//skye can kun gyi rnam par shes//rgyu yis sun dbyung ma yin pa//'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi ste//dam bcas yan lag rnams
40b3(mdo sde): kye nga /mtha' ma thugs med par 'gyur//dam bcas pa si rnam paca' dang//rgyu mi khyad par rgyu dag ste//de bas da la rnal du med//rtag pa can gyi spyod su la min//rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na//
40b4(mdo sde): de ni stug po sems spangs pa'o//rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin//de bzhin/shegs pa'i pi dra ts+tsha/me skyes sngon dang tha ma med//lhun gyis sgrib pa'i stobs las byung //rgyu med pa dang las
40b5(mdo sde): skyes min//dbang nga chen pos byas pa'ang min//gzugs med gzugs dang 'dad pa las//yang dge 'das te gnas pa yin//'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su//gzugs dang gzugs med
40b6(mdo sde): 'du shes med//mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas//sdug pa'i nang ni rnam par mdzes//phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste/rgyu chen rnams kyi spyod yul min//yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang brag/gcig
40b7(mdo sde): dang gzhan pa spangs pa'i//ces pa dang ni bzhinadzin//'dod kyil dang rang dang ba men//khyu mchog gis byigs mi yin//de bzhin ga can gsum gyi meng//rdul gyi rkyen pam rgya
41a1(mdo sde): yin//sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med//nga bo nyid kyis bskyud pa ni//'dod rgyal gyis kyang mirnyed do//ma rig las dang sred ngas rgyan//mi shes las kyang smos pa smin/
41a2(mdo sde): khur med khur gyi yul yin te//'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul//lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen//sa bcu dag tu rnam par sbyangs//rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs yul//don gyi dam
41a3(mdo sde): pa ston pa'o//las ci las min gang zhes te//byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur//las dang las min bshad pa ni//rnal 'byor can rnams bder gyur pa//sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te//
41a4(mdo sde): lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis//phyi dang nang dang thams cad du//gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas//sems kyis sems ni mthong yin yang //khong du mi chud dbus pa rnams//kha gnyis
41a5(mdo sde): sems de lus can gyi//yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa//bdag gi byed pa'ang de bzhin byed//yul lta bur yang rab tu snang //rdza ma la sogs gzugs su gnas//rdza la sogs pa'ang yod pa
41a6(mdo sde): min//'di yi don la thub pa dag/rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos//rnal 'byor de yang mi rtogs pa//bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas//sems 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de//me long
41a7(mdo sde): zla ba bzhin du gnas//ji ltar rab rib rab rib can//skra tshogs ltos shig ltos shig kye//phan tshun dag tu ston mod kyi//bdag nyes dbang po zhan byung gi/'di na gang yang skra tshogs med///
41b1(mdo sde): rgyan dang nor bu dag kyang ngo //yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar//dbang po'i nyes pas mthong ba yin//de bzhin rtog can dbang gis 'di//bdag gi blo ni rdza ltar gnas//tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thub
41b2(mdo sde): par//rtog pa med pas rab tu 'dzin//gang 'di mang po snang ba dag/sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan//sna tshogs thams cad bdag gi sems//rdza la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan//nang du gyur
41b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs rnams dang //mtho ris gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang //gang 'di phyi nang bya ba rnams//thams cad sems las byung ba'o//rgyan sdug rnal 'byor gang yin pa//de na gud na yod pa min//rnal
41b4(mdo sde): 'byor can gyi bsod nams kyis//zhugs pa 'di la bslab par gyis//dbang sgyur lha rdzas gnas dag dang //yang na gzugs can rnams gnas dang //'du shes med pa'i gnas su'am//'og ma yin pa'i
41b5(mdo sde): gnas su yang //cung zad med dang rnam shes dang //'du shes yod pa ma yin dang //sna tshogs kyi ni gnas dag tu//'dod chags kyi ni phyogs bshig na//khyod ni myur du der gnas pa//stug po rnal
41b6(mdo sde): 'byor can gnas su//rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas te//stug po der ni 'gro bar gyis//rnal 'byor de la spyad par gyis//bdag gi gnyen gyis ci zhig bya//bdag gi gnyen ni rtag tu 'tshong
41b7(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i lam rgyud rgyu yang yin//dbang po rnams ni g.yo ba ste//bud med rnams la'ang blo 'khrul pas//khu chu khrag mnam mi zhim pa'i//'ji bar srin bu skyes gyur pa//dgu 'am bcu zhig pa
42a1(mdo sde): dang yang //khu chu srin nas mngon par skye//dbang po rnams kyis kun yog pa//srin bu g.yo ba ji bzhin te//rim pa de yi tshul gyis na//ji srid sems can gnas par du'o//lus
42a2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi skye la ltos//tshe tsher de dag byung ba ste//pha dang ma ni stong dag dang //bu dang chung ma brgya dag kyang //thams cad gnas sa rnyed pa ni//lus can skye la gnas pa'o//rmi lam dag na
42a3(mdo sde): bu med pa'i//mo gsham bu 'byung ji bzhin du//bu rnyed pa yi dga' ba dang //rmi lam rmi tshe de nyid ldan//de ni shir gyur de nas de//rmi lam shes nas sad pa dang //rmi lam gyi ni bu shi med//
42a4(mdo sde): gang yang skye ba yod pa min//chu bo rab tshal bu dang ni//grong khyer dag dang ri rnams dang //grong dang tshong 'dus phyugs lhas dang //dka' thub tshal bu'i gnas rnams dang //'gro ba dag gis rgyas pa'i
42a5(mdo sde): yul//nong dang ba lang lug gis gang //'jig rten gyi ni longs spyod kyang //de dang 'di dang gzhan du'ang snang //ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir rgyug pa//rmi lam rgyug pa de bzhin te//gdag dang bskum
42a6(mdo sde): la sogs pa yang //de dang 'dir yang snang ba yin//mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba//skye ba med cing 'tsho med par//slar sod nas su sems pa ni//bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no//ji ltar ri dang
42a7(mdo sde): de'u rnams kyi//bri bar kun tu snang ba bzhin//de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang //mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam//ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba zhig/bud med lhan cig rtse dga' rmi//sna tshogs
42b1(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang //lha rab btsun mo mnyam pa dang //gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos pos te//sad nas rnam par sems pa ni//ci zhig bden nam rmi lam yin//rmi lam bud med lhan cig tu//rtses nas phyir
42b2(mdo sde): ni bdag sad de//'di brdzun bus pa slu ba yin//de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun//rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no//dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang //ma dang phu nu po dag kyang //rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste//
42b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor sbyar bar dzir mi byi//dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang //ri dang ri yi sman gshong dang //'o ma 'byung dang ma la ya//lhun po bya 'da' dbang chen dang //dngas kyi mi dang kai las//char 'bab
42b4(mdo sde): la yang gang gnas dang //dzam+bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang //gang dag bdud rtsi za ba dang //phan du kam bam pa ra ya tra//ko bi dar na gang 'khod dang //ri rab nang na gang gnas dang //dpag dAs ma shing la gnas pa
42b5(mdo sde): dang //rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang //nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //thams cad kyi na rnal 'byor 'di//glang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste//pad+mo'i gnas su brtan bcas te//skyil mo krung du mnyam
42b6(mdo sde): gzhag cing //rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis//'dod dang bde las rnam par dben//dbang po dbang po'i don gyi rnams//thams cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing //lcags kyus glang po ji bzhin du//sems
42b7(mdo sde): ni mnyam par bzhag par gyis//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge/'dod dang dga' ba dben la sogs//yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang //khyad par
43a1(mdo sde): du yang gzugs med dang //'du shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams//nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang //'du shes yod min med min rnams//nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i/
43a2(mdo sde): dbyibs//pad+mo dang ni 'od 'dra zhing //nam mkha' ri mo me 'dra bar//rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong //'di dag thams cad spangs nas su//snang ba med par rab tu gnas//gang tshe mtshan
43a3(mdo sde): mod rnal 'byor cin//rnam par mi rtog chags med na//sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong //zhing dang zhing namanyam bzhag pa//de dag phyag gi dbang bskur bar//de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te//
43a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang //sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung //sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas//kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur//stobs dang mngon shes dang yang 'jog/
43a5(mdo sde): gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin//thams cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur//thub pa rnal 'byor skyed pa'i yang //gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzhigs shing //mchog rdul yan chad nyin dben phyir//
43a6(mdo sde): yod las med par 'gyur ba ste//bong bya'i ba lang ra mthong bzhin//cha shas med phyir cha shas can//phung po las ni phung can med//de bas las kyi 'bras gyur pa//'di ni sgyu ma'i bus byas bzhin/
43a7(mdo sde): 'di na las med 'bras bu med//las kyi sgrub pa'ang yod pa min//'jig rten byed pas ma byas te//byed pa byed pa ma yin no//byed la byed pa yod na ni//'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur//
43b1(mdo sde): thug med byas pa'i nyes pa yis//thub pa dri ma can du gyur//de ste lam rgyud sna tshogs rnams//chu dang nam mkha' sa gnas pa'i//lus can lus la kun gnas te//skye ba bzang po gnas su ste//ris
43b2(mdo sde): su 'gro ba yod pas na//ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'gro//dbang po so so bya ba yang //ji ltar 'dod par yul 'dzin te//'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba//zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las//de bzhin skye
43b3(mdo sde): dang gnas dang 'jig/las kyis byas par 'gyur sems na//rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin//brag ca dang ni glog 'dra ba//smig rgyu ri dgas sred pa ltar//dngos po rnams bsgoms rnal 'byor can//theg
43b4(mdo sde): ma med nas bsags pa yi//mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis//sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang //sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags//dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin//yul rnams rmi lam 'dra
43b5(mdo sde): ba ste//byed dang las dang bya ba yang //rnal 'byor sgrub pas mi brtag go/rtog pa nyams pa'i rtog pa can//rnam myos shes pa nyam chung bas//byed par rab tu rtog pa ni//bya bas 'gro bar byas
43b6(mdo sde): par te//'jig rten gces pas byas ma yin//rdul gyi rkyen las byung ba'ang min//rgyu med pas kyang byas ma yin//ngo bo nyid kyis byung ba'ang min//rdo rje lcags dang khab long dang //rin chen
43b7(mdo sde): phreng ba rgyan rnams kyis//ji lta bu yi las shig byas//nor bu gser du ming btags pas//bya dang ri dgas khra bo dang //tsher ma rnams kyi rno dngos dang //'gro ba sna tshogs ngo mtshar ba//rnam
44a1(mdo sde): rtog las las ma skyes so//las ci gang las ma yin zhes//rtog can bden la myos pa ni//bden pa'i dngos por mi shes pa//'di ni rnam rtog las min du//'o ma'i nang na yod
44a2(mdo sde): pa'i dus//rjes su mi bde rnam par 'gyur//rnam par rtog pa'ang thams cad du//de bzhin dngos po rnams la 'jug/dngos po skye ba ma yin te//dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'ang med//rnam
44a3(mdo sde): rtog sna tshogs de dag ni//rtog pa can gyis mi rig gi/'gro ba'i ris kyi dngos po dag/rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhig/sbyar zhing rnal 'byor de la zhugs//las dang las min ma sems par//
44a4(mdo sde): ris su 'gro ba'i dngos po yis//zla ba nyi ma rnam mdzes pa//rlung gis shin tu bskyod nas kyang //mkha' la brten pa med par 'gro/shin tu phra zhing shes dka'i las//stug por gnas par rab
44a5(mdo sde): mthong //las de ci zhig yod par 'gyur//zhugs brtson rnal 'byor can dag lo//ji ltar me ni shing gi ri//thar par byed pa skad cig tu//rnal 'byor can gyi thams cad las//ye shes mes
44a6(mdo sde): tshig skad cig tu//las dang bag chags lhan cig tu//mang po'i dus nas bsags pa dag/rnal 'byor ye shes bag chags kyis//thams cad zhig byed skad cig tu//ji ltar sgron mas mun
44a7(mdo sde): pa'i chags//skad cig du ni bsal byed pa//ye shes sgron mas zung ba de//mi shes rnam par sel bar bya//rgyan stug po theg pa chen po'i mdo las bdag gi las kyi bskyed pa zhes byab
44b1(mdo sde): /le'u rdza pa'o///'phags brgyan sdug go//bam po gsus pa//'jis pan+d+ha migapag palas//dzA m+WA gnas pa 'i sbyis kyi mas//phan d+hun kun nas 'dus 'byor ba /
44b2(mdo sde): ma yi dbus na snang ba ni//re re la yang khyim med do//rjes dang dngos la rnam brtags na//rdzas kyi rnam pa 'dus pa la//khyim zhes gdags shing brjod pa ste//sIr mo bon tun kun 'dus na//
44b3(mdo sde): skyur lag pa'i phyi drung ngu//lag pa gnyis ni bsdus las 'gyur//tha dad pa las mi 'byung ngo //g.yul dang shing rta bsnyems dril khang //grong khyer nags tshal de bzhin te//ri dang sprin dang dba' rlangs
44b4(mdo sde): nga //bregs ga dang 'dra ba'o//swabAr+dz+dza ts+tshin+d+ram+b+hi 'dag/sngam bu rdza sogs grags pa ste//mkhas le drangs pa thams cadakyang /rmi lam 'dra ba na tu snang //de bzhin du mo khyim sna tshigs pa/
44b5(mdo sde): drim pa'i lan rgya dag pa n+d+ha//rnams kyis ri bzhin zla ba ste//khyim ltar rtag tu mi gartan la//'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //bdag las mA yin gzhan las min//rtag dang cing las na
44b6(mdo sde): smib rgya sna ste//yid med rnam thal dge badzin//rmilam smin ltar rdzong bste/ga ma ma'i ga /na gyi 'dza 'dri rje//dngos kun gcig gis gcig d+hAg/rang bzhi gas
45a1(mdo sde): par mi rung ste//rnal 'byor can gyis yang dag mthong //rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang //rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te//rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas//rdul phran
45a2(mdo sde): mchog ces de phyir brjod//de phyir blo ni phyir ldog ste//sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan spangs//rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can//de tshe ngal bso'i yid du 'gyur//ngal bso'i yid ldan
45a3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can//bcings pa kun las grol bas na//'di dang pha bir mi skye ste//bsam gtan tshul la mos pa rnams//sna tshogs rin chen snying po yi//gnas na dbang can de dag rtse//yon tan
45a4(mdo sde): dbang byung nyes pa med//rig 'dzin bud med mang po dang //thub pa rnams kyis rab mchod cing //rmi lam bzhin du gnas pa yin//'di na gnas kyang tshangs pa dang //thub dang thub pa'i bu rnams dang //
45a5(mdo sde): rig 'dzin tshogs kyis de bzhin te//spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus so//'di yi thub pa'i rnal 'byor yul//de bas bsam gtan brtson par gyis//'di ni kun gyi yul ma yin//de phyir grogs po bstan par
45a6(mdo sde): gyis//brtan pa sa rnams sna tshogs dang //'od can rnams kyi gnas su yang //'dod chags phyogs dang bcas pa dang //gti mug zhe sdang de bzhin du//bcom ste stug po rab yangs pa//yid
45a7(mdo sde): bzhin zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro//de ni 'chi bdag yul ma yin//rnam shes spyod yul de bzhin min//mtshan ma med pa'i gnas yin te//rtog pas de bsgrub ma yin no//'di ni lha rdzas
45b1(mdo sde): gnas yin te//thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yi//de bas zhing mchog de 'dod na//thub pas bsam gtan de la gyis//'dod chags zhe sdang rnam bcom ste//nga med nga yi 'gro med du//'dod chags zhe
45b2(mdo sde): sngar mi bsam par//bsam gtan mchog la bsgom par gyis//phan tshun yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir//gnyis kyi blo ni rab tu 'byung //yod med rtog pas de bzhin du//rnam shes rnams la kun gzhi'o///
45b3(mdo sde): bud nang ro smad shas rgyas shing //skra bzang mig kyang mdzes pa dang //sna legs 'phral ba'i dbyibs sdug la//smin ma sdug cing blta mdzes pa//ji ltar la la der chags pa'i//yid kyis rnam par myos
45b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems//lta zhing rnam par rtog pa'i tshe//mkhas min de la shin tu myos//'gro 'dug 'greng yang de bzhin te//snom za gnyid kyis log pa na'ang //'dod can gzhan du mi sems te//'dod
45b5(mdo sde): pa can mo yid la byed//de bzhin khyod blo rnyog pa can//rnam pa kun tu yid la gnas//rdzab yul rnyog dang ldan pa yi//bcings pa'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig/ji ltar la la rtog pa can//blo yi spyod
45b6(mdo sde): yul rnam 'khrul pa//ma he dag dang ba la glang dang //glang po dag dang bse rnams dang //rang ga kri s+yA sa ra dang //sha ra b+ha dang su ra dang //gnyen dang g.yag kyang de bzhin te//mgo kA ra rna dang khyu mchog
45b7(mdo sde): gi/ru chen rnam par mthong ba dang //'di bden gzhan du mi 'gyur zhes//seng stag bong bu sogs pa yi//rwa rnams la ni med ces te//yod dang med pa'i lta ba yang //mi mkhas rnams
46a1(mdo sde): la rab tu 'byung //de ltar gzhan gyi mthong zhing //bong bu'i mad ces rnam rtog 'byung //ci ste gzhan gyi ma mthong na//bong na med snyam de mi 'byung //log par dmigs pa'i rgyu
46a2(mdo sde): phyir//'di na med ces rtog pa 'jung//de la dwamigs pa med ngas kyang //gdon mi za bang med la brten//rtag ca nang rgyal rtog stsal la//cho gas spyod yul marten cig/ba lang ba man ma te rnams//
46a3(mdo sde): rtog pas brtags pa ji bzhin te//de ltar khyod kyis sems spyod dang //phung po skye mched spyod yul dag/mngon sum tshad ma dag gis sam//shes rab kyis kyang rnam par ltos//rnam grol mtho ris
46a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba'am//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang 'gyur//tshangs pa'i gnas su tshangs par ram//mchem rab dang gnas dben dang //rin chen sna tshogs gnas su yang //dbang sgyur rnam par mdzes par
46a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//'od cung rgyas pa dag tu 'am//'dod khams bdag po dbang can nam//nyi zla ba dag bdag gnas su 'am//gzhan yang 'od 'bar gzer yang rung //sum cu rtsa gsum rgyal chen dang //'phrul
46a6(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i gnas su yang //tshangs gnas bcu dang ldan pa yi//rnal 'byor can na rnam par mdzes//gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong //'dod med mi dros de bzhin te//'og min gnas kyi lha
46a7(mdo sde): rdzas na//'og min shin tu rnam par mdzes//cung zad ming mkha' rnam shes dang //'du shes yod med ma yin dang //de bzhin 'phrul gyi bde can dang //zhing bzang gzhan du de bzhin te//mkha
46b1(mdo sde): la 'gro dang spobs pa bzhin//'khor lo 'khor ba'i rigs su gnas//grol ba rnams kyi grol yul la//su gnas de dag rnal 'byor can//'dod chags stobs las sngon rgyal ba//de dag bzang po'i sa
46b2(mdo sde): la gnas//'di lta'i rnal 'dor ldan pas nA//rnal 'byor la ni thub par rtse//rdza ma 'jig partso mo yi//ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur ba dang //skad cig 'jig la skad cig ste//mi rtag nyid kyang rtag pa 'i//sa bon/
46b3(mdo sde): ji bzhin myu gu la//rgyu rnams de dge 'dra ba yin//myu gu gzhan min sa bon las//sa bon nyid kyang myu gu min//sa snar rnams las rdza snar 'byung //chos dam dmar rur mngon par 'drung //gnag dang sngar
46b4(mdo sde): dang 'dres pa dang //gri bo dmar po dag kyang ste//'dam bu las ni sgog par 'gyur//rwa las lan tshwar de bzhin te//mi gtsang sbrang bu dag las kyang //srin bur 'gyur gzhan mi 'dra mad//rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras
46b5(mdo sde): ni//sa rnams gang na'ang yod pa min//gyur pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung //rdul phran gang dag rgyur 'gyur ni//dngos po 'jig pa med par te//rnam par rtog la mi rtog cing //rgyu yi bdig dang nang gi bdag/
46b6(mdo sde): bdag gi mchog kyang med pa ste//bdag dang dbang byi yid dang don//'dus pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te//phrad las 'byung dang rnam shes dang //rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin no//shes can shes byas yul rnams pa/
46b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i stobs dang ldan pas ni//sde rung stobs dang bzhin bcas pa'i//nyon mongs bdud rnams gdul bar bya//sred pa 'jig rten dma' bar byed//s+yAng rtsis bdakan mang po bzhin//sred
47a1(mdo sde): bcom zhing thub pa'i rnams//rnam pa mang las rnam par grol//sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa na//'khor las rnam par mi 'grol te//sred dang rnam bral 'thar bar
47a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//de bas rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis//yun ring yod pa'i bag chags ni//sbrul gdug khros pa ji bzhin yang //'di dang pha bir 'drid pa ni//'khor ba'i lam rgyud dog par ro//
47a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgyan stug po las rnal 'byor rnam par phye ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o////sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnam phye dang //bdag ldan de yi byin gyis brlabs//
47a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras//bye ba'i zhing na bzhugaso pa dang //khams gsum gnas pa thams cad dang //sa gnas rnal 'byor ldan pa dang //bde yod zheng dang stug po ste//rnal 'byor
47a5(mdo sde): can gyi zhing mchog dang //sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbus bzhugs pa//rdul phran bzhin bzhugs bdag gis mthong //rnal 'byor de las bdag langs nas//sa la rgyal ba de dag ni//stug po'i
47a6(mdo sde): zhing na bdag bzhugs shing //rgyal sras thabs cig bzhugs pa dag/me tog a ta si 'dra ba'i//mkha' la zla 'dra bzhin bzhugs mthong //mthe bo'i tshogs dang rab 'dra ba//sa rnams
47a7(mdo sde): dge la rab sbyor ba'i//rnam grol snying po bdag gis mthong //'din bu khyod su zhig ces//snying po de ltar sems gyur te//thub pa 'di ni gcig cig snyam//de tshe sku ru zhugs par gyur//'gro/
47b1(mdo sde): ba rnams kyang skur zhugs nas//thub pa pad+mo'i snying po yis//sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs spyod dang //khams gsum kun na gnas par yang //gang tshe mthong ba de dus na//kye ma mtshar ces bsam pa dang //
47b2(mdo sde): de tshe thub pa lha yi lhas//rnal 'byor yul ni rab bsdus te//thub pas sngon bzhin bzhag par gyur//kye ma bsam yas lha rdzas 'di//rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs gzugs//sangs rgyas lha yi
47b3(mdo sde): yul yin te//bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis mthong //chos kyi sprin gyi ting 'dzin dang //dga' dang mi g.yo de bzhin te//ring song mngon du gyur pa dang //'od byed pa yi ma lus par//sgyu ma
47b4(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro la sogs//gzi brjid can yang ma lus par//gzugs rnams kyi yang yul yin te//'og min thabs las byung ba'o//de ni yid bzhin 'gyur sku yis//dbang gi yon tan brgyad po
47b5(mdo sde): rnams//phra tshogs che ba'i yon tan dang //'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang //bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang //ji ltar 'dod par rung ba'i rnams//thob nas sdug pa'i dbus yul na//rnam par
47b6(mdo sde): gnas shing rab tu rtse//sprul pa'i lha rdzas stug po nas//phyin pa dge ba de dag kyang //lhun gyis grub pa sangs rgyas kyi//'phrul pa rnams ni rab tu 'gyed//rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras su//thabs
47b7(mdo sde): cig bzhugs par kun na snang //de ltar sa 'di sna tshogs te//rang gi gzugs ldan rnams kyang 'dres//cha las phyir ldog de yi tshe//bya ba byas pas stug po'i gzhi//shes pas bcad cing mkhas
48a1(mdo sde): pa'i rnams//thub pa dag gis stug po mthong //gzhal med pad+mo 'dra ba na//me ltar rab tu 'bar ba yin//thub pa rnal 'byor bde mos pa//rnal 'byor can dang lhan cig
48a2(mdo sde): gnas//dpal be'u mtshan dang thams cad ldan//phra ba'i lus can rang gi 'od//de dag dbus su thub pa'i dbang //khyod ni gnas par rab tu 'gyur//ltos shig lha yi cod pan dang //dru ma
48a3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci yi bdag/gzhal med dbye ba mang po yis//zla ba bzhin du rab tu 'bar//thub pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras//dga' ldan la sogs lha yi mchog/a ta si yi me tog 'dra//shes
48a4(mdo sde): rab bzang zhing mtshan mang ba//phreng bcod pan thogs pa'i rnams//gzhal med mang pos gnas pa ste//lus ni rab tu 'bar ba dang //kun mkhyen thams cad mngon gyur pa//thogs pa med
48a5(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa dang //kun tu bzang po stobs chen te//zla ba 'dra ba'i gzhal med kyis//stug po'i gangs chen mtsho la gnas//rnam pa du mar thams cad nas//thub pa rnams kyis bstod pa ste///
48a6(mdo sde): chags med tshangs pa'i khyu mchog dang //grub dang dri za tshogs rnams dang //mkhas dang nges par ldan pa yi//skyes bu'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang //rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas//rnal
48a7(mdo sde): 'byor spyod pas khyad par du//gzims pa lta bur mthong ba ni//de dag le lo bral bas te//gnyid dang snyom sogs bsrabs pa yis//sangs rgyas lha yi rjes su 'brang //mur 'dug kun
48b1(mdo sde): gyis mthong gyur cing //de bzhin lha dang tshangs la sogs//'dzam gling pa dang 'og min dang //'phrul gyis sprul pas thub mthong ba//'gro bas sna tshogs kun gzugs su//sa la kun nas bzhugs
48b2(mdo sde): par te//cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po yis//mgon po shin tu rnam par mdzes//la la nyal zhing rab tu 'bar//de bzhin gzhan dag phan tshun 'chag/la la g.yen spyi brel cing sgom//de bzhin
48b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang mya ngan 'da'//la la mngal du 'jug pa dang //skye dang 'byung dang dka' spyod dang //byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing //chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ro//sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas
48b4(mdo sde): yul//sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med//rgyal ba'i sras po 'jogs med pa//de dag kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te//thub pa shAkya'i seng ge yis//ji ltar brnyes bzhin grogs po rnams//rgyal sras
48b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa yis//'di dag kun la yid ches kyis//yid ches gyur na sangs rgyas sam//thar par 'gyur ba the tshom med//'khor lo 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur//spobs can khams
48b6(mdo sde): kyi bdag po dang //tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas su yang //gnas 'gyur 'khor gyi bdag por 'gyur//dri med zhing gi pad+mo la//thub pa'i dbus su skye bar 'gyur//pad+mo'i dbus su skye ba yang //brtson
48b7(mdo sde): 'grus ldan pa'i sras kyis 'thob//brtson pas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//ngag chags 'dod pa'i rgyu las kyang //'dod bdag bdag po pham byas shing //theg pa gcig la rab tu 'jug/brtson
49a1(mdo sde): 'grus ldan zhing zhi med pa'i//rigs kyang thub pa rab tu ston//sras po yangs pa'i rigs gyur cing //zhing dang zhing du bdag por 'gyur//sangs rgyas nyid du smon sems na//
49a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rigs ni rnam par dag/rnam dag rigs can sras de ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te//myur du sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba//de bzhin thub pa 'tshang rgya'o//rnam sangs
49a3(mdo sde): rgyas nas nyer 'tsho ba//tshangs la sogs dang rnal 'byor can//sa ltar rtag pa'i dus su yang //lus can rnams la nye bar gnas//thams cad sman gyi rnal 'byor can//ji ltar grong dang
49a4(mdo sde): grong gnas pa//nang rnams rab tu sel ba ltar//rab tu mkhas pa de byed pa//rnam rtog med pa'i yid kyis te//bcad kyang g.yo zhing 'gul ba med//'di ni rnam par rig pa tsam//yid
49a5(mdo sde): ni nang dang phyi yang spyod//bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste//nor bar mthong zhing mi g.yo'o//yid kyi rnam shes yul can gyi//kun gzhi kun nas gnas pa ste//gcad dang gcod par byed
49a6(mdo sde): pa dang //de nyid gcad bya gcod pa'ang yin//lus can kun gyi kun gzhi ni//las kyi bag chags rnams kyis yog/khar ba nor bu nyi ma dag/ldan las me 'byung ji bzhin te//gtsub ma gtsug/
49a7(mdo sde): stan 'dus las min//mis kyang byas pa ma yin no//de bzhin sems yid rnam shes dang //dbang po don dang yid dang las//sems rnams rab tu skyer gyur pa//rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs
49b1(mdo sde): ji bzhin no//sdig rgyu nam mkha' sgyu ma dang //rmi lam ma yin nor ba'ang min//sbal pa rus sbal spu dag dang //ri bong rwa dang mnyam pa'ang min//me ni shing las skye bar 'gyur//glog ni de bzhin
49b2(mdo sde): sprin las so//me la skyed pa su yang med//rdza sogs rdza mkhan lta bu'o//ji ltar rtswa dang shing dag la//brten cing lhan cig sgyu 'byung ba//de bzhin mos la sogs pa kun//sems dang sems byung lhan
49b3(mdo sde): cig gnas//sems kyi yul ni bsam du med//stag na gnas pas legs par mthong //lha rdzas sngon med lhan cig skyes//mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' bzhin//so sor ma brtags 'gog pa
49b4(mdo sde): ltar//dus gsum rnam par spangs pa ste//'od can rtag tu dag pa ni//lus can kun gyi kun gzhi'o//dang po ches pa'i zla mdog ltar//bye ba'i zhing du snang ba ste//ri rab gnas shing 'khor ba yang //
49b5(mdo sde): dngos po 'jig pa ma yin no//de bzhin yid sems rnam par shes//sems can khams na 'khor mod kyi//de la 'phel zhing 'bri med de//rtag tu rang bzhin 'od snang ba'o//ji ltar zla ba skye 'bri bar//
49b6(mdo sde): mi shes 'gro ba rnam rtog kyang //skye 'dri zla la yod pa min//gling dang gling du'ang rab tu snang //de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes la//byis pa mi shes 'gro rnams kyang //rtag tu skye brir rnam rtog ste//de
49b7(mdo sde): ni zag med sangs rgyas so//kun gzhi 'di la ji ltar yang //'byung bas tha dad mi 'gyur te//'jug pa'i rnam shes song gnas pa//bag chags kyis ni zla ba bzhin//chu klung dbus kyi shis
50a1(mdo sde): bur//chu bo'i klung dang 'grogs mod kyi//tha dad mtshan du'ang rab tu grub//rgya mtsho chen por de bzhin 'gro/de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //rtag tu bag chags ldan
50a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba//rnam par shes pa bdun pa dang //'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste//kun nas nyon mongs rnam byung dang //rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yang de//chos mthong 'phags pa rnams kyi yang //
50a3(mdo sde): de ni rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag pa//byol song mi dang lhar skyes dang //sha za lto 'phye yi dgas dang //lha min dri za 'bar ba yi//lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang //sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes
50a4(mdo sde): la'ang //de nyid rgyur ni gyur pa ste//de rtogs nas ni sangs rgyas dang //rigs dang theg pa gzhan min 'gyur//thams cad lus la rtag tu gnas//spyod 'os yod la rnam par 'dug/
50a5(mdo sde): dpal dang ldan la khyad par du//thams cad kun kyang rab tu gnas//rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la'ang //'gro ba dog pa thams cad na//de ni kun tu gnas pa ste//lus can rnams kyi lus
50a6(mdo sde): la rten//'bras bu re bdag dang rgyu yi bdag/nang gi bdag kyang de nyid la//byis pa rnams kyis khor zug brtag/de yi dbyings la thog ma med//gnas ngan len dang las kyis bskyed//bag
50a7(mdo sde): chags thog ma med nga sa bsags//'tsho zhing gso bar byed pa ni//rnam par shes pa bdun po ste//yid ni rtag tu rlung dang mnyam//g.yo zhing myur bar rab tu 'jug/lus can rnams
50b1(mdo sde): kyi dus gnas shing //khams kyi gong la gnas pa'o//las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa ni//dbang po rnams la khyab par gnas//rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu//dpa' nangs bzhin du rgyu bste//rdul phran
50b2(mdo sde): dus dang gtso dang //de bzhin skyes bung bang bcas su//kun gzhi gcig pu dge bar//rtog pa can gyi sathor drug brtag/rtag tu ma tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs//gso zhing rgyu 'i byung byed pa ste//kun
50b3(mdo sde): bzhi sa rnams thams cad du//phyi nang bcas par gnas pa yin//de ni sa yi rgyu yin par//rgyu can rnams kyis brtag pa ste//de yi 'gro ba shin tu pra//rtog pa can rnams myos par byed//bdag
50b4(mdo sde): don dbang po yid mos pa'i//yang dag ma mthong myos par 'gyur//sngon gyi las kyis bskyod pa yi//rnam par shes pa sred pa'i rgyu//sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba dang //mi rnams kyi yang rgyu yin
50b5(mdo sde): no//'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams la//rdo rje'i snying ngos yang smras pa//kun gzhi dang lugs dge ba ni//rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong thos te//kun gzhi'i mchog tu dge ba ni//thams cad lus la zhen pa
50b6(mdo sde): ste//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing //rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba'i//rgyal ba 'khor lo 'khor bar yang //sa rnams la lar 'gro bas mthong //ji ltar zla ba skar tshogs dang //lhan
50b7(mdo sde): cig mapa' la gnas pa ltar//rnam shes rnams dang kun gzhi yang //de bzhin lhan cig lus la gnas//ji ltar dbang gis sgyur ba'i lha//lha yi bu mos mdun 'dar cing //rin chen dbus
51a1(mdo sde): na rnam mdzes pa//de bzhin kun gzhi sa rnams la//ji ltar chu dbang chu yi lha//chu klung rgya mtsho mching rnams la//ji bzhin skye ldanas yang ste//de bzhin sems ni rnam
51a2(mdo sde): par mdzes//ji ltar gzhal med gnas pa'i gnyi//ri rab logs na rnam par mdzes//lha rnams kyis ni phyag kyang bya//de bzhin kun gzhi sangs rgyas sar//sa bcu dag la lhan cig
51a3(mdo sde): tu//spyad pa spyod pa rgyal ba'i sras//theg pa chen pos phyung ba ste//lus la gnas pa rnam par mdzes//brjod pa'i zhal gyis rtag par yang //rgyal ba rnams ni kun nas bstod//nyan thos
51a4(mdo sde): rnams dang rang rgyal dang //rgyal ba'i sras rnams khyad par du//sa dang sa la rnam dag pa//rgyal ba'i sras shes mngon bsgrags dang //rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras//de dag kun
51a5(mdo sde): bzhi 'di la brjod//lung ston lung bstan 'gyur ba yi//rgyal sras rgyal ba de bzhin te//kun gzhi dri med bsod nams kyis//de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin//'di lta bu
51a6(mdo sde): yi kun gzhi'i yul//sdug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can//thub brtson rnal 'byor spyod pa yis//rab tu mthong gis rnal 'byor gyis//sangs rgyas drag dang rang sangs rgyas//nyan thos rnams
51a7(mdo sde): dang mur 'dug gzhan//de nyid rtogs nas mthong ba ni//rnal 'byor 'jigs med rnal 'byor ro//rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul gang //'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung //rnam par
51b1(mdo sde): shes par gyur pa ste//rdza la sogs pa sa ma yin//'di ltar nor pa gang snang ba//sna tshogs rdza grags ci yang rung //de ni kun gzhi gyur pa ste//snang ba nor pa'i mtshan nyid do//kun gzhi chu klung /
51b2(mdo sde): dri bzhin du//sna tshogs snang mngon 'gro bas mthong //bag chags rnams kyis bsgos pa'i sems//gzung dang 'dzin pa rab tu 'khor//dngos po skye 'dra ma yin te//sgra yi chags dang smig rgyu
51b3(mdo sde): min//skyes dang mi skyes ma yin te//stong dang mi stong rnam par spangs//dngos su gcig med mi 'gyur te//ring dang thung la sogs pa bzhin//sgo ma'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni//gang na ci yang
51b4(mdo sde): yod pa min//de ni rig sngags sgyu ma ste//skyes bu rnams la rab tu snang //smig rgyu sgra la sogs pa'i tshogs//gnyis las nye bar mngon pa ste//gcig med por ni gnyis po yang //ma byung
51b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar ma 'gyur te//sgyu la sogs pa rnam brtags pa//'di ni rnam shes gyur pa'o//sgyu med sgyu zhes bya ba yi//dngos po gang dang gang yang med//ci yang rung ste gang yod pa//sgyu mas byis
51b6(mdo sde): pa'ang yod pa yin//myos par byed par 'jig rten na//sems la dbang med rnams la yod//sgyu mi dag gam gyo mo dag/sna tshogs sgyu mas ma byas te//g.yo ba gang dag ci yang rung //de ni snang
51b7(mdo sde): min sus mi mthong //'di la rnam rtog g.yo ba ni//khab len dag la lcags bzhin te//sems can med la mi rtog pa'i//shel sgong nor bu ji bzhin no//kun gzhi kun nas sna tshogs pa/
52a1(mdo sde): byed pa bzhin du snang bste//rgya gang 'chi bar 'gyur mad kyi//'khor ba po ni gang yang med//rmi lam 'dra bar s+ya shI dag/rab tu mthong na rnam par 'grus//thub pa gang mchu
52a2(mdo sde): pan//grol bzhes ni brjod pa ste//rigs dang gzung gis brtan pan-i//spangs rgyas kyu mchog de yin no//thams cad chos la me 'ong bzhin//srang yin de bzhin tshad ma ste//dngos bdun
52a3(mdo sde): skyon ma bzhin//khab blang ba yi rdo ltar gnas//rnal 'byor lam gyi mtshan nyid do//'jig pa rnams kyang rnam par bzlog/bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mchog/rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin
52a4(mdo sde): na/kun nas nyon mongs zad par byed//lam yang rnam par sbyong ba'o//dam pa'i don gyi spyod yul te//'gyur ba rab tu ston pa'o//'phags pa rgyan stug po las le'u bdun pa'o//
52a5(mdo sde): drinas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te/gtsug gi rin po che'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /dbang byed kyi gnas dang /nor
52a6(mdo sde): rin pa che'i snying po'i po byang na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i skyes rnams la'ang snang bar byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du dgod pa sngon po la smras pa/yang dag
52a7(mdo sde): pabaji lta ba bzhin du dgod bstan pa kha ba yod pa'i ngos la ri dgas thams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dgas kyi rigs shig yod de/de ni gtsam sgyu brgya stong gis ri dgas mang po nye bar drid cing
52b1(mdo sde): thangs la bab pa'i ri dgas rnams bsad cing za'o//ri dwags drus ma phru bu dang bcas pa mthong na'ang phru gu'i skad du 'bod do//ri dgas rwa can mthong na'ang rwa de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o//de
52b2(mdo sde): nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang /des de dag bag rton par rig nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o//rwa mthong na'ang rwa'i gzugs su bstan te//de dag bag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsod cing
52b3(mdo sde): za ste/ji ltar ri dgas zhes gtum pa'i ngang tshul can de rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dwags gsod pa de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'ang phas kyi rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par
52b4(mdo sde): zhen pa/bdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa/'dzin pa de dang de dag gis bcings pa de dang de dag la de lta de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis bdag tu smra ba yongs su rtog cing rdul phra mo yan
52b5(mdo sde): chad du rab tu shes par byed pa de dag la de'i bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid du gnas pa ni gzhan du rnam par shes pa tsam du mi gnas pa'i bar du ste/bdag yongs su rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis ni yid dang
52b6(mdo sde): dbang po dang don du ldan pa las shes pa skye ba mthong gi/bdag dang /yid dang /dbang po dang /don 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no//dper na me tog dang gos su phrad na bsung gi khyad par du
52b7(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ma phrad par ni bsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sems dang /sems las byung ba dang /yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa
53a1(mdo sde): snod dang ba dar lta bu'am//me mar dang rdza lta bu'am/smig lo dang i shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de/rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung
53a2(mdo sde): zhing bdag med la phra ba dang /bskyed du mi rung ba dang /cha med pa dang /dag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang /yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod
53a3(mdo sde): yul ma gtogs par rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so//'di nyid ni ri dgas kyi gcan gzan zhe gtum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang /med pa dang /gcig pa dang /mang
53a4(mdo sde): bo dang /thams cad dang /thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste/lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par zhen par yang
53a5(mdo sde): ltung bar byed do//mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud pa'i blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pha bi nas rab tu rgyug ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
53a6(mdo sde): dpa' dang bral ba/rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo can/'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa/theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi
53a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par phyir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas/stug po'i dkyil 'khor gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po'am stug po'i sgra'ang mi
53b1(mdo sde): thos so//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs su sbyang ba ste/'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang brtson par gyis shig/sangs
53b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gling stug por 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams la ston cig/rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o///khab long rdol ji ltar lcags//
53b3(mdo sde): longs kyis kun tu rab 'khor ba//de bzhin phung po'i shing rta ste//stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor//rtswa dang 'jim pa shing smig dang //thag pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las//khyim du ji ltar snang //
53b4(mdo sde): gyur pa//de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o//lcags dang khab long ro langs la//sems can nye bar dmigs med kyang //thams cad sems can lta bur g.yo//de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o//rgyal
53b5(mdo sde): sras phyag na rin chen gyis//gzugs mang rgyal mchog la smras pa//mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i snying po la//rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byos//rgyal sras 'jigs med mkhas pa'i rnams//kun gyis thos
53b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba ni//brtag bral brtag par mi nus pa//brjod pas rnam par spangs pa ste//ming dang ming can rnam bral ba//'on kyang 'du ba de bzhin te//sna tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi//rang bzhin
53b7(mdo sde): ci dang cir gnas pa//de nas gzugs mang rgyal po yis//rdo rje snying po 'jigs med la//rjes su 'brel ba'i skabs dris pa//dngos po don gzhan brtag pa ste//rdo rje'i dbang po'i dngos po gang //
54a1(mdo sde): la lA rab tu brtag byug//ming dang 'du shes sogs pa'i mum//yod das rdo rje snying pos smros//ming rnams sus byas ji lta thA//mad ni ci la rab tu gnas//mi mgon cig
54a2(mdo sde): ni thos pa dang //rdo rje'i snying pos de la smras//'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste//'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas//brjod las tha dad gyur pa yi//brjod par bya ba yod pa min//phung po
54a3(mdo sde): bzhi po ming yin te//gzugs kyang tsam zhes rnam par brtag/tsam la ming du btags pa ni//skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba ste//tsam la mtshan ma zhes bya bar//rgyal ba rgyal sras dag gis
54a4(mdo sde): gsungs//mtshan ma med par ming du ni//de dag rnam par rtog mi nus//de bas mtshan ma rten byas shing //ming du kun nas brtag pa yin//ji ltar lding dang lnga byid dang //b.rab yang
54a5(mdo sde): yod pa min//mtshan ma med par ci yang rung //byis pas de la rnam mi brtag/de bzhin sa 'di thams cad kyang //mtshan ma med par yod pa min//ci yang mtshan mar mi rtog pa//mtshan
54a6(mdo sde): ma yod na rnam par brtag/rdzu dang snam bu shing rta dag/gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod//'jig rten 'di ni 'di tsam ste//gzugs tsam rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur//tsam la ming du btags
54a7(mdo sde): pa ste//'di la yang dag ming yod min//ming med rnam par bral bar yang //sa rnams thub pas mthong ba na//rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug/rnam rtog med pa mi skye'o//tshor skye med
54b1(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyur pa//mi zad de la skye bar 'gyur//rgyu med phyir na ming med de//'du shes tsam la rnam par rtog/de bas rgyal pos rtag par yang //'du shes ma yin 'du shes sgoms//'di dag thams
54b2(mdo sde): cad 'di tsam ste//thams cad las ni gzhan med do//tsam ni gzugs su shes par bya//de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs//cha lugs ring dang sku yangs te//mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs
54b3(mdo sde): gcig/'du shes ming dang rnam rtog dang //brjod dang khyad par lhan cig ste//tsam dang mtshan ma 'du shes su//spyod par rab tu gdags pa ste//tsam la gnas de ming rnams kyang //kun rdzob don
54b4(mdo sde): du rnam par brtags//brjod pa med par dngos po ni//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te//rnam shes rnams kyi 'byung ba yang //rtogs bya med par yod pa min//rtogs bya ming dang tsam po ni//sa
54b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad de nyid de//dngos po gang la gang ming gis//brtag par bya ba de bzhin med//'di ni chos rnams chos nyid de//brtags na gnas pa med pa'o//'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste///
54b6(mdo sde): 'du shes can gyi dngos po med//de med pas na ming med de//ming med pas na rnam mi brtag/rnam par mi rtogs zhing 'gyur ba//bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin te//khur tsas ji ltar khur bkur ba//
54b7(mdo sde): de dang tha dad mtshan can te//de bzhin tsam ni ming gi khur//de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyer//sems la tsam zhes rnam par brtags//ming gis tsam du sems tsam gyis//'di ni skyes bu sdong ngo zhes
55a1(mdo sde): ci yang rung ste ming tsam brtag/'byung ba rnams dang 'dus pa dang //tsam yang gzugs la rnam par brtag/tsam po med par 'byung ba yi//tsam zhes bya ba mi dmigs te//
55a2(mdo sde): bum pa'i ngos la yon tan ltar//tsam la ming ni rnam par gnas//bum pa bum pa'i dngos po yis//rnam par dben zhing ming dang bral//bum pa bum pa'i dngos por ram//ming yang ming du
55a3(mdo sde): gnas pa med//rnal 'byor can gyis gang gi tshe//ming tsam g.yo ba med pa dang //rnam rtog gnyis dang 'brel ba yi//ming tsam yod ming mthong ba na//ji ltar me ldan lcags rnams dang ///
55a4(mdo sde): spra tshil dag kyang rgya skyugs kyang //chu dang mnyam par khu bar 'gyur//'on kyang chu yi yon tan med//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa//rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu//rtag tu las su
55a5(mdo sde): 'jug par byed//rnam par shes pas yun du spangs//khab long rdo las rten byas shing //lcags ni sems can bzhin 'khor yang //de dag gnyis ka byed pa med//sems can gson po
55a6(mdo sde): bzhin du g.yo//sems ni bdun zhes bgrang ba yin//kun gzhi brgyad po de bzhin no//bag chags srad pus brgyus pas na//sems can bzhin g.yo sems can med//lus na kun tu
55a7(mdo sde): rgyas par 'dug/'gro ba dog par 'khor ba ste//gcig las gcig gis mi shes pa//byed med lcags dang khab long bzhin//mgo bo du ma lce mang po//kha mang lag pa du ma dang //lus
55b1(mdo sde): kyang du mar rab bsgyur cing //de bzhin gshegs la mchod byed pa//shin tu mang ba'i zhing gi rnams//tshad med stong du 'gro byas shing //de dang der yang mgon po'i rnams//de dag kun la rtag
55b2(mdo sde): mchod byed//ri rab ri dang mnyam pa yi//me tog na bza' char mang po//sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas//de dag mchod pa rab tu byed//phreng ba phreng byed cod pan dang //rin chen brgyan pa sna tshogs
55b3(mdo sde): kyis//thams cad mkhyen dang rgyal sras la//rtag par mchod pa rab tu byed//sprin lta bu yi gzhal med khang //sna tshogs mang po'i gzugs 'gyur ba//mtha' ma na mkha'i mu dang mnyam//gzhan
55b4(mdo sde): yang rdul phran rdul snyed kyi//sprul mang lha yi bu mo yis//rol mo sel snyan rab bsgrags te//gzhal med dag la mngon gnas nas//de bzhin gshegs la mchod par byed//stobs dang mngon
55b5(mdo sde): shes dbang thob cing //dog pa'i sa nas ma nyams pa//chos kyi sprin las 'thon gyur nas//sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa'i rnams//sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs//ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
55b6(mdo sde): bzhag ste//gzungs la mkhas par gyur pa'i rnams//de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed//sangs rgyas yang dag brjod mos rnams//mtha' yas zhing du 'gro byas shing //yang dag yon
55b7(mdo sde): tan ldan pa dag/sangs rgyas yon tan rab tu brjod//dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste//rgyal ba dag dang thabs cig tu//rgyal sras so so rang rig pa'i//rtogs par bya ba'i ting 'dzin
56a1(mdo sde): skosgom//gnas gzhan gyur pa'i yon tan can//chos la bdag med ston pa'i rnams//spros pa thams cad rgyun bcad cing //dam pa'i don la rnam sgom pa//chos lnga rnams kyi
56a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang //rnam shes brgyad la'ang de bzhin te//mkhas pa byas par rtag gyur cing //mnyam par bzhig rnams mchod par byed//shin tu phra ba'i rdul 'dra dang //de bzhin chen po
56a3(mdo sde): lus kyis kyang //sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur nas//de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed//sa rnams kun ka bdag lus dang //yungs kar 'brur yang rab 'jud byed//rgya mtsho ba yang
56a4(mdo sde): rjes su byed//ba ling rjes kyang gangs chen mtshar//spu gcig rtse mor brtan g.yo ba'i//'gro ba rab tu 'jud byed kyang //gnod par byed pa ma yin te//'gro ba dag na rnam par spyod//longs spyod
56a5(mdo sde): can gyi skyed longs yul//nyi zla sa dang mnyam pa ste//'tshig med sa dang 'dra bar yang //rnam pa kun gyis phan 'dogs shing //me dang rlung dag 'dra ba ste//rtag tu chu dang smon 'dra ba/rin chen
56a6(mdo sde): khams kyi 'byung khungs ltar//sems can kun kyang nye bar 'tsho//skyes pa mod cing 'gags pa med//ma chad rtag pa'ang med pa ste//tha dad don min don gcig min//'gro med 'ong ba med pa'i
56a7(mdo sde): rnams//rnam par brtags pa'i ming dag dang //kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis//sems can rnams kyi don byed pa//ming dang ming med rnam spangs dag/sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam 'dra//
56b1(mdo sde): dri za'i grong khyer dpe bzhin te//smig rgyu chu yi zla ba 'dra//rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa dag/glog dang sprin dang du ba dang //mgal pa'i 'khor lo smig rgyu 'dra//'di tshul brtags pa'i chos rnams
56b2(mdo sde): ni//rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa ste//gang dang gang gi ming rnams kyis//chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa//de ni de na yod pa min//kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no//'di dag thams
56b3(mdo sde): cad ming tsam ste//'gro ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//brjod pa dang ni tha dad pa//brjod par bya ba gang yang med//'di ni sa yi rang bzhin te//kun tu brtags pa rab tu bstan//mig dang gzugs
56b4(mdo sde): las brten byas shing //gsum las yid de 'byung ba yin//rnga sgra me ni 'du 'phrod las//myu gu sa bon sa las rim//khang pa la sogs sna tshogs dang //snam bu rdza la sogs pa dang //
56b5(mdo sde): lus can rnams dang chos rnams kyi//'di ni rang bzhin gzhan dbang ngo //don rnams dor ba med pa dang //gang yang zag pa med pa'i chos//so so rang rig rgyud rnams dang //chos la bdag med/
56b6(mdo sde): nyid dang ni//thams cad chos kyi grub pa ste//rang bzhin du ni de brtags so//rang bzhin gyis ni chos kyi rnams//tha dad mtshan du bsgrags pa ste//chos rnams thams cad 'dres par ni//
56b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin med na rab tu 'gyur//gcig min rdzas rnams 'dus pa las//sgyu ma'i mkhan ngos gcig min gzugs//rtogs par sla ba ma yin pa'i//sgyu ma'i ri dgas byas pa bzhin/
57a1(mdo sde): de ltar dngos po thams cad kyang //rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags//rtogs par mi rung mi gcig gzugs//kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no//sna tshogs nor bu 'dra ba
57a2(mdo sde): yi//ri dgas rdzas kyi rgyu tshogs nas//sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rnam byas dang //sems can kun gyi gzugs bzhin te//de ltar dngos po 'di dag kun//rnam par rtogs pas rnam par brtags//
57a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba ste//kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no//ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs//tshon dang phrad na rnam par mdzes//de bzhin sa rnams kun ka ste//rtog pas rnam par
57a4(mdo sde): brtags byas na//yon tan dngos su mi gnas te//sgyu ma rmi lam sprin dang 'dra//smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ste//kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no//ji ltar dri za'i khang pa dag/khang pa ma yin/
57a5(mdo sde): khang par snang //rgyu med par yang mi snang ste//de bzhin sa rnams sna tshogs nyid//nyi zla gzhal yas khang rnams dang //tha mal ri dang rin chen ri//du ba sprin gyi gnod pas ni//nam yang
57a6(mdo sde): nyes par mi 'gyur te//bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las//rtog pas rnam par brtag byas na//dngos nyid mi 'grub dngos rnams kyi//rang bzhin kun tu brtag pa'o//rgyu las dngos
57a7(mdo sde): po mi 'byung ste//rgyu med las kyang ma yin no//rang bzhin zhes bya rnam rtog ste//dngos dang dngos med rnam par brtags//mtshan ma la ni ming rten te//gnyis la rnam par rtog pa gnas///
57b1(mdo sde): yang dag shes dang de bzhin nyid//rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'o//sems ni mtshan ma 'dra ba ste//mtshan ma yid la gnas pa yin//yid la sems rnams lnga po ni//dba' rlabs bzhin du rab
57b2(mdo sde): tu 'byung //sems ni bag chags rgyu ba ste//bag chags rnams la thog ma med//thog ma med pa'i blo yi yul//yul ni sems kyi nor ba'o//sems ni yul dang 'dra ba ste//sa rnams yul
57b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yin//thams cad sa bon kun gzhi la//rnam par shes pa kun kyang gnas//rnam shes bdun po kun gzhi las//rab tu 'byung ngo phan tshun dang //sems kyi rnams dang kun gzhi
57b4(mdo sde): la/rtag med chad pa'ang med pa ste//sa rnams thams cad kun gzhi yin//bar snang rnam par gnas pa ste//gsum po 'dus pa'i rkyen byung ba//bdag dang dbang po dag las byung //lus can
57b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnam shes ni//yul rnams rnyed nas 'byung ba ste//'di ni rtog pa can gyi tshul//rgyu dang las kyi rgyus byung ba//dbang po sa rnams thams cad dang //tshangs la sogs pa phyi rol dang //
57b6(mdo sde): de dag lha min las kyang min//rdul phran gyis kyang sa ma byas//sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi nyid//lte ba'i yul du g.yo ba yin//rkyen rnams kun gzhis ma byas te//rkyen gyis kun gzhi byas pa min//
57b7(mdo sde): 'di dag la ni gsum 'dus med//rnam shes 'on kyang 'khor ba ste//shel 'dra zla ba bzhin du yang //rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu//bag chags byung ba'i rnam shes dang //kun gzhi rtag
58a1(mdo sde): tu 'grogs pa ni//zla ba spyang kis zin pa bzhin//rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu//bag chags de las langs pa yis//rgyas par byed do yang dang yang //rgyas pa gzhan
58a2(mdo sde): yang rgyas byed de//de la'ang gzhan gyis yang dang yang //de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i sems//mthong nas sems de rnam par ldog/mi brtan yul la kun nas 'brel//khab long rdol lcags bzhin
58a3(mdo sde): te//kun gyi gzhi la sems yod pa//zag bcas zag pa med pa dag/bag chags dag gis bsgos pa'i rnams//'jug dang phyir ldog byed pa yin//ji ltar bsreg las me dus shing //gzhan du
58a4(mdo sde): me yang rab tu bud//de dang gzhan du de bzhin bud//de dag nas kyang spo bzhin dang //de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes dang //gzhan yang de las byung ba rnams//chos la rab tu rgyu ba ni//gtogs dang /
58a5(mdo sde): zag pa med pa dag/mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa yi//yul dang yul can de yin te//'phags pa mthong ba'i chos can gyi//ting nge 'dzin kyang 'di dag yin//'phags pa de dag de ldan zhing ///
58a6(mdo sde): sgom dang mthong ba ldan pas na//chos kun de bzhin nyid shes pa//zhing nas zhing du rab tu 'dong //ji ltar shin tu bzang ba'i gser//gser gyi dbyings na mi snang ste//brtsal bas shin tu zhi ba
58a7(mdo sde): btags nas//yongs su sbyangs na snang bar 'gyur//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa//rnam par shes pa bdun dang bcas//ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs sbyangs pa'i//rnal 'byor can gyis
58b1(mdo sde): rtag tu mthong //ji ltar ma bsrubs zho la yang //de na mar yod mi snang ste//bsrub pa'i tshul gyis mthong bas na//mkhas pa rnams kyis de phyir bsrub//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes//rnam shes
58b2(mdo sde): bdun dang ldan pa yang //rnam par bsrubs shing stug spyod pa'i//thub pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin//ma rig pa ni sdug ces bya//dkyil 'khor ye shes rnam grangs te//dkyil 'khor 'di la bskyabs
58b3(mdo sde): pa yi//rnal 'byor can rnams stug por 'dong //gzugs med gzugs yod nam mkha' dang //rnam shes 'du shes ma yod dag/rnal 'byor can gyis yul bsgoms sam//de dag stug po'i
58b4(mdo sde): zhing du 'dod//nyi ma zla ba'i 'odi bzhin du//'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal ba'i sras//rnal 'byor can gyi thub ston cing //rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bas//de ni dbang
58b5(mdo sde): bskur stug por sang //sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rjes su mthong //gzhan du gyur nas stug por song //stug na gnas shing sprul pa dang //sprul pa'i sprul pa de dag gis//gang na gang chos su 'dod pa/
58b6(mdo sde): de ni mnga' la 'dug cing ston//sngon med dus kyi gnas ngan len//bag chags rgyu yis bsags pa yi//kun gzhin ma rtag byas pa yis//bcings pa kun tu rab tu 'byung //ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dpa'
58b7(mdo sde): rlabs rnams//rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa dag/rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung //rnam shos de bzhin kun gzhil//rnam shes de ni nges byas pa'i//bag chags rnams kyis rgyas par 'gyur//
59a1(mdo sde): 'byung zhing la la phyir ldog ste//tshad med rtag pa med pa'o//rang sems khong du ma chud pas//yul la gzhol ba'i rnam shes rnams//rab tu zhugs kyang phyir ldog
59a2(mdo sde): pa//'gro ba rang sems mthong ba'i tshe//de bzhin gzhan du gyur pa'i sems//me dang bsreg pa ji bzhin te//kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba yang //gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med//zag med
59a3(mdo sde): 'gros su song ba dang //'phags pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur//kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba ni//sa rnams khyab par byas shing gnas//yid ni bdag la bdag ces te//ngar sems rab tu
59a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa yin//rnam shes kha dog khyad par dang //kun tu gcod pa rab tu byed//sems ni las rnams sogs pa ste//yid ni khong du chud par byed//rnam par shes pas rnam par rig
59a5(mdo sde): lnga pos snang ba mthong bar 'gyur//rab rib ldan pa myos pa yis//ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin//gzugs la sogs la gzugs med de//sems ni gzugs ltar gnas pa yin//
