59a6(mdo sde): nyi ma zla ba'i nor bu dag/yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid can//nyi zla'i zer gyis phog pa dang //de dag rang gi yon tan 'byin//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
59a7(mdo sde): dge snying po//zag med legs dang ldan gyur te//gzhan du 'gyur na rab tu 'byin//'di ltar snang ba gang yang rung //mtshan ma gzugs su snang ba'i rnams//bag chags yog pa'i kun
59b1(mdo sde): gzhi ste//sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas//ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa dang //yon tan zho dang dar bar snang //de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //rnam par gyur nas gzugs ltar gnas//ji ltar/
59b2(mdo sde): rab rib ldan pas skra//mig gnyes pas rnam mthong ba//de bzhin bag chags nyes ldan pa'i//kun gzhi lus can rnams kyi ste//rtag tu mig gi nang seng ba'i//gzugs kyis snang bar rab tu 'jug/
59b3(mdo sde): 'di dag snang ba ci yang rung //smig rgyu chu yi dpe bzhin te//gzugs ni yod dang med kyis spangs//kun gzhi rjes su mthong ba'o//mig dang gzugs las rten byas shing //de ni sgyu ma bzhin du
59b4(mdo sde): 'byung //rtag tu mig gi nang song ba//smig rgya bzhin du rab tu g.yo//gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs//kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas pa ste//byis pa ji ltar brtags pa bzhin//gzugs
59b5(mdo sde): ni bud na yod pa min//byed med sems pa'ang med pa ste//dbu ba'i phung po bzhin du gnas//gnyid log ra ro dregs pa dang //'gro 'dug rnam par rgyug pa yi//bya ba gcig car byed pa ni//lus can
59b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi kun gzhi'o//ji ltar gdung bas bsar sa las//gyen du ldang ba'i smig rgyu rnams//dpyid ka'i chu ltar rab tu g.yo//ri dgas rnams la slu bar byed//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //gzugs
59b7(mdo sde): min lta ba'i spyod yul du//gzugs snang ji ltar rtog can gyis//brtags bzhin gzugs 'dra ma yin no//ji ltar khab long mthong ba dang //lcags ni myur bar kun tu 'khor//'on kyang de
60a1(mdo sde): la sems pa med//sems ldan bzhin du'ang rab tu snang //de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //sems med sems can ji bzhin du//'gro dang 'ong bar g.yo ba ste//sa rnams
60a2(mdo sde): 'bri bar rab tu byed//ji ltar rgya mtshodza ru ni//sgeg med par yang g.yo 'gul te//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa//lus la gnas shing g.yo bar gyur//glang po glang pa'i gzugs brnyan
60a3(mdo sde): dang //ji ltar 'thab cing choms nas min//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa//'jug pa choms nas mi rgyu'o//ji ltar pad+mo dri med pa//'dam gyi nang nas byung ba ni//mi dang lha dang btsun la 'os
60a4(mdo sde): lha yul gnas pa kun kyang 'dod//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes//bag chags 'dam nas byung ba ni//rnam dag gzhan du gnas gyur pa//bdag nyid che rnams 'dod pa yin//ji ltar rin
60a5(mdo sde): chen rnam par dag/ri brag mi yis bcags brdungs kyang //rgyal po'i cod pan du'ang 'os//cod pan la yang gdags pa yin//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes//bag chags rnams
60a6(mdo sde): kyis bcags brdungs pa//rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te//sangs rgyas nyid du de gzung ngo //ji ltar chu gting rdo ba dag/nya lhubs dag gis yongs dkris pa//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes
60a7(mdo sde): kyang //bag chags dri ma can du byas//gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang //dngos po gnyis kyis rab tu 'jug/ji ltar kha gnyis yod pa'i sbrul//gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ste//de bzhin
60b1(mdo sde): kun gzhi rnam par shes//rim dang cig car rgyu ba yin//rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu//de la rtog pas rnam par brtag/rtog can rnam par myos 'gyur ba//bdag dang bdag gir rnam rtog cing //
60b2(mdo sde): yod dang med kyi rgyu sdod pa'i//sa rnams la yang rnam rtog ste//'gyur ba'i yongs su gyur pa dang //kun gzhi zab pa nyid dag kyang //blo chung rnams kyis mi rigs pas//sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du 'khor///
60b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gcig min shes par dka'//lus can kun la 'dra ba ste//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //rtag tu sgyu ma'i ri dgas 'dra//sems can gcig min shes par dka'//yod dang med
60b4(mdo sde): par rnam par brtag/rdul dang gtso bo skyes bu dang //mi gsal tshangs pa'ang de yin te//rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtog can rnams//kun gzhi la ni rtag tu rtog/sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la//sna tshogs/
60b5(mdo sde): sar yang de bzhin rtog/sa la gang gis rtogs gyur pa'i//yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya//ji ltar ri mo mtho dman dang //rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gyi gzugs//'ja' dang ri dgas sred byed dang //
60b6(mdo sde): sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin te//rab rib can gyi phreng ba dang //bzang mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du//rmi lam dag ni rnam sna tshogs//dri za'i khang pa gnas rten dang //ro langs chu yi shing rnams dang //brag
60b7(mdo sde): tsaca sprin dang du ba dang //mo long mig la gzugs brnyan dang //chu la chu yi zla ba dang //rnam rtog 'di dang mang bar yang //'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog/gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar//rnam pa sna
61a1(mdo sde): tshogs kun mthong ste//'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang //de'i tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi//bag chags snyoms las sogs pa dang //
61a2(mdo sde): rtog pas rnyog pa can du byas//gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med//zag med rang lugs rab thob nas//de dag rtag cing brtan par 'gyur//nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam//'gog dang
61a3(mdo sde): 'dra ba de bzhin te//mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pa la//mi zag chos rnams skye bar 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar dang //ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang //mkhas dang stobs
61a4(mdo sde): dang mngon shes dag/'bri med mi zad de bzhin te//nam mkha' zad kyi mtha' snyigs shing //dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang //mthar phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing //yid bzhin shin
61a5(mdo sde): tu brtan pa'i lus//rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can//gzhan du gyur nas rab tu 'thob//'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin//sems can yod min skye ba med//'bri med gang ba med
61a6(mdo sde): par yang //rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro bar bshad//zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi//chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste//skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang //chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin
61a7(mdo sde): gnas//rnal 'byor ldan pa grol ba la//rtag med chad pa med pa ste//sems can khams rnams zhig gyur na//thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo //ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang //'das
61b1(mdo sde): dang da ltar byung ba dag/mnyam pa ma yin 'thun pa min//shes bya zad nas de dag 'byung //bdud rnams tshar bcad log pa ste//brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang //de ste sems can 'jig
61b2(mdo sde): na ni//sdug bsngal spungs las mi 'grol lo//lcags kyi gar bu bsregs pa las//me las byung ste bsil gyur cing //lcags ni rtag par 'dug pa bzhin//de ltar rnal 'byor can dag 'khod//
61b3(mdo sde): phung po'i khyim dang des byung ba'i//bag chags rnams kyang 'gag pa dang //thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams//de dag rtag cing grol ba yin//rnam shes rnams ni dba' rlabs bzhin//kun
61b4(mdo sde): gzhi mtsho las 'byung ba ste//chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis//rab tu bskyod cing shin tu rgyu//gnas ngan len gyi spros pa yis//bcom pa gnas med don gyi gzugs//lta ba'i yu
61b5(mdo sde): du rnam par g.yo//de ltar shes nas phyir log ste//gzhan gyur mi bzad rtag po'i rnams//mgon po dag ni stug por 'dod//sdug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin//rtag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par
61b6(mdo sde): mdzes//phung po sdug pa kun gzhi ste//yid ni de la nye phan no//rnam par shes pa rtogs par byed//gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu//rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni//dbang por
61b7(mdo sde): bcas shing yul gzhol bas//sna tshogs yul la 'dzin par byed//kun gzhi yul can ma yin no//tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te//yad ni drod du rab tu gnas//yid kyi rnam shes de na ste//
62a1(mdo sde): lhag ma dbang po ltar yang gnas//senas drung yid dang rnam par shes//drung po di san rnam par gnas//bgachags las dang 'brel ba'i rnams//stan chad byas pa/
62a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis 'byung //'dod chags srid las byung ba yi//las kyis bya ba byed pa ste//sngon chad de dag las byas pas//rgyun du las rnams 'byung ba yin//lus las lus ni gzhan la
62a3(mdo sde): 'gro/'pho ba srin bu pad+ma bzhin//sems dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnams//rgyun chags par ni shin tu 'dong //ying zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams dang //rnam shes srid pa dog
62a4(mdo sde): par yang //tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni//las rnams shin tu 'byung ba'i phyir//tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis//gang tshe lus ni bor gyur pa//de tshe lus ni dor ba ste//shing bzhin
62a5(mdo sde): tshor ba med pa'o//sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes//ngar sems bdag nyid yid yin no//gang zhig yul la 'dzin byed pa//de ni rnam par shes zhes bya//sems ni las rnams
62a6(mdo sde): sogs pa ste//yid ni khong du chud par byed//rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/lnga pos snang ba rtogs par byed///'phags brgyan stug go//bam po bzhi pa ste/
62a7(mdo sde): tha ma pa//lus ni sems kyis bzung ba yin//yid ni lam rgyud 'dod pa ste//rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/snang ba gcod pa lnga pa'o//rgyu la dmigs shing rnam shes rnams//
62b1(mdo sde): skye ste gzhan ni de rjes 'brang //yid la dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang //mthar chags su ni rab tu 'byung //yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni//dbang gi yon tan rnams kyis byas//dbang ni lnga dang /
62b2(mdo sde): ljon cig tu//rnam par shes pa rab tu byed//'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu//ro langs 'gro dang 'dra ba ste//sdig rgyu dag gis gzugs dang mnyam//log pa ma yin badren pa yin//'di ni bdag
62b3(mdo sde): med stong pa ste//srid pas kun du 'dra ba yin//'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/thams cad dus yod lhan cig ste//sems byung yid ces bya ba dang //lhan cig rnam par shes pa 'byung /
62b4(mdo sde): rnam shes lnga po de dag dang //yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni//gnas ngan len dang sred bsgos pa//rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung //lus can kun gyi kun gzhi yang //sems dang sems byung
62b5(mdo sde): ldan pa 'byung //kun gzhi rnyed nas de dag rgyu//rgyu nas rgyas par byed pa ste//sems rnams lam rgyud thams cad du//rtag par gcig las gcig rgyas 'gyur//sa 'di rnam pa sna tshogs
62b6(mdo sde): pa//rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung //kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni//rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin no//phan tshun rgyu yi stobs ldan pa//rnam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste//kun
62b7(mdo sde): gzhi mtshol dba' rlabs bzhin//sa bon dag dang myu bu'i rgyud//chu ba'i rgyun kyang mtshams med cing //rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung med kyi//tha dad bye brag dag kyang snang //de bzhin rnam shes
63a1(mdo sde): spyod pa ste//mtshams med pa yi rgyun du yang //rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung //gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang //sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams///
63a2(mdo sde): bag chags bde bas bskyed pa dang //rang sems rnam par 'khrul pa yis//dba' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung //chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba dag/phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te//
63a3(mdo sde): thub pa'i gnas kyang rnam bsgoms nas//mnyam par bzhag par stug por 'gro/rdo rje'i snying po khyod dang yang //rgyal sras 'jigs med gzhan dag kyang //stug por 'jug pa byed pa'i
63a4(mdo sde): chos//thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa//rgyal ba rnams drang rgyal sras rnams//thabs cig rab tu rnam dgongs te//chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe med pa//rmad du byung ba 'di bstan to//rdo rje
63a5(mdo sde): snying po 'jigs med pa//rin chen sna tshogs zla snying gi/seng ge'i khri la rab 'dug ste//shes rab chen pos rnam bsgoms kyis//rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun bdar ba//stug po'i rgyan la
63a6(mdo sde): rnam par bsgoms//rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di//rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston//zla dbang rgyal ba des bstan la//bag med par ni ma byed cig/zla ba'i dpal gyi bcom
63a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das//sprul par bye ba mang sprul cing //'dod pa'i khams kyi bsnyengs bral dang //gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su yang //rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor//lha rnams
63b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang mdun bdar cing //tshul gyis dam pa ston pa ni//'jigs med stug po'i rgyan yin no//rnal 'byor can gyis spyod pa'i mchog/tshul bzang rnal 'byor spyod pa ste//so so rang rig
63b2(mdo sde): shes pa yi//ting nge 'dzin dang bde ba'i rnams//yang dag mtha' la mi rig par//rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang //rnal 'byor bde las mngon langs shing //gcig lnga gcig ni phan tshun lta///
63b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul dge 'di//gang gis shin tu mthong bar gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi//stan gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams//kun kyang ngo mtshar rab tu rnyed//bsami byed
63b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bsam pa dang //bsam gtan rnams kyi dgongs pa dag/rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams//kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas//stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la//lta ba mnyam
63b5(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'i rnams//mgo la cod pan thogs pa dag/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi//yan lag bris pa de dag kun//bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste//g.yo ba rnams dang shin tu bral//
63b6(mdo sde): thams cad gos bzung cha lugs mdzes//rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te//lha'i rdo rje snying po la//rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod la//chos la mos pa yang dag tu//mthong ste de nas de kun dang /
63b7(mdo sde): phyogs rnams bzhi por blta byas te//'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas//'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su spyad//rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams//rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor
64a1(mdo sde): yul//gang la rtog can myos 'gyur ba//de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis//gang bsam gang gis ji lta bur//bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag/'dod dang
64a2(mdo sde): sdig pa rnams kyis dben//rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas//dga' bde dben las skyes par yang //bsam gtan dang po skye ba yin//de lta bu yi rim tshul du//bzhi dang brgyad dang
64a3(mdo sde): de bzhin bcu//mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang //bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed//nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang //rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te//kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan
64a4(mdo sde): byed//chos rnams dang ni sa dag gi/rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang //phung po skye mched tshogs kyi rnams//'di dag thams cad bdag med de//byed pa med cing g.yo ba med//gsum po 'dus las
64a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung //'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste//byed pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs//thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed//stong par lta ba'i lta ba can//chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams//
64a6(mdo sde): chud gson mtshan nyid ma yin no//phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams//bsam gtan 'di 'dra bsam gtan byed//de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/lha rdzas bsod nams lta
64a7(mdo sde): sbyang ba//rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras//mnyam gzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed//'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste//mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min//phung po rnams
64b1(mdo sde): med khams yod nin//thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med//rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang //de dag de ltar mi gnas so//rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni//dngos pos dang tshu la sogs//dngos
64b2(mdo sde): po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa//mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog/kha dog sdug dang mi sdug dang //kha dag snang bzhin de bzhin to//'dza' dang in+d+ra go bltar//kha dog snang mang sprin lta bu'i//
64b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis//thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste//rgyas pa'i skye mched ces bya bas//'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te//rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis//lus la
64b4(mdo sde): rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong //gang la dmigs te mnyam gzhag pa//de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang //gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa//de dang de ni dmigs pa yin//rnal 'byor can med rnal
64b5(mdo sde): 'byor med//de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni//rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid//kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad dang //thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la gnas//chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang //
64b6(mdo sde): rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing //mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag/mnyam gzhag ldan pa rab tu ston//chos kyi rang bzhin rnam phye bas//rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrug pa//blo gros zhan
64b7(mdo sde): pas rab tu skye//chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur//yid ches lung dang mi ldan par//chos rnams ston par byed pa ni//mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis//bdag kyang chud zos gzhan
65a1(mdo sde): chud gson//mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med//'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par snang //mngar ba'i rnams ni madris pa sel//bad kan tsha sbyar lan che ste//ma zhun
65a2(mdo sde): ba'i rnam pa dang //lan tshwa la sogs rnam par sel//mkhris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa las//rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang //lus can rnams kyi lus yul du//'dus pa rlung las
65a3(mdo sde): drung ba dang //rims dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//thub pas bsdu ba byas pa ni//kha ra la sogs yan lag drug/sha dang skol ma khu ba dag/tha dad mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba//lus
65a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi rims kun to//rnam shes rnams ni kun gzhi la//phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te//gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam//mtshan nyid gcig ni yod gyur na//de tshe chos dang mtshan
65a5(mdo sde): nyid la//mtshan nyid mi 'dra med par 'gyur//rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel me nus//mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro//sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di//mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste///
65a6(mdo sde): gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa//rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste//ska ma'i ri dgas bzhin 'khor ba//rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin//mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste//phung po
65a7(mdo sde): rnams las phung po can//gzhan med yan lag nyid lag las//yan lag can med yan lag la//'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te//'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med//'jig rten
65b1(mdo sde): rdul phran pasags pa min//phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o//de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du//ci yang rtsom par mi byed de//dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i phyir//rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dod//de tsha
65b2(mdo sde): yon tan khyad yod pa//yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du//'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis//'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste//'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min//chos gsum pas kyang ma byas
65b3(mdo sde): te//bag chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems//rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas//snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi//lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang //sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams//'gro ba dag
65b4(mdo sde): gis sna tshogs brtags//'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te//sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas//sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las//gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste//sa la stong zhes brjod par bya//sems
65b5(mdo sde): ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas//rdza la sogs pa'i yul med de//sems 'di snga ma lta bu'o//sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang //lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang //rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba//de
65b6(mdo sde): dag kun gzhi snang ba yin//kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste//kun tu kha mig mgo bo yang //cig char ba dang rim gyis kyang //sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas//bus pa rnam par myos byed de//gang gi//
65b7(mdo sde): snying la gang gnas pa//de ni de la gnyis tshul du//lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas//stong min dngos po gang yang med//tho bas ji ltar rdza bzhin du//dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i//dngos po/
66a1(mdo sde): dngos su yod pa min//de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na//'jig byed ma yin gzhig par 'gyur//gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang //de ni rnam par rtog pas brtags//
66a2(mdo sde): ri rab ri bo tsam 'gyur ba'i//bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi//stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni//nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o//rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid//gnas ma yin par sbyar mi
66a3(mdo sde): bya//gnas myin gal te sbyar gyur na//bdud rtsi drug tu 'gyur ba yin//lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung //lus can rnams la yod pa yi//lta bu rnam par spang ba'i phyir//stong pa nyid
66a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul bstan to//stong pa nyid kyi lta thos kyang //la la'i lta ba ma zhig na//gsor mi rung ba'i lha can te//sman pas gtang ba'i nad pa bzhin//ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa'i me//bsreg pa
66a5(mdo sde): med pas mi gnas so//de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na//stong nyid ma yang 'gag par 'gyur//lta bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang //ye shes yang dag mi 'byung ste//nyon mongs thams cad
66a6(mdo sde): bsreg par byed//nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes//thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams//ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog/stug po
66a7(mdo sde): der ni rab tu 'dong //ri bong rwa yis ri ngo rnams//mngon par gzhag bya ma mthong ste//'di la mo sham bu yis kyang //srog tshogs gang yang bsad pa med//ri bong rwa yi gzhu yis kyang //
66b1(mdo sde): su yang thab mo mi byed de//mo sham bu la su yang rung //khyim gyi las su mi sko'o//stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid//rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te//yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang //de bzhin
66b2(mdo sde): gcig pa nyid du gyur//mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang //gzugs rnams gzhig par brtson pa ste//gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min//gzugs med par yang de med de//khyad par med
66b3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba ni//ma bsgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin//de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang //lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste//phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du//de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo//rgyu dang rkyen rnams/
66b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa las//rnal 'byor can gyi las sgrub bo//lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te//ro langs 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'dra//sred pa'i srad bus bcings byas shing //yul gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin//
66b5(mdo sde): lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa//lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste//mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba//rgyal ba rnams kyis lha med bshad//stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni//yod dang med pa gzhag pa'i phyir//blo ldan
66b6(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa yi//rnal 'byor can gyis rtog tu bsgom//rtswa dang shing dang gyo mo dag/sgyu mi'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te//sngags kyiso tso dang cir 'dod par//gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed//
66b7(mdo sde): gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang //sred dang mig rnams rgyur byas shing //mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin//smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o//gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med//yul gzhan dag tu la
67a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba min//'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la//yod dang med par brtag mi bya//skra yi tshogs dang dong buphyir//mo sham bu dang smrig rgyu dang //dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam
67a2(mdo sde): dka/ming du grag gi yod pa min//stag dang gzig dang dom dag dang //rnga rta beng bu khyi rnams dang //g.yi dang gsa' dang ru sbal la//rA ni yod pa ma yin na//thub pa rtsod par brtson pa yis///
67a3(mdo sde): de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing //bong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya//ci go de dag bsgrub nus sam//shes rab can gyis sar bstan pa//de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya//rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba
67a4(mdo sde): ni//blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra//sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med//so so rang rig yul yang med//gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la//rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus//stug por gnas
67a5(mdo sde): par rnam par rtogs//de la brtags shing dge ba 'thob//rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor can//de na gnas pa bzhin du snang //lha yul gnas pa'i bsnyems bral dang //zla ba gza'
67a6(mdo sde): la sogs pa yang //rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams//rire rab rten cing rgyu ba yin//de bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun//bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi//kun gzhi kun gyis don
67a7(mdo sde): can//de la brtag cing rab tu rgyu//ji ltar sa las kun brten cing //so skye kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin//sems can kun gyi gnas yin te//'byung khung kun gyi khyad par du//de bzhin
67b1(mdo sde): kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te//sems dang sems las byung bar ldan//dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung //ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgro rnams//'od dang kha
67b2(mdo sde): dog rnam mang ste//gtsug phud can rnams 'dab skye yis//rma bya mo dang longs rtse ba//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas//thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te//
67b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong //ji ltar rgya mtsho chu bo yis//nyin gcig bzhin du gang bya yang //chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad//rgya mtsho rtog par yong mi byed//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes
67b4(mdo sde): kyang //zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste//rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin//bgo chags chu ngos rab tu dgang //ji ltar rin chen ldan pa'i sa//sna tshogs kun tu phan 'dogs te//
67b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho//yon tan dngos su ston pa yin//de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung //de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de//gyur na de
67b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa stongs bcu can//spyod pa legs spyad gtsang ba ste//sa bcu pa las mngon byung ste//bde bar gshegs pa'i sar zhugs nas//yang
67b7(mdo sde): dag mtha' la rab gnas pa//sna tshogs sems can rnam sprul par//'jigs pa med par 'byung ba ni//rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no//sos ka me tog mang de'i gzugs//mi dang
68a1(mdo sde): bya yi yid du 'ong //de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems//thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed//ji ltar don ma ngas rgyal ba'i sras//'byung las byung ba ma yin pa//med
68a2(mdo sde): pa'i blo can de bzhin te//log par smra la brtson pa dag/chos dang mi mthun phra ma can//lce gnyis log par lta ba dag/rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos//rnam pa gzhan du ston par
68a3(mdo sde): byed//ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig/'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa//'bras bu me tog de na med//sngags dang khong bzos zo mdog bde//'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas de//rnam pa
68a4(mdo sde): gzhan du ston par byed//rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras//kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas//bstan pa gzhan la ji snyed du//bstan pa byas pa de dag kun//bde gshegs rnal
68a5(mdo sde): 'byor mkhas pa yis//bstan pa stug de'i rgyun la bstan//khams rnams drug dang bco brgyad bstan//skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi//yid kyi srad bus btags pa dag/sems can kun
68a6(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'khor//rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs//khams dang skye mched phung po ste//yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing //lus drang lus la rab tu rgyu//'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste/
68a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan//lus can kun gyi skyes bu ni//'gro yong byung ba ma yin te//khams rnams drug pa skyes bu yin//skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te//bco brgyad rnams
68b1(mdo sde): la yid rgyu ba//dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste//dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa//nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang //dga' ldan la sogs bsnyems bral dang //mtshe ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad//
68b2(mdo sde): rdo rje snying po dbang can la//rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams//dge' dge zhes dga' 'bod cing //thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//thub ldan rnal 'byor spyod pa dang //rgyal byadag
68b3(mdo sde): dang rgyal ba'i sras//zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang //lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang //rnal 'byor bdag po rnal 'byor can//ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang //dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs
68b4(mdo sde): rnams kyang //thal mo sbyar te gnas par gyur//phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing //rgyal ba'i sras lo smra ba ni//'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang //mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste//thub can
68b5(mdo sde): kun gyi skyes bu ni//thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan//'das dang da ltar byung ba yis//sngon byas ma byas thos pa ni//sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis//khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o//ji ltar
68b6(mdo sde): mkha' la bya rjes rnams//rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du//sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams//gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan//ji ltar shing las me dag gi/me lce gnam du gnas
68b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur//sregs pa gzhan pa ma rnyed cing //rlung gis bab na gtan mi 'bar//bya rjes rnam par bzhag pa ni//mkha' la gnas pa mi snang ste//'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yi///
69a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin//bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dong ste//de dag sgro yi shugs kyis 'dong //bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni//skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstan//las kyi
69a2(mdo sde): skyes bu bstan pa ni//'khor rnams rtag tu 'khor ba ste//bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa//byas pa'i las ni chud mi za//ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las//'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te//don
69a3(mdo sde): dong ldan pa de dag ni//gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med//lha rdzas 'gro ba'i'o skyes bu ni//rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston//lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing //de ni dge ba'i las byed do//'di
69a4(mdo sde): dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang //lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing //'khor los sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur ba'i//bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed//thar dang pha rol phyin rnams dang //sangs
69a5(mdo sde): rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun//'gro ba'i skyes bu med na ni//kun kyang 'bras bu med par 'gyur//lha yi bde ba thams cad dang //dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang //de bzhin nyid mthong
69a6(mdo sde): thub pa yi//rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur//las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong //las rnams don med ma yin te//'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang //mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams
69a7(mdo sde): kyi lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin//'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na//sred pa'i 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur//'khor dang bral na thar pa ste//blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so//'jug pa'i
69b1(mdo sde): skyes bu med na ni//mo sham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur//bong bu'i rwa yang rno 'gyur te//bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung //phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni//phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste//gang dang gang
69b2(mdo sde): du 'gro ba dag/de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin//lha dang lha yi bu mo'i tshogs//dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang //dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang //sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang //thub
69b3(mdo sde): la mchod par 'os pa yi//rdo rje snying po sras bcas la//mchod de gsol ba 'debs par byed//thams cad dga'o dge zhes smra//nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul//rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa
69b4(mdo sde): ni//gzhan gyis rgol ba 'joms pa ste//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan//'gab zungs lhag chod tshar gcod pa//bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston//shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol//
69b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'di dag nyan par 'gyur//ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang //lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon//shin tu dka' ba'i ngas ma yas rgyu//brtags 'das rtog dang bral ba yi//rgyu dang dpe yi me
69b6(mdo sde): tog ste//rnal 'byor rnams kyi thub dge ba//stug po'i rgyan ni bshad par bya//de ni thub la rnal 'byor ston//stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te//sdug na spyod pa'i thub pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
69b7(mdo sde): gnas kyi mchog/thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o//sa stengs thub pa'i dru ma la//rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa//rtag par dru mar khyod kyis kyang //chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis//dngos po rnams
70a1(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin ci//dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes//'di 'dra'i lha dang ldan pa yi//thub pa rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo//chos pa gcig pu rtogs pa yis//chos par
70a2(mdo sde): mngon du shes pa ste//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang //dngos po gcig gis shes par 'gyur//ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho//sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa//de bzhin dngos
70a3(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi//rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur//dngos po ji med stong pa nyid//dngos po dngos por yod pa'ang med//'di dag kun gzhi rnam pa ste//stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o//
70a4(mdo sde): rgyal sras dru ma 'jigs med pas//rdo rje'i snying po de la smras//lus can rnams kyi khams kyi mi//ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur//'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing //'byung las 'byung
70a5(mdo sde): ba'i ji lta bu//g.yo ga sher cha dang sra ba yi//khams rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur//rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis//du ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas//mi 'am ci bdag khyod dge ste/
70a6(mdo sde): khyod ni dge'o yang dge'o//rnal 'byor can gyi snying po'i mchog/yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa//sems kyi skyes bu'i lus can la//khams rnams skye 'gyur ji lta zhes//de phyir dbang
70a7(mdo sde): spyod rgyal sras la//de ni dges bshad par bya//de bas mi 'am ci yi bdag/pi wang slob dpon bdag las nyon//ji ltar mi 'am ci yi bdag/khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa//snyoms
70b1(mdo sde): bral mang po sna tshogs kyis//nam mkha' las ni rang 'dong zhing //rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor du//pi wang sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas//thub pa dru ma ltos shig ces//phan tshun gcig la
70b2(mdo sde): gcig kyang gsung //snyems bral mang po sna tshogs na//mi 'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing //pi wang bai DUr+yas spras pa//len cing mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe//pi wang yid 'ong shin tu snyan//dbyangs
70b3(mdo sde): kyis yongs su sbyang ba de//mi 'am ci yi bdag po yis//rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe//nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de//nyan thos de dag gyur pa de//rgyal sras rnams kyi mthong ba dang ///
70b4(mdo sde): 'od srungs rnal 'byor bzang can dang //lha yi cod pan la smras pa//rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi//pi wang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis//'dod chags bral ba ci phyir gar//'od srungs khyod/
70b5(mdo sde): kyis nged la ston//rgyal sras stobs chen dmu rlung bzhin//ri dgas rnams dang 'dra ba ni//nyan thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams//bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can//nyon mongs rnam rtog byung
70b6(mdo sde): bas mnar//yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas//bag chags dri ma yongs bsal te//bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing //shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na//sems kyi khams las gzhan
70b7(mdo sde): gyur pa//de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur//khyod ni dbang chen phra yul ldan//shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas//dbang po 'jig rten phyal pa yi//gtsug lag mtshan la
71a1(mdo sde): khyod gnas te//mi 'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dge/sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas bya la//bslab ste zla ba bzhin gnas pa//mi 'am
71a2(mdo sde): ci yi dbang po khyod//sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes//khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes zhing //thub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su//khams kyi sems las skyes pa'i mi//kho bo la ni sras kyis
71a3(mdo sde): dris//mnyam sems mnyam par bzhag pa yis//thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis//khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang //sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la//rgyu rnams gang gis
71a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba yi//de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya//chu ni rlan rnams skyed par byed//dod ni me'o sra bas//gdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams//rlung gi khams kyis kun nas rtsom//gzugs
71a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sa mtshams ni//nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed//rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni//bag chags rnams kyis rab tu bskyed//srid kyi mtshams dang mig dag gis//skye
71a6(mdo sde): ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni//gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te//rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang //nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas//dbang sbyor pho brang bzang po na//rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs
71a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa//rgyal sras rnams kyis mdun bdar cing //so so'i stan las kun langs te//yang dang yang zhing phyag 'tshal nas//rim gror rdo rje'i snying po la//mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa
71b1(mdo sde): byed//rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing //yang dang yang du gsol ba byed//dge'i dge'o yang dge ste//dge ba ldan pa rab gnas zhing //chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas//sangs rgyas sa la rab
71b2(mdo sde): bzhugs te//dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan//rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis//de nas yang du mchod byas te//rnal 'byor che can dge'o dge/rdo rje'i
71b3(mdo sde): snying po 'jigs med pa//lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi//chos de bdag la bstan pas na//nor bu rin chen sna tshogs nas//bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas//thub ldan 'phags pa spyan
71b4(mdo sde): ras gzigs//blo gros chen po byams pa dang //blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang //'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang //lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag/shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros dang //
71b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang //rin chen gtsug phud 'phrul chen dang //yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang //mtshe ma'i rab dang 'gro 'dzin dang //rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che//rnal
71b6(mdo sde): 'byor can la sems ston pa//thub pa thams cad don grub pa//thub sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams//'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste//rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams//so so'i stan
71b7(mdo sde): las kun langs nas//de dag gcig la gcig bltas te//rdo rje'i snying po de la smras//chos kyi tshul ni bstan par gyis//khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs//rgyal sras rnams kyis rab
72a1(mdo sde): rgya mchod//sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang //khyod la thams cad shin tu gnas//khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni//rgyal sras sbyongs chen thams cad dang //rnam
72a2(mdo sde): 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag/sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do//rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang //'jig rten rnams kyi ngo mtshar gzhi//mdo sde kun gyis dri med cing //bstan
72a3(mdo sde): dang bklag pa rnams spangs pa//stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir//rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis//sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste//de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang //
72a4(mdo sde): zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings//so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul//lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde//'phags pa rnams la de ston cig/phung po lhag ma ma lus par//gtugs pa'i chos
72a5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ston cig/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnams//rnam par thar dang dbang rnams dang //yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi//lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis//sangs rgyas rnams
72a6(mdo sde): kyi ngos ma yas dang //mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan//rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal skyes kyi//rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phrad dang //sku rtse brgya cher phra ba dag/rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis//
72a7(mdo sde): bstan dang bklag dang rnam bral zhing //brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi//stug po zhing gi dam pa der//ci nas thub pa 'dong ba'i phyir//rnal 'byor mkhas pas song ge ltar//thub pas
72b1(mdo sde): de dag kun bltas te//'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la//brtags par mi nus brtag bral ba'i//chos tshul rab tu bstan bya bar//blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na//rnal 'byor can dag
72b2(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul//sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas//tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste//ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad du//rgya chen lce yis rab snyan par//rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bshad//seng ge ra
72b3(mdo sde): stod lus 'chang ba//mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus//rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bstan//mi dka'i sgra la mkhas pas na//sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa
72b4(mdo sde): yis//mdor na de yi nyis gyur tu//rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston//srang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs//mthong zhing ring ba'i sgra skad dang //gan dA ra dang ran ldan par//rgyal ba'i sras pos rab
72b5(mdo sde): tu bstan//r-i Sha b+ha dang d+he ba ta//ShaDA kr-i shi lnga po yi//sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa yin//dbyangs kyis thub pa rnam par gsung //rings dang dal ba med pa'i tshig/zab cing snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs te//
72b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la//de bzhin sim par byed pa yi//tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig/rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni//lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste//sprul pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin///
72b7(mdo sde): thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni//ci yang brjod par mi byed par//thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra//yan lag rnams la mngon par 'gyur//smin ma 'phral ba spyi bo dang //phrag pa sna rtsi byin pa
73a1(mdo sde): las//chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing //dge ba'i sgra rnams byung bar gyur//rdo rje snying po thub pa yi//smon lam legs las byung ba ste//bre mo'i drang pa'i rgyal po
73a2(mdo sde): bzhin//rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus//dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po ni//thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin//dpa' chen rdo rje'i snying po de//rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o///
73a3(mdo sde): skar ma'i dbang po skar ma de//gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa bzhin//rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can//dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes//ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang //zla ba'i 'od du bye
73a4(mdo sde): brag med//de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang //rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med//yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i//rgyal ba'i sras po stongs po che//rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog/
73a5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa//stan las legs par ldang byas shing //rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas nas//tshig dge rnam par smras pa ni//kye ma theg chen theg pa ni//
73a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab//de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang //rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston//bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal po dang //rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang //
73a7(mdo sde): dri med bsam gyis mi khyab chos//dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin//theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni//mchog tu phra zhing dkon pa ste//gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog/rtog pa
73b1(mdo sde): can gyi yul ma yin//rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul//rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed//bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi//de bzhin khyad par byed pas na//bag chags spros pas nga
73b2(mdo sde): pa de//yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang //sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing //rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung //lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba dang //gser bzhin rnam par byang
73b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/sangs rgyas rigs su de dag 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs//mur 'dug nyan thos rnams spangs pa//thob nas sangs
73b4(mdo sde): rgyas zhing gi mchog/stug por de bzhin 'dong bar 'gyur//ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang //ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci//rdo rje'i snying pos gang thob phyir//tshul dge 'di ni ston
73b5(mdo sde): por 'gyur//rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang gnyis la//thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas//rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyi//rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod//ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin/
73b6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci//gang la gnas shing tshul 'di yang //rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzad//rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod//dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no//rdo rje'i
73b7(mdo sde): snying po 'jigs med kyis//'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang //tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyad dang //rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu stobs dang //blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang //nus sam mi nus
74a1(mdo sde): zhes bltas nas//blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang //rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis//thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par byos//gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dge
74a2(mdo sde): ba//dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang //thub pa rnams la bshad par bya//theg pa chen po 'od can gyi//ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te//de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams//
74a3(mdo sde): tshul dge rab tu ston par byed//bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong //de dag mgon po de bzhin no//rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa rnams//de dag rang gi zhal ston to//dge 'o dge zhes rab tu
74a4(mdo sde): gsung //'di ni rnal 'byor bzang ldan lam//lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang //ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba//thob nas sangs rgyas dri med gyur//gang yang sangs rgyas ting
74a5(mdo sde): 'dzin skyes//theg pa chen po snang ba yi//ting nge 'dzin gyi phra sems pa//de la gnas shing rgyal sbas pa//rgyal ba bsam yas spyod yul can//sprul pa bye ba mang po yis//so so
74a6(mdo sde): rang rig spyod yul gyi//ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong ba ni//shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do//so so rang gis rig tshul ni//gang lo sangs rgyas gnas pa yin//chos 'di mtshan ma
74a7(mdo sde): med pa ste//sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs//ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa yin//mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste//rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skyes//chos rnams kyi
74b1(mdo sde): ni de bzhin nyid//de ni yang dag sus mthong ba//de yi ye shes yang dag mtshon//rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te//mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung //ming dang mtshan ma med pa na//
74b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin don dam ma yin te//thams cad lus la kun nas gnas//kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste//bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod gnas//yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs//yid
74b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam shes spyod pa yis//yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas//rnam shes lnga po yul can dag/'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa yin//rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni//sems can bzhin
74b4(mdo sde): gnas lus can la//kun gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las//dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'gyur//rnam shis kun gzhi mtshor gnas pa//bag chags rnams kyis brnyogs pa'i rnams//
74b5(mdo sde): yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pa dag/rnam par rgyun chad med par rgyu//chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras//bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste///
74b6(mdo sde): mngon sangs rgyas shing chos ston te//phung po gang zag bdag med par//rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing //chos kyi dngos yod ma bshig par//nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur//
74b7(mdo sde): bdag med gnyis la mkhas pa nyid//rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed//rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni//tshul bzhin bzhin du yang dag mtha'//yang dag mtha' yi bde
75a1(mdo sde): myong zhing //sring rje med pa'i sras rnams ni//sems can dgongs pa'i rgyud bcadru pas//de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob bo//ngas ma yas kye ma ye shes 'di//sems
75a2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi bde bskyed//mkhyen cing rgyal ba rgyal sras rnamapa//blo chung rnams la tshul ston te//ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi//dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad+mo dag/thub pa rnams dang /
75a3(mdo sde): lha dag gi/nye ba'i longs spyod rgyu yin no//de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las//rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'byung ba ni//sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing //lha la yid du 'ong ba yin/
75a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang //lha yi khrod du khyad par du//rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste//'khor lo can du khyad par du'o//lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang //
75a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi de bzhin te//theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi//lus can rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob//de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis//theg pa che la brtson par gyis//mthar gyis
75a6(mdo sde): bde gshegs gnas rab dang //rgyal po dag tu'ang 'gyur bar 'ong //kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang //rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun//rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi//sa
75a7(mdo sde): la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin//spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam//'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyang //gtso ba rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyis//'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas//khyad
75b1(mdo sde): par can gyi rgyu brjod pa//ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste//rgyu med rang yang med par 'gyur//bya med byed pa'ang med par 'gyur//rnam par byang dang tha mi dang //kun gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba
75b2(mdo sde): min//de ste rnam byang tha dad na//kun gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur//sngon med 'jig med rtag pa ste//mtha' gzhi rnam par spangs pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/sprul pa
75b3(mdo sde): ye shes sgrar yang grag/phan tshun snying po tha mi dang //de ni sor gdub bzhin du gnas//sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste//bde gshegs snying po dge ba'ang de//snying po de la kun gzhi
75b4(mdo sde): sgras//de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad//snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang //blo zhan rnams kyis mi shis so//gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi/gser las sor gdub
75b5(mdo sde): byas pa ni//sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes//phan tshun tha dad mtshon yin te//sor gdub ces kyang brjod mod kyi//las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur bas//gser ni gzugs bzhin
75b6(mdo sde): rab tu gnas//chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi//sems dang rnam par shes pa'i yul//bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang //'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldog/'phags pa mthong ba'i chos
75b7(mdo sde): ldan gyi//so so rang gis mthong ba dang //spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa//thams cad brjod par mi nus so//ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung //sems dang rnam shes spyod yul
76a1(mdo sde): du//sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang //rnam shes yin te yul med do//sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su//gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste//rdza m+bu snam bu sogs
76a2(mdo sde): pa yi//yul ni gang yang yod pa min//ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing //nyi zla gza' yi tshogs kyi rnams//bral ba med par rtag tu 'khor//de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi la//rnam
76a3(mdo sde): dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni//rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar//kun gzhi snying por bsgrags pa na//rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin//rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dag/
76a4(mdo sde): brtag par nus pa mo yin dang //yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang //rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong //yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni//bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos/
76a5(mdo sde): smig rgyu sna tshogs byung ba ste//'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs//stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las ji snyed pa'i mdo//rdzogs so///
76a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ma hA ka ru NA puN+Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/bod skad du/'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas
76a7(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i
76b1(mdo sde): tshal na bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan dgun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pado mod kyi nam gyi thun
76b2(mdo sde): tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/khyod kyis shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal chos shig/kun dga' bo 'dus byas
76b3(mdo sde): su brtags pa thams cad legs par bcom po'i shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ngas gnas med pa'i
76b4(mdo sde): chos zhi ba rab tu zhi ba mchog gya nom pa zab pa/mthong bar dka' bo/khong du chud par dka' ba/rtag mi nus pa ma brtags pa/rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/mkhas pa dang 'dzangs
76b5(mdo sde): pas rig pa/phul du phyin par 'phags pa'i bdud rtsi ni bstan/kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am bdud dam lha'amatshungs pa 'am/gzhan gang gis
76b6(mdo sde): kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba len gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba ni bskor/ngas chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdungs/ngas chos kyi dung chen po ni pus/ngas chos kyi
76b7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgrengs/nges chos kyi mar mechen po ni bus/nges mun pa chen po ni bsal/ngas stong gsum ni sdang bar byas/nges gru chen po ni bcas/ngas stegs chen po ni btsugs
77a1(mdo sde): ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/ngas pha rol tu 'dod pa mang po ni bton/ngas thar pa'i lam ni yang dag par bstan/ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phab/ngas lha dang mi
77a2(mdo sde): rnams ni tshim par byas/ngas gdul ba rnams ni btul/ngas pas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni skrag par byas/ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/ngas
77a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas ni g.yo bar byas/ngas seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyung /ngas sngon gyi yi dam ni yongs su rdzogs par byas//
77a4(mdo sde): ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis brlabs/ngas nyan thos chen po rnams las byed du ni btsud/ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems
77a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba ma gtogs par phyis bya ba nga la med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rnam pa
77a6(mdo sde): de lta bu de thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug rngus zug par gyur nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
77a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rab tu myur bar mya dran las 'da' zhing bde bar gshegs pa rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ste/'jig rten gyi mig rab tu myur bar mi snang bar 'gyur/rab tu myur
77b1(mdo sde): bar 'jig rten mgon ma mchis pa dang skyabs ma mchis pa dang /yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
77b2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo tshig gis mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig/gang gnas pa dang byung ba dang 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa ni rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jig par ga la 'gyur
77b3(mdo sde): te de ni gnas med do//kun dga' bo nges thog ma nyid du khyed la dga' ba dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur bral bar 'gyur bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma
77b4(mdo sde): bstan tam/kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la byams pa'i lus kyi las phan pa dang bde ba dang gnyis su med pa dang tshad med pa dang /mi mthun pa med pas bsnyen bkur byas so//kun dga' bo
77b5(mdo sde): gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa la bskul pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bsnyen bkur byas pa bas gang de bzhin gshegs
77b6(mdo sde): pa la yud tsam zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de de bas 'bras bu shin tu ches kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/smre sngags ma 'don cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
77b7(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur byas pa ni don che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang phan yon che ba dang rgya che ba dang bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang /bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang /bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
78a1(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mchi ma phyis nas smre sngags 'don cing shing sA la zung gri bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas
78a2(mdo sde): mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sA la zung ga la ba der gshegs nas shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal lo//gang gi
78a3(mdo sde): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na shing dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman
78a4(mdo sde): dang nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam mo yan cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gang du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba de logs su gzhol 'dud rab tu 'dud cing mngon par 'dud/
78a5(mdo sde): par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klung ngam 'bab chu 'am chu mig gam mtsho 'am lteng ka 'am khron pa 'am rdzing ngam/pad+ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yod
78a6(mdo sde): pabade dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang po dang /ri dgas mang po sna tshogs ji snyed
78a7(mdo sde): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra mi 'byin par 'khod cing mi za mi rgyu bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dam/skar ma'i
78b1(mdo sde): gzugs sam/nor bu'am me 'am smin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste/lham mer ma yin/lhan ner ma yin/lhang nger ma yin par
78b2(mdo sde): gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i mo ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/mi 'bar bar gyur/mi cha
78b3(mdo sde): bar gyur/ma tshig par gyur/yongs su mi gdung bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi
78b4(mdo sde): zhing bsil bar gyur to//de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to//dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i
78b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/gcig la gcig gnod sems med rnam par 'tshe ba med rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med cing gnod pa byed
78b6(mdo sde): pa med par gyur to//gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkros pa dang /skom pa med par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs
78b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang lus dang sems tshim pa dang /sdug bsngal rgyun chad pa dang /bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar klo g.yas
79a1(mdo sde): pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /khor yug dang khor yug chen po dang /btang zung dang btang zung chen po
79a2(mdo sde): dang /spos kyi ngad ldang dang /gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang /gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang /rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs
79a3(mdo sde): pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/'gul rab tu 'gul/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ldeg rab tu ldeg par gyur to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i tshe mi ldang bar gyur to//
79a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe skad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang bar gyur te gnyid mod/tshong pa med sgrib pa med chom pa med cing mi 'dzer bar gyur te sgra chung ca ci chung
79a5(mdo sde): zhing yid mi g.yeng bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha
79a6(mdo sde): ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur
79a7(mdo sde): te 'od med gzi brjid med par gyur par shes so//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas monal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang
79b1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khyod pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi stan dang skyed mos
79b2(mdo sde): tshal dang gzhal med khang rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas par skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
79b3(mdo sde): khams 'dri na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po gang dag zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi nan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba 'di snyam du sems shing bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag byas/bdag
79b4(mdo sde): cag gis sems can 'di dag sprul/bdag cag gis 'jig rten byas/bdag cag gis 'jig rten sprul lo snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i
79b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to//rang rang gi gnas thams cad dang ldan pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur par shes so//de
79b6(mdo sde): bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur par shes te rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to//'jig rten skyong ba dang dbang
79b7(mdo sde): phyug chen po dang gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdog rang gi gnas
80a1(mdo sde): la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga ltas yin snyam du sems so//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
80a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa la bltas so//des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa po dbang phyug
80a3(mdo sde): bdag po dbang sgyur ba/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do mod mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/gang gis bdag rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dag
80a4(mdo sde): ba dang /glang gis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sde ltas yin 'di ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/de ma
80a5(mdo sde): dga' zhing yid dung zhes byed de spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te myur ba myur bar rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //de'i
80a6(mdo sde): tshe snang gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang /ma 'dus pa dang /tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur/'phags
80a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos la gnas par gyur to//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan
80b1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang ji ltar bslab par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
80b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa khyod nga ni tshangs pa tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa kun shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba yin
80b3(mdo sde): te/bdag gis sems can rnams byas/bdag gis sems can rnams sprul/bdag gis 'jig rten byas/bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing de skad zer zhe na bden nam//
80b4(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das med do//bde bar gshegs pa med do//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa khyod sus byas/sus sprul/de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to//tshangs pa chen//
80b5(mdo sde): po cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar
80b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar/kun tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa khyod nyid kyis byas sam/khyod kyis sprul tam/gsol pa/
80b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sa chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la brten/chu'ang rlung la brtan/rlung yang nam mkha' la brten te 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri
81a1(mdo sde): brgyad stong yod cing mi 'jig pa de la ji snyam du sems/'di khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul tam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bde bar
81a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i bu dag lam me ma yin/lhan ni ma yin zhing gzhal med khang rnams stong par
81a3(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
81a4(mdo sde): ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/grang sos ka dang /dbyar dang ston dang dgun dang dgun smad dang /dpyid kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis
81a5(mdo sde): byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang chu'am/me long gi dkyil
81a6(mdo sde): 'khor ramo/'bru mar dang mar gyi snod dam/nor bu dang shel rnams kyi nang ngam/de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di lta ste shing
81a7(mdo sde): ljon pa dang nags tshil dang kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang snang ba 'am/grong dang grong khyer dang grong brdal snang ba'am/glang po che dang rta dang rnga mo dang ba lang dang bong/
81b1(mdo sde): bu dang lug dang ri dgas dang bya rnams snang ba 'am/zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i tshogs rnams snang ba 'am/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs bya'i sku/
81b2(mdo sde): snang ba 'am/sa dang ri dang klung snang ba'am/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang de las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis
81b3(mdo sde): sprul pa dang /khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin na mo/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa g.yang sa dang ri deng ri'i 'bab chu dang rdzing rnams na dung dang rnga bo che
81b4(mdo sde): dang rdza rnga dang glu gaur dang ri dgas dang bya dang mi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag cha dang /gang de dang mthun pa'i sgra brnyan 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa
81b5(mdo sde): dang /khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmi la mo ni gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang /
81b6(mdo sde): sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang /dri sna tshogs snom pa dang /ro sna tshogs myong ba dang /reg bya sna tshogs reg pa dang /chos sna tshogs shes pa dang dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs myong ba dang /mchim
81b7(mdo sde): byung ba dang ngu ba dang 'jigs pa deng skrag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba mthong ba 'am/myong ba'i ma shes pa de dag tshangs pa khyed kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs
82a1(mdo sde): pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal ba/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang /mi dga' bru dang mya ngan dang /skye sngags
82a2(mdo sde): 'don pa dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang bkres pa dang /sgom po de dge tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol po bcom ldan 'das ma
82a3(mdo sde): lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi mdzes pa'am mi sdug pa 'am/longs spyod che ba 'am longs spyod chung ba 'am/dbul ba 'am/bsod nams
82a4(mdo sde): che ba'am/tshul khrims bzang ba'am/tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/shes rab bzang ba'am/shes rab 'tshal pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyed kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /
82a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyis 'jigs pa 'am/sgog pa 'am/gnod pa
82a6(mdo sde): 'om/rnam par 'tshe ba 'am/rnam par mtho 'tshams pa 'di lta ste/mtshan cha dang me dang chu dang rlung dmar dang dug dang gcan gzan khro bo dang dgra dang mi dang /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs
82a7(mdo sde): pa'am/gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyed kyis sprul pa dang /khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom
82b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang dus dang khams mi mthun pa lngas gyur pa
82b2(mdo sde): 'am/gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus na ba dang /sems can rnams kyi yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal
82b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis spel pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lugs so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang mu gri
82b4(mdo sde): dang chu dang 'brag dong sbrul dang chom rkun dang dgon pa dang mtshon cha dang nad dang bar gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang /khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
82b5(mdo sde): nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'brel ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pha ma dang spun dang sring mo dang grogs dang nye
82b6(mdo sde): du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dang bu po dang chung ma dang bu mo dgu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa
82b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs yang ba'i los la sbyor ba/skra dang babs dang rgya skyugs dang /'khor lo 'tshang ba'am/
83a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba dang /'brog dgon par 'jug pa'am/phyogs sna tshogs su skyes 'degs pa 'am/zhing ge las rgya cher byed pa'am/de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna
83a2(mdo sde): tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang
83a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par len pa/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi'i rgyu las
83a4(mdo sde): byung ba rnams dang /gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /legs par spyad pa rnams sam/gang 'jig rten na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems
83a5(mdo sde): can rnams la mi phan pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang gnod pa dang /dAn song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log
83a6(mdo sde): par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnod sems dang /log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod
83a7(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod byed kyi sdug
83b1(mdo sde): bsngal 'di lta ste/mgo bcad pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang rna ba dang sna bcad pa'am/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad pa'am/mer bsregs pa dang /'bru mar gyis gtor ba dang /srog
83b2(mdo sde): dang dpral ba dang ral gri dang mdung thung dang /mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang /bsad pa dang bcing ba dang go rar gzhug pa dang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byis///
83b3(mdo sde): shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod
83b4(mdo sde): pa'i gzhis ma la log par spyod pa dang /sring mo la log par spyod pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log par spyod pa dang /sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs
83b5(mdo sde): pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod
83b6(mdo sde): par byed pa sna tshogs byed dang ro longs dang rig sngags dang sngags dang sman dang 'byung po dang gdon 'bebs pa dang /gang de las gzhan pa dug sbyor ba dang /gang sems can rnams la gnod par
83b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /srog 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol
84a1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta ste/skye ba dang
84a2(mdo sde): rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang /zad pa'i chos nyid dang 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang
84a3(mdo sde): mdza' ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang /med par 'gyur ba dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang bya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis
84a4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang sgrib pa dang
84a5(mdo sde): chod pa dang bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa dang kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba
84a6(mdo sde): dang /sdang bar 'gyur ba dang rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /las mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang
84a7(mdo sde): khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang 'di sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin
84b1(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis
84b2(mdo sde): sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso//bka' stsal pa/tshangs po gang 'di 'byung po'i tshogs dang /sa bon gyi tshogs dang rtsa dang
84b3(mdo sde): shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal chu na gnas pa dang /thang la gnas pa'am me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dang spos shing rnam pa sna tshogs sam/mngar ba dang kha ba dang lan tshwa dang sbyar
84b4(mdo sde): ba dang tsha ba dang /bsku ba'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mngon par grub pa gang sems can rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du sems//
84b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa gang 'gro ba lnga po
84b6(mdo sde): dag na yongs su 'khor ba skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'thon pa dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'di dag dang /tshangs pa gang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang /sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa kun
84b7(mdo sde): tu rgyug cing 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang /tshangs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyun ma chad pa gang na lha dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dang /dge
85a1(mdo sde): sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thags 'khrugs pa lta bu/dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu 'ong ba dang /'gro bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang /'jig rten
85a2(mdo sde): pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/'khor ba las byung ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis
85a3(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so//bka' stsar pa/'on tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar ngas sems
85a4(mdo sde): can 'di dag byas ngas sprul ngas byin gyis brlabs ngas 'jig rten byas ngas sprul ngas byin gyis brlabs snyam du sems/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdog ni ma 'tshal ba/rtag tu lta
85a5(mdo sde): bar gyur pa ma spangs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rtag tu ma thos pas sems can rnams bdag
85a6(mdo sde): gis bgyis/bdag gis sbrul/'jig rten bdag gis bgyis/'jig rten bdag gis sprul zhes bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bur gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de
85a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di lus bgyis/'jig rten 'di sus sprul/sems can rnams sus bgyis/sus sprul/bcom
85b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu lags/sus byin gyi brlabs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa 'jig rten ni las kyis byas las
85b2(mdo sde): kyis sprul lo//sems can rnams ni lus kyis byas/las kyi rgyu las byung las kyis rab tu phye ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis
85b3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen
85b4(mdo sde): gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid
85b5(mdo sde): mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di/'bo' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas sdug bsngal
85b6(mdo sde): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag pa'i bar du 'gyur te/tshangs pa las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams yod na sems can rnams 'byung bar snang ba dang /las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor
85b7(mdo sde): nga dang bral bas 'byung ba med par snang ba ma gtogs par 'di la byed pa po 'am/byed du 'jug pa 'am/nye bar 'jog pa po gang yang med do//tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad
86a1(mdo sde): pa dang /nyon mongs pa zad pa dang /sdug bsngal zad pa dang /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang /nges par byung ba dang rnam par zhi ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las
86a2(mdo sde): 'das pa zhes bya'o//tshangs pa de la las gang yin pa de zad pa dang /nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang /sdug bsngal gang yin pa de rnam par zhi ba dang /nub pa ma gtogs
86a3(mdo sde): par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos nyid de lta bu dag 'byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/
86a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa mi 'byung gi/tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi
86a5(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba zab pa zab par snang ba chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las yongs su
86a6(mdo sde): grol bar 'gyur/sems can rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sdigs 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid myi badre ba dang /'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i bar dag las yongs su grol bar
86a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/'du byed thams cad ni mig yir lta bu mi rtag pa g.yo nga mi brtan pa/the zug ma yin pa zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes tshangs pa sangs
86b1(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de rnam par phye zhing gsal bar mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
86b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na'ang 'di lta ste/'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid byin gyi rlabs yin no//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed thams cad//
86b3(mdo sde): mig yor lta bur ma gzigs su zin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bur mi ston pa zhig na tshangs pa gang
86b4(mdo sde): gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang /mig yor dang brag cha lta bu dang mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mkhyen pa de'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs
86b5(mdo sde): pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bur ston no//de la mkhas pa de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag yod de de'i mtshan ma mthong nas rgyu de dang rkyen de dang dmigs pa'i mtshan
86b6(mdo sde): ma des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par khong du chud cing g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes rnam par 'byed do//'du byed thams cad ni 'jig cing 'gyur ro//dus dang tshigs dang dus tshigs
86b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang 'jog go//skad cig dang thang cig dang phyed tsam dang yud tsam dang zhag dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo dang lo brgya dang bskal pa dang bskal pa brgya dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro///
87a1(mdo sde): me'i phung po chen po'ang 'bar nas shi bar 'gyur ro//chu'i phung po chen po'ang bab nas mi 'bab po//rlung gi phung po chen po'ang langs nas mi ldang ngo //sa'i phung po
87a2(mdo sde): chen po'ang byung nas med par 'gyur ro//ri'i phung po chen po khor yug dang /khor yug chen po dang /lhun po dang lhun po chen po dang /de las gzhan pa ri nag po dag kyang byung nas ye med
87a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag kyang byung nas lham mer ma yin lhan ner ma yin lhang nger ma yin zhing slar lhung ngo //lha yul pa'i
87a4(mdo sde): lha'i gzhal med khang bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro//gong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal 'di dag dang /shing ljon pa dang nags tshal dang /skyed mos tshal dang /kun dga' nyams
87a5(mdo sde): dga' ba 'di dag kyang byung nas 'gag par 'gyur ro//lha dang mi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang 'pho ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag kyang mtshan ma
87a6(mdo sde): de mthong nas kye ma'o 'du byed 'di thams cad ma rtag pa'o 'jig go//'du byed 'di thams cad med par 'gro'o//'gyur ro//'du byed 'di thams cad zad par 'gyur ro snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur
87a7(mdo sde): ro//skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag rgyu de dang rkyen des khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo //de dag dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung nas kyang 'du byed
87b1(mdo sde): thams cad mig yor lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag cha lta bur rig ste/mtshan ma de dang dmigs pa de dang rkyen des byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro//chu'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /nyi ma'i dkyil
87b2(mdo sde): 'khor snang ba dang /skar ma'i gzugs snang ba de dag mthong nas/de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa 'am/de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gdams pa'am/bdag gi blos
87b3(mdo sde): brtags pas 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bur rtogs nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
87b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa dang /gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bzod pa dang po thob pa dang /bzod pa gnyis pa
87b5(mdo sde): dang gsum pa thob pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa dag yod do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa rnams
87b6(mdo sde): kyi chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ste/de zos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad mchog dang
87b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang /theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di'ang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya ste/tshangs pa gang gis skyes bu mkhas pa dag
88a1(mdo sde): gis 'du byed 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba/g.yo ba mi brtan pa/zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can te/rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma de mthong
88a2(mdo sde): nas yang dag par skyo bar 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so//sngon spyad cing sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yongs su smin par bya ba
