174b1(mdo sde): da drang pad+ma dkar po thams cad dang /glu dbyangs thams cad dang /rol mo'i sgra thams cad dang /lha dang mi'i mchod pa bzang po me tog nas sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa'i bar thams cad kyis
174b2(mdo sde): bsti stang byed/bla mar byed/rim gror byed/mchod par byed na/kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/gzhi de las khyim bdag de bsod nams mang du skyed dam/gsol pa/bcom
174b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la khyim bdag des bshos gsol na'ang bsod nams mang du skyed de/dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs
174b4(mdo sde): de snyed cig bskal pa de snyed du bzhugs pa la bsti stang bgyid/bla mar bgyid/rim gror bgyid/mchod par bgyid pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten
174b5(mdo sde): la de lta bu'i bsti stang bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de lta bu la de lta bu'i bsti stang bgyis pa khyim bdag de gzhi de las bsod
174b6(mdo sde): nams 'od skyed cig bskyed do zhes bsod nams kyi phung po de dpe bsten du mi nus so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
174b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khyod la bsgo'o//kun dga' bo khyed kyi khong du chud par bya'o//khyim bdag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed cig bskal pa de snyed du bzhugs
175a1(mdo sde): pa la bsti stang byas/bla mar byas/rim gror byas/mchod pa byas pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten la de lta bu'i bsti stang byas
175a2(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa bas/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rab tu mang ba/lhag po'i bsam pas zhugs pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang
175a3(mdo sde): chub la mi rtog par mngon par dad cing yid ches la/mos pa gang gis chos thams cad mi rtag pa 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/stong pa 'am/bdag med pa'o zhes legs par
175a4(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos la yang dag par zhugs shing tshig tu smra na/kun dga' bo 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do//kun dga' bo gang bla na med pa'i chos dkon
175a5(mdo sde): mchog 'di lta bu bsti stang du byas te gzhan le 'chad dam/rab tu ston na bsod nams ji tsam du rgya cher skyed pa dang /ji tsom du tshad med pa dang /ji tsam du grangs med pa dang //
175a6(mdo sde): ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /ji tsam du mtshungs pa med pa dang /ji tsam du dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa la ltos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di
175a7(mdo sde): ltar de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa rnams ni zag pa dang bcas shing nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ste/'khor ba'i rgyu ba yin la/kun dga' bo bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar
175b1(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa'i chos dkon mchog zang zing med pa bla na med pa 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//kun dga' ba chos dkon mchog blan med pa 'di thos na sems
175b2(mdo sde): can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/sems can na ba'i chos can dang /'chi ba'i chos can dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug
175b3(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde bo dang /'khrug pa'i chos can rnams 'khrug pa'i bar las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo don gyi gzhi 'di mthong nas gang chos gus par
175b4(mdo sde): 'tshed pa dang /gang chos gus par nyan pa gnyis ni bsod nams mang du bskyed do zhes nga smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dge'
175b5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs shing yang dag par bsgrub par 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mi rtog par mngon
175b6(mdo sde): par dad cing mos nas chos legs par gsungs pa yin pa dang /dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa yin pa dang /'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/zhi ba
175b7(mdo sde): 'am/stong pa 'am/bdag med pa yin par yid ches na/kun dga' bo 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de tshig tsam ma yin no//kun dga' bo gang la la
176a1(mdo sde): zhig gis ru shing bzhin du byas/yid la byas/sems thams cad kyis bsam nas rna brags te chos nyan pa dang /mnyan nas kyang tha nA se gol gtogs pa
176a2(mdo sde): tsam yang mi rtag pa 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'om/stong pa 'am/bdag med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
176a3(mdo sde): myu med pa dag na sems can gyi khams yod pa'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad ni ches mang gi/sa'i khams ma yin/chu'i khams ma yin/me'i khams ma yin/rlung
176a4(mdo sde): gi khams ma yin no zhes de skad bya ba de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/skad cig dang /thang cig dang /yud tsam cig la snga phyi med par mir gyur la/skad cig
176a5(mdo sde): dang /thang cig dang /yud tsam cig la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/khyim bdag gcig cig kyang byung la/sangs
176a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji tsam du 'khor de'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa de srid du yun ring du bzhugs te/khyim bdag de'ang bskol pa de srid du gnas par gyur la/des
176a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la na bza' dang be shos dang gzims cha dang /na bo'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dang /bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byed/bla
176b1(mdo sde): mar byed/rim gror byed/mchod par byed pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas te/lha'i gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
176b2(mdo sde): dang /ba dan rnams dang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa thams cad dang /bdog pa thams cad kyis bsti steng byed/bla mar byed/rim gor byed/mchod par
176b3(mdo sde): byed na/kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/khyim bdag de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa
176b4(mdo sde): gcig mnyes par bgyis/bsti stang bgyis/bla mar bgyis/rim gror bgyis/mchod par bgyis na'ang gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed de/bsod nams ched ma mchis//
176b5(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa ma mchis/dpag tu ma mchis pa skyed par 'gyur na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de lta bu la bskal pa de snyed du bste
176b6(mdo sde): steng bgyis/bla mar bgyis/rim gror bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
176b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/de bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do//kun dga' bo de bas na khyed la bsgo'o//khyod
177a1(mdo sde): kyi khong du chud par bya'o//gang khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa de skad cig la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bskal pa de snyed du bsti stang byas/bla
177a2(mdo sde): mar byas/rim gror byas pas bsod nams bskyod pa bas/gang gis ru shing bzhin du byas/yid la byas/sems thams cad kyis bsams te/rna blags sems rtse gcig tu
177a3(mdo sde): byas nas chos nyan cing se gol gtogs pa tsa mo yang 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa 'am/sdug bsnol ba 'am/zhi ba 'am/stong pa 'am/bdag med pa'o zhes yid la byed
177a4(mdo sde): noni 'di de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/kun dga' bo gang chos gus par 'chad pa dang gang ches gus par nyan pa ni bsod nams ches mang du skyed do//kun dgo'
177a5(mdo sde): bongs 'di la dgongs nas 'di skad du/rnam pa gnyis kyi don gyi phyir//sangs rgyas bshad pa mnyan par bya//zag pa rnams kyang zad par 'gyur//byang chub nye bar gyur
177a6(mdo sde): par 'dod//gang zhig chos rnams 'chad pa dang //drang srong rgyal mtshan gang 'dzin pa//gnyis ga bsod nams ldan par 'gyur//chos ni drang srong rgyal mtshan yin
177a7(mdo sde): zhes bshad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gang chos gus par 'chad pa dang /gang chos gus par
177b1(mdo sde): nyan pa 'di gnyis ni bdud dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'dre ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid dang /dge ba'i grogs su gyur pa nyid dang /
177b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sems
177b3(mdo sde): can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur du nas sems can 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams 'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo ngas
177b4(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams la yang dag po'i lta ba 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyis dang /rkyen gnyis ni 'di lta ste/gzhan gyi sgra dang /so so rang gis tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o zhes gsungs pa'ang de
177b5(mdo sde): yin te/kun dga' bo de dag las gzhan gyi sgra ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las byung bar rig par bya'o//gang so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de'ang sangs rgyas
177b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid las byung bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa med pa'i
177b7(mdo sde): phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas rnams ma byung na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci zhig yid la bya ba mi shes kyi chos 'di dag yid la bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa
178a1(mdo sde): nyid kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo ngas don gyi gzhi 'di mthong nas so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las byung
178a2(mdo sde): bar rig par bya'o zhes de skad bshad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//skyes bu dam pa rnams ni mthong na legs//the tshom rnams ni
178a3(mdo sde): gcod cing sol bar byed//byis pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhas par byed//de bas mkhas pa rnams ni mthong na legs//'phags pa rnams ni mthong na bde//dam pa rnams
178a4(mdo sde): dang 'grogs pa'ang ba //byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na//dam pa rnams la rtag tu bde//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /dge ba'i grogs su gyur
178a5(mdo sde): pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gyu med pa ni tshangs par spyod pa 'di rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'ang ngas 'di la dgongs te tshig de skad smras so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun
178a6(mdo sde): dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sems dge bar 'gyur ro//sems dge bas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur/sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur/dge ba'i chos la sems dang
178a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/dge ba'i chos la nye bar gnas par 'gyur/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shes nas dad par 'gyur/chos la shes nas dad par 'gyur/dge
178b1(mdo sde): 'dun la shes nas drad par 'gyur/'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rang dbang can mkhas pas bsngags pa/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba rnams bobya par 'gyur ro//kun
178b2(mdo sde): dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na char rab tu bab na shang shong rnams yongs su gang bar byed do//shang shong rnams yongs su gang nas chu bran rnams brug par byed do//chu bran rnams
178b3(mdo sde): brug nas klung chen po rnams drug par byed do//klung chen po drug pa rnams kyis mtsho chen po rgya mtsho yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen
178b4(mdo sde): dang /dge ba'i grogs su gyur po dang /dge ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang /dge ba gtso bor gyur pa dang /dge ba'i sems nyid la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed
178b5(mdo sde): pa thob pa rnams ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bar du bsgrub pas rab tu mthar thug pa dang /rab tu dri ma med pa dang /rab tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /rab tu mthar phyin por
178b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo phyi rol gyi dngos por gyur pa 'di dag kyang dus la bab na skye bar 'gyur ba dang /me tog dang /yal ga dong /'bras bu'ibyin pa la ltos//
178b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo 'di ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag kyang slu bar mi byed na khyed kyi legs par spyad pa mi slu ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do//kun dga' bo legs par spyad pa ni su la'ang mi
179a1(mdo sde): smras legs par spyad pa spyod cig/kun dga' bo nga'ang legs par spyad pas ma bslus so//kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/legs
179a2(mdo sde): par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag spyad de legs par spyad pa des nga ma bslus so//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa lam gang nas gshegs pa de na gang sa mthon dman dang /ngam
179a3(mdo sde): grog dang /g.yang sa dang /stor khung dang /shod khrud dang /sdong du ma dang /tshor ma stug po de dag thams cad 'dud cing med par 'gyur ba dang /sa dma' ba mthon por 'gyur
179a4(mdo sde): ba dang /mthon po dma' bar 'gyur ba dang /shing rnams rab tu 'dud pa dang /shing gi lha rnams phyag 'tshal ba dang /tshong dus dang /srang dag na skye bo gang dag 'khod pa de
179a5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'brang ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas de dag slar rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa la ltos/kun dga' bo sngon sangs rgyas bcom
179a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba rnams dang /dge
179a7(mdo sde): sbyong dang /bram ze rgan pa rnams la rtag tu gus pa dang /'dud pa dang /phyag 'tshal ba'i legs par spyad pa'i rgyu mthun pa la ltos/kun dga' bo phyi rol gyi dngos po sems
179b1(mdo sde): med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /'thob par 'gyur ba dang /dngos po gang dag dma' bar 'os pa 'am/mtho bar 'os pa de dag de bzhin gshegs
179b2(mdo sde): pa mthong ma thag tu dma' ba dang mtho bar 'gyur ba legs par spyad pa'i khyad par la ltos/'di la mi blun po kha cig ni nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non/nga rgyal gyis bslang /nga rgyal
179b3(mdo sde): gyis sems yongs su gdungs nas su la'ang mi 'dud do//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel ba dang /zhabs dra bar 'brel pa de dag thams cad kyang legs
179b4(mdo sde): par spyad pa las gyur pa la ltos/kun dga' bo gang ngas sngon sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa sems can rnams bsdus pa sngon gyi legs par
179b5(mdo sde): spyad po de dag la ltos/kun dga' bong sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di ni nga'i ma yin/'di ni nga'i pha yin/'di ni phu nu bo//'di ni sring mo//'di ni nyeng//
179b6(mdo sde): 'di ni mdza' bo//'di ni mi mdza' ba yin no sgom pa de lta bur ma gyur gyi/kun dga' bo nga ni sems can thams cad la sems ro gcig pa dang /sems mnyam zhing sems mi
179b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa med pa dang /bdag gi sems su gyur to//kun dga' ba yun ring po 'di na gang ngas sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pas ma gzung ba'i
180a1(mdo sde): sems can de ni rnyed par sla ba ma yin na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni de ltar bzung bar mi shes so//ji ltar 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa bzhin du byis
180a2(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bde ba myong ste/kun dga' bo byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis rang gis bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pas bde ba myong bar gyur pa de bas ni
180a3(mdo sde): gang ngas sems can gcig la bde bar sbyar zhing bsgrubs pa 'di ches myong ste/ngas sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba bsgrubs pa tsam ni sems can de dag gis rang gis
180a4(mdo sde): bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pas bde ba ma myong ngo //kun dga' bo 'on kyang bde bar sbyor ba de dag thams cad ni mi rtog pa ste 'gyur ba'i chos can no//gang nga sngon byang chub
180a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyad pa spod pa na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la bde bar sbyor ba thams cad nyo bar spyad pa de dag thams cad ni lam 'di la dgod pa'i phyir yongs su smin par 'gyur
180a6(mdo sde): ba sha stag go/da ltar bde ba gang gis ngas khyod bde bar byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'i bde ba/'phags pa zag pa med pa'i bde ba/de dag ni nam yang phyis yongs su mi 'gyur
180a7(mdo sde): zhing chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo di bas na 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bya ba byos shig/kun dga' bo ye shes kyi bya bas bya ba byos shig/ngas ni byas zin no//
180b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo spyod pa gzhan yang tha na sems dad pa gcig bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa ngas bshad zin no//kun dga' bo sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa
180b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa dag kyang yod do//kun dga' bo sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su dran nas nga 'di lta bur
180b3(mdo sde): zad cing yongs su nyams pa thos na dga' ba tsa mo ma ma dad pa tsam gyis mchi ma 'byung ba dag kyang yod do//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran nas shugs ring po
180b4(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/spu zing zhes byed pa dag kyang yod de/sems can de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
180b5(mdo sde): rten du mi 'gro zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba dag go/kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang la la nga rjes su dran nas chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung ba
180b6(mdo sde): 'am/spu zing zhes byed pa'am/shugs ring du 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad ni kun dga' bo dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi
180b7(mdo sde): 'gro'o//log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gro'o//kun dga' bo de bas na bag yod pa la brtson par gyis shig/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
181a1(mdo sde): chub ni bag yod pas thob cing de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang bag yod pas thob bo//kun dga' bo gang 'doms pa blos bya ba
181a2(mdo sde): dang /gang don 'dod pa dang /phan pa dang bde ba 'dod pa dang /phan par dga' ba dang /snying rje can dang /snying brtse ba can gyis snying brtse ba'i phyir bya ba de dag dras byas kyis/da
181a3(mdo sde): ni khyed kyis ci nas kyang dge ba'i lam rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba dang /dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig/kun dga' bo ci nas kyang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di
181a4(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya cher 'gyur bar gyis shig/kun dga' bo chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di ci nas kyang rab tu mi 'jigs
181a5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la gtad do//'di ni ngas rjes su bstan pa'o//'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa
181a6(mdo sde): rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/
181a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bsgrubs na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'od yun ring du gnas pa dang /lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
181b1(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul 'di bdag gis ji ltar yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi/ji ltar rab tu bstan par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
181b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong gnas brtan dag 'dus nas chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par sdud par byed de/de la kun dga'
181b3(mdo sde): bo gra nas brtan 'od srungs chen po la sogs po dge slong gnas brtan dag khyod la 'di skad 'dri'o//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstun pa chen po dag gang du gsungs/gleng
181b4(mdo sde): gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs dag gang du/mnyam par bzhag pa chen po gang du/lnga pa dang gsum pa gang du/lhas zhus pa dag gang du/brgya byin gyis zhus pa dag gang du/lha yul
181b5(mdo sde): nas babs pa gang du/tshangs pa'i dri ba gang du gsungs zhes/kun dga' bo dge slong de dag rnam grangs de dag gis khyod la de skad 'dri bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo dri bzhin gshegs
181b6(mdo sde): pas mdo'i sde dag gang du gsungs/dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /lung bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /gleng gzhi'i sde dang /rtogs
181b7(mdo sde): pa brjod pa'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i sngo dang /skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde dag gang
182a1(mdo sde): du gsungs/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos kyi sde snod gang du gsungs/rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod gang du gsungs/theg pa chen po byang chub sems
182a2(mdo sde): dpa'i sde snod gang du gsungs zhes/kun dga' bo de na dge slong de dag gis khyod la de skad dris pa dang 'di skad lung ston zhig/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//

182a5(mdo sde): gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das yul bA ra Na sI na drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags ni bzhugs/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab

182b1(mdo sde): gigs thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

182b3(mdo sde): pa'i rdzing gi 'gram na bzhugs/de bzhin du ga yU na gau yA mgo'i ri la bzhugs/de bzhin du yul ko'u sham+b+hi na sgras mngon gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/yul gnas bcas

188b6(mdo sde): sogs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/phyin ci log bzhi'i chos snang zhing gsal bar rtogs par khong du chud pa gang gis byang chub sems
188b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /gang gis nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
189a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
189a2(mdo sde): chos ston pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te bzhugs so//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
189a3(mdo sde): mthong ba don yod dang /byang chub sems dpa' chu lha dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par srung byed blo gros dang /de dag la sogs
189a4(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' khri lhan cig tu stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shar
189a5(mdo sde): lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te rab tu dga' zhing rab tu drang ba'i yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
189a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas/sems can rnams las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
189a7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa ni ngo mtshar te phyag 'tshal
189b1(mdo sde): lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
189b2(mdo sde): sa lo btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcomi ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub
189b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha dang /
189b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spong byed blo gros dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub
189b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' khris bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bstan pa bcad nas lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
189b6(mdo sde): te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te rab tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
189b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ring po ma lon par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas/srog chags bye ba
190a1(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dge ba'i rtsa bdag la yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes mchi/bcom ldan 'das de
190a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa shul ni ji srid cig na bzhugs/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
190a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni yun ji srid cig lags/gang na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dum pa zhes bgyi ba bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/'jig
190a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'i bkod pa ni ji lta bu zhig gis brgyan pa lags/ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas cho 'phrul
190a5(mdo sde): chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad/rkyen gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yong dag par 'das pa gzhan
190a6(mdo sde): dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cho 'phrul gang dag rnam par bstan pa de dag kyang mthong la
190a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcomo ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka'
190b1(mdo sde): stsal to//rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu khyod sems can bye ba khrug khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs
190b2(mdo sde): pa pad+mo dam pas byang chub thob pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par bstan par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dri ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su
190b3(mdo sde): zhu bar sems dpa' ni khyod kyi spobs pa dge ba yin te khyod kyis yongs su zhus pa legs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung shig dang
190b4(mdo sde): bshad par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
190b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
190b6(mdo sde): phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed drag pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/mye tog sna tshogs bkram pa/spos
190b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis khyob pa/rin po che'i shong ljon pa dag gis brgyan pa/rin pa che'i pad+ma dag gis kun tu gong ba zhig yod de/de nas gzhi bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub cing /byang chub
191a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang la chos kyi sgras khyab pa yin no//bai DUr+ya las grub pa'i sa gzhi de'ang ka tsa lin+di kA ltar reg na badre zhing 'jam la/rkang pa
191a2(mdo sde): bzhag na sor bzhi tsam nems shes byed/rkang pa bteg na sor bzhi tsam par ces byed cing pad+ma sna tshogs dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no//de ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon
191a3(mdo sde): pa 'phang du dpag tshad bdun gyi srid tsa mo bdag yod de/shing ljon pa de dag la lha'i gos ngur smrig dgA rab tu 'phyang zhing /lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang dag par 'byin
191a4(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod do//shing ljon pa de dag la bya sna tshogs dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan log gi sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu sgrogs pa dag kyang yod de/shing
191a5(mdo sde): ljon pa de dag gi lo ma dag phan tshun phrad pa na lha'i lus shin tu 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag gi sgra'ang 'byung ngo //shing ljon pa re re'i dri rgya chen po lha'i las
191a6(mdo sde): 'dres pas kyang dpag tshad 'bum du khyab par byed cing shing ljon pa de dag la lha'i rgyan dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo //shing ljon pa de dag gi bar dag na rin po che sna
191a7(mdo sde): bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'phang du ni dpag ched lnga brgya rgyar ni dpag tshad brgya pa dag yod de/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kun la'ang phyogs bzhin rta babs dag yod de//
191b1(mdo sde): rtathabs de dag gi nang rol khang pa brdegs pa de dag gi phyi rol na rdzing bla srid du ni dpag tshad brgyad cu rgyur ni dpag tshad lnga bcu pa dag yod do//rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug/
191b2(mdo sde): no rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i them skas dag kyang yod do//rdzing bu de dag kyang khor yug tu me tog ut+pal dang /pad+ma dag gis kun nas yog ste/mye tog re re la'ang rgyur ni
191b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad tsam yod do//me tog de dag gi ze ba dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rab tu skyes te/de dag kyang nam gyi gung thun dang po la pad+ma de dag gi ze ba
191b4(mdo sde): dag las skye zhing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /bde ba myong bzhin du skyil mo krung gis mtshan mo de 'da' bar byed do//den mtshan mo de'i nang par gyi dus kyi tshe phyogs bzhi nas dri zhim
191b5(mdo sde): pa yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing reg na bde bar byed pa'i rlung dag rab tu ldang ste/de dag gis me tog kha zums pa rnams mngon par 'byed par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
191b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba spangs nas pad+ma'i ze ba dag las babs te/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu zhugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi stan
191b7(mdo sde): dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do//shing ljon pa de dag dang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug dag na rin po che dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi
192a1(mdo sde): ri 'phang du dpag tshad nyi shu rgyar ni dpag tshad gsum pa dag yod de/ri de dag gi bar byar dag na chu shel dang /me shel dang /an+da rnyil dang /nor bu skar
192a2(mdo sde): mdog 'bum phrag du ma dag snang ngo //de nas sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i 'od kyis ri dang nor bu dag la phog pa na sangs rgyas kyi 'od de dang /nor bu'i 'od des 'jig rten gyi khrims
192a3(mdo sde): pad+ma de rtag tu snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te/de na nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mi mngon te gzhan du na gang gi tshe pad+ma rnams kha zums shing bya dag sgra chung bar gyur pa de'i tshe
192a4(mdo sde): mtshan mo zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur la de las bzlog pa ni nyin par yin no//ri de dag gi steng na bai DUr+ya sngon po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa phang du ni dpag tshad drug cu
192a5(mdo sde): rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi shu pa dag yod de/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi na rin po che sna bdun las byis pa'i rta babs dag kyang yod do//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na
192a6(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag yod de de la skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams
192a7(mdo sde): pad+ma de na bying chub kyi shing dbang po zhes bya ba 'phang dri ni dpag tshad sum stong rgyar ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma dag ni dpag tshad stong du legs
192b1(mdo sde): bar gnas pa yod do//byang chub kyi shing de'i drung na dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma sdong bu'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya yod la/de'i 'drab ma ni gser las byas pa bye ba phrag 'bum
192b2(mdo sde): yod do 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga yod do//ze ba thams cad na rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa'i ze 'bru dag yod do//ze ba rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ste/'phang du
192b3(mdo sde): ni dpag tshad bcu rgyar ni dpag tshed bdun yod do//der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192b4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//sangs rgyas kyi gdan pad+ma de'i kho ra khor yug na'ang pad+ma dag yod de/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod pas de bzhin
192b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i cho 'phrul dag mthong bar gyur to//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
192b6(mdo sde): dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas cho 'phrul chen
192b7(mdo sde): po ji lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
193a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa ni mdang gi nam gyi thun tha ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
193a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/da nang nang par gyi dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
193a3(mdo sde): bar du mngon par sprul nas dbu'i gtsug tor nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rab tu bkye'o//'od zer de dag gos steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
193a4(mdo sde): zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyeng dag snang bas khyab par mdzad do//de'i tshe steng gi phyogs na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa dag gis thur du bltas na de dag la ri rab dang /khor
193a5(mdo sde): yug dang /khor yug chen po dang /ri nag po rnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang /gang dag
193a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob pa dag dang /gang dag gzungs thob pa drag dang /gang dag bzod pa thob pa dag dang /gang dag sa las shin tu 'das pa dag dang /de na gang dag skye ba gcig gis
193a7(mdo sde): thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur nas thal mo sbar te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dgo par rdzogs pa'i
193b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa de'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'i sku'ang mthong /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dang /'jig rten gyi
193b2(mdo sde): khams pad+ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhong gi yon tan bkod pa'ang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mchog tu dga' ba dang /bde ba skyes te/'jig rten gyi
193b3(mdo sde): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bgrong ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bor nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
193b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa lo mchod pa bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar lcags so//rigs
193b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa des kyang bzhugs pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /'chag bzhin du zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
193b6(mdo sde): byigyi khams de ljags kyi dbang pos yongs su khebs par mdzad do//de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas de bzhin gshegs
193b7(mdo sde): pa pad+ma dam pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la mchod pa bya ba'i las la brtson par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas ljags kyi dbang po'i rdzu 'phrul
194a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir bsdus nas/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas thams cad nas spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu'i sgo re re
194a2(mdo sde): nas kyang /'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung zhing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang
194a3(mdo sde): ba rgya chen pos khyab par mdzad nas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang dag ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen
194a5(mdo sde): bkur bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi snang ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar lhags so//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
194a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir bsdus nas/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang //
194a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /bde dang /theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
194b1(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje d+ma dkar po las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes
194b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i le'u ste dang dri'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldar
194b3(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma de mtshan mo dang nyin mong ni ji ltar 'tshal/don sbyin ji lta bu dag grags/byang chub sems dpa'adi dag bsam pa ni ji lta bu dang ldan/gnas pa ni gang
194b4(mdo sde): gis gnas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma ni rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa yin te/de na gang gi tshe ma
194b5(mdo sde): tog dag kha zums par gyur cing /bya rnams kyang sgra chung bar gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bsami gtan dag gis rol cing rnam par grol ba'i
194b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang bde myong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe de na mtshan mo yin par shes so//gang gi tshe me tog de rlung desaM kha bye bar gyur cing bya rnams kyang sgra yid du 'ong ba sgrogs par byed pa dang /
194b7(mdo sde): der me tog gi char dog kyang mngon par 'bab pa dang /phyogs bzhi nas dri mchog tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing /reg na bde bar 'gyur ba'i rlung dag ldang ba dang /bcom ldan
195a1(mdo sde): 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs la/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs shing bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam pa byang chub sems dpa'
195a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi tshe sa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam las shin tu 'das pa dag ston par mdzod pa de'i tshe de na nyin mo
195a3(mdo sde): yin par shes so//rigs kyi bu de na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang mi 'bral lo//mi 'jigs
195a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang /mngon par 'du byed pa'i sgra dang /skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /zhi ba'i sgra dang /nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /byams
195a5(mdo sde): pa chen po'i sgra dang /snying rje chen po'i sgra dang /mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang /dbang bskur ba'i sku thob pa'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang mi 'bral te/byang
195a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag ni rtag tu sgra de lta bu dag nyan par byed do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag skyes
195a7(mdo sde): pa dang /skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing /'od dpag tshad brgya pa yod la byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rnam par
195b1(mdo sde): mi lhung ba'i chos can yin no//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /snum pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang
195b2(mdo sde): ldan pa dang /dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /spro ring ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /rab tu dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /khong
195b3(mdo sde): khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /chos la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /sems can thams
195b4(mdo sde): cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /'jig rten pa'i gtam la mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems dang
195b5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'chol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /phung
195b6(mdo sde): po med pa la rtag tu rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /na ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg par byed
195b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /kun tu sbyor ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /chos thams cad la rlome sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /bsam
196a1(mdo sde): pa'i stobs can dang /sbyor ba'i stobs can dang /rkyen gyi stobs can dang /smon lam gyi stobs can dang /snying po med pa dang /ma 'dres shing gong du spyod
196a2(mdo sde): par byed pa'i stobs can dang /nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs can dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs can dang /thos pa'i stobs can dang /gau
196a3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs can+da dang /tshul khrims kyi stobs can dang /bzod pa'i stobs can dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs can dang /bsam gtan gyi stobs can dang /shes rab kyi stobs
196a4(mdo sde): can dang /zhi gnas kyi stobs can dang /lhag mthong gi stobs can dang /mngon par shes pa'i stobs can dang /dran pa'i stobs can dang /byang chub kyi stobs can
196a5(mdo sde): dang /snying stobs kyi stobs can dang /bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i stobs can dang /bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'dul byar byed pa'i stobs tsun+da
196a6(mdo sde): dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa'i stobs can dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i stobs can sha stag ste/'jig
196a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa dang /smyo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas 'bumo phrag mang po dag la lhag par bya
196b1(mdo sde): byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa yin no//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma der/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa dang /skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems
196b2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag ni 'di lta ste/dper na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la khams kyi zas za ba'i zas med pa bzhin du bsam gtan gyi zas dang /chos kyi zas dang /dri za'i zas dang ldan pa yin
196b3(mdo sde): no//de na rnam pa thams cad du mi dge ba'i ming yang med do//de na rnam pa thams cad du bud med kyi ming yang med gdags pa'ang med do//de na rnam pa thams cad du sdug bsngal
196b4(mdo sde): gyi sgra'ang med pa rnam pa thams cad du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sgra'ang med do//de bzhin du sbyar te nyon mongs pa'i sgra'ang med yongs su 'dzin pa'ang med do//de na mun pa'ang med dri ma'ang
196b5(mdo sde): med do//sems ngal ba'ang med do//lus ngal ba'ang med do//sems can dumyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra'ang med do//ngan song du
196b6(mdo sde): gdags pa'ang med do//tsher ma dang /thibs po dang /rdo ba dang /gseg ma'ang med do//me'ang med/nyi ma dang zla ba'ang med/skar ma'i gzugs kyang med do//rgya mtsho chen
196b7(mdo sde): po'ang med/ri rab kyang med/khor yug gi ri'ang med/'jig rten gyi bar yang med/ri nag po rnams kyang med do//rdo ba mi gtsang ba dag kyang med/rdul gyi ri'ong med do//
197a1(mdo sde): sprin dang char pa'i sgra'ang med/rlung mar gyi sgra'ang med do//rnam pa thams cad du ngan song gi sgra'ang med/rnam pa thams cad du mi khom pa'i sgra'ang med
197a2(mdo sde): do//gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang /bsod nams kyi 'od dang /rin po che'i 'od kyi snang ba rgya chen pos
197a3(mdo sde): rtag tu gsal bar gyur to//de na bya 'bras bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dag rang rang gi sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag gis dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
197a4(mdo sde): dag rab tu sgrogs par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi
197a5(mdo sde): khams pad+mo de che khyad ni ji tsam zhig legs/pad+ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/gang med nga mngon par rdzogs
197a6(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa de'ang yun ji srid cig tu bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston par 'gyur/yongs su mya ngan
197a7(mdo sde): las 'das nas ni dam pa'i chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa dang /skye
197b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dag ni yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi
197b2(mdo sde): 'bral logs sam 'on te de lta ma lags/'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma de ni sngon ming ci zhes bgyi ba ro gyur/der rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub nas yun ji srid cog lags nas/de'i 'og tu de
197b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ci'i rkyen gyis ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dgra na
197b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag cho 'phrul dag mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dag kha cig gis ni mthong la/kha cig gis ni mi
197b5(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab la 'phang du ni dpag tshad 'bum drug khri brgyad stong yod la/rgyar
197b6(mdo sde): ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa skyes bu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/stobs dang ldan pa la la zhig 'ongs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ri'i rgyal po ri rab de yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du
197b7(mdo sde): bkrum nas/yungs 'bru tsam du gyur po de dag ni bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pas na yungs 'bru tsam po de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang
198a1(mdo sde): bar mi nus te/yungs 'bru tsam po de dag ji snyed par de na gling bzhi pa'i tshad kyang de snyed yod do//'di lta ste dper na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can byang chub sems
198a2(mdo sde): dpa' dag gis kun tu gang po bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma'ang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
198a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa sum cur bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin
198a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur
198a5(mdo sde): ro//'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gang dag skyes pa dang /skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro///
198a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma de sngon ni tsan+dan zhes bya bar gyur te/da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma ltar yongs su dag par yang ma gyur la/de ltar sems can dag pa
198a7(mdo sde): ngadag gis gang bar yang ma gyur to//rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan du ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa zhes
198b1(mdo sde): bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan par gyur te/des kyang bar gyi bskal pa sum cur chos bstan par gyur to//yongs
198b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu dong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma gang dag de
198b3(mdo sde): na 'khod pa de dag ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa ni de mod nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya
198b4(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal po bcur gnas par gyur na dam pa'i chos nub pa'i 'og tu
198b5(mdo sde): su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam du sems par gyur to//yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems
198b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba de sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa lung bstan par gyur
198b7(mdo sde): te/rigs kyi bung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur te/nem gyi gung thun la ngo'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur nas
199a1(mdo sde): de nyid kyi nub mo thun tha ma la khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgyu bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag
199a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes
199a3(mdo sde): lung bstan to//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla
199a4(mdo sde): ba dam pa ga la ba der song ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa'i drung du lhags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
199a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogaso dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la mchod de lan gsum
199a6(mdo sde): skor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bskal pa bar
199a7(mdo sde): ma bcu po de dag 'da' bar bgyi bar 'tshal lags so//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang
199b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di ni 'das
199b2(mdo sde): nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad pa yin la/sangs
199b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams drag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes nga'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i
199b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston par mdzad cing /gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rgyal cheb tu dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
199b5(mdo sde): la ston par 'gyur bas na khyod kyis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgro la 'jug pa 'di gzung zhig/tad+ya thA/dz+wa li dz+wa li ni/ma hA dzA li ni/tu kle/bukle/sam
199b6(mdo sde): ba de/ma hA sa maM ba de/dau bA na a Ti/ba Ti/Ta ke/Sha ra thag kaMka/a mi ma kaM si/hi li tsi li ti li/ru ru kaM/ma hA ru ru ka/dza ye/durdza ya/dza ya ma ti/shAn+te/shAn+te nir g+ho Sha
199b7(mdo sde): Ni/a mU le/a mU la ba ri tshan+de/mA ra saM n+ya/bid tra sa ne/muk+te/muk+ta pa ri shud+d+he/a b+hi tI/b+ha ya mo tsa ne/b+ha ra o ha ra Na/dAn+ta/bid+ya bid+ya/bid+ya/d+ha rut+ta me/ni a grats+tsha
200a1(mdo sde): Sh+TA gan+d+ha/\u0f7f/m+b+ha rgyu/ Sh+Ta//m+b+ha stan/ shAg/nam mi /sar+b+ba/
200a2(mdo sde): d+hArAd+yaSh+Ti/g+huT+Te/ b+hUb+h+yapran+te/dz+wa la/ya thA la lI/a pa li ni N+Dal/nit+pal/sam+b+ha/oMm+b+haH/niHk+Sh+Na/u ba d+hA meH/bi mAHbti/bi pal/A \u0f7f
200a3(mdo sde): oM biti/bri bo ti/ra ta~M kuwa~M/ la man+ta/a ting sa ma i tita ba/an+tanIn+tad/sar+b+ba lo ka oM na~M ka bi li ga//oM b+h+ya sa re/ha~M ta man+ti/bau sha a gram te/a pa la//
200a4(mdo sde): kapa la/tra yan+te/oM re sh+tsitAnA~M/ad+hi muk+Shi pa dmi dan/dzod ta/a ni hwA ra thAHta 'phyo/i dam pA lan/ni yAm+b+ha pa lan/s+yAmrad+h+wa~M nA yA/bi b+hUSha pa gyi so man+ta/
200a5(mdo sde): mno//e sa man//tshong ngan/man+ta s+t+wa~M/dA sh+ma dAla?/bikratata/isa? spen/spya nI kham/m+b+hamA ti/ts+tshak+Sha/tiShi tIm ti/br-i b+h+yu d+hoH/bub+h+ya
200a6(mdo sde): pra ta re/tsi tur+t+ti/sa ma myag pra haNAnAM/oM d+hi mud+hi pa di praka sha na pad mi dan/an+ta man+to ma ne/ma maun+ye/bI ri bi ti re sha me/sha mi ti be/shAn+te/muk+te/ni rak+Sha ma~M/
200b1(mdo sde): sa me/sa ma sa me/k+Shu yAM/ak+Sha ya/a dzi ti shan te/shA naSh+Te/d+ha ra Ne/A lo ka/a ba b+ha se/rat+na pra te/rasmA ba te/dz+nyA na ba te/me ru ba te/k+Sha ya ni ra sha ne/lo ka pra
200b2(mdo sde): ti ni daR+sha ne/tsa tur+N+NaM pra ti saM bi dAn/i d+hi muk+ti pra da pra ka sha nu pa dA mi dan/tsak+Shu a b+hA sa ni/daR+sha na/dz+nyA na a lo kA nirda r+Ya no/pra b+ha sa ni/srarba in+d+ri ya/b+hu mi a ti kran+te/sa ba sa
200b3(mdo sde): ba/ba mA nA/sarbaM pra thA ba/k+ShI yang kA raM/sh+loka an+d+ra bA tsa nI/lo ka a nudaR+sha ni/bi b+hA na t+yat+taM/r-id+d+hi padA nAM/a d+hi muk+Shi pa da pra kA shra na pa da mi dan/a tsi laM bud+d+he/d+ha b+ha pra tsa le/sa
200b4(mdo sde): twe gI hA/sid+d+hi kAma? pa ni/ni srid+d+hi sma ti te/ba ri kra se re/sau me/tsaN+De/dAn+te/a tsi le/a ma re/pi tsa ba le/ne ba re/br-i tse tsa le/pra sa re/a na ya/a byaM se/karka me/pra
200b5(mdo sde): b+ha bi naM/oM mi ni dza se/kra pra mo/nA yu te/in+d+ra ya nAM/ba la nAM/a d+hi muk+ti pa da pra k+Sha sha na pad mi dan/puSh+pe su puSh+pe/dru ma ba re ha re/a b+ha ya ru tsi re/tsau ka k+She/uk+Sha ye
200b6(mdo sde): ma stu na ni le/ma ma le/pany+tsa shi shi re/lo ka s+ya bidz+nyA ne/na ya sa ma bra ha te tse yuk+te/tshin+dina?/sap+ta nAM/bo d+h+yaM ga nAM/a d+h+ya muk+ti bad pAk+Sha sha na pa da mi danA/tsakra badz+re/mai tre
200b7(mdo sde): sra ma ma te krAn+te/kre te/kA ru Ne/ru dik+Sha yi/br-i di rU pik+Sha saM ban+de/a ra te/ba ra te/kha ge kha ge/a mU lau/mU la sho d+ha no/tsa tur+N+Na bai sha ra d+ya nAM/a d+hi muk+ti pa da pra kA sha
201a1(mdo sde): ra shwA yaH/ dzi/dza ba /gyur man ni hUMnas sbyin / ra/ngis /
201a2(mdo sde): na/ ya n+ti//sa mamam/silaman/ na /b+h+ya ladzin/
201a3(mdo sde): na sur/pUd+d+ha ga ti ta ni/baN+Dita na~M/ma yin kaNaH/dzar d+ha me/gar+b+ha at+ma/na ta ni ma kar b+hU hi ne/sid+d+ha m+me/bi logam ti/prad+d+ha a b+h+yo/
201b1(mdo sde): dashan m+b+ha la nA ma d+hi mAg+hi p+pa ka sha nA pad mid na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgrol 'jug pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu/de nas de'i mong la stong
201b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul/rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul
201b3(mdo sde): to//'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//chem chem/rab tu chem chem/kun tu rab tu chem chem mo//mtho ba dang dma' ba dang /kun tu rab tu dma' bar
201b4(mdo sde): yang gyur to//gang gi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i bye ma snyed dag sdang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa de lta bu'i snang ba dag kyang
201b5(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to//de'i tshe na ro rab dang /khor yug dang /khor yug chen po dag kyang mig lam nu mi snang ngo //phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das
201b6(mdo sde): pa dag kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun tu snang ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das
201b7(mdo sde): pa dag na gnas pa de dag dang /gang dag ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang bzod pa thob pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyan pa'i
202a1(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
202a2(mdo sde): lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal to//byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
202a3(mdo sde): byas nas de nyid du 'khod do//lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /grul bum dang /shi za bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen
202a4(mdo sde): po nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di mnyan pa'i phyir bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig lnga ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
202a5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dir 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
202a6(mdo sde): pad+ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'ang mthong bar gyur
202a7(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung
202b1(mdo sde): bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyis gzungs 'di thob bo//gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dang 'di dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa
202b2(mdo sde): de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te de dag ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur
202b3(mdo sde): nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te de nyid du 'khod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bkra'
202b4(mdo sde): stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di bsgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi
202b5(mdo sde): stong 'thob bo//gzungs kyi sgo bdun khri nyis stong yang 'thob bo//ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo drug khri'ang 'thob bo//gzungs 'dri 'thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
202b6(mdo sde): byams pa chen po'ang 'thob bo//snying rje chen po'ang 'thod ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba'o zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs
202b7(mdo sde): kyi chos su cu rtsa bdun rtog par byed cing /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob ste/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//sangs rgyas bcom
203a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang gzungs 'di'i ngo bo nyid thugs su chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad cing shin tu myur bar yongs su mya ngan las
203a2(mdo sde): 'da' bar yang mi mjed do//rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di'i gzungs kyi mthus sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing snang ba byung bar
203a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang /snang ba des kyang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yis mu med pa de
203a4(mdo sde): dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dog nas 'dir lhags pa la ltos//
203a5(mdo sde): bram po gnyis pa//'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugason spyod pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /mi dang //
203a6(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa mu med pa gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo lo 'jug pa 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i
203a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/yi ger 'dri bar byed na'ang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /
203b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang mi 'bral lo//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dri kha
203b2(mdo sde): terten du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni las dang po rnams ma lus par zad par byed cing tshe brjes nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203b3(mdo sde): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgril 'jug pa 'di sgom par byed na/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de la mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas shing bsags pa zhig
203b4(mdo sde): yod na'ang de'i las de dag yongs su zad cing gang gi phyir tshe brjes na'ang sa dang po gnon par byed do//gang la mtshams med pa'i las rnams med pa de ni tshe 'di nyid la las gzhan thams
203b5(mdo sde): cad ma lus par zad cing tshe brjes nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do//gang bsgom par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed kyang nyan cing chos smra ba la drar gyis 'ching bar byed na de la 'jig
203b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur
203b7(mdo sde): zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/byang chub sems dpa' de ni der yongs su btang bas ring por mi
204a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par rgyal 'tshab tu dbang bskur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du gang la la
204a2(mdo sde): chos smra ba la spos kyis mchod pa byed na de'ang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spros 'thob bo//chos smra ba la me tog gi mchod pa byed na tha
204a3(mdo sde): na med pa ye shes kyi me tog dag 'thob bo//chos smra ba la 'bras chan dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dag byin na de bzhin gshegs pa'i zas bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//
204a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba la gos kyis bkab na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog bla na med pa 'thob bo//gang zhig chos smra ba la rin po che dag gis 'gengs par byed na da'ang
204a5(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rin po che rnams 'thob ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen
204a6(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa de ni de ltar don che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thams cad der bstan pas na thams cad
204a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob cing yid du 'ong ba'i chos bzhi'ang 'thob/
204b1(mdo sde): par byed pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
204b2(mdo sde): mkha'i phyag rgya la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa de dag gtams pa de nyid kyi tshe'ang de bzhin du sa g.yos par gyur cing /'jig rten du snang ba chen po'ang
204b3(mdo sde): byung bar gyur te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to//de bzhin du sa phyogs mi mnyam pa dag kyang lag
204b4(mdo sde): mthil ltar mnyam par snang ngo //der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das
204b5(mdo sde): pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur to//de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa'
204b6(mdo sde): bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
204b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyid kyang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan du lhags so//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
205a1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag ngas mngon par
205a2(mdo sde): shes te/gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'dra' bar byed
205a3(mdo sde): do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ma rnams kyis ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya
205a4(mdo sde): 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos 'di nyid thos par gyur cing bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di
205a5(mdo sde): dag la chos rnams thos nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das
205a6(mdo sde): pa dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/de dag sems mngon par rab tu dang bar byas te sems rab tu dang ba'i rgyu des dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa'i
205a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam po la mchod pa byas nas/bcom ldan
205b1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor
205b2(mdo sde): lo bla na med pa skor bar 'gyur lags sam zhes gsol pa dang /bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'das nas
205b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de gang gi nub mo bla na
205b4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur zhing /der
205b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bar gyi bskal pa bcur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro//de na byang chub sems dpa'
205b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang dag de la chos nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni chos de thos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed nas/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgya bla na med pa
205b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /des byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor
206a1(mdo sde): lo//rab mchog gi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams phyir mi ldog pa la bkod
206a2(mdo sde): cing /der bar gyi bskal pa bcur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos 'di ston pa na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de las nyan par 'gyur te/
206a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de dag gis chos thos nas skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ro//gang dag bskal par nyan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni de'i tshe na sa las yang dag par
206a4(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te de nyid kyi tshe na gzungs 'di'ang mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin
206a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal te/sangs rgyas
206a6(mdo sde): kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs yang dag par bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la ting nge 'dzin sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bstan te/lus
206a7(mdo sde): rdorje lta bur byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa dang /ting nge 'dzin 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /der bar gyi bskal pa bcur byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams
206b1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
206b2(mdo sde): pos brgyan pa dag gsal zhing snang bar byed pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /des byang chub kyi gdan la chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te byang
206b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams la ches ston par byed pa dang /ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i phreng ba zhes bya ba nges par ston cing /de chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
206b4(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa nyid la 'god par rig nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya
206b5(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/rang rang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu zhugs te 'dug go/de bzhin gshegs
206b6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa'ang de nyid kyi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//
206b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la mched pa byas te rang rang gi khang po brtsegs pa dag tu zhugs par gyur to//byang
207a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzhan dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo //de na gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'gog pa la snyoms
207a2(mdo sde): par zhugs pa nyid kyi bar gyi bskal pa bcu po de dag 'da' bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
207a3(mdo sde): po rnams las brtsams te chos ston par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang bar gyi bskal pa bcur dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par 'gyur te/mdang
207a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/des de nang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te cho 'phrul chen po bstan nos/srog chags bye ba
207a5(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di bshad pa
207a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag gnyis ni bla na med pa yang
207a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do//byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i
207b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di thob bo//lha dang mi bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de
207b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
207b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs
207b4(mdo sde): 'di 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la logs par gnas pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub
207b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gos ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' zhing chog shes la/gos ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed cing /de gos kyi phyir
207b6(mdo sde): tshul dang mi mthun par mi byed la/gos ma rnyed na'ang yongs su gdung ba med cing /gos rnyed na'ang chags pa med pa dang /zhen pa med pa dang /mkhyen pa med pa dang /mdud pa
207b7(mdo sde): bor ba med pa dang /brgyal ba med pa dang /lhag par chags pa med pa dang /lhag par chags par gyur pa med par yongs su spyod par byed cing /nyes dmigs su lta la
208a1(mdo sde): nges par 'byung bar rab tu shes shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i rigs la legs par gnas
208a2(mdo sde): pa dang po yin no//gos la ji lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms dang /mal tshe dang stan la'ang de bzhin no//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na ba'i gsos
208a3(mdo sde): sman dang yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' zhing chog shes la/na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed cing de na ba'i
208a4(mdo sde): gsos sman dang /yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi mthun pa 'tshol bar mi byed la/de ni ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma rnyed na'ang yongs su gdung ba med cing rnyed na'ang chags pa med
208a5(mdo sde): pa dang /zhen pa med pa dang /mkhyen pa med pa dang /mdud pa bor ba med pa dang /brgyal ba med pa dang /lhag par chags pa med pa dang /lhag par chags par gyur
208a6(mdo sde): pa med par yongs su spyod par byed cing /nyes dmigs su lta ba la nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la
208a7(mdo sde): legs par gnas shing /chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'di thob cing sgom par byed pa yin no//gzhan yang byang
208b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lnga dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 'thob ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
208b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa dang /so so thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang /cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang /kha na ma tho ba phra rab
208b3(mdo sde): tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs shing slob par byed la/gzhan tshul khrims dang bral ba dag mthong na'ang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs
208b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dang po de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems
208b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can lta ba la zhen par gyur pa rnams log par lta ba las rnam par bslang zhing /yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la
208b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can cho ga
208b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa la zhen por gyur pa rnams yang dag pa'i cho ga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
209a1(mdo sde): chos gsum pa de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can bsam pa nyams par gyur pa rnams bsam pa phun sum
209a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan
209a3(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
209a4(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ste/chos lnga po
209a5(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni gzungs 'di 'thob bo//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos drug dang ldan na gzungs
209a6(mdo sde): 'di 'thob ste/drug gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang thos pa mang ba dang /thos pa 'dzin pa dang /thos pa bsags pa yin pas
209a7(mdo sde): des chos tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/
209b1(mdo sde): yongs su byang ba gang yin pa de mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod cing /de de lta bu'i chos mang po dag thos nas gzung ste/kha ton yongs su byang ba dang /yid kyis brtags pa
209b2(mdo sde): dang /mthong bas shin tu rtogs par byas shing /de de ltar mang du thos par gyur pa na thos pa nyung ba'i sems can gzhan dag mang du thos pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing
209b3(mdo sde): 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/chos dang po de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang /ser sna med cing phrag dog dang /ser snas zil gyis non pa'i
209b4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang phrag dag med pa dang /gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i bar du ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems
209b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams lnga 'tshe bar mi byed cing mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin par
209b6(mdo sde): byed la gnod pa sna tshogs gnod par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gnod pa dag las yongs su thar par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang /tshul 'chos pa med cing kha bsag
209b7(mdo sde): med pa dang /sgyu med cing g.yo med pa dang /stong pa nyid kyis lan mang du gnas par byed pa ste/chos drug po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
210a1(mdo sde): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 'thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de lta bu dang ldan pas
210a2(mdo sde): lo bdun du 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag thams cad la nyin gcig cing lan gsum gsum yan lag lngas mdo dang rgyas par phyag byas shing lus su gtogs pa'i don pa
210a3(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag pa ste/stong pa nyid la gnas pas 'go lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di brjod par bgyi'o//langs nas kyang phyogs bcu kun nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
210a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngan par byed pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lo bdun 'das nas thams cad
210a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 'thob bo//gzungs 'di 'thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang gis phyogs
210a6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ston par mdzad pa thams
210a7(mdo sde): cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig kyang 'thob cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa dag kyang mthong nas//
210b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'thob bo//ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dadun khri nyis stong yang 'thob bo//chos kyi sgo drug khri'ang 'thob ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo
210b2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po'ang 'thob bo//snying rje chen po'ang 'thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
210b3(mdo sde): gzungs 'di 'thob par gyur pa des gal te mtshams med pa lnga'i las zhig spyad par gyur na'ang de'i tshe phyi ma la yongs su zad par gyur te/tshe gsum gyis las de dag ma lus par zad par
210b4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sa bcu pa'ang gnon par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' des mtshams med pa'i las dag ma byas na'ang de'i las gzhan thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing /tshe rjes
210b5(mdo sde): nas kyang sa bcu pa gnon par byed de ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag kyang 'thob la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang 'thob par 'gyur//
210b6(mdo sde): ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa yin
210b7(mdo sde): /byang chub sems dpa' sems dngo' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul mthong na/gang gis 'jig/
211a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
211a2(mdo sde): chos nyan cing /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nyid du phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//
211a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di ni las yongs su zad par byed pa dang /dge
211a4(mdo sde): ba mngon par 'phel bar byed pas na don che ba yin no//rigs kyi bu gang drag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di dang /bcom ldan
211a5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'ang
211a6(mdo sde): nges par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
