211a7(mdo sde): 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag las gzungs 'di thos shing thob lags so//kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces bdag cag gis ni gang+gA'i
211b1(mdo sde): klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las so zhes gsol to//kha cig gis ni gsum snyed las so zhes/kha cig gis ni bzhi snyed las so zhes/kha cig gis ni lnga snyad las so zhes/kha cig
211b2(mdo sde): gis ni brgyad snyed las so zhes gsol to//kha cig gis ni 'di skad du bdag cag gis ni 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang+gA'i klung dgu'i
211b3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di thos shing rnam pa thams cad du thob lags so zhes gsol to//byang chub sems dpa'
211b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa/bdag gis ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na bskal pa chen po kun nas sgrol ba zhes bgyi ba zhig byung ste/de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
211b5(mdo sde): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bgyi bar gyur pa der sangs rgyas sa li'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/
211b6(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mtha' yas pa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs
211b7(mdo sde): su bskor cing /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhig gis yongs su bskor ba zhig byung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs
212a1(mdo sde): kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di nyid bshad par gyur pa na/de las gzungs 'di thos nas bdag gis bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing rtogs par bgyis
212a2(mdo sde): lags so//de bzhin du bsgral pa tshad ma mchis pa'i yang ches tshad ma mchis pa/grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa dag la 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
212a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gis mchod par bgyis nas/
212a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas re re las kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad ma mchis pa dang /glengs ma mchis pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsrungs shing bsod nams kyi
212a5(mdo sde): phung po yongs su bzung ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba dris bdag sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dag gis lung bstan kyang /bdag ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis dus la lta zhing 'di ltar yun
212a6(mdo sde): ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur te/de'i slad du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing /sbyar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyus
212a7(mdo sde): lags te/da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/bdag gi shes rab kyi mgol rnam par grol ba'i cod
212b1(mdo sde): ban bcings lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa de de bzhin te/khyod kyis
212b2(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs
212b3(mdo sde): 'di thob par gyur to//byams pa khyod ni re ba ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas byams pa khyod ni 'dod na bskul pa bcu'i bar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
212b4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /byams pa khyod kyis ni myur ba nyid du bla na med pa ye shes kyi phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug
212b5(mdo sde): par yang nus mod kyi byams pa khyod 'di srid du 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni smon lam gyi dbang gis dus la lto ba yin no//byams pa de'i phyir khyod
212b6(mdo sde): kyis da ltar nga las rgyal tshab yongs su blangs pa yin te/khyod kyis ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las kyang rgyal chub yongs su blangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
212b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang /lha dang //
213a1(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za dang /mI dang /mi ma yin pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal
213a2(mdo sde): to//dAn+ta b+hU maHda ma tha d+hA miHsmA ti b+hU miHpradz+nyA b+hU miHbai sha rat+na b+hU miHpra ti sa ma bid+d+ha miHa nu k+She pa b+hU miHsa ma ta pA ri k+She pa a be k+She pa b+hU miHdza tek+She ya b+hU miHma muM dzaM/min
213a3(mdo sde): /bin mr-i dzaM/mu le na mudza/bi shra kr-i/dA shibi te/pre shaHta rAH/bai sha lA kr-i/sha mu shrAb ti/bi ma to/bim te/yo pa ra tita/rog me ta/bshi sa kra mA ya
213a4(mdo sde): ti tsa ra ba ti/ma khre mu /da ha ra bA to/pUd+d+haM A gu d+da b+hud+d+he/drA hA kra ma ti/sa do Sha ban+d+ha/ba la ya ti la yaHa nu ka Ta/a mun+ta man/ar+ha ba ti/mu ru ba ti/ti h+ni na bi d+ha/
213a5(mdo sde): A gran+d+hi/ba ka na te/sa ma ke/di sa b+ha Te/iTaM/i TaM ba laM/an+ma/tat+tA/ku ru Sha Na/lA ba Sha Na/la taH/ru \u0f7f/sarban taHsar+b+ba ta baHa ni rud+d+ha/i daM
213a6(mdo sde): ri hi pha la/ba hu pha la/sa twa pha la/shiSh+Na ba te/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams la'ang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa mos pa'i tshig rnams bshad de/de dag
213a7(mdo sde): bshad pa na lha khrag khrig phrag drug cus bden pa mthong bar gyur to//tad pha la na/a gra pha la na/la la hu/a la hu/e la ha/ni lang ha re/ba na ta khya/i da na pha
213b1(mdo sde): ldan/na ya ma pa lan/nA mu dra ya/b+hi g+hA ba/pradz+nyA tsakra su ni rab+hi tiHk+Sha/dz+nyA na tsak+kha/mos pa'i tshig de dag gis lha dung phyur gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
213b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed nas de nyid du phyir me ldog par gyur to//po sh+ye/so ma to/a nu ma to/A ku ma ti/tshe dang kaM/man+ta s+thA/da sha bA la/bi pra ba s+tha/i sha s+thi ta/a ti me ti/
213b3(mdo sde): tik+Sh+Na ma ti/A lo ke/ste re tuSh+Ta/mos pa'i tshi ga de dag gis klu drug khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de nyid du phyir mi ldog par gyur
213b4(mdo sde): to//a dra b+ha/sa mya dan/oM had d+yo/b+ha ga bAng dz+yaM/kA ru Sh+yamr-ik+Sha/sid+d+ha maM ti sa mA na tAk+Sho/a la ba le/sau ta ka ro/ma hA bA laM/o dza hr-i raM/d+hA ro ni/bing ge lek+ShaHu
213b5(mdo sde): d+hAd+hak+ShaHku gak+ShaMHbi ro d+ho/bi rU pa ma Sha/ak+Shi he sta/shag ti bA len/i su ro bi nAM/e su ro ba nAM/a su ro pra mAr di ti/mos pa'i tshig de dag gnod sbyin dung phyur phrag
213b6(mdo sde): gnyis dang bye ba phrag gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/de nyid du phyir mi ldog par gyur to//a tsi pha li le/ti ni do che/san ding tshe//
213b7(mdo sde): ga ti ne na/ka me ma/na ma ste/u be ra be/mu da me/ma da me/sa ni ha/shU re/d+ha ro ni/sa na tra/saM de ba/sa nA ga/sa yak+Sha/a su ra/de ba/nA ga/ni ru ga ti ba re
214a1(mdo sde): da rA/ni ru ti la b+hi/smr-i ti/pradz+nyA pa ri ba ra ma ti/pra ti la b+hi/d+hI ti la b+hi/pUrba keSh+Ta/tsi r-i ta bran+d+ha/sh+tsA ra ban+d+ha/tsa ra bir+ya ban+ta/bi ta pra ti/b+ha sa ge/mArga/
214a2(mdo sde): mum+be/dA shra ba ka ri Sha Ni/k+Sha mA ra hu/o ha ro Ni/de ba rA dzA tu/su ra mu drA/yak+Sha sa mu dra/rak+Sha sa mu dA/be di bai di mi te bI pe/tad ta ba pe/uSh+mA nA mo/pra khad t+ya/ne
214a3(mdo sde): na bi/d+hA ri Ni ya/a b+hiSha/di sha shrod+ha ni/bak+Shu shud+d+he/dzIny+dza shud+d+he/bA tsi d+ya ri kArme/prad+d+haM/br-id+d+he/smr-i ti/ma ti/ga tI/d+hI ti/ga NA na/pr-i ta sa ra Na bud+d+hi/dzay+Ya
214a4(mdo sde): tsakre/shU n+ya ta tsakre bya ya/mos pa'i tshig de dag gis lha ma yin lnga khri drug stong gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/phyir mi
214a5(mdo sde): ldog pa la gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med yang dag gzhol zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin
214a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka'a'o//tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam
214a7(mdo sde): par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgoms pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang de rnyed par dka' 'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
214b1(mdo sde): pas sems can rnams la phan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsgrub pa'i phyir/snron byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag
214b2(mdo sde): par sdom pa dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab kyis yongs su bzung ba'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams la
214b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas te/la la las ni sbyin pa byin/la la las ni tshul khrims bsrungs/la la las ni tshangs par spyod pa spyad/lo la las ni sgom po bstan/la la las ni brtson
214b4(mdo sde): 'grus brtse mos/la la las ni brjod pa bsgoms/la la lAs ni ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs/la la las ni shes rab bsten cing /dge ba'i las rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs
214b5(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa mang du byas pas/de'i phyir ngas da ltar bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni/bskul pa
214b6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrog du mar brdzun dang /phra ma dang /ngagra rtsub mo dang /tshig kyal pa spangs te/ngag gis las dge ba rnam pa du ma bsten cing mang du byas pas/de'i phyir
214b7(mdo sde): do ltar ljags shin tu ring ba brnyes te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni gzhan du gsung ba mi mnga'o//de nas bcom
215a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor der ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba la
215a2(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/rang gis zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu yog par mdzad nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu
215a3(mdo sde): rab tu phyung ste/'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
215a4(mdo sde): mdzad do//'od zer de dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi rnams la khyab par gyur te/'od zer de dag gis
215a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sems can me rab tu 'bar bas lus sreg pa gang yin pa de dag rlung bsil ba dag langs nas de dag la reg pa dang /de dag yud tsam zhig bde ba'i tshor
215a6(mdo sde): ba skyes par gyur to//sems can dmyal ba'i sems can re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing /dpe
215a7(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs rnam par mdzes par gyur pa dag bzhugs te/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gis de mthong nas bde ba dang ldan zhing sangs
215b1(mdo sde): rgyas mthong ba'i bde bas lus rab tu tshim ste/sangs rgyas mthong nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob bo snyam du sems te/de dag bcom
215b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la dga' zhing dad la gus pa skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/kye sems can dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//chos la phyag
215b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang rtag tu de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis thal mo sbyor nas
215b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//chos la phyag 'tshal lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod do//de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i
215b5(mdo sde): rtsa de dngong /sems dang ba des de nas shi 'ophos nas/kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so//kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so//gong dag grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams
215b6(mdo sde): su skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung dron po dag langs nas snga ma bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar du skyes so//de bzhin du yi dgas bkres pa dang skom pas lus rab tu 'bar por gyur
215b7(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis bkres pa dang skam pa'i me zhi bar byed cing bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed de/yi dgas re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i gzugs skyes bu
216a1(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa dag bzhugs par gyur te/yi dgas de
216a2(mdo sde): dag gis de mthong nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bde bas lus tshim par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob bo snyam du sems te/de
216a3(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' zhing dad la gus pa skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/sems can dag tshur shog khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag
216a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//chos la phyag 'tshal lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang zhes bya ba nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas kha cig ni lha
216a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skyes so//kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bar du gyur to//dud 'gro rnams la'ang de bzhin du bskul/mi rnams la'ang de bzhin du bskul nas/lha
216a6(mdo sde): dang mi bgrang ba los yang dag par 'das pa dag chos monyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'khod
216a7(mdo sde): do//de'i tshe na lha dang /mi'i tshogs bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed por gyur to//byang
216b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis ni der ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa dang /gzungs thob par gyur to//theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar po
216b2(mdo sde): las gzungs kyi sgo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa slar bsdus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la/byang
216b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros zhi bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyu ging dang rkyen gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi sangs
216b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag cing rnyog pa ma mchis la/snyigs ma lha dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sna tshogs dag mchis la/de na byang chub sems dpa'
216b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan la/de na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang
216b6(mdo sde): ma mchis na/skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gyur legs/bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad par 'khrugs shing //
216b7(mdo sde): tshe'i snyig sa ma dang /dus kyi snyigs ma dang /sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /lta ba'i snyigs ma dang nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma byung bar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par
217a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum las brtsams te chos bstan par mdzad lags/ci'i slad du bcom
217a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su ma bzung lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
217a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa'ang yongs
217a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin par byed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin
217a5(mdo sde): par byed pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nga da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad pa 'di lta bur skyes pa'ang ngas de ltar smon lam btab pa'i phyir te/de legs par rab tu nyon la yid
217a6(mdo sde): la gzung zhig dang /ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa
217a7(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
217b1(mdo sde): 'dir bskal pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/bskal pa chen po de la gling bzhi pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gling bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba zhig
217b2(mdo sde): byung ngo //rtsibs kyi mu khyud de la mdun na 'don bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba zhig yod do//de'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad
217b3(mdo sde): cus lus rnam par mdzes la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom grang ba yod la/shi dro n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng grub cing lte bas chog mi shes pa zhig bces so//de
217b4(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu lha 'bum gyis mchod pa byas nas/rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya bar ming btags so//de dus gzhan zhig na nges par byung nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
217b5(mdo sde): bgos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom
217b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod par gyur to//de dus gzhan
217b7(mdo sde): zhig na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag meng po dag gos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor
218a1(mdo sde): dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim gyis gung na 'khor los sgyur bya'i rgyal po de gnas pa'i grong khyer gzhan zhig tu gshegs
218a2(mdo sde): so//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas ha cang yang mi ring ba ni dzam+bu'i tshal zhes bya ba'i
218a3(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal zhig yod pa na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
218a4(mdo sde): dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po bdag gis yul du gshegs nas/dzum+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs
218a5(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdag song la phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsti stang du bya/bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod par bya
218a6(mdo sde): gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
218a7(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te grong khyer nas byung zhing dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal ga la ba der song nas bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song ste
218b1(mdo sde): phyin pa dang /rkang pas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
218b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang de bzhin
218b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du
218b4(mdo sde): bcug/yang dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang
218b5(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nus kyang mi gsung bar gyur to////bam po gsum pa//de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud stan
218b6(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/de bzhin
218b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung zla gsum po 'di la bcom
219a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan bza' dang /bshos dang /gzims cha dang /gdun dang /snyun gyi gsos spyan dang /yo byad rnams/
219a2(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos rgyal
219a3(mdo sde): po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do//de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
219a4(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud
219a5(mdo sde): kyis khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang /blon po phra mo rnams dang /grong mi rnams dang /ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /
219a6(mdo sde): zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams bos te smras pa/gtso bo dag shes par gyis shig/ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
219a7(mdo sde): snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum po 'di la yo byad thams cad kyis nges par spyan drangs te/nga la nye bar spyad pa dang /yongs su spyad pa dang /bsnyen
219b1(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang /dga' mgur spyad pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ngas bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par byas te phul
219b2(mdo sde): gyis/khyed cag la gang zag gis nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /dga' mgur spyad pa dang /chung ma'i 'khor ji yod pa de dag thams cad
219b3(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par phul cig ces bsgo nas/de dag gis kyang de bzhin du phul lo//khyim bdag rin po ches kyang skyed mos che la bzang po
219b4(mdo sde): thams cad dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas shing skyed mos tshal de nyid du/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi khang po brtsegs pa brtsigs te/de'i phyogs bzhi kho ra
219b5(mdo sde): khor yug dag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi sgo dag kyang btod do//skyed mos tshal thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan to//shing ljon pa de dag kyang gos
219b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang /ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /gdugs sna tshogs dang /mu tig gi lnga ldi sna tshogs dang /rgyan sna tshogs dang /rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /spos sna tshogs
219b7(mdo sde): dag gis legs par brgyan to//shing ljon pa de dag rin po che'i me tog dang /'bras bu thams cad kyis kyang brgyan to//skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad nor bu rnam pa du
220a1(mdo sde): ma dag gis kyang brgyan nas me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing dar dang /ras bcos bu dang /be'u ras dang /bgo ba sna tshogs dag gi gdan dag kyang bshams
220a2(mdo sde): so//'khor lo rin po che de'ang khang pa brtsegs pa'i phyi rol gyi steng gi bar snang la mi'i tshad tsam du red de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par 'bar zhing 'dug go/glang po rin po
220a3(mdo sde): che thal kAr yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi sdim logs na/bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'o shing ljon pa 'dzin cing 'dug ste/shing ljon
220a4(mdo sde): pa de'ang rin po che sna bdun dang /mu tig gi lnga ldi sna tshogs dang /rgyan sna tshogs dang /me tog phreng sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing /drar sna tshogs dang /ras bcos bu sA
220a5(mdo sde): tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan nas shing ljon pa de la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag kyang dpyangs par gyur to//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi btsun mo dam pa gang yin
220a6(mdo sde): pa de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'dis la tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dag 'thor bar byed do//rgyal po rtsibs kyi
220a7(mdo sde): mu khyud kyi nor bu rin po che 'od gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de'ang rang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhag go/de nas nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis skyed mos tshal
220b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad rtag par rgyun du snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rtag par rgyun du
220b2(mdo sde): khyab par gyur to//nyan thos re re la'ang tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i rkang rten dag bzhag go/nyan thos re re'i rgyab tu'ang glang po che'i gtso bo thal kar snga ma lta bu dag dang /ji ltar bcom ldan
220b3(mdo sde): 'odas la 'khor lo rin po che mi'i ched tsam pa bzhag pa de lta bu dag kyang bzhag go/nyan thos re re'i mdun du'ang bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag bkod nas tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i phye
220b4(mdo sde): ma dag kyang 'thor bar byed do//nyan thos re re'i mdun du nor bu bai DUr+ya dag kyang bzhag go/skyed mos tshil gyi nang gi kho ra khor yug dag tu rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag kyang bsgrags so//
220b5(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal gyi phyi rol gyi kho ra khor yug dag na blon po rin po che dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dag kyang gnas so//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de
220b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer nas byung ste/de bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon
220b7(mdo sde): pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/rkang pas skyed mos tshol du zhugs so//zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang de bzhin
221a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/rang
221a2(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la phyag chab gsol te/bdag nyid lag dar nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /bldag pa dang /bsod pa mang po dog lags
221a3(mdo sde): par bstabs shing tshim par byas so//bdag nyid lag dar te legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag
221a4(mdo sde): bcabs par rig nas/bdag nyid kyis bsil yab blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yabs so//rgyal bu stong dag khams kyi rgyal po stong gis kyang nyan thos re re la de lta
221a5(mdo sde): bu'i bsnyen bkur byas nas bsil yab blangs te nyan thos rnams la g.yebs so//zhal zas brim pa rdzogs te gdugs chod rgyu mthug tu srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
221a6(mdo sde): phrag du me dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir kun dga' ra bar lhags so//lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char dag mngon par
221a7(mdo sde): rab tu phab nas/lha'i rol mo'i sgro dag kyang rab tu bsgrags so//lha'i gdugs dang /gos dang /rgyan dag kyang rab tu dbyangs so//gnod sbyin gos sngon po can sa ya phrag
221b1(mdo sde): bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bsrung ba'i phyir tsan+dan gyi tshal nas tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i sdong po dag blangs nas thun du blags te mel tshe byed do//rgyal po rtsibs
221b2(mdo sde): kyi mu khyud nyid kyis kyang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan snga re mar me kha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bus so//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal
221b3(mdo sde): po rtsibos kyi mu khyud bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo'i steng du'ang mar me'i kong bu gcig bzhag/phrag pa gnyis dang /lag pa gi na sa dang /rkang pa gnyis su'ang mar
221b4(mdo sde): me'i kong bu re re bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'ongs kyi spyan sngar mtshan yal nangs su mar me btang yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lus la ngal ba med cing /'di lta ste dper na dge slong
221b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur lus kyi bde ba tshor bar gyur te/de ltar lus ngal ba med pa dang /sems ngal ba med par zla ba gsum du bcom ldan 'das
221b6(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur byas so//de bzhin du rgyal bu stong dang /khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang nyan thos re re
221b7(mdo sde): la zla ba gsum du rgyal po'i yo byad dang /de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas so//ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la bsnyen bkur byas
222a1(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa lha mo dpal gyis kyang zla ba gsum du spos dang /me tog dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so//de bzhin du bu mo bye ba khrag khrig
222a2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu
222a3(mdo sde): khyud kyi zla ba gsum po 'das nas bcom ldan 'das la dzam+bu'i chu ba'o gser las byas pa'i rgyan brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo//bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo rin po che la sogs
222a4(mdo sde): pa gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//bcom ldan 'das la glang po rin po che la sogs pa glang po che thal kar brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//bcom
222a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rta rin po che la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che la sogs pa nor bu me shel brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//

222a7(mdo sde): blon po rin po che la sogs pa khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
222b1(mdo sde): grong khyer la sogs pa grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo//bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /rin po che'i me tog
222b2(mdo sde): gi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs ngargyad khri bzhi stong dang /rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos rgya chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /rin po che'i phreng ba
222b3(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /rgyan dang /khre'u dang /mgo lta bu dang /mig lta bu dang /snyan cha gdub 'khor dang /gser gyi tshong tshang dang /mu tig gi do shal dang /chags
222b4(mdo sde): dang /gzims cha dang /zhabs rten dang /snod dang /rnga bo che dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /dung dang /dril bu dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ril ba b+hing+ga ra dang /kun dga'i ra ba dang /

222b6(mdo sde): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la sman bcud kyi len brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
222b7(mdo sde): bdag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa meng ba lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bzod pa mdzad cing /bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du bzhugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
223a1(mdo sde): skyed mos tshul 'dir rtag tu dgyes par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag slad
223a2(mdo sde): kyis kyang mchi'o//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bu stong po gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas so so nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

223a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la snang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas rgyal bu de dag la gnang bar mdzad do//de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud
223a5(mdo sde): kyis gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sde
223a6(mdo sde): nas phyir song ngo //de nas rgyal bu de dag gi thu bo mig mi 'dzums zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du ji ltar rgyal po
223a7(mdo sde): rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur bya bas bsnyen bkur byas so//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge
223b1(mdo sde): 'dun la lta ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir nyin mo skabs skabs su 'ong ngo //rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i yab bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba de'ang
223b2(mdo sde): dzats+tsha'i gling thams cad nyul zhing skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dag las zas slong bar byed de/de la zas de sbyin pa na ji srid du khye'u dang /bu mo de dag gsum la
223b3(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba la rab tu 'god cing /rab tu bkod nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi byed pa de srid du len par mi byed do//de ltar
223b4(mdo sde): tshul ba na dzem+bu'i gling na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des gang zas kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang gang dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la ma bkod pa dang /gang bla na med pa yang
223b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa dang /gang bla na med pa'i ye shes la rab tu ma bkod cing yang dgo bar 'dzin du ma bcug pa'i mir gyur pa 'ga' yang med
223b6(mdo sde): de/srog chags bye bla khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas la bkod do//de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
223b7(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du btsug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//rgyal bu gnon nu mig mi 'dzums kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla bo gsum du spyan
224a1(mdo sde): drangs shing /ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas bsnyen bkur byas nas zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /dus
224a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs thams cad giser las byas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo//glang po chu dang /rta dang /nor bu dang /bud med dang /khyim
224a3(mdo sde): bdag dang /blon po rin po che rnams ma gtogs pa glang po che dang /rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /de bzhin du nor bu me shel dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /dpag pas mo gyi
224a4(mdo sde): shing dang /me tog gi phung po dang /gdugs dang /gos dang /me tog phreng ba dang /rgyun dang /rin po che'i khri'u dang /mgo lta bu dang /mig lta bu dang /snyan cha gdung
224a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang /gser gyi tshong tshong dang /mu tig gi do shal dang /chags dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /zhabs rten dang /snod dang /rnga bo che dang /rol mI'i
224a6(mdo sde): sgra dang /drung dang /rnga paT ha dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ril bad+hid+hA rA dang /kun dga'i ra ba dang /mar me'i keng bu dang /rin po che'i bye sna tshogs dang /rin po che
224a7(mdo sde): ri dgas sna tshogs dang /sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa snga re re zhing yang 'argyad khri bzhi stong bzhi stong yang phul lo//dge slong gi dge 'dun la'ang de snyed phul lo//
224b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 'dzum gyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol te/rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 'dzums kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
224b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur gyis bsnyen bkur byas shing de las mi nyung ba'i yon yang phul lo//
224b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po'i tshogs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'byor pa yongs su btang zhing bsnyen bkur byas so//
224b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyor te rgyal bu gzhon nu nyon mongs med dang /'jigs med dang /nam mkha' dang /yang dag skyes dang /grub pa dang /'gran med dang /mnyen shes dang /grum
224b5(mdo sde): por 'grang ba dang /'dron pa can dang /shed bu dang /sha bo che dang /'dus pa can dang /rtsibs can dang /shes pa can dang /gdong can dang /nor mang dang /dgra dbang
224b6(mdo sde): dang /mig can dang /glang po 'thob dang /zla ba'i mu khyud dang /nyi ma'i mu khyud dang /dbang po'i mu khyud dang /rdo rje'i mu khyud dang /bzod pa'i mu khyud dang /gnas kyi mu khyud
224b7(mdo sde): dang /shugs kyi mu khyud dang /g.yul gyi mu khyud dang /sgra ga can dang /sgra gcan stobs med dang /sgra gcan dgra med dang /chun po sna tshogs dang /rgyal po ri
225a1(mdo sde): gnas dang /'dod chags mi gnas dang /nor bdag dang /srung ba po dang /lus bzungs dang /bsam pa dpog dang /sdom brtson 'khor dang /sprin
225a2(mdo sde): chung dang /yar ma thu dang /'gro ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /nges mche dang /ya s+yan dang /skar ma 'dud dang /chags med rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du byas te/rgyal
225a3(mdo sde): po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bu steng gi bar du re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpog
225a4(mdo sde): tu med pa dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum ga sum du na bza' dang /bshos dang /gzims cha dang /gden dang /snyun gyi gsos sman yo byad kyi tshogs de lta bu dag gis bskye
225a5(mdo sde): bkur bya bas bsnyen bkur byas nas rgyal bu thu bos ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du re res kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la gser gyi 'khor lo brgyad khri/
225a6(mdo sde): bzhi stong dang /sman bcud kyis len ba rgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgya cher phul lo//de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byas nas de dag kha cig ni brgya byin nyid du spyon/kha cig ni tshangs
225a7(mdo sde): pa nyid du smon/kha cig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por/kha cig ni longs spyod chen por/kha cog ni nyan thos kyi theg par smin cing /lo nyis brgya lnga bcur
225b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod par gsol to//de'i tshe na mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'ongs nas 'di lta ste/na bza' dang /bshos
225b2(mdo sde): dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gyi gsos sman yo byad rnams dang /'tshog chas thams cad kyis lo bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
225b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas yab 'dun na 'don gyi gtso bo la gnang
225b4(mdo sde): ber mdzad do//de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bsnyen

225b6(mdo sde): sems la 'di lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa skyes te/bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin
225b7(mdo sde): du bcug kyang bdag gis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'di lha'i rgyal srid dmo/mi'i rgyal srid 'dod dam/nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod dam/bla na
226a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/'di ci 'dod pa'i smon lam mi shes na/ji ste bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
226a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu zhing skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /
226a3(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dag las ma rgal ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa dang /mthar pa rnams thor bar byed pa dang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams yongs
226a4(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par lta na rgyal po 'di lha'i dpal 'dod dam/'on te mi'i dpal lam/'on te nyan thos nyid dam 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/'on te bla na
226a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ci 'dod pa lha 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/sangs rgyas sam/nyan thos sam/bram ze 'ga' zhig gis bdag
226a6(mdo sde): gi rmi lam du sgron grang snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi rmi lam na snang ba gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
226a7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed dog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba de lta bu'i snang ba mthong zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bram ze de la pad+ma 'dab ma rnams ni
226b1(mdo sde): gser/sdong bu rnams ni dngul/snying po rnams ni bai DUr+ya/ze ba rnams ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa dag bskur te/pad+ma de dag thams cad la'ang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag kun
226b2(mdo sde): tu snang zhing /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de dag gi steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag kun nas gnas pa dang /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re las kyang 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu byung
226b3(mdo sde): bar gyur nas 'od zer de dag thams cad bram ze de'i khar zhugs pa dang /bdag gis lus dpag tshad stong gi tshad tsam du gyur cing 'di lta ste/dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs
226b4(mdo sde): su dag pa bzhin du yongs su dag par mthong ba dang /lus kyi khong pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam
226b5(mdo sde): gtan bsgom pa dag kyang mthong ngo //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs de dag kyang bdag gi mgo la phreng ba dang ra bar mthong zhing gdugs rnams kyang steng gi nam mkha' la tshangs
226b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas pa mthong ngo //kho ra khor yug na'ang pad+ma sna tshogs dag yod par mthong zhing pad+ma de dag lus lha'i sil snyan mi'i las shin
226b7(mdo sde): tu 'das pa dag byung ste sgra'ang grag go/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud lus khrag gis bskus shing phag gi gdong du gyur nas rgyug cing srog chags rnam pa mang po dag la za
227a1(mdo sde): ba dang /zos nas kyang e ran nga'i shing drung na snyems shing 'dug pa dang /srog chags sna tshogs dag 'ongs te rgyal po de zos nas keng rus kyi bar la thug par
227a2(mdo sde): byas te bor ba dang /de bzhin du yang dang yang phyir skyes pas phag gi gdong du gyur cing lus khrag gis bskus te srog chags rnam pa mang po dag zos nas e ran da'i shing drung
227a3(mdo sde): nun 'dug pa dang /srog chags sna tshogs dag gis zos shing rkeng rus la thug par byas te bor ba dag mthong ngo //gzhan yang rgyal bu dag kyang la la ni phag gi gdong /la la
227a4(mdo sde): ni glang po che'i gdong /la la ni mi he'i gdong /la la ni seng ge'i gdong /la la nau spyang ki'i gdong /la la ni wa'i gdong /la la ni khyi'i gdong /la la ni spre'u'i gdong du gyur
227a5(mdo sde): pa ri mthong zhing lus dag la khrag gis gtor te srog chags rnam pa mang po dag zos nas e ran di'i shing drung na 'dug pa dang /srog tshogs rnam pa mang po dag gos zos shing king
227a6(mdo sde): rus la thug par byas te bor ba mthong ngo //yang lus de nyid la gnas shing srog chags dag la za bar yang mthong ngo //rgyal bu kha cig ni sna ma'i me tog gis brgyan cing ma
227a7(mdo sde): he'i shing rta dag lo zhon te lam gol bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su bltas shing dong bar mthong ngo //brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang 'ongs
227b1(mdo sde): nas bram ze la smras pa/kye bram ze khyod kyi kho ra khor yug nadad+ma yod pa gang yin pa de dag las khyod kyis dang por pad+ma gcig ni rgyal po'i skal bar phul cig/de nas rgyal bu 'di dag
227b2(mdo sde): la'ang pad+ma re re byin cig/lhag ma rnams ni khams kyi rgyal po rnams la byin cig/gzhan dag ni skye bo rnams la byin cig/de thos nas bram ze lha rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du byang
227b3(mdo sde): zhes smras te/de nas bram ze de pad+ma rnams 'grod bzhin pa las sad pa dang /de mal nas langs te rmi lam dran zhing 'dug pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
227b4(mdo sde): po de dang /rgyal bu kha cig ni smon lam dman zhing 'khor ba'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba ste/de dag ni dman pa la mos pa yin no//gang dag bdag gis rmi lam na sna mo'i me tog
227b5(mdo sde): gis brgyan cing ma he'i shing rta dag la zhon te/lam gol bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su bltas shing dong bar mthong ba'i rgyal bu kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa yin no//
227b6(mdo sde): bdag gis snang ba chen po mthong zhing snang ba nges phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i srog chags
227b7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de'i mtshan ma yin te/gang gi phyir
228a1(mdo sde): bdag gi dzam+bu'i gling myul cing sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
228a2(mdo sde): nas btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa dang /bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcos

228a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis pad+ma dag bskur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa gang yin

228a6(mdo sde): gis 'od zer de dag rang gi khar zhugs par mthong ba gang yin pa dang /lus chen por gyur par mthong ba gang yin pa dang /nyi ma'i gzugs rnams phreng ba dang ra bAr mthong

228b1(mdo sde): de lta bu'i rmi lam dag rmi ba dang /bdag gis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag mthong zhing pad+ma 'di dag bgos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa dang /bdag gis pud+ma
228b2(mdo sde): de dag bgos te byin pa gang yin pa'i rmi lam de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na bdag la de lta bu'i rmi lam dag rmis zhes bdag gis
228b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshogs pa la zhu'o snyam mo//de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de nyid kyi mchen mo 'dres pa dang zhol zas sbyar nas nang par sngar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste

229a1(mdo sde): bu stong dang lhan cig tu srog chags stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bder te/de nyid du 'ongs nas de bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du
229a2(mdo sde): bzhon pas song ste/bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs so//zhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
229a3(mdo sde): dang /dge slong bri dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze rgya

229a7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la btsud cing rab tu bkod pa dang /sems can bgrong ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag bla na med
229b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste brtul cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa dang /theg pa chen po 'dri la brtsam pa byas pa des na gang dag gis khyod la pad+ma
229b2(mdo sde): gang dag la nyi ma'i gzugs dag snang ba'i pad+ma 'dab ma rnams ni gser/sdong bu rnams ni dngul/snying po rnams ni bai DUr+ya/ze ba rnams ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa dag bskur ba'i
229b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag gis bram ze khyod bla na med pa

229b6(mdo sde): gdugs dag bskur zhing /gdugs de dag kyang steng ge bar snang la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas pa dag mthong ba ni bram ze gang gi nub mo khyod bla na med pa

230a1(mdo sde): dang /sgra dang /tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po dag mngon par 'phags par 'gyur zhing /khyod kyi spyi gtsug kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i
230a2(mdo sde): bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags shing bltar ma nus par gyur te/bram ze rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no//bram ze grong khyod kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa'i

230a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams srungs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/khyod kyis byang chub
230a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yang dang yang du khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
230a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na/des da ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang
230b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas bcom
230b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag gis khyod la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dag gtong bar 'gyur te/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub
230b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogos dag gis khyod la mchod pa byas shing /der khyed las chos thos nas ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa rnam po sna tshogs
230b4(mdo sde): dag thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ste/khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur zhing dbyangs rjes su sgrogs
230b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no//bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu 'khod par zhugs nas
230b6(mdo sde): de dag pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam gtan sgom pa dag mthong ba ni bram ze khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/grang dag srog chags bye
230b7(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig 'bu mo dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsug par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
231a1(mdo sde): mi ldog pa dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bram ze khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/bskal
231a2(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad 'das pa'i 'og tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su
231a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ni/'di skad du bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung ste//
231a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/
231a5(mdo sde): brtul cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pas na des da ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing
231a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal srid kyang brnyes so zhes khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no//bram ze gang khyod kyi rmi lam na phag gi gdong/
231a7(mdo sde): dang /khyi'i gdong gi bar du gyur cing lus khrag gis bskus te srog chags rnam pa du mau dag zos nas e ran de'i shing drung na 'dug pa dang /de'ang srog chags rnam pa du ma
231b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis zos shing keng rus kyi bar la thug par byas te bor ba dang /yang lus phyir skyes nas lus khrag gis bskus shing khyi'i gdong gi bar du gyur byas srog chags rnam pa mang
231b2(mdo sde): po dag zos nas yang e ran da'i shing ngan pa'i drung na 'dug pa dang /srog chags rnam pa du ma dag gis zos par mthong ba ni khyod kyis skyes bu blun po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
231b3(mdo sde): gsum po sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing rab tu bkod pa de dag lha rnams kyi nang du 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal 'dod pa dang /mi
231b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mi sdug pa dang /phrad pa dang /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du bkres pa dang /skom pa'i
231b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du gti mug gi mun pa dang /mgo gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du gnod pa sna tshogs la sogs
231b6(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pa rnams lha rnams kyi nong du lha'i rgyal srid 'dod la mi rnams kyi nang du
231b7(mdo sde): ni gling gcig gi dbang phyug 'dod de/de dag der sems can thams cad la longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi kha zas dang /longs spyod du
232a1(mdo sde): 'gyur bas de ltar skyes bu blun po de dag yun ring por 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam de ni de'i snga ltas yin no//bram
232a2(mdo sde): ze gang khyod kyi rmi la man mi kha tsog sdoma'i me tog gi phreng ba dag gis mgo brgyan cing /me ho'i shing rta dag la zhon te lam gol ba ro zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su lta zhing
232a3(mdo sde): dong bar mthong ba de'ang bram ze khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pa'i rigs kyi bu dag gcig bdag dul bar bya ba dang /bdag zhi bar bya ba
232a4(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig gis phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur te/bram ze de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag gi snga ltas yin no//rigs kyi bu de
232a5(mdo sde): nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed par dka'
232a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'ong u dum+bA ra'i me tog ltar rnyed par dka'/dge ba'i chos la 'dun
232a7(mdo sde): pa'ang rnyed par dka'/yang dag pa'i smon lam yang snyed par dka' lags so//rgyal po chen po lha'i rmyi 'i srad ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags so//gling gcig
232b1(mdo sde): gi mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyang sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags so//gling gnyis dang /gsum dang /gling bzhi pa'i rgyal srid kyang sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags te rgyal po chen po
232b2(mdo sde): yun ring por 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bgyid pa lags so//rgyal po chen po lha dang mi'i 'byor pa ni rlung gi shugs bzhin du g.yo zhing mi gnas pa lags so//byis
232b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni chu zla lta bu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ngoms mi myong zhing yul rnams la myos nas lha dang mi'i dpal 'tshal bar bgyid de/byis pa de dag ni yang dang yang du sems
232b4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams su gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du kun tu gti mug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug
232b5(mdo sde): bsngal dang /mi rnams kyi nang du sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /lha rnams kyi nang du 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal dang /yang mngal du gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang /gcig
232b6(mdo sde): gis gcig mgo gcod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /gcig la gcig 'tshal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te byis pa rnams 'khyams pa na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag
232b7(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas ma thob po thob par bgyi ba dang /mi rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba dang /mngon sum
233a1(mdo sde): du ma bgyis pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i smon lam mi 'debs shing rtsol bar mi bgyid pa'i slad du ste/de ltar byis pa glen pa dag ni gang la
233a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad bas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis skyo bar bgyid cing gang la yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor bas skyo bar mi bgyid cing
233a3(mdo sde): yid 'byung bar mi bgyid do//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na 'khor po ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa lags par yongs su brtag pa mdzod cig rgyal po chen po 'di
233a4(mdo sde): ltar khyod kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la lhag par mdzad pa mdzad de dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bskrun/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni brnyes/longs spyod chen po'i phyir bcom
233a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la dbul ba ni phul/mtho ris su skye ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du tshul khrims ni bsrungs/bcom ldan 'das la chos gsan pas khyod shes rab chen po brnyas par
233a6(mdo sde): ni gyur/mchod sbyin ni mdzad ljags kyis/rgyal po chen po khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed cig/smras pa/bram ze kho bo ni bla na med pa yang
233a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'dod de/bram ze kho bos ni 'khor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i don du sbyin pa byin cing tshul khrims bsrungs la chos nyan to//bram ze bla na
233b1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni thob par dka' ba yin pas bram ze mi dgos so//bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po la lan gnyis su smras pa/rgyal po chen po byang
233b2(mdo sde): chub kyi lam ni yang dag pa lags pas bsam pas smon lam btab par dkyi ba ste/lam de ni sgrib pa ma mchis pas rdzogs shing shin tu dang ba 'gas so//lam de ni lhag
233b3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pas rnam par dag cing drang po lags so//lam de ni nyon mongs pa bsal bas g.yo med cing dag pa lags so//lam de ni sgrib pa ma mchis pas rgya che ba lags so//
233b4(mdo sde): lam de ni dusam pa las byung bas yang dag par gzhol ba lags so//lam de ni sdig pa thams cad mi bgyid pas 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so//lam de ni sbyin pa'i
233b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par 'byor pa lags so//lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsil ba lags so//lam de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gozhi ma
233b6(mdo sde): mchis pa lags so//lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byin gyi rlabs kyi rten lags so//lam de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnyog pa ma mchis pa lags so//
233b7(mdo sde): lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu rtogs pa logs so//lam de ni snying rje chen pos ngo bo nyid kyi shes pa rjes su rtogs pa lags so//lam de ni dga' ba chen
234a1(mdo sde): pos mchog tu dga' ba thob pa lags so//lam de ni btang snyoms chen pos snying po dang mthun pa ljags so//lam de ni 'dod pa dang /gnod sems dang /
234a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag ma mchis pas tsher ma dang bral ba lags so//lam de ni khong khro ba'i sems ma mchis pas bgrod bde ba lags so//lam+ba d+ha
234a3(mdo sde): ni gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya rnam par rig pas g.yo dang bral ba lags so//lam de ni khams dang skye mched shin tu mthong bas bdud dang phyir
234a4(mdo sde): rgol ba nges par bcom pa lags so//lam de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud dang bral ba lags so//lam do ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la
234a5(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang bral bas snyems rgya chen por mchi ba lags so//lam de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang bcas pA lags so//lam
234a6(mdo sde): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che dang mthun pas rin po rje chen po nges par sgrub pa lags so//lam de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag
234a7(mdo sde): tu bstan pa lags so//lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su zin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ston cing rjes su spyad pa legs so//lam de ni rjes su chags pa dang /
234b1(mdo sde): khong khro ba spangs pas mtho dman dang bral ba lags so//lam de ni gnod sems dang /tha ba dang /khro ba ma mchis pas rdul nges par bcom pa lags so//lam de ni mi
234b2(mdo sde): dge ba thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror mchi ba la sman pa lags so//rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi lam de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas bde ba 'thob pa lags
234b3(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po chen po byang chub tu thugs skyed cig/rgyal pos smras pa/bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni skye dgu lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi nang du 'jig rten du byung bas na de
234b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas ngan song thamaso cad zhi bar mdzad pa mi spyod de/sems can gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni 'bras bu la gnas par gyur/
234b5(mdo sde): la las ni ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang /bzod pa bsgrubs/gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur//
234b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa kha cig gis ni lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur te/sems can rnams ring rang gi dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i lus rnams kyis 'phyan par gyur
234b7(mdo sde): pas na 'di ltar sems can gcig tsam gyi sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar ma mdzad na bcom ldan 'das kyis btul ba'i sems can gang zhig yin/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
235a1(mdo sde): ni zhing du gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa'i sems can rnams sdug bsngal las thar bar ni mi mdzad do//kho bo ni byang chub tu sems
235a2(mdo sde): bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod la/kho bo ye shes chen po bsags pa dang /chos kyi sgo chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug pa des sems can rnams
235a3(mdo sde): 'dul zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'od byed mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'di lta bur byang chub kyi phyir sems yongs su bsngo bo 'ba' zhig ni mi byed do//gal te grang
235a4(mdo sde): gi tshe kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der kho bos sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
235a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba lta na de'i tshe kho bo byang chub tu sems bskyed cing kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang spyad par bya'o//rigs
235a6(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos 'dri lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon pa ro 'du mdzad de/de'i
235a7(mdo sde): tshe ting nge 'dzin me long bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so///de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin me long bkod pa la mnyam por bzhag pa dang /'di lta bu'i snang
235b1(mdo sde): babyung bar gyur te/snang ba des phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi 'jig rten gyi rdul snyed dag gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad
235b2(mdo sde): sdang bar gyur te/la la dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /la la dag na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa dang //
235b3(mdo sde): gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung ni 'dug nas bdud pham par byed pa rnams dang /gang dag na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po
235b4(mdo sde): ma lon par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rnams dang /gang dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ring po ma lon par chos ston pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas
235b5(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis khyab pa dang /gang dag na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa dang /gang dag na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba
235b6(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgya snga dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi stong pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing kha cig snyigs ma
235b7(mdo sde): lngas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa dang /kho cig snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba'i yongs su dag pa dang /kha cig no sems can mchog rnams dang /kha cig na dman pa rnams dang /
236a1(mdo sde): kha cig na tshe ring ba rnams dang /kha cig na tshe thung ba rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing kha cig mes 'jig pa rnams dang /kha cig chu dang /kha cig rlung
236a2(mdo sde): gis 'jig pa rnams dang kha cig chags pa rnams dang /kha cig chags shing gnas pa de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par kun tu snang ngo //thams cad dang
236a3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthong nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po la smras pa/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
236a4(mdo sde): bkod pa dag la gzugs la/rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed cig/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu bzhed par yang gzung
236a5(mdo sde): bar mdzod cig/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
236a6(mdo sde): 'das las gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po yongs su 'dzin pa nas/gang gis sems can rnams bsam pa yongs
236a7(mdo sde): su dag pa dang /gang gis sems can rnams tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i bar du rgyo cher gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems
236b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa dang /smon lam gyi dbang gis yongs su dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin/
236b2(mdo sde): to//rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag grong khyer du zhugs te/rtse gcig tu mchis nas smon lam bsam par bgyi zhing bdag snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba'i
236b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu la dga' ba der dge ba'i spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes
236b4(mdo sde): par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas//
236b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste grong khyer du zhugs nas rang gi khyim du nang du yang dag 'jog la rtse gcig tu 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa dag sems par byed
236b6(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa//de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu thu bo mig mi 'dzums la smras pa/mig mi 'dzums khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
236b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed la/khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba spyad cing bsod nams bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
237a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/des smras pa/mkhan po bdag kyang rang gi khyim du mchis la gcig pu dben par mchis nas
237a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dgra bsam par bgyi ste/gal te byang chub kyi slad du sems skye bar 'gyur ba lta ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du slar mchis nas byang chub
237a3(mdo sde): tu sems yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//de nas rgyal bu des kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum skor ba byas nas
237a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ste/rang gi gnas su song nas gcig tu dben par song ste 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag sems par byed do//rigs
237a5(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu gnyis pa la bos te smras pa/gzhon nu khyod byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgya
237a6(mdo sde): chetshar sbyar te/rgyal bu stong gi bar du thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /gzhan yang sems can dung phyur phrag
237a7(mdo sde): dgu dong /bye ba phrag gnyis kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang /de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag kyang rang rang gi khyim du mchis
237b1(mdo sde): la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag bsam par bgyi'o//de skad ces smras nas thams cad rang rang gi khyim dag tu dong ste gcig pu dben par
237b2(mdo sde): 'dug nas lo bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sems par byed do//rigs kyi bu de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems lnga 'di lta
237b3(mdo sde): bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes te/bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing /bdag
237b4(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'di yang lo bdun gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs pas/gal te blo na med pa yang
237b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du smon lam 'di'ang 'grub pa lta na de'i phyir bdag gis lha dang /lha ma yin dang /dri
237b6(mdo sde): za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum rnams mchod sbyin chen po 'di la yang dag par gzud par bya'o snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya
237b7(mdo sde): mtsho'i rdul rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu mthong bar 'dod pa dang /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/bram ze rgya
238a1(mdo sde): mtsho'i rdul ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze khyod kho bo las ji zhig 'dod/bram zes
238a2(mdo sde): smras pa/khyod su zhig yin/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/bram ze chen po khyed kyis gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos pa de ni kho bo yin na bram ze
238a3(mdo sde): bsgo ba ci yod/ci zhig bgyi/bram zes smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyang mchod sbyin chen po 'di la spro ba bskyed cig/des smras pa/bram ze khyod ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bya'o//
238a4(mdo sde): smras pa/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo'i tshig gis gnod sbyin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la 'di skad ces kyang bsgo
238a5(mdo sde): shig/gal te gnod sbyin khyod cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa lta na/khyed cag deng la rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi
238a6(mdo sde): snying po dag long zhig/kha cig gis ni spos sna tshogs dang //kha cig gis ni me tog sna tshogs dag long zhig ces bsgo shig dang /des kho bos nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan
238a7(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa bya'o//rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bram ze de ltar bya'o zhes bram ze de'i ltar mnyan nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/rnga bo che brdungs nas gnod sbyin
238b1(mdo sde): dang /srin po dag bsdus te 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/gang dzAm+bu'i gling 'dri na rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya
238b2(mdo sde): mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad
238b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyis/de'i phyir khyed cag gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyed cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed cig/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin dang /srin po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis thal mo sbyar te smras po/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs
238b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas
238b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan dang /dge ba'i rgyun gang yin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag thams cad la bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par
238b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/khyed cag nyon cig/khyed cag las gang su dge ba'i
239a1(mdo sde): rtsub 'dod pa dang /bsod nams 'dod pas lo bdun du gang gi phyir bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhal zas
239a2(mdo sde): sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dag rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas long zhig/de nas gnod sbyin dgu khri nyis stong gis tshig mthun par smras
239a3(mdo sde): po/grogs po dag bdag cag gi lo bdun po 'di la gang gis lo bdun po 'di la gang gi phyir bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal
239a4(mdo sde): zas sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dag blang bar bya'o//gnod sbyin be ni khri drug stong gis smras pa/bdag cag gis ni spos blong bar
239a5(mdo sde): bya'o//gnod sbyin lnga khri nyis skyong gis smras pa/bdug cag gis ni me tog sna tshogs dag blang bar bya'o//gnod sbyin nyi khris smras pa/bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das
239a6(mdo sde): dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir sman bcud kyis len sna tshogs dag gi mthu blangs la zhal zas dang /gtsang nanA sbyor bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa der mthu gzhug par bya'o//
239a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin bdun khris smras pa/grogs po dag bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhal zas sbyar bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze
239b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i rdul rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po mthong bar 'dod pa dang /de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ga la bla der song ste phyin cing grul bum bye ba khrag khrig
239b2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar dang /de bzhin du rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /yul 'khor srung dang /klu dang /
239b3(mdo sde): dri za bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus gling bzhi pa
239b4(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi gan du 'ongs pa dang /bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
239b5(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug nas de dag kyang dong ste rang rang gi 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
239b6(mdo sde): rnam pos kyi bu ther 'bum 'khor dang bcas pa'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go//'phags skyes po ther 'bum dang /mig mi bzang
239b7(mdo sde): ther 'bum dang /yul 'khor srung ther 'bum 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/rigs kyi bu de nas bram
240a1(mdo sde): ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi
240a2(mdo sde): rnye bya'ang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur la/gal te bdag gi smon lam yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur bltan bdag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la mchod sbyin chen
240a3(mdo sde): po 'di'i bsod nams yang dag par bgo ba sha' byed par gyur cig/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig gal te bdag
240a4(mdo sde): bsod nams des blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur blta na des lha'i dbang po brgya byin bdag la lta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar
240a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /lce'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /lha'i bu rab 'phrul dang /lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyang bdag blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong
240a6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig snyam mo//rigs kyi bu bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de snyam du sems bskyeng ma thag tu lce'i dbang po bad+d+ha byin b+h+ra m+bi ze de lta bo'i phyir 'ongs so//lho'i bur ba'ab
240a7(mdo sde): bral ring /lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /lha'i bu rab 'phrul dang /lce'i bu gzhan 'phrul dang byed kyang bram ze de lta ba'i phyir 'angs nas/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi de dag
240b1(mdo sde): la khyed cag su yin zhes dris pa dang /lha'i rgyal po lnga po dag gis rang rang gis ming rus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so//kye bram ze kho bo cag la sgo ba ni ci zhig yod/mchod sbyin
240b2(mdo sde): chen po 'di la kho bo cag gis yo byad dag sbyar bar bya ba lta ci yod/bram zes smras pa/bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir khyed cag lha'i 'jig rten na tham
240b3(mdo sde): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rin po che'i khang pa brdzogs pa dag dang /rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag dang /dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag dang /spos kyi shing ljon pa dag
240b4(mdo sde): dang /me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang /'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang /lha'i na bza' dag dang /lha'i gladan dag dang /lha'i gding ba dag dang /lha'i rin po che'i snod dag dang /
240b5(mdo sde): lha'i rgyan dag dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bA dan dang /lteb lhub dag dang /lha'i rol mo'i sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis dzam+bu'i tshul thams cad brgyan
240b6(mdo sde): par gyis shig/lha'i rgyal po lnga po de dag gis grogs po de ltar bya'o zhes bram ze'i ltar mnyan te/bram ze'i drung nas phyir log nas lha'i 'jig rten du dong ste phyin pa dang /lce'i
240b7(mdo sde): bu'akhro byed dang /lha'i bu 'khyil byed dang /lha'i bu snar ma skyes dang /lha'i bu sa rtsom dga' rnams bos te 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag khyod cag deng la dzam+bu'i
241a1(mdo sde): gling du babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal rgyan gyi khyad par sna tshogs dag dang /gdan dang /gding ba sna tshogs dag gis
241a2(mdo sde): de ltar lha'i 'jig rten 'di brgyan pa de lta bu dag gis brgyan par gyis shig/grogs po dag rin po che'i khring pa brdegs pa 'di lta bu'ang brtsig tu chug cig/'di lta ste/
241a3(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i blo gam can 'di ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brtsig tu chu gcig/lha'i bu de lngas lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas
241a4(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling du babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mtshan gcig gis dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal thams cad rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag dang /rgyal mtshan gyi bar
241a5(mdo sde): dag gi rkyen de lta bu dag gis brgyan to//'di lta ste/dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i ba gam can ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'ang
241a6(mdo sde): brtsigs te/dzAm+bu'i tshal thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mthar thug par brgyan nas lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa/grogs po dag
241a7(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzod cig/ji ltar lha'i 'jig rten 'di legs par brgyan pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dzam+bu chel gyi skyed mos tshal yang lha'i rgyan gyi khyad par
241b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mthar thug par brgyan cing 'di lta ste/dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i bu ga ma can ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i rin po//
241b2(mdo sde): che thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'ang brtsigs lags te/grogs po dag lha'i 'jig rten dang /dza m+bu'i gling gi dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal ni khyad par cung zad kyang ma mchis
241b3(mdo sde): so//de nas lha'i rgyal po lnga po brgya byin dang rab 'thab bral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /rab 'phrul dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed de dag dzom+bu'i gling du babs nas blam
241b4(mdo sde): ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir dzam+b+ha'i tshol nI brgyan zin na'ang kho bo cag gis bya ba lta
241b5(mdo sde): yod/de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i bu lnga po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i rgyal po khyed lnga ni lha'i ris so so na rgyal srid bya ba yin pas de
241b6(mdo sde): nakhyed cag gi dbang du 'gyur gyis lha'i rgyal po dag deng la rang rang gi lha'i 'khor rnams bsdus te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /
241b7(mdo sde): bsnyon bkur bya ba'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling du shig la bcom ldan 'das las chos kyang nyon zhig/de nas lce'i rgyal po de lnga rang rang gi gnas kyi khyad par rnams su dong ste phyin pa
242a1(mdo sde): dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsdus te 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/dzam+bu'i gling na rgyal
242a2(mdo sde): po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ces bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la
242a3(mdo sde): lo dadun du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs shing ri mor byed de/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas kho bo cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge
242a4(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir skyed mos tshol thams cad brgyan zin gyis/de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
242a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod cig/de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po drag gis thal mo sbyar te tshig tu smras pa/grogs po bdag cag gis
242a6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po de lo rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing rjes su yi rang ba de las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
242a7(mdo sde): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis kyang 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams bsdus te/rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//lha'i bu yongs su dga'
242b1(mdo sde): ldan dang /lha'i bu 'phrul dga' dang /lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag bsdus nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang
242b2(mdo sde): po dag gis thal mo sbyar te tshig tu smras pa/grogs po dag bdag cag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang yin pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing de dag thams cad
242b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byas/grogs po dag de'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling du 'bab cing bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la lta
