242b7(mdo sde): dang /a ti muk+ta ka dang /tsam+ba ka dang /man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char dag 'bebs shing lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag kyang rab tu sgrogs par byed do//rigs kyi
243a1(mdo sde): bu gzhan yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
243a2(mdo sde): bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing smon lam 'di'ang 'grub pa lta na/'di ltar lha ma yin dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig snyam mo//
243a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu des sems bskyed ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lnga bram ze de ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa nas/bram ze'i tshig gis lha ma yin skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u
243a4(mdo sde): dang /bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs
243a5(mdo sde): nas chos nyan pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar ro//de bzhin du bram ze de bdud 'drod pa dang /de'i tshe na bdud gang po zhes bya ba 'ongs pa nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu skyes pa
243a6(mdo sde): dang /bud med dang khye'u dang /bu mo dang bcas po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar dang /chos
243a7(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyor ro//rigs kyi bu de nas yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul tshangs pa chen po gnas pa'i grong khyer zhes bya ba 'ong bar 'dod pa nas
243b1(mdo sde): bram ze las mnyan cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan
243b2(mdo sde): 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nas babs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin
243b3(mdo sde): du sbyar ro//rigs kyi bu de nas yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i brgya byin mthong bar 'dod cing lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /rab
243b4(mdo sde): 'phrul dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang mthong bar 'dod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po de lnga'ang bram ze'i drung du lhags nas bram ze des de dag yang
243b5(mdo sde): dge par rjes su bstan pa dang /de dag kyang rang rang gi lha'i gnas dag tu dong nas bram ze'i tshig gos rang rang gi 'khor rnams kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go//de bzhin du sum
243b6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
243b7(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed nas de dag kyang brgya byin dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /bcom ldan
244a1(mdo sde): 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so//de bzhin du lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan
244a2(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha'i bu skyes
244a3(mdo sde): pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang bcas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
244a4(mdo sde): bskyed de/bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bye ba dang /phrad par bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /bcom ldan 'das las
244a5(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir gleng bzhi pa 'dir lhags so//gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i lha ma yi ni gyi dbang po dang /bdud dang /tshangs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no//de bzhin du gling
244a6(mdo sde): bzhi pa gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa'i bar dag gi brgya byin dang /lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul
244a7(mdo sde): dbang byed dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /bdud dang /chongs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chos mnyan po'i bar gyi phyir de dag 'khor dang bcas te gling
244b1(mdo sde): bzhi pa 'dir lhags so//de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bar dag nas kyang brgya byin ther 'bum dang /lha'i bu rab 'thab bral ther 'bum dang /yongs
244b2(mdo sde): su dga' ldan zer 'bum dang /'phrul dga' ther 'bum dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed zer 'bum dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po ther 'bum dang /bdud ther 'bum dang /tshangs
244b3(mdo sde): pa chen po ther 'bum dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus tshangs pa chen po'i bar du re re zhing yang tshangs ras kyi lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
244b4(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bar dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nus bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /blad par bya ba dang /phyog bya
244b5(mdo sde): bo dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'drir lhags so//de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
244b6(mdo sde): dag kyang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs de ni cung zad kyang med do//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
244b7(mdo sde): byang chub lo bdag gi rib yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /ji ltar rnam thos kyi bu ther 'bum dang /tshangs pa chen po zir 'bum gyi bar 'di dag dag dang mthun par 'jug pa de
245a1(mdo sde): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang bdag dang mthun par mdzad paltan/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khyams kyi bar gyi mi dang /dud 'gro dang /
245a2(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang /sems can dmyal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar mdzad la bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed nas de dag re re'i mdun nu'ang
245a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa bzhugs shing des sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen
245a4(mdo sde): po mdzod par gyur cig snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de nas dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi
245a5(mdo sde): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rab tu gdung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin
245a6(mdo sde): rab tu gdung ba la thugs mnyam par bzhag pos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las spu'i/bung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed dag byung ste/'od
245a7(mdo sde): zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab par gyur to//de la 'od zer kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar dong nas grang ba'i sems can dmyal
245b1(mdo sde): bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la rlung dron po dag langs so//gang dag tsha ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung bsil ba dag langs te/des sems can
245b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi bkres pa dang /skom pa dang /ngal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rob tu zhi bar byas nas bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed do//sems can dmyal ba pa re
245b3(mdo sde): ro'i mdun na'ang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan cing dpe byad bzong po brgyad cus gzugs legs par spras pa bzhugs so//de
245b4(mdo sde): nas sems can dmyal ba pa bde ba dang ldan pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/rkyen gang gis bdag cag gi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi zhing bde ba skyes par gyur snyam pa dang /de dag gis
245b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa de mthong ngo //de dag gis de mthong nas 'di skad
245b6(mdo sde): du snying rje chen po dang ldan po'i bdag nyid chen po 'di'i mthus bdag cag 'di ltar bde bar gyur to zhes zer zhing de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skyes nas rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la
245b7(mdo sde): blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces sems can dag khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes legs por tshig tu brjod la bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs
246a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang /khyed cag phyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde ba'i tshor ba 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/
246a2(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pa dang /de dag gis kyang 'od skad ces bdag cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed kyis dge ba'i rtsa
246a3(mdo sde): ba des bdag cag gi las kyi sgrib pa zad par gyur cig ces smras so//de nas kha cig shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so//sems can dmyal ba pa'i
246a4(mdo sde): sems can gung dag mes bsreg pa de dag lnga'ang 'od zer de dag gis rlung bsil ba dag rab tu btang ste/de dag gis de la reg pa dang bkres pa dang /skom pa rab tu zhi zhing
246a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal med par gyur nas/kha cig de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa'i bar du gyur to//de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams la'ang
246a6(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o//de bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar la'ang brjod par bya'o//'od de yang phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das
246a7(mdo sde): kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub pa lha dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /klu dang /lha ma yin bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag
246b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to//sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa dang /gzungs
246b2(mdo sde): thob par gyur to//dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched kyi phyir lha rnams kyis rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin gyi dzem+bu'i tshal
246b3(mdo sde): gyi skyed mos tshol lha'i rgyan dang /lhab lhub dag gis brgyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag dong ste blta zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun
246b4(mdo sde): yang lta'o//der song nas bcom ldan 'das las chos kyang mnyan par bya'o zhes smras nas/de'i tshe na mi rnams las skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo bye ba
246b5(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /phrad par bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /skyed mos
246b6(mdo sde): tshal de'ang mthong bar 'dod pa'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin du 'ong ngo //skyed mos tshal de la'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo nyi khri yod de/skyed
246b7(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi sgo re re zhing rin po che'i khri'u lnga brgya lnga brgya bshamos nas de dag la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya lnga brgya 'khod nas sems can gang dag 'ongs shing skyed mos tshal der 'jug
247a1(mdo sde): pa de dag bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong /chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
247a2(mdo sde): chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste 'dzud cing sems kyang skyed du 'jug go//gang dag nye ba na gnas pa rnams dang /gang dag ring ba na gnas pa rnams kyang bcom ldan
247a3(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun yang blta ba'i phyir phyis skyed mos tshal der 'jug go//de ltar mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
247a4(mdo sde): gyis lo bdun po de dag las lha bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//
247a5(mdo sde): klu dang /lha ma yin dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum dang /dri za dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i
247a6(mdo sde): skye gnas su skyes pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i bar dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//
247a7(mdo sde): bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de lo bdun po de dag 'das nas kyang lha'i 'khor lo rin po che ma gtogs par 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /glang po rin po che ma gtogs pa rin po che
247b1(mdo sde): sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /shing rta brgyud khri bzhi stong gi bar dag kyang 'bul bar 'dod do//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang lo bdun po de
247b2(mdo sde): ngag 'das 'das su 'dod chags la 'dun pa ma skyes so//zhe sdang la 'dun pa med/gti mug la 'dun pa med/rgyal srid la 'dun pa med/nor la 'dun pa med/bu la
247b3(mdo sde): 'dun pa med/bu mo la 'dun pa med/zas la 'dun pa med/skom la 'dun pa med/gos la 'dun pa med/spos la 'dun pa med/gzhon pa la 'dun pa med//
247b4(mdo sde): gri nyid la 'dun pa med/bdag tu 'dun pa med/gzhan du 'dun pa med par gyur to//lo bdun du glos phab ste nyal bar ma gyur kyang /de la mtshan mo'i 'du shes ma
247b5(mdo sde): skyes/nyin mo'i 'du shes ma skyes so//gzugs kyi 'du shes ma yin/sgra'i 'du shes ma yin/dri'i 'du shes ma yin/ro'i 'du shes ma yin te/reg bya'i
247b6(mdo sde): 'du shes kyang ma skyes so//lo bdun du de dag gis lus la ngal ba ma skyes te/rtag par rgyun tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi
247b7(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dgo mthong yang de'i mig lam du ri rab snang bar ma gyur/ri gzhan dag kyang ma yin/khor yug kyang ma
248a1(mdo sde): yin/khor yug chen po dag kyang ma yin/'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang ma yin/nyi ma dang zla ba drug kyang ma yin te/lha'i gzhal med khang dag
248a2(mdo sde): kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur cing ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa dag lnga lta
248a3(mdo sde): zhing smon lam sems par byed do//ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de lta bu'i bde ba'i yon tan gyi gnas pas lo bdun du gnas pa dang /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
248a4(mdo sde): gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sems shing 'dug pa de bzhin du rgyal bu bu bo mig mi 'dzums dang /
248a5(mdo sde): mu khyud dang /dbang po'i tshogs dang /de bzhin du rgyal bu stong po de dag thams cad dang /khrims kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /gzhan yang srog chags dung phyur phrag
248a6(mdo sde): dgu dang /bye ba phrag gnyis po thams cad kyang de lta ro lo bdun du gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten
248a7(mdo sde): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang mthong la/lo 'dun gyi bar du de dag 'dod chags la 'dun pa ma skyes shing /zhe sdang la 'dun pa med/gau ti
248b1(mdo sde): mug la 'dun pa med/de dag la ngal ba'i gnas skyes par ma gyur pa'i bar du ste/rtag par rgyun du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sangs
248b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab snyed dag mthong yang de dag gi mig lam du ri rab kyang snang bar ma gyur/ro gzhan dag kyang ma yin/lha'i gzhal med khang gi bar dag kyang mig lam du
248b3(mdo sde): snang bar ma gyur te/de dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i smon lAm sems shing
248b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang yon tan gyi gnas pa de lta bus lo bdun du gnas te/kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa dag sems so//kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi
248b5(mdo sde): zhing yongs su ma dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa dag sems so//de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun po de dag thal zhing rdzogs par rig nas rin po che sna bdun 'bul bar 'dod
248b6(mdo sde): bya'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po ga la ba dri logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
248b7(mdo sde): to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal nas/de rang gi khyim du mchis
249a1(mdo sde): te/gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang drag 'jog la gnas shing der mi su'ang mchir mi ster lags so//de bzhin du bdag gis rgyal bu stong po de
249a2(mdo sde): dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing gzengs bstod nas de bzhin du so so rang rang gi khyim dag tu mchis te gcig pu nang du yang dag
249a3(mdo sde): 'jog la gnas shing /der yang su'ang mchir mi ster legs so//de bzhin du khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /de bzhin du gzhan yang srog chags dung phyur
249a4(mdo sde): phyag dgu dang /bye ba phrag gnyis kyi bar dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag por 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas thams cad kyang rang rang
249a5(mdo sde): gi khyim dag tu mchis te/gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas shing der yang su'ang mchir mi ster lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang
249a6(mdo sde): rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyad nang du yang dag 'jog de las langs te 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /gang dag bdag gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal ba de dag thams cad kyang
249a7(mdo sde): 'dir mchi bar 'gyur zhing bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las blos mi g.yo ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa 'thob par
249b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /ming dang /rus dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag la dgongs su gsol/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag
249b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin blo gros sgrub pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas
249b3(mdo sde): zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod khaM dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo //de dag byung nas kyang nang
249b4(mdo sde): du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gi mdun du tshangs par sprul te 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag longs shig/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun du mchod
249b5(mdo sde): sbyin bya ba ni zin te/bcom ldan 'das kyang gzhan du rgyu zhing gi shegs par 'gyur gyis/grogs po dge bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /
249b6(mdo sde): phyog bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dengs shig/de nas de dag thams cad la 'od zer de dag gis bskul ba dang /langs nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la skul bar byed
249b7(mdo sde): de'ang de dag gis bskul ba dang /langs te chas so//rgyal po de chas pa dang lha rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil nas rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga pa Ta ha la sogs pa
250a1(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra dag kyang rab tu bsgrags so//de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
250a2(mdo sde): bapar gyi phyir shing rta la zhon nas bu stong po de dag dang /khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /sreg chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /bye ba phyag gnyis po rnams kyis

250a5(mdo sde): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phag btsal nas/srog chags bye ba phrag du ma dag dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul

250a7(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas shing /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag dang /grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag kyang phul ba de la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la/rjes
250b1(mdo sde): su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dang /yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

250b4(mdo sde): par 'dzin pa bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so//khyed kyis yon tan 'di la rjes su yi rarung bar byas te phul la 'di skad ces kyang smros shig/sbyin pa 'dis
250b5(mdo sde): bdag dbang po'i gnas min tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu mi 'dod na//rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs shing g.yo brgyalo po'i srid kyi dpal lta smos ci dgos//bdag gi gus pa
250b6(mdo sde): chen po'i sbyin pa 'di yi 'bras bu gang yin de yis ni//sems la dbang byed mtshungs med byang chub 'thob cing sems can rnams kyang sgrol gyur cig/snying rje pad+ma dkar po las sbyin pa
250b7(mdo sde): gtong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o////rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po
251a1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'dis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
251a2(mdo sde): cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa de dag ngas lung bstan par bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang bstan par bya'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
251a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//'dzum pa mdzad pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang ba
251a4(mdo sde): rgya chen pos snang bar mdzad nas/rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bkod pa rnams kyang bstan to//de'i
251a5(mdo sde): tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis snang ba de mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
251a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lhags nas/de dag gis kyang byang chub
251a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal cing bsnyen bkur
251b1(mdo sde): byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam lung bstan pa thos par 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i
251b2(mdo sde): rdul gyis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis je dang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkod pa gzung zhig/de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu
251b3(mdo sde): khyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub don du gnyer ba lags
251b4(mdo sde): te/'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu mi mchis pa dag la dgung zla gsum du yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas
251b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shing /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung lo bdun po 'di dag la'ang sangs rgyas kyi
251b6(mdo sde): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag bsams lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs paro 'tshang
251b7(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur ba der sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag 'byung bar ma gyur cig/sems can gang dag de nas 'chi 'pho bar
252a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad gser gyi mdog lta bur gyur cig/de na lha dang mi thams cad
252a2(mdo sde): kyang khyad par ma mchis par gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad tshe rabs dran par gyur cig/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas
252a3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lha'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/sems can thams cad
252a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phyag 'bum dag gi chos ston pa thos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lha'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
252a5(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag meng po dag na gnas pa'i sems can de dag gi sems kyi spyod pa kun shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas po dang ldan por
252a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/sems can thams cad sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bya ba la mkhas pa dang
252a7(mdo sde): ldan par gyur cig/de na sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pa ma mchis shing tha ni rang gi lus la yid kyi 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis par gyur cig/sems can
252b1(mdo sde): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/sems can thams cad brdzus te skye bar gyur cig/de na bud med du gdags pa'ang
252b2(mdo sde): ma mchis par gyur cig/de na sems can rnams smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ma mchis par gyur cig/de na sems can rnams la mi dge ba'i
252b3(mdo sde): ming yang 'byung bar ma gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dri nga ba 'byung bar ma gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das spangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par
252b4(mdo sde): gyur cig/sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par gyur cig/sems can thams cad smon lam ma gtogs par skye ba
252b5(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs par gyur cig/de na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sems can thams cad snga dro gcig gis sangs rgyas bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed dag la bsnye no
252b6(mdo sde): bkur bgyid par 'gyur zhing /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal na'ang de dag la de bzhin
252b7(mdo sde): du 'grub par 'gyur la de nyid kyi snga dros slar ldog par gyur cig/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sde snod smra bar gyur cig//bam po lnga pa//sems
253a1(mdo sde): can thams cad sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/sems can gang gis kyang cher na lha'i mig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
253a2(mdo sde): tan gyi brgyan gyis bsngags pa'i mtha' tshad 'dzin pa'i rngo mi thog par gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa grangs ma mchis
253a3(mdo sde): pa dag thob par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad stong gi tshad tsam du gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i 'od gsal bar gyur cog/de'i khor
253a4(mdo sde): yug na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa babrang ba las 'das pa dag gda' bar gyur cig/sems can grang dag der skye bar 'gyur ba rnams byang chub kyi mthar thug
253a5(mdo sde): gi bar du tshangs par spyod par gyur cig/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur cig/dbang
253a6(mdo sde): po ma tshang bar ma gyur cig der sems can rnams skyes ma thag tu lha'i las shin tu 'das pa 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba thob par gyur cig/de na sems can thams
253a7(mdo sde): cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'gogs par gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad gos ngur smrig sar pa gyon par gyur cig/de na sems can rnams skyes ma thag tu shin tu rnam
253b1(mdo sde): par 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin de thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa dag tu mchis nas sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen
253b2(mdo sde): bkur bgyid par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du thams cad mthong bar gyur cig/der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag gos sangs rgyas kyi zhing
253b3(mdo sde): gi yon tan bkod pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu dag 'tshal ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rang bzhin dag rin po che'i shong ljon pa de dag las mthong bar gyur cig/
253b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams skyes ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing /ting nge 'dzin de thob pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas
253b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa rnams rtag tu mthong bar gyur cig/sems can gang dag der skye bar 'gyur pa de dag thams cad gzhan
253b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gos dang /gzhal med khang dang /rgyan dang /spud pa dang /kha dog dang /gzugs ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
253b7(mdo sde): de na rdul dang /gor ma dang /ri nag po rnams ma mchis la/khor yug kyang ma mchis/khor yug chen po'ang ma mchis/raM rab kyang ma mchis/rgya mtsho chen po'ang ma
254a1(mdo sde): mchis par gyur cig/de na sgrib pa dang /chod pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis pa dang /de na sems can
254a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dag kyang thams cad du ma mchis pa dang /mi khom pa'i sgra dang /sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang /
254a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal yang ma lags bde ba'ang ma lags pa'i sgra dag kyang ma mchis par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing don du gnyer ba legs
254a4(mdo sde): te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji srid du de lta bu'i yon tan dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyes pa de srid du byang chub sems dper gyur cing dka'
254a5(mdo sde): ba spyod par bgyid lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu bgyis nas/de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
254a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ste/bdag gis byang chub kyi shing ni dpag tshad khri mchis par gyur la/bdag der mchis nas sems bskyed pa'i skad cig gcig gis bla na
254a7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/bdag gis 'od ni tshed ma mchis shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag
254b1(mdo sde): snang bar bgyid par gyur cig/bdag gi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu ma mchis te bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis par gyur la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs
254b2(mdo sde): pa de sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thog par gyur cig/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas spangs shing dpag tu ma mchis la/thams cad
254b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par du sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mo thog par gyur cig/bdag gis byang chub thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag
254b4(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ba dang /dbyangs rjes su sgrog par 'gyur ba dang /snyan pa brjod par gyur cig/bdag gis byang chub thob
254b5(mdo sde): pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis grang se ma mchis pa gzhan dag na mtshams mi mchis pa bgyid pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ma gtogs pa'i sems can gang
254b6(mdo sde): drag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su bsngo ba bgyis nas bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/bdag
254b7(mdo sde): gis byang chub thob pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las 'das pa gzhan dag gi byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal zhing /byang chub tu
255a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed par 'gyur la dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang der yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig/de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na'ang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
255a2(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du mchis la de dag gis kyang bdag mthong nas bdag la dga' ba dang /dang ba skye bar 'gyur zhing de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang ldog par
255a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing der yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa dag
255a4(mdo sde): bdag las nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /de dag ji lta bu 'tshal bar 'gyur po de lta bu thos par gyur cig/bdag gis byang chub 'thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las
255a5(mdo sde): 'das pa snyed dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
255a6(mdo sde): ldog cing bzod pa dang po dang /de bzhin du gnyis pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhing ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyang thob
255a7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bgang ba las 'das pa snyed dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa snyed dag gi byang
255b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi ming thos nas shin tu dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /ngo mtshar thob par gyur nas bdag nyid
255b2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal zhing snyan pa dang grags pa brjod par gyur cig/gang gi tshe bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na'ang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag mngon par bsgrubs nas de'i 'og tu
255b3(mdo sde): bla no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bdag la mchog tu dad pa thob pa'i byang chub

255b5(mdo sde): gyur nas/byang chub kyi mthi'i bar du rjes su mthong bar gyur cig/bdag byang chub thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gi bud med gang dag gis bdag gi
255b6(mdo sde): ming thos par gyur pa de dag shin tu dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dang ba thob par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur nas
255b7(mdo sde): slan chad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bud med nyid mi 'thob par gyur cig/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa snyed dag gi bud med
256a1(mdo sde): baglang ba lngas 'das pa snyed dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag shin tu dka' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dang ba thob par 'gyur zhing bla na

256a3(mdo sde): 'das badrag ni de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /de 'dre ba'i sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa dag 'tshal te btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i sangs
256a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
256a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i srungs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos rgyal po chubs kyi mu khyud la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rgyal po chen po legs so legs so//rgyal po chen
256a6(mdo sde): po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su bzung ba ni khyod kyi smon la mi zab bo//rgyal po chen po ltos shig dang /nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi
256a7(mdo sde): zhing bye ba phrag 'bumo 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po ltar shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par
256b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can yongs su dag pa rnams la chos kyang ston to//sangs

256b3(mdo sde): chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig brjod do//de na sems can rnams ni thams cad kyang brdzus te skyes pa sha stag go/de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri na
256b4(mdo sde): ji ltar rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam dpag tu med pa btab cing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dpag tu med pa dag yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i
256b5(mdo sde): yon tan thams cad yod do//rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po yongs su mya
256b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das shing der dam pa'i chos nub nas bar gyi bskal pa drug cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lhun po'i 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro//der yang de bzhin gshegs
256b7(mdo sde): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros bsam yas yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag
257a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po lhur shin tu mdzes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
257a2(mdo sde): bkod pa ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bsam yos yon tan rgyal po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i 'od kyi yon tan bkod pa'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de
257a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bsam yas yon tan rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bor gyi bskal pa drug cur 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bsam yas yon tan

257a5(mdo sde): po na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rnam par dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//der yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer zhes
257a6(mdo sde): bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/de'ang snga ma dang tshe'i tshad mnyam pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs par 'gyur bar sbyar ro//de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las

257b2(mdo sde): zhing gzhos la chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro//de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na de'i dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bdun du gnas par 'gyur ro//der dam pa'i chos
257b3(mdo sde): nub pa na snga ma bzhin sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpag tu med pa dag byung zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong yang 'jig rten gyi
257b4(mdo sde): khams da ni 'jig pa 'ong med 'chags pa'ang med do//der ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed ni 'das/bskal pa grangs med pa
257b5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bde ba can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/rgyal po chen po khyod de ro bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
257b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po
257b7(mdo sde): rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis gsol po/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag pas ches sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
258a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gang nas mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
258a2(mdo sde): pa/rgyal po chen po gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/gzhal du med/dpag tu med pa de dang de dag nas/nga la phyag bya ba dang //
258a3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir dang por lhags nas gang dag nga'i mdun na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag yin to/rigs kyi
258a4(mdo sde): bu 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//'di dag ni da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
258a5(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/'od dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dang po kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni re res kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag la
258a7(mdo sde): lhog par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa bo bskyed la shes rab bsgom pa yin te/rgyal po chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor dang po kho nar sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni
258b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di dag yin no//rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258b2(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal ba'i bram ze rgya mche'i rdul de dus ji srid cig na bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags//
258b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/'dis ji ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba ni
258b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis kyang thos par 'gyur ro//rgyal pos gsol pa/gal te bdag ci nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa dang /bdag gi smon lam de grub pa lta na/de'i
258b5(mdo sde): slong du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rab tu 'gul zhing rab tu g.yo bar
258b6(mdo sde): gyur la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tshe zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang bdag la lung ston par gyur cig/rigs kyi
258b7(mdo sde): bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas gtugs so//gang gi tshe rgyal po'i mgo bo sa la reg pa de'i tshe/
259a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang 'gul rab tu 'gul/g.yos rab tu g.yos/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs nas/sangs rgyas gang+gA'i
259a2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma rnyed dag kyang lung ston par mdzad de/bskal pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par sgrol ba zhes bya bar skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de
259a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung
259a4(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba dag pa dpag tu med par de bzhin gshegs pa dge
259a5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur te/phyogs bcu kho ra khor yug tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang snang
259a6(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bya ba shes pa'i sems can mchog rab longs//stobs bcu gang+gA snyed kyis
259a7(mdo sde): khyod lung bstan//ri dang bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos gyur te//mi mchog 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud
259b1(mdo sde): dga' zhing mgu la/rab tu dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas phyir nur te chos mnyan pa'i phyir ha cang yang mi ring bar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//rigs kyi bu de nas bram
259b2(mdo sde): ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bu thu bo mog mi 'dzums la bos pa dang /mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das
259b3(mdo sde): bdag gis ngan song rnams la bltas lags na/sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag ni sdug bsngal drag po rab tu mi bzad pa nyams su myong por 'gyur lags so//bdag
259b4(mdo sde): gis mtho ris rnams su bltas lags na/sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dog ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur pa'i sems kyis slar ngan sdong rnams su lhung lags so//
259b5(mdo sde): bdag gis sems can thams cad la'ang bltas lags na/mi dge bo'i bshes gnyen dang 'dres par gnas shing chos kyi mu ge'i mun pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bas pas lta
259b6(mdo sde): ba'i chu srin 'dzin khris zin cing shul ngan pa na gnas lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can de dag la tshig gis rgya cher go bar bgyi zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
259b7(mdo sde): cad kyang bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi lags so//gang gi tshe bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can
260a1(mdo sde): gang dag sdug bsngal gyis gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /'jigs pas skrag pa rnams dang /chos kyi mu go'i mun par zhugs pa rnams dang /zhum

260a4(mdo sde): su byur par mo bgyis pa bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgyu bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

260b2(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa ji srid cig tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad

261a3(mdo sde): ces kyang bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir khyod kyis ngan song rnams su'ang bltas/mtho ris rnams su'ang bltas/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal yang
261a4(mdo sde): bltas shing /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal lus thar bar bya ba dang /nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje'i sems bskyed pas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod

265a6(mdo sde): gtams pa dag 'byung bar gyur cig/byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du gang bdag cag zas kham gyis za ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/gang bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams

265b3(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin de thob nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu thogs pa mi mchis par mchi bar

265b5(mdo sde): phul nas kyang chos bshad par bgyis nas de nyid kyi snga dros rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du slar mchi bar gyur cig/gos rin po che dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/de nyid kyi snga dro'i
265b6(mdo sde): bar gyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du slar mchis nas gcig la gcig gos dag skon par yang gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la longs spyod
265b7(mdo sde): dang yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /sems can gzhan dag dang thun mong
266a1(mdo sde): du bgyis nas slad kyis bdag yongs su spyod par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar gyur cig/de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis
266a2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/bslab pa byung ba'i sgra ma mchis par gyur cig/ltung byed las bslang po'i sgra ma mchis par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rin po che 'bum phrag du ma dag
266a3(mdo sde): bsngags par gyur cig/rin po che du mas spras shing nor bu ltar kun tu snang bar gyur cig/nor bu rin po che gang dag phyogs bcu rnams su sngon ma mthong ba dang /ston mthos
266a4(mdo sde): pa'i nor bu rin po che de dag spyod par gyur cig/nor bu rin po che de dag go mong brjod ni lo bye bas kyang mi bas par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gser
266a5(mdo sde): las grub par mthong bar 'a tshal na'ang de la gser las grub par gnas par 'gyur ba dang /gang dngul las grub par 'tshol ba des dngul las grub par mthong yang de la gser

266a7(mdo sde): po las grub pa dang /spug las grub par 'tshal na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dag tu mthong bar gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi
266b1(mdo sde): zhing de a ga ru las grub pa dang /rgya spos las grub pa dang /ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa dang /tsan+d+ranas mchog las grub par
266b2(mdo sde): mthong bar 'tshal na'ang de bzhin du gyur cig/ji lta ji ltar ci 'dra bar mthong bar 'tshal ba de lta de ltar dri dang 'dra bar mthong bar gyur cig/gcig gis gnyis pa'i smon lam
266b3(mdo sde): mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing /thams cad kyi smon lam yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri na nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa'ang ma mchis shing /der byang chub
266b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od can dug skye bar gyur cig/gzhan yang 'od ji lta bu dag 'tshal ba de lta bu dag tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum tshun chad du'ang gtong bar gyur cig/

267a3(mdo sde): tu nam mkha'i dkyil nas sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag sgra 'khrol bar gyur cig/snrel snyan de dag las kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgro 'byung ba dang /
267a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'

267b1(mdo sde): dang /rtags de dag dang /mtshan ma de dag dang /gnas de dag dang /ngo mtshar de dag dang /smon lam de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mchis par gyur

272b7(mdo sde): 'jigs med ces bya ba la'ang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma lags kyi gang na sems
