273a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o zhes rgyal bu 'jigs med kyis de bzhin gshegaso pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pad+ma bzhag ste gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
273a4(mdo sde): 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bkod pa snang ba zhes bgyi ba thob
273a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing /des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skad dag tu'ang pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa'i
273a6(mdo sde): me tog gi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dog rab tu 'bengs par 'gyur la/bdag gis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/tshig de brjod ma thag tu sangs
273a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu pad+ma shing rta'i pang lo tsam pa'i me tog
273b1(mdo sde): gi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to//rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis de mthong nas shin tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes
273b2(mdo sde): par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ni shin tu smon lam bzang po btab ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang po'ang yongs su blangs//khyod
273b3(mdo sde): kyis tang nge 'dzin kyang shin tu myur bar thob/bden pa'i tshig gis pad+ma'i cher yang rab tu bab bo//des gsol pa/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
273b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/de'i slad du pad+ma 'di dag nam mkha' la gnas par gyur la/de ltar nam mkha' la gnas nas char bzhin du'ang bab
273b5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu nam mkha' la pad+ma dag gis shin tu myur bar rgyas btab pas na de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nam
273b6(mdo sde): mkha'i phyag rgya zhes bya bar gyur cig/nam mkha'i phyag rgya khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs med pa gnyis pa la
273b7(mdo sde): babang no shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/khyod der
274a1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa zhes
274a2(mdo sde): bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun yang chod med par 'gyur
274a3(mdo sde): la/khyod kyi tshe'ang dpag tu med par 'gyur te/ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
274a4(mdo sde): dpa' nu mo mkha'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyon mongs
274a5(mdo sde): rnyog pa zhi bar byed gyur cing //zhing rdul snyed kyi yon tan 'chad gyur pa//sngon gyi rgyal bzhin byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing //'gro ba dag la phan pa byed par 'gyur//
274a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu drug pa nam mkha' zhes bya ba la smras pa drang //sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'di 'ba' zhig tu mo lags kyi zhes
274a7(mdo sde): bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal
274b1(mdo sde): te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/de'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi nam mkha' thams cad las rin po che sna bdun
274b2(mdo sde): gyi gdugs gser gyi dra ba dag gis g.yogs pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu dag gis brgyan pa dag byung bar 'gyur zhing /gdugs dang /dril bu dang /dra ba de dag las
274b3(mdo sde): kyang 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar gyur cig/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /stobs kyi sgra dang /mngon
274b4(mdo sde): par shes pa'i sgra dang /mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dag 'byung zhing sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang sgra de lta bu dag thos par gyur cig/de dag gis thos nas kyang bla na med pa yang
274b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/sems can gang dag sngon 'dir sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
274b6(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/tshig de skad smras ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad las de lta bu'i sgra
274b7(mdo sde): dag byung ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus bdag nyid kyis kyang mthong nas des yang 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal
275a1(mdo sde): te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
275a2(mdo sde): spyan sngar ye shes rnam par snang byed ces bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'ad thob par 'gyur zhing des bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnams grub par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin thob nas
275a3(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag lung ston par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ye shes rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /bcom ldan
275a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//khyod kyis ni smon lam rgya chen po btab ste/khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa des phyogs bcu'i
275a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po dag tshad gcig tu gyu rol yid du 'ong ba'i sgo 'bum phrag mang po dag gos bskul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor rigs kyi
275a6(mdo sde): bu khyod rnam par snang byed ces bya bar gyur cig/rnam par snang byed khyed ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas grangs med pa gnyis
275a7(mdo sde): pa lo bab pa na shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi zla zhes bya ba zhig yod de/der khyod mngon par
275b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la dbang sgyur dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs
275b2(mdo sde): su ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag
275b3(mdo sde): byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/brtul zhugs bzang po rab dga' sems dul longs//bla med sangs rgyas byang chub ma gtogs
275b4(mdo sde): par/sems can dag la snying rje cher skyed la//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i mthar gnas sems can sgrol//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bdun pa yan
275b5(mdo sde): lag skyes zhes bya ba la smras pa dang /snga mo bzhin du sbyar te/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma lags kyi gang na sems can dmyal ba ma mchis pa
275b6(mdo sde): dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas ma mchis pa dang /go shin rje'i 'jig rten ma mchis pa dang /bud med ma mchis pa dang /sems can mngal na gnas po dag ma mchis pa
275b7(mdo sde): dang /ri rab ma michos pa dang /khor yug ma mchis pa dang /khor yug chen po dag ma mchis pa dang /brag dang ri dag ma mchis pa dang /mtho dman dang gseg ma dang /
276a1(mdo sde): gyo ma dang /tsher ma dang /chang tshing dag ma mchis pa dang /shing ljon pa dag ma mchis pa dang /rgya mtsho chen po dag ma mchis pa der byang chub
276a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/de na nyi ma dang zla ba dag ma mchis pa dang /skar ma'i gzugs rnams ma mchis pa dang /nyin mo dang mtshan mo ma mchis
276a3(mdo sde): pa dang /mun pa thibs po ma mchis pa dang /de ni sems can rnams la bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /michi la ma dang /snabs dag ma mchis pa dang /lus kyi
276a4(mdo sde): rdul dang /dri nga ba ma mchis pa dang /sems can rnams la lus ngal ba ma mchis pa dang /sems ngal ba ma mchis par gyur cig/de na 'thul ba ma mchis par
276a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/de na sa gzhi thams cad rin po che'i rdo'i snying po las grub par gyur cig/rin po che 'bum phrag du mas brgyan cing me tig man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dag
276a6(mdo sde): bkram par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan par gyur cig/rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs
276a7(mdo sde): kyi dri ba dag gis brgyan par gyur cig/rin po che sna tshogs kyi ras bcos bu dag dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos dag dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag dang /rin
276b1(mdo sde): po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag la me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs dang /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogasna dag dang /rin po
276b2(mdo sde): che'i snying sna tshogs dag dang /rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs dag gis brgyan par gyur cig/de na gang gi tshe me tog drag kha zums shing rol mo'i sgra dag mi grag pa ma gtogs
276b3(mdo sde): par mitshan mo mi mngon par gyur cig/me tog kha zums pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' dag skye bar gyur cig/der byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs
276b4(mdo sde): pa na ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin de thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag ni bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs
276b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cig/skad cig de nyid la gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi
276b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zheng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos 'chad pa thos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa thob par gyur
276b7(mdo sde): cig/sems can dag skyes ma thag tu thams cad kyis tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /de dag gis bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rjes su dran par
277a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/sems can de dag skyes ma thag tu thams cad kyi phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bgrod pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
277a2(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lha'i mig thob par gyur cig sems can de dag skyes ma thag tu thams cad kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
277a3(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems can thams cad sems kyi spyod pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sems
277a4(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad byang chub cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bor du ting nge 'dzin de chud mi za bar gyur cig/nang par sngar phyogs bzhi nas dri shin tu bda' zhing dga'
277a5(mdo sde): bar bgyid la 'jam zhing reg na bde ba'i bser ma'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur zhing me tog de dag kyang kha 'byed par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin de dag
277a6(mdo sde): las langs shing /me tog gi ze ba de dag las ldang bar gyur cig/gang gis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis phyogs ro rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
277a7(mdo sde): zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu mchis shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la phyag bgyis shing snyen bkur bgyis nas slar
277b1(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul yang thob par gyur cig/de na me tog man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po'i ze ba dag la skyil mo krung bcas te mchi bar 'gyur zhing
277b2(mdo sde): chos kyi bde ba yid la dgyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lte bar gyur cig/gang dang gang du mi chis sam ldog pa'i phyogs thams cad du bdag kyang mthong bar gyur cig/de na
277b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos rnams la nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom ji lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la bltas shing mthong ba
277b4(mdo sde): tsam gyis bral bar gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag chos bstan pa ji lta bu dge 'tshal ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa dag bdag la bltas pa tsam
277b5(mdo sde): gyis 'tshal bar gyur cig/de na sems can rnams bdag gi ba ma mchis shing /yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing /tha na rang gi lus dang srog la'ang don du
277b6(mdo sde): gnyer ba ma mchis par gyur cig/de na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyir mi ldog par sha stag tu gyur cig/de ni mi dge ba'i ming yang ma mchis par gyur cig/sangs
277b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na bslab pa len pa'i ming yang ma mchis la/ltung byed las slong ba'i bar gyi bka' mchod kyang ma mchis par gyur cig/sems can thams cad skyes bu chen
278a1(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur cig/thams cad sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/de na byang chub cing yongs su mya
278a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can gcig kyang dbang po ma tshang bar ma gyur cig/de ni sems can thams cad skye bregs shing gos ngur smrig sar pa dag 'tshal bzhin
278a3(mdo sde): du skye bar gyur cig/shin tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du'ang chud mi za bar gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad
278a4(mdo sde): kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad la na ba dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal ma mchis par gyur cig/sems can
278a5(mdo sde): gang dag tshe yongs su bas par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang skyil mo krung gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing rang gi lus las mye'i khams byung ste/des rang
278a6(mdo sde): gi lus sregs par gyur nas phyogs bzhi nas bser ma drag longs shing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sku gdung de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu 'thor zhing /'di
278a7(mdo sde): lta ste dper bgyi na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag kyang byung bar gyur cig/de na sems can gang dag gis
278b1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i 'od de dag mthong bar gyur tam/nor bu rin po che de dag mthong bar gyur tam/de dag la reg par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang byang chub cing yongs
278b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das kyi dar du sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal mi myong bar gyur cing //de dgo de nas shi 'phos
278b3(mdo sde): nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag zhugs te 'tsho ning dgazhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa der skye bar gyur cig/sems can de dag der skyes nas kyang
278b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos par 'gyur zhing de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed par yang gyur cig/sems bskyed ma thag tu bla na myed pa yang dog par rdzogs
278b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can 'ga' yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /gcig la
278b6(mdo sde): gcig 'gums par 'gyur ba'i gnod sems kyi sems dang ma bral bar 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par ma gyur cig/de sman chad mi khom pa rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/sangs
278b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur
279a1(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/de na sems can thams cad tha ba dang zhe sdang ba dang /'chab pa dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang bral bar
279a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnam par spangs par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis glang bar gyur
279a3(mdo sde): cog/sems can gang dag der skye bar 'gyur ba dag 'jam pa'i sems dang /mnyen pa'i sems dang /khon med pa'i sems dang /gdug pa med pa'i sems dang //
279a4(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'od gsal bar gyur cig/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
279a5(mdo sde): de yon tan chen po bkod pa dang ldan par gyur cig/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas kyang bda' zhing des khyab
279a6(mdo sde): par gyur cig/de na sems can dag rtag tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra'ong ma grag par gyur cig/ji srid du bdag
279a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jog par 'gyur ba de
279b1(mdo sde): srid du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems can de lta bu dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par bkod la de'i 'og tu
279b2(mdo sde): bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yong dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o//bdag byang chub thob pa na 'od dpag tu ma mchis par
279b3(mdo sde): gyur cig/phyogs bcu gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu bdag gi lus mtshan gyis brgyan pa gda' bar gyur cig/de na sems can gang
279b4(mdo sde): gis bdag mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /phrag dog dang /nga rgyal dang /'chab bya dang /
279b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo
279b6(mdo sde): rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'tshal bya de lta bu dag kyang bdag mthong bas thob par gyur cig/de na sems can gang dag grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes par gyur pa de dag gis kyang
279b7(mdo sde): bdag mthong bas bde ba'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /'di lta ste dper bgyi na dge slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs po de lta bu'i bde ba'i tshor ba thob
280a1(mdo sde): par gyur cig/de dag gis bdag mthong nas lus dang sems kyi bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
280a2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing /der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso ba'i byang chub las
280a3(mdo sde): slar mi ldog par gyur cig/sems can gang dag yi dgas kyi gnas rnams skyo skyes par gyur pa dag gis kyang bdag mthong bar gyur cing snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/bla na
280a4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams la'ang brjod par bgyi'o//lha rnams la'ang
280a5(mdo sde): de bzhin te/bdag gi 'od kyang nyes 'gyur du snang bar gyur cig/bdag gi tshe'ang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur la/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par su sa
280a6(mdo sde): kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thog par gyur cig/bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gzhan dag
280a7(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis gang dag bsgrags par 'gyur ba bdag gi bsngags pa brjod par gyur cig/de na sems can gang dag gis bdag gi bsngags
280b1(mdo sde): pa thos par gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo b.ru gyur cig/de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams
280b2(mdo sde): dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ma gtogs pa dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/bdag byang chub thob pa na
280b3(mdo sde): gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis bdag gi ming thos par 'gyur zhing bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba 'tshal bar
280b4(mdo sde): gyur cig/de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na'ang bdag tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing rab rib ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/gang sems can de dag
280b5(mdo sde): gi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i legs pa bshad pas sems can de dag tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/dad pa de nyid kyis sems med pa zhes bgyi ba'i
280b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/sems dga' ba'i chos kyis bzod pa'ang thob par gyur cig/'gum pa'i dus dgyes nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/
280b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na sems can gang dag nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /theg pa gsum don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /lha dang mi'i phun sum chags pa dag
281a1(mdo sde): don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /dge ba yongs su btsal ba don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po don du mi gnyer ba
281a2(mdo sde): rnams dang /chos ma lags pa dang /'dod chags la chags pa rnams dang /'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang /chos log pas sems dkris pa de
281a3(mdo sde): drag 'bum pa'i dus kyi tshe na bdag tshogs du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du mchis nas 'od dang ting nge 'dzin gyis chos ston par gyur cig/de dag la bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
281a4(mdo sde): zhing yang ston par gyur cig/byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar yang gyur cig/sems can de dag kyang bdag la mchog tu dga' zhing dang ba thob par gyur nas
281a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/de dag gis ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i sgrol ma thob par gyur nas
281a6(mdo sde): gti mug spangs par gyur cig/de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes
281a7(mdo sde): bu dam pa legs so legs so//khyod kyis ni smon lam bzang por btab bo//des gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag smon la mi de lta bu yongs
281b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab
281b2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/sems can gang dag gis dro de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/bdag
281b3(mdo sde): gis kyang ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur cig/de'ang bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bu dris ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang ba bskyed pa dang sangs
281b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char bab pa de'ang bdag nyid kyis mthong la phyogs bcu'i phyogs
281b5(mdo sde): re rer yang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa gang dag gi thal mo sbyar te byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang mthong ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
281b6(mdo sde): bu shin tu myur bar spos kyi char yang bab la sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang byang chubo yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod seng ge spos zhes bya
281b7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/seng ge spos khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi
282a1(mdo sde): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa der 'jig rten gyi khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral
282a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/seng ge spos khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
282a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba rdul bral spos mthong dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de
282a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' seng gre'i spos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos
282a5(mdo sde): de la bka' stsal pa/lha mi lha min rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba longs//srid pa'i 'gro bar sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis sgrol//srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs
282a6(mdo sde): 'ching ba khyod kyis tshong //mi yi rgyal ba 'phags pa'i gang zag nyid du 'gyur//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu brgyad pa gnod pa med ces bya ba la snga
282a7(mdo sde): ma bzhin du sbyar ro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can khro sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul bral ci 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar
282b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
282b2(mdo sde): dpa' dag gis khyab par gnas par 'gyur ba srid du byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na slad kyis bdag
282b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
282b4(mdo sde): dag mi spyod pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i' spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag lo bdun po 'di la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs
282b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su dag pa la sems shing mchis pa na/bdag gis ting
282b6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin khri chig stong bskyed cing thob ste bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub
282b7(mdo sde): sems dper gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lags so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dge na
283a1(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston pa de dag dang /gang dag dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i sangs
283a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su gtams pa de dag mthong zhing der 'jug par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge
283a3(mdo sde): 'dzin des podag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cig/
283a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gnas ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kyis re re la'ang phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig/re re la'ang bdag gi lus re res
283a5(mdo sde): rin po che dang /me tog sna tshogs bla na ma mchis pa dag dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /phye ma dang /byug pa dang /rol mo'i sgra bla na ma mchis pa sna tshogs bkod
283a6(mdo sde): pa bla na ma mchis pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu'ang bdag bskal pa rgya mtsho bye ba snyed du spyod par gyur cig/gang gi tshe bdag gis lus
283a7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas re re'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi zhong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'tshal bar
283b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin yon tan 'byung gnas kyis de dag gis re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bstod pa bla na ma mchis pa dag gis
283b2(mdo sde): bstod par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig mi 'dzum pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdul gcig gi steng du sems kyi tshad kyis rgyal ba rnams kyis gtams pa'i sangs rgyas
283b3(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
283b4(mdo sde): cad dag na 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/btsun
283b5(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can dmyal ba rnams su zhugs te sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su sprul nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i
283b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig/de na sems can de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/de nas
283b7(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos nyan
284a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur cig/dud 'gro rnams la'ang de bzhin/yi dgas rnams la'ang de bzhin/gnod sbyin
284a2(mdo sde): rnams la'ang de bzhin/srin po rnams la'ang de bzhin/lha ma yin rnams la'ang de bzhin/klu rnams la'ang de bzhin/ma 'am ci rnams la'ang de bzhin/lto'i phye
284a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams la'ang de bzhin/sha za rnams la'ang de bzhin/srul po rnams la'ang de bzhin/lus srul po rnams la'ang de bzhin/mi gdol pa rnams la'ang de
284a4(mdo sde): bzhin/tshong pa rnams dang /smad 'tshong ma rnams la'ang de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das sems can rigs ji lta bur skyes pa rnams dang /de dag gis lus ji lta bu
284a5(mdo sde): thob pa dang /sems can las kyi rkyen ji lta bus bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba rnams dang /bzo'i gnas ji lta bu dag dang /las kyi gnas ji lta bu dag la chags
284a6(mdo sde): pa rnams la de lta bu'i lus su sprul nas/bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas de lta bu dag la brtson pa ston par bgyid cing /de lta bu'i yi ge brjod pas sems can rnams kyi
284a7(mdo sde): sems mgu bar bgyid cing chos kyang ston par gyur cig/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud pa dang rab tu 'god par yang
284b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
284b2(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu po thams cad dag na sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la'ang ci nas kyang sngon gyi las dang /nyon mongs pa ma lus par 'gyur ba dang /sems can 'ga'i
284b3(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud kyi lam yang bdud bzhis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad
284b4(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//de'i slad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri'ang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po skar me'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul
284b5(mdo sde): bral gyi yon tan bkod pa ci 'ad ba de ltar yongs su dag par 'jog par gyur cig/de bzhin du bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /bdag gi 'khor yang ji ltar byang chub
284b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge spos kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin du gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du
284b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag gi sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/thams cad kyang sems mnyen par gyur cig/sems las su rung
285a1(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/rang rang gi gling bzhi pa dag na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/sems can de dag la rin po che sna tshogs dag dang /me
285a2(mdo sde): tog dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag bdog par gyur la/des sems can de dag sangs rgyas de dag la'ang
285a3(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod
285a4(mdo sde): pa'i mthus bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig/tshig de brjod ma thag tu ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
285a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu khyod ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khor khar yug tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khri 'jog par 'gyur
285a6(mdo sde): ro//sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med
285a7(mdo sde): pa dag la mchod pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag byed par yang spro bar yang 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig/kun tu bzang
285b1(mdo sde): po khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
285b2(mdo sde): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi chu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/kun tu bzang
285b3(mdo sde): po khyod ni der bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
285b4(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285b5(mdo sde): po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/
285b6(mdo sde): brtul zhugs bzang po rab tu dga' ba sems dul longs//dam bcas brtan pa sems can rnams kyi rgyud sbyongs la//khyod kyis sems can nyon mongs mi bzad klung las sgrol///
285b7(mdo sde): khyed ni 'jig rten ye shes sgron mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur//rigs kyi bu'ang de'i tshe na srog chags la lo can khris tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom
286a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing yongs
286a2(mdo sde): su dag par 'jog par 'gyur ba na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas su 'gyur bar
286a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o//de ltar bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin
286a4(mdo sde): po che'i snying pos srog chags khri bo de dag la 'di skad ces lung bstan te/glang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
286a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kho ra khor yug dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
286a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/stong stong zhing mtshon mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//'di lta ste stong ni de bzhin gshegs po mi lce thab khung
286a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin
286b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shin tu dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa gya nom 'jigs med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po
286b2(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri med dbyangs kyi gzi brjid dpung phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//lta brgya 'ong mtshan mthun te/'di lta
286b3(mdo sde): ste nyi ma'i dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du nyis stong lnga brgya ni 'dzegs bral glags bya'i rgyal po dang /'od zer bral dang /'od zer bral ba'i dbyangs dang /grags
286b4(mdo sde): pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs dang /rnam grol chos grags dbyangs dang /snying po grags pa'i rgyal po dang /rin chen rgyal mtshan dang /snang ba'i dbang phyug dang /thub chen
286b5(mdo sde): ye shes 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dang /gnas kyi gos bsogs rgyal po dang /ye shes blo gros bsam yas snying po dang /ye shes lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /ye shes rgya mtsho'i
286b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /brtson 'grus chen po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang /lhun po'i dpal lta bu dang /ye shes rdul bral shugs dang /ci'i dbang phyugs sa bon dang /ye shes
286b7(mdo sde): shin tu dri med sgrogs pa'i dbang phyug dang /yon tan rgya mtsho'i zil mnan rgyal po dang /ye shes 'byung ba stobs kyi rgyal po dang /byang chub rdul bral rgyal po dang /thub
287a1(mdo sde): pa dpal brtsegs shugs kyi me tog dang /ye shes dpal brtsegs blo dang /rdo rje seng ge dang /tshul khrims 'od gsal dang /bzang mchog dang /
287a2(mdo sde): 'od zer mtha' yas dang /seng ge dga' dang /ye shes mi zad brtsegs dang /rin chen snang ba dang /ye shes dri med dang /ye shes rgyas pa dang /seng ge
287a3(mdo sde): grags pa dang /mngon shes yon tan rgyal po drang /chos kyi sna ma'i me tog char 'bebs dang /'od byed dang /lhun po mngon 'phags dang /chos yang dag 'phags
287a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dri med dang /spos kyi dbang phyug dang /dri med spyan dang /rab tu che bsags dang /thogs med stobs kyi rgyal po dang /rang gi ye shes bsod nams stobs dang /
287a5(mdo sde): ye shes chos gos dang /dbang sgyur dang /chags mod pham bzhed dang /ye shes yang dag 'byung dang /lhun po chen po dang /stobs kyi snying po dang /yon tan
287a6(mdo sde): 'byung gnas dang /khro shing me tog rgyal mtshan dang /yon tan 'od dang /gti mug rnam bral yon tan rgyal po dang /rdo rje mchog dang /chos kyi rtog dang /dbyangs
287a7(mdo sde): kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /legs sbas dang /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang /rin chen dbang phyug dang /mngon 'phags rgyal mtshan dang /ri bo lta bu dang /dga'
287b1(mdo sde): sprin dang /chos byed dang /sA la'i rgyal po dang /kun skyed dang /rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang /ye shes yang dag bsags dang /ye shes 'od 'phro dang /me tog tshogs
287b2(mdo sde): can dang /glang po che'i dbang phyug dang /u dum+WA ra'i me tog dang /gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang /tsan+dan dang /shin
287b3(mdo sde): tu brtan pa dang /mthus gnon dang /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sgron ma dang /ye shes go rims dang /rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan dang /rnam rgyal chos glags dang /nga rgyal
287b4(mdo sde): sgrogs dang /yon tan 'od 'phro dang /ye shes 'od dang /ye shes sgron ma dang /bde ba'i rgyal po dang /ye shes dbyangs dang /rgyal mtshan bsdus pa dang /rdo
287b5(mdo sde): rje'i sgron ma dang /bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /rgyal ba'i grangs dang /rab tu brtan pa dang /blo gros zla ba'i rgyal po dang /rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang /sA la'i
287b6(mdo sde): dbang po seng ge'i sgra dang /sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal po'i snying po dang /yon tan rin chen yang dag bsags dang /skar ma'i snying po dang /skar ma rnam 'jog grags
287b7(mdo sde): pa dang /bsod nams stobs sA la'i rgyal po dang /yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /tshangs mchog dang /yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang
288a1(mdo sde): stod ni spos kyi pad+ma nAm rgya la grags du'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /snang ba'i rgyal po dang /spos kyi pad+ma ngam
288a2(mdo sde): pa'i shugs dang /yon tan rgya rmi che'i mtha' yas ye shes bla ma dang /dzen+d+ra'i grib ma dang /yon tan ri ba'i rgyal mtshan+da dang /seng ge'i tog dang /klus spangs
288a3(mdo sde): me tog gzi brjid rgyal po dang /dri zhim sa bon bdag med dang /yon tan bdud rtsi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs
288a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos sbyin rgyal po klu dbang rnam grol sang byed 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i mig gi ri bo zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te/'jig rten
288a5(mdo sde): gyi khams gzhan dang /gzhan dag tu nyi ma gcig dang /dus gci tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /che'i
288a6(mdo sde): tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro//srog chags khri bo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgos gtugs pa dang /de
288a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/klu ltar brtan par sgrogs pa dag ni re shig longs//dge ba'i nor rnams dag ni yang dag sogs gyis la/
288b1(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pa rnams la myur du brtson gyis dang //lha mi 'jig rten rnams kyi 'dren pa dag tu 'gyur///bam po bdun pa//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho
288b2(mdo sde): rdul gyis rgyal bu dgu pa sdig med ces bya ba la smras pa/snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/des gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod
288b3(mdo sde): pa na/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag no/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams bdag/
288b4(mdo sde): gi dbang lagros par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyi ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grang bdag gis khyod kyi spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed
288b5(mdo sde): pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni 'gyod pa'i sems skye bor

293b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi khor yug dag tu gang du mi de dag chab kyi bya ba bgyid par 'gyur bar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chub kyis yongs su bltam pa'i rdzing

293b5(mdo sde): dag gi bar yang blangs te thogs par gyur cig/bdag gi byang chub kyi shing ni rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur la/'phang du ni dpag tshad stong mchis/sdong po'i sboms
293b6(mdo sde): su dpag tshad gcig mchis/yal gA gyes pa'i khyon du'ang dpag chad stong mchis par gyur cig/byang chub kyi shing de bser mes bskyod pa las pha rol tu phyin pa dang /mngon
293b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra lha'i las shin tu 'das pa 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/sems can
294a1(mdo sde): gang dag gis sgra de thos par gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi dran pa so sor thob par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med rnams
294a2(mdo sde): ni 'di lta ste/dper bgyin dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mo ltar yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/de na bud med rnamasA la dI nga bya ma mchis shing /lce gnyis

294a4(mdo sde): na skyes pa gang dag kun tu chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur na/de mchis te kun chugs pa'i sems kyis yud tsam zhig bud med la bltas pas skyes pa'i 'dod chags rab
294a5(mdo sde): tu zho bar gyur nas shin tu yid byung ste/slar log cing gtsang ma rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin des bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs
294a6(mdo sde): su grol nas slan chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye bar gyur cig/de na bud med gang lags pa de dag kun tu chags pas skyes pa la brtags pa tsam gyis sbrum par 'gyur
294a7(mdo sde): zhing /brtags pa tsam gyis gnyis ka'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u 'am/bu mo gang lags pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste dper bgyi no//
294b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong ba de lta bu'i lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig/sangs
294b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang /bu mo dag gdugs mtshan bdun du de lta bu'i 'dre ba nyams su myong bar gyur cig/bud med sgyu mo ma de dag kyang 'di lta ste/dper
294b3(mdo sde): bgyi na dge slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig/sems can de dag kyang mngal gyi dri ma dang /mi gtsang bas gos par
294b4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhing /dgung bdun pa la mchog tu dri bda' ba dang /bde ba'i yo byad dam pa dang ldan bzhin du btsa' bar gyur cig/bud med de'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar
294b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhing gnyis kau rdzing bur zhugs te khrus bgyis nas/bud med des gang gis 'dod chags dang bral ba gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngan pa thob par
294b6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin des 'dod chags kyi chos rnams las yongs su grol zhing rtag par rgyun du mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig/gang gis tshe rabs snga ma dag la bskal
294b7(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag mang por bud med kyi lus nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsogs pa gang lags pas kyang ting nge 'dzin de mngon par bsgrub pas bud med
295a1(mdo sde): kyi lus thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su bas par 'gyur zhing /yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du slan chad bud med kyi lus thob par ma gyur cig/

295a4(mdo sde): zhing mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/der sems can de dag gi las de thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su byas par gyur cing /sems can de dag byang chub kyi

295b1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra skad nyams dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur cig/sgra des mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin des
