302a1(mdo sde): de'i slad du kun dga'i ra ba 'di thams cad du mug tig dmar po'i char dag rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang
302a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs
302a3(mdo sde): la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du mu tig dmar po'i tshor dag kyang rab tu bab/shing ljon pa de thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i
302a4(mdo sde): sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/mthu mchog mi zad shes rab mdzod longs shig/sems can snying brtse phan
302a5(mdo sde): 'dod byams pa'i sems//khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa rdzogs 'gyur te//'jig rten sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur//bram ze'i bu gnyis pa yang dag 'byung
302a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis ji lta ba de bzhin du gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/bram ze'i khye'u khyod
302a7(mdo sde): kyang bskal pa ut+pa la yang dag rtog lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu'i lo brgyad khrir 'phel ba na de bzhin
302b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/gsum pas kyang gsol pa dang /lo nyis stong pa na
302b2(mdo sde): skar ma'i dri zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//de bzhin du sbyar te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sna mi'i me tog dang /ri bo'i
302b3(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /smon bsdams dang /chings mchog dang /d+hUm+b+ha'i grib ma dang /gang ba dang /thi mo dang /rin che ni ri bo dang /rgya mtsho'i snying po dang /sred med kyi bla dang /
302b4(mdo sde): gtsug tor can dang /ge ser thub dang /thub dbang dang /kauN+Di n+yas dang /seng ge'i rtsal dang /ye shes rgyal mtshan dang /sangs rgyas sgrogs dang /gzhan gyis mi
302b5(mdo sde): thub pa dang /rgyas pa dang /rgyal ba dang /phan bzhed dang /shes rab snang dang /dbang chen dang /zhi ba dang /shes rab 'byung gnas dang /dga' ba dang /n+ya gro
302b6(mdo sde): d+ha rgyal po dang /gser spyan dang /phan bcas dang /gaunyi dga' dang /rin chen gtsug tor can dang /spyan bzang dang /tshangs pa dang /mdzes pa dang /tshangs pa khyu
302b7(mdo sde): mchog dang /sgra rab dang /chos kyi zla ba dang /don mthong dang /snyan pa dang /dga' can dang /grags mchog dang /gzugs bzang dang /dri zhim dang /grims g.yar dang /
303a1(mdo sde): rab mchog spyan dang /rab stong dang /don bcas brtul zhugs dang /thugs kyi re ba bzang dang /shes rab mchog dang /gsar gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
303a2(mdo sde): spyan mdzes dang /dag pa'i lha dang /zas gtsang dang /legs mthong lha dang /'phags skyes rgyal mtshan dang /mig mi bzang dang /tshangs dbyangs dang /dpal
303a3(mdo sde): 'byung dang /nga rgyal dpal dang /rdul bral dang /nor bu bzang dang /'od zer can dang /shAkya thub pa dang /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang /bde 'byung dang /thu bo dang /
303a4(mdo sde): yang dag 'byung dang /me tog dang /yang dag me tog dang /mi 'khrugs pa dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang /klus byin dang /rdo rje'i 'od dang /
303a5(mdo sde): grags pa'i rgyal po dang /stag gi 'od zer dang /spyod bcas dang /ye shes 'byung dang /spos kyi dbang phyug dang /sA la'i dbang po dang /sred med kyi bu'i snying po
303a6(mdo sde): dradang /skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu thams cad kyi tha chung 'jigs pa'i gdung bral zhes bya ba gang
303a7(mdo sde): yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying nge'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i khye'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag
303b1(mdo sde): thams cad bskal pa ut+pa la yang dag rtog gi'ang skye ba gnyis pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa lags
303b2(mdo sde): pas na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/bskal pa ut+pa la yang dag rtog bas par 'gyur ba
303b3(mdo sde): na thams cad kyi tha mar byang chub mchog la reg par gyur cig/sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dbu po de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam
303b4(mdo sde): du gyur cig/de dag gi 'dul ba ji snyed mchis par gyur pa dang /ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur ba bdag gcig pu'i yang de snyed du gyur cing //
303b5(mdo sde): ji ltar de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed mchis par 'gyur ba bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig/sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po
303b6(mdo sde): de dag byung ba'i bskal pa ut+pa la yang dag rtog de la sems can gang dag gis mi'i lus thob par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa bas par 'gyur ba na bdag bla na med pa
303b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas theg pa gsum po dag gi nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag
304a1(mdo sde): gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
304a2(mdo sde): lung bstan du gsol//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jigs pa'i gdung bral la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa khyod
304a3(mdo sde): sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la snying rje zhing phan par byed par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so//bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grongs
304a4(mdo sde): med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa ut+pa la yang dag rtog de zad kar thams cad
304a5(mdo sde): kyi tha maro khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral yang dag 'phags mngon
304a6(mdo sde): 'phags zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//ji ltar sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag gi tshe bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod gcig
304a7(mdo sde): bu'i yang bskal pa phyed du 'gyur te/ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro//des gsol pa/btsun pa
304b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltan/de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
304b2(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri thams cad du me tog sngon po'i char shin tu dri bda' ba dag 'bab par gyur cig/sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams
304b3(mdo sde): cad kyi khams rnams rab tu drang zhing mi mthun pa mi mchis par gyur cig/sems can thams cad kyi nang rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i
304b4(mdo sde): khye'u 'jigs pa'i gdung bral gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du me tog sngon po'i
304b5(mdo sde): tshor dag kyang rab tu bab/sems can thams cad kyis kyang de de tshor bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams kyang snyoms shing mo mthun pa med par gnas par gyur/de na
304b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/snying rje brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs
304b7(mdo sde): shig/'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing //nyon mongs g.yo mdud dam po gcod 'gyur te//dge ba dam pa shes rab mdzad du 'gyur///
305a1(mdo sde): bam po brgyad pa//rigs kyi bu bram ze de'i slob ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga'i ra ba'i sgron 'dug pa de dag gis kyang sems can 'ongs pa rnams gsum la
305a2(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la smras pa/kye bram ze'i khye'u dag bla
305a3(mdo sde): no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang longs shig/smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa
305a4(mdo sde): dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob cig/de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa/lam ji lta bu dang /tshogs ji lta bu dang /spyod pa ji lta bu dang /
305a5(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang chub 'thob par 'gyur lags/mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi zad
305a6(mdo sde): pa'i mdzod bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /shes
305a7(mdo sde): rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa ste/rigs kyi bu lam de ni de lta bu yin no//bram ze'i khye'u de bzhin gshegs
305b1(mdo sde): pas kyang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba tshogs nyams su len par byed pa/chos kyi sgo sbyin pa'i tshogs yongs su gtong
305b2(mdo sde): bar byed de/des ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs
305b3(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
305b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur
305b5(mdo sde): ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i
305b6(mdo sde): tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro//
305b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung
306a1(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
306a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni 'dul ba li ma skyo bar byed par
306a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms
306a4(mdo sde): kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro///
306a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas
306a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba sgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed
306a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo gros
306b1(mdo sde): byebrag 'byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa
306b2(mdo sde): nye bar bzhog pa'i tshigs ni lus dang /tshor bya dang /sems dang /chos la so sor rtog par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi yang dag pa'i stong ba'i tshogs
306b3(mdo sde): na dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang /sems yang byi nyid
306b4(mdo sde): du byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sdom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs
306b5(mdo sde): ninyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yon lag gi tshogs ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par byed par 'gyur
306b6(mdo sde): ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying por byed pa drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/bram ze'i khyo
306b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnam par dag pasdud pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su lon par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no//des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs ni longs
307a1(mdo sde): spyod chen po dang /g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /thos pas ni
307a2(mdo sde): shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /dad pa dang /'tsho ba dang /sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed par bstan to//mdun na 'don gyis smras pa dang /bram ze'i khye'u
307a3(mdo sde): gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/bram ze'i khye'u de'ang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang drug byang chub kyi lam la zhugs/
307a4(mdo sde): pa de dag gis ni dul ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//zhi gnas kyi sems kyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o//rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal
307a5(mdo sde): bar bya'o//snying rje chen po'i sems kyis bsgom pa bsgom par bya'o//chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang /ye shes dang /thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub
307a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/bram ze'i khye'u de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no//tshogs de lta bus byang chub thob par 'gyur te/bram ze'i
307a7(mdo sde): khye'u ro sgom pa ni de lta bu yin/dran pa ni de lta bu yin/byang chub kyi lamau gyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyis/bram ze'i khye'u byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed cig/bram ze'i khye'u
307b1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam ni dag pa yin gyis ngasam pa thag pa nas smon lam thob cig dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bram ze'i khye'u bsam pa tha ga ngas byang chub kyi lam ni dang ba yin
307b2(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u g.yo med pas rnam par dag pa ste/nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal bas byang chub kyi lam ni grang ba yin no//bram ze'i khye'u bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
307b3(mdo sde): pa'i mthar thug pos byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang /bde ba yin gyis smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa'am/yongs su ma dag
307b4(mdo sde): pa ji lta bu 'dod pa long zhig/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sbur pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
307b5(mdo sde): btsugs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/sems
307b6(mdo sde): can 'dod chags chung ba rnams dang /zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang /gti mug chung ba rnams dang /sems 'khrul pa me mchis zhing ma 'khrul pa rnamaso dang /'khan pa'i
307b7(mdo sde): sems ma mchis pa rnams dang /phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems rnam par spangs pa rnams dang /log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang /yang dag pa'i
308a1(mdo sde): lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang /dge bar sems pa rnams dang /dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang /ngan song gsum gyi lam
308a2(mdo sde): rnam par spong bar sems pa rnams dang /mtho ris kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams dang /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba'i
308a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang /theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems dpa' rnams kyi slad du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla na med
308a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par
308a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur cig/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de'i
308a6(mdo sde): lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo thal dkar yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas/des smras pa/khyed cag cung zad tsam zhig thams
308a7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la dang la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char shin tu dri zhim pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sems
308b1(mdo sde): can thams cad sad par gyis shig/de'i thigs pas sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig/de'i thigs pas sems can gang dag gi lus la phog gam/gang dag
308b2(mdo sde): gis dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi sgrib pa lnga spangs par gyur cig/'di lta ste 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig/gnod sems dang /rmugs pa dang /gnyid
308b3(mdo sde): dang /rgod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /the tshom gyi sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu glang po che de dag steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar mgyogs par
308b4(mdo sde): dong ste/'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyang pa las bskum pa'am/bskum pa las brkyang ba de bzhin du de ltar mgyogs par dong nas/glang po
308b5(mdo sde): che'i gtso bo dag gis ji skad sngor smras pa'i bya ba dge byas nas phyir log ste de'i mdun du 'khod do//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shin tu yid dga'
308b6(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dang /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal po/rigs kyi bu khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskol pa grangs med pa gad+hA'i klung blo bye ma snyed
308b7(mdo sde): gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa sgra snang zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs
309a1(mdo sde): pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub
309a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag ldes gtugs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
309a3(mdo sde): pos bka' stsal pa/rdul dang rnam bral sems can rnam dag longs//khyod kyi sems can bye mang lung bstan to//byang chub phyir ni rab dag lam sbyong zhing //rgyal
309a4(mdo sde): mchog sems can rnams kyi 'dren par 'gyur//de bzhin du sbyar te/bram ze'i khye'u stong dang /bram ze'i khye'u bye ngo phrag gsum po gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi
309a5(mdo sde): zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lami btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstan te/tha ma ni sangs
309a6(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /gtsug tor tson dang /thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro//bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de dag thams cad las gang dag rig byed
309a7(mdo sde): klog pa'i bram ze stong zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol pa/bdog ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs me lnga dang ldan par bla na med
309b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur cig/'dod chags bdo ba dang /zhe sdang 'dro ba dang /gti mug bdo ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/
309b2(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa/kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dngang ji zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs mA lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs
309b3(mdo sde): par bgyi lags/'dun na 'don gyis smras pa/snying rje chen po dang /ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par byang chub
309b4(mdo sde): thob par byed cing /sems can skyabs med pa rnams dang /dpung gnyen med po rnams dang /nyon mongs pa dag gis gtses pa rnams dang /lte bas nyin mongs par
309b5(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams kyi don byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god
309b6(mdo sde): par byed cing sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim par byed do zhes grag ste/gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam
309b7(mdo sde): 'debs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po yin par snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/khyab 'jug rlung khyod ni
310a1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa
310a2(mdo sde): na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyu la mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
310a3(mdo sde): skyes bu dom pa khyod der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba
310a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//khyab 'jug rlung gis gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par
310a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta na/de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bsod nams brgya'i
310a6(mdo sde): mtshan gyis brgyan pa gnyis bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u khyab 'jug rlung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
310a7(mdo sde): gtugs pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs po rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' khyab 'jug rlung gi spyi bo ro zhabs gnyis bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/snying rje'i bsam
310b1(mdo sde): pa shes rab rnon po longs//byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod gyis la//brtan pa nyon mongs 'ching ba dam chod cig/khyod ni phan pas snying brtse sangs rgyas 'gyur//
310b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la pus mo g.yas po'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gsol pa/btsun pa
310b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang
310b4(mdo sde): dang /gti mug gi sems cha mnyam pa rnams dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bsam pa la mi gnas pa'i skye dgu tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
310b5(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka'o stsal pa/bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
310b6(mdo sde): 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mi mjed ces bya bar 'gyur te/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ma mjed ces bya zhe na//
310b7(mdo sde): sems can de dag 'dod chags la mi mjed pa dang /de dag zhe sdang la mi mjed pa dang /gti mug la mi mjed pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams la mi mdzad
311a1(mdo sde): pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bskal pa chen po bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur
311a2(mdo sde): te/ci'i phyir bzang po zhes bya zhe na/bskal pa chen po bzang po de la sems can 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi nang du rdzogs pa'i sangs
311a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po byung zhing /skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri
311a4(mdo sde): thob pa na thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba
311a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing /theg pa gsumo po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur te/'khor ba'i chu bos 'das pa'i sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa
311a6(mdo sde): dag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'god par yang 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma skyong gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin
311a7(mdo sde): pab che'i snying po'i zhangs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u gnyis pa tam bu ru zhes bya ba'ang
311b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams su sbyor
311b2(mdo sde): zhing 'jig rten gyi skye dgu tshe lo sum khri thub pa ni sangs rgyas su 'byung bar gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni bskal pa
311b3(mdo sde): grangs med pa gad+hI klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la brub pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung
311b4(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
311b5(mdo sde): rgyas gser thub ces bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du sgra rnam par gragaso par 'gyur ro//nges bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan po thos nas/de bzhin gshegs pa rin
311b6(mdo sde): blo che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyug 'tshal te bsko ba byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das
311b7(mdo sde): kyisku la 'thor zhing thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/shin tu 'brel ba legs bsgrags rab snyan gsung ba po//ma
312a1(mdo sde): 'khrul ma 'dres ma rtogs dri ma mo mnga' ba//khyad 'phags shin tu sdom brtan ba blugs ldan//drang srong dam pa khyod mdzes zlab gtso khyu mchog
312a2(mdo sde): lags//yon tan brgyus bltam yon tan mang po stsol ba khyod//thub mchog bde ba mdzad pa mi yi dam pas btud//srid pa gsum no khyod 'dra'i sems can gzhan
312a3(mdo sde): mA mchis//deng khyod sems can mang po byang chub la mA lung bstan//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u kun gyis bsrungs zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
312a4(mdo sde): snying po'i spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'u bzhog ste/rin thang 'bum gyi bsham pas bshams nas khri'u de la gser gyi lhung bzed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang
312a5(mdo sde): ba dang /gser gyi ril bi b+hing ga ra dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdong dag bzhag ste/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas des gsol pa//
312a6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni bskalnga pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung
312a7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po de la tshe 'grib pa dang /rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang /sems can 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /
312b1(mdo sde): gti mug bdo zhing /nga rgyal dang /phrag dog dang /ser snas kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /sems can log par lta ba dang /mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang //
312b2(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems kun nas langs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsi ba'i sems yongs su nyams pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems rnam par spangs pa dang /log pas 'tsho
312b3(mdo sde): zhing mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan par 'gyur zhing /de bzhin
312b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa gser thub yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/dam pa'i chos nub nas 'jig rten long bar 'gyur zhing /'dren pa ma mchis pa skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na bdag bla
312b5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze kun gyi bsrungs
312b6(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/bram ze legs so legs so//skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa'i bar dang /'jig rten long bar
312b7(mdo sde): gyur cing 'dren pa med pa'i nang du smon lam btab pa ni rtogs pa che zhing ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mkhas mdzad snying rje rten ces bya bar gyur cig/
313a1(mdo sde): mkhas mdzod snying rje rten khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskul pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs myed pa gnyis pa la bab pa
313a2(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du bskal po bzang po byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs po 'od srungs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du
313a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas mdzod snying rje rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs lo yan lag ldes phyag byas te
313a4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /phye ma dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad
313a5(mdo sde): po 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//mi mchog phan pa mdzad pa dga' bar bgyid pa skyed pa po//zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes po shin tu snyan pa'i gsung mnga' ba//gnas
313a6(mdo sde): mkhyen mkhas pa phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu rab mchog ldan//ye shes bsam gtan rnam par mthar phyin bde gshegs khyod la 'dud //spyod pa mang po spyad pa zhal
313a7(mdo sde): ni rnams rgyas pa//khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po//gzhal yas byang chub slong du lung yang bstan pa mdzad//mi mchog bde bor gshegs
313b1(mdo sde): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med ces bya ba la yang dag par bskul to//rigs kyi bu de
313b2(mdo sde): nas bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol ba/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzung
313b3(mdo sde): po de la byang chub par 'tshal mod kyi rtsod pa'i dus de lta bu 'ba' zhig mi 'tshal te/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgu tshe lo khri
313b4(mdo sde): thub pa na sems can sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa'i bsdam pa bas pa rnams dang /nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /mi dge ba'i bsheso gnyen la ston
313b5(mdo sde): par 'du shes par sems pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /legs par spyod pa gsum dang bral ba
313b6(mdo sde): rnams dang /nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la brtson pa rnams dang /nyon mongs pa'i mun pas sems rnam par dkrugs pa rnams dang /theg pa gsum po dag don du mi
313b7(mdo sde): gnyer ba de'i dus su ni sus kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa sgrub par rngo mi thog lags na/skye dgu tshe la stong thub pa na lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/sems can de dag kyang tshe lo brgya pa'i
314a1(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur te/de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ming yang ma mchis na dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/re zhig
314a2(mdo sde): skyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tshe 'dri zhing lo brgya par gyur nas/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mnye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i dus na bdag lho rnams kyi nang nas babs shing
314a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig/myi dge ba spangs nas dge ba la spyod par gyur cig/sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu
314a4(mdo sde): 'god par gyur cig/sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang dge ba'i las kyi lom rnams kyis yongs su spyod par gyur cig/theg pa gsum po dag la yang sbyor
314a5(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/sdigs ma lnga yang yongs su spong bar gyur cig/skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bdag bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por
314a6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya byar gyur cig/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mugo dang /ma rig pa dang /phyug dog dang /ser sna chung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston cing theg pa
314a7(mdo sde): gsum po dag la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du btsun pa
314b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag de ltar lung bstan pa thob nas theg pa gang
314b2(mdo sde): gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyi sa'ang don du mo gnyer la/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang don du mi gnyer lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
314b3(mdo sde): pos bka' stsal pa/bram ze'i khye'u byang chub sems dpa' le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/le lo'i dngos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
314b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni yun ring por 'khor bar 'dod do/lta ba'i g.yang sa dang /'khor ba'i brtson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
314b5(mdo sde): kyang myur du 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' la la chos sman pa dang /grogs dman pa dang /yongs su gtong ba dman pa dang /smon lam
314b6(mdo sde): dman pa yin te/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dman pa yin zhe na/'di la lus dang /ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /nyan thos
314b7(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs zhing rgyu ba dang /thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing kun la'ang yongs su mi gtong la lha dang mi'i dpal
315a1(mdo sde): dang badre ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su mi len cing 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon
315a2(mdo sde): lam yang yongs su mi len pa yin te/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' le lo can ni yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar
315a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du thob par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
315a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa bsdams shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /theg pa chen
315a5(mdo sde): po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang /thams cad yongs su gtong zhing kun la'ang yongs su gtong la sems can rnams sdug bsngal las
315a6(mdo sde): yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje'i sems bskyed cing sbyin par byed pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /'dul ba la rtog pa'i
315a7(mdo sde): smon lam yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
315b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar rton par byed pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
315b2(mdo sde): mngon par brtson pa dang /sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa mngon por sgrub pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par
315b3(mdo sde): ba yin no//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhis ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba
315b4(mdo sde): dang /bsgom pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos pos ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go/byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i gter
315b5(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpas dad pa mi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /chos bstan pa dang /yongs su
315b6(mdo sde): bsngo ba dang /sems can dbul po yongs su gzung du mi zad po'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag go//bzhi po 'dri dag ni bdag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su
315b7(mdo sde): dag pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sems can med pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /srog med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang /gang zag med pa'i phyir
316a1(mdo sde): shes rab yongs su dag pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa ste/byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag
316a2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing nam mkha'i
316a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo'ang bskor bar byed/mi rtag pa'o 'khyer lo dang /mi mnyam pa'i 'khor lo dang /brjod du med pa'i 'khor lo dang /nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang /nges
316a4(mdo sde): par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang /bskor du med pa'i 'khor lo'ang skor bar byed do//bgrod bya'i bu dri ma meng khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskul ba grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig/
316a5(mdo sde): gi be ma snyed 'das te/bskal pa bzang po la bab nas ring po ma lon zhing sdigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na skye dgu tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa nu bla na med pa yang dag par
316a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//bram
316a7(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u bgrod byi'i bu dri ma med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la
316b1(mdo sde): me tog dang /phreng ba dang /phye ma dag gis mchod pa byed pa la brtson zhing tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/mgon po khyod ni dpral ba'i dbyes che mdzod spu gangs mdog
316b2(mdo sde): mdzes//khyod ni gser gyi ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra zhing yid du mchi//yon tan brgyas gtam bdag dus 'di gsungs 'gro na'ang bdog 'tshang rgya//thub pa khyu mtshig 'jig
316b3(mdo sde): rten sgron khyod la nr-i su mi 'dud//bram ze mdun na 'don rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/bramo ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong po thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/
316b4(mdo sde): lngar 'khor ba 'jig dang /gser thub dang /'od srungs dang /byams pa lung bstan po de bzhin du/bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa seng ge dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /
316b5(mdo sde): dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du thams cad kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin
316b6(mdo sde): po che'i snying pos bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do//de dag thams cad kyi nu bo tha chung gang yin pa de la'ang mdun na 'don gyis
316b7(mdo sde): 'di skad du kye bram ze khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang ring du brtag tu ci yod/sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cig ce sa yang dag par bskul nas tshigs su bcad pa
317a1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis kyang mngon par go bar byas so//sems can gang dag na dang nad dang 'chi 'pho'i 'dzags pa sred pa'i klung du lhung ba dang //phung po rnams la
317a2(mdo sde): zhen pa'i mi dag srid pa'i brtson ra rab tu 'jigs par chud pa rnams//phan tshun gsod par byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni sdug bsngal rgya mtshor rab tu gnas/
317a3(mdo sde): gti mug gis kyi lam stor long ba bzhin du mi gtsang 'khrul 'khor dag na 'khyams par 'gyur//ldog par lta la gnas pas 'byung po thams cad srid pa gsum na sdug
317a4(mdo sde): bsngal rnams kyis 'bar//srog chags thams cad 'gro ba lnga po dag ni ji lhor 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du 'khor//'gro ba lnga pa dag na chos kyi mig nyams skyabs med
317a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni dran gyis la//yang dag shes rab kyis ni nem nur yid gnyis spongs la byang chub don du 'dun pa skyed//'gro ba rnams kyi sred pa'i mya ngan sol la sems
317a6(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gnyen du gyur par gyis//'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching ba dgol bar bya phyir byang chub don du sems kyang gzhol gyis shig/gti mug bral ba chos mig rnam par
317a7(mdo sde): nyams pa rnams la lam gyi dam pa sbyin par gyis//'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ro dgon 'bar ba rnams la chos kyi bcud kyis tshim gyis shig/phan par byed pa khyod ni
317b1(mdo sde): myur du nye bar song la thub pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa gyis//re ba thams cad grub smon bkra shis ldan pa rab brtan 'dren pas sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos//'jig rten dag na sems
317b2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi dbugs 'byin gyis la srid pa'i mtsho lus sems can thon//gya nim thar pa'i lam dang dbang po'i stobs dang byang chub yan lag sbyin byed 'gyur bar gyis//chos
317b3(mdo sde): sprin chos kyi char pa rab tu phob ste sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar gyis//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs tshon shugs 'chang des kyang smras pa/mkhan po

317b7(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul b.raro bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mchis legs na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma srungs pa bdag cag gis ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/rigs
318a1(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bsnyen bkur ba dang po lo thang spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog gi rgyan dag byin/bsnyen
318a2(mdo sde): bkur ba gnyis pa thang la spyod ces bya ba de la rin po che sna bdun gyi rna tsha byin/bsnyen bkur ba gsum phra chu lo spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi khri byin/bsnyen bkur

323a7(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa'i spyi bo la bsod na mos brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag
323b1(mdo sde): gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu
323b2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
323b3(mdo sde): gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te smras pa/skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//khyod kyis smon lam bzang po btab ste/nga phyin chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya ma
323b4(mdo sde): dgos kyi ji ltar bde ba nyid du spyod cig/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyom du sems te/ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di na snang ba ltar bdag gis
323b5(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/sems can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis
323b6(mdo sde): ni smon lam rgya che ba dgu btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba sha stag yongs su blangs te/khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod pa'i dus
323b7(mdo sde): yongs su spangs pas bdag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na/sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer bar bya zhing brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/bdag
324a1(mdo sde): gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang /lha dang
324a2(mdo sde): dri za dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
324a3(mdo sde): 'das 'di'ang bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
324a4(mdo sde): gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing bla na med pa yang
324a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'ang mdzad la pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag kyang
324a6(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /gang yang phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs
324a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang /nad dag gis bdas par gyur
324b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur la sems can rnams la'ang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang /bdag yongs su
324b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag
324b3(mdo sde): to ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa dang dbyangs kyang sgrog par 'gyur la/
324b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing
324b5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam thos nus mchog tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /de dag kyang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang /de nas de dag kyang
324b6(mdo sde): smon lam de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar da ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon
324b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /chu bo bzhis bdas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /mya
325a1(mdo sde): ngan+da las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo//rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi
325a2(mdo sde): gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par bskyed nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa
325a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ngo //yang de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis na mo mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang
325a4(mdo sde): po dag gsil dkrol zhing /me tog gi char rab tu phab nas chog mthun par smras pa/skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon
325a5(mdo sde): lam rab mchog dag shod la bzung zhig dang /khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par
325a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas tshig mthun par smras pa/skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//mkhas pa
325a7(mdo sde): rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo mchog mnga' ba smon lom brtan por thob cig dang /bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo//gang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste/
325b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dun na 'don gyis pus mo'i lhang btsugs pa dang de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdza
325b2(mdo sde): tsam pa de thams cad g.yos/rab tu g.yos/'gul/rab tu 'gul/'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/ldeg/rab tu ldeg go/sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra
325b3(mdo sde): 'khrol lo//ri dgas dang /bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so//shing ljon pa dag las kyang me tog dag 'bul lo//stong
325b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs par gang su dag sa lA rten cing gnas pa'i
325b5(mdo sde): 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang /dge
325b6(mdo sde): bi'i sems dang /kho na med pa'i sems dang /rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /byams pa'i sems dang /ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to//sems can gang dag nam
325b7(mdo sde): mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'khod nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog dang /me tog
326a1(mdo sde): phreng dang /spos dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdun dang /gos dang /rus bcos bu dag gis mchod
326a2(mdo sde): pa'i lhas la brtson par gyur to//de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lce gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang /bram ze'i smon lam mnyan pa'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling du blangs te/nam
326a3(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyi lhun 'khod cing /lha'i spos dang /ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to//bram zas kyang thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs
326a4(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de//bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin//gzugs kyis 'od gsal brgya byin
326a5(mdo sde): 'dra ba ste//rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing //rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin//zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la seng gi 'dra//mi 'gul brtan pa
326a6(mdo sde): lhun po 'dra ba ste//rgya mtsho bzhin du 'a drug pa mi mnga' zhing //yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod//dri ma thams cad ded pa chu bzhin te//thub pa me ltar
326a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs nags rnams sreg/rlung ltar gang la'ang chags pa mi mnga' zhing //thub pa lha ltar yang dge nyid kyang ston//klu ltar thub pa chos kyi char 'bebs shing /
326b1(mdo sde): char pa bzhin du 'gro kun ngoms par mdzad//pha rol mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra//me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong //tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i tshigs
326b2(mdo sde): gsung zhing //'gro ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin//sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin to//'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin mdza' ba shes 'dra//nga rgyal dgra
326b3(mdo sde): 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin te//thub pa mtshon bzhin srid pa'i 'khri shing gcod//zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing //klu ltar thub pa mi shos rtswa rnams bsreg
326b4(mdo sde): thub pa zla ltar 'od bsil gtong mdzad cing //mi yi pad+ma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin//'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mjed ljon shing 'dra//thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor//
326b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba ste//'gro ba dag la sems snyoms rtswa shing bzhin//rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing //'jig rten rjes su mthun 'jug chu dang 'dra///
326b6(mdo sde): thub pa mtshan mchog mnga' bo thugs rje can//khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan//sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis brtul//byang chub mchog rab tu ni
326b7(mdo sde): bdag lung ston//drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog/bdag ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'thab rtsod che//sangs rgyas byang chub lung ston dogs chod la//sems can
327a1(mdo sde): brgyu dag zhi bde'i lam du 'khod//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs
327a2(mdo sde): su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/de na 'dug pa de'i med la lha dang /dri za dang /mi dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin no//
327a3(mdo sde): mdun na 'don gyis gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal
327a4(mdo sde): te/de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
327a5(mdo sde): pa dang /gdul sla ba dag yongs su bzung lags so//gang dag skur ma skyong la sogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
327a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te/skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chagros dang /zhe sdang dang /nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid lags
327a7(mdo sde): mod kyi/'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang /rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang
327b1(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang /log par lta bu rnams dang /'phags pa'i nor
327b2(mdo sde): bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /phar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /mar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /bgyi ba ma
327b3(mdo sde): lcags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba rnams dang /legs par spyod pa gsum po dag
327b4(mdo sde): don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /de bzhin du lha dang /mi rnams kyi dpal dang /'byor pa dag la brtson pa rnams nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs
327b5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba rnams dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams dang /mkhas pa thams cad kyis bor ba rnams
327b6(mdo sde): dang /srid pa'i brtson rar chud pa rnams dang /rgyun phyogs su 'das pa rnams dang /'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang /gaN+DI
327b7(mdo sde): mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang /mi dge ba'i bgyi ba thams cad ma btang ba rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang /mi dge ba'i
328a1(mdo sde): rngub thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang /lumya ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs
328a2(mdo sde): lags te/de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na mi'i tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa 'di dag gis spangs shing bor
328a3(mdo sde): bas de'i tshe snying pa'i dba' klong dang /'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor na skyob pa ma mchis pa dang /skyabs ma mchis po dang /dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang /sdug
328a4(mdo sde): bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag spangs nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung zhing shin tu dul ba dang /bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /dge
328a5(mdo sde): paba'i rtsa ba basbyin pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po lnga lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma lags
328a6(mdo sde): sam/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/bram ze de bzhin te/sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam 'debs par byed cing sangs
328a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang yongs su bzung ba rnams ngos kyang de nyid du lung bstan to//bram zes gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dper na shing
328b1(mdo sde): kang ku sha'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 'drar zhing bdag gi yid ni shin tu skyo la bdag gi lus thams cad ni sha thang bar gyur cing mchis na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te
328b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phangs te thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas
328b3(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba lta na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs mi mchis pa
328b4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa ni bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa na sdod cing bdag yun ring po de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor bas yongs su
328b5(mdo sde): mi skyo bar gyur cig/bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun ring pos smin par bgyi 'tshal ba'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lo spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tu phyin pa
328b6(mdo sde): drug lo spyod pa na 'dul ba rnams yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dngos po'i mtshan ma yongs su gtang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags
328b7(mdo sde): so zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bgyi ste/ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan dag na slongs mo pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag mchis par
329a1(mdo sde): 'gyur na'ang de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/'di lta ste/zas dang /skom dang /bza' ba dang /bca' ba
329a2(mdo sde): dang /btung ba dang /bldag pa dang /gos dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /gnas dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /na ba'i gsos sman
329a3(mdo sde): gyi sbyin pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /nor dang /'bru dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /shing rta dang /gser dang /dngul dang /
329a4(mdo sde): 'gron bu dang /nor bu dang /mu tog dang /bai DUr+ya dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul chen dang /sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang du yongs
329a5(mdo sde): su gtong ba na bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la stsal nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i don dang /
329a6(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/gal te yang btang bar dka' ba slong ba'i sems can
329a7(mdo sde): dag mchis nas 'di lta ste/dran dang /bran mo dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /rgyal srid dang /mchis drang dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /lag pa yongs su
329b1(mdo sde): btang ba dang /rkang pa yongs su btang ba dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /mig dang /lce dang /pags pa dang /khrag dang /rus pa dang /lus dang /srog dang /mgo yongs
329b2(mdo sde): su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dag slong bar bgyid na'ang ma tshig tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du sems can rnams
329b3(mdo sde): la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sprad par bgyi ste/gang sngon chad nam yang sems can gang gis kyang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba
329b4(mdo sde): yongs su btang bar ma gyur pa dang /slan chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa gang yang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs
329b5(mdo sde): su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu yongs su gtong ba dog yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/gang dag tshe rabs gzhan na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa de dag tu
329b6(mdo sde): bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par gyur cig/bdag gis slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang
329b7(mdo sde): ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/nyon mongs pa'i g.yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa de ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol
330a1(mdo sde): tu phyin pa lags te/de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs sna tshogs
330a2(mdo sde): kyi dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/ji ltar sngar spros pa bzhin du yul rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang /bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar dang lags pa de ni bzod pa'i
330a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/bdag de lta bu'i bzodang pa sgom par gyur cig/ji ltar spyir spros pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas thams
330a4(mdo sde): cad zhi bar sgom pa la brtson zhing bla na med pa'i spyod pa las skur mi ldog pa gang lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//'du byed thams cad la phyin ci
330a5(mdo sde): log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa gang legs pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lpags pa de
330a6(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gos te/bta dgu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis spyod pa
330a7(mdo sde): la/ji ltar sngan chad byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs
330b1(mdo sde): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad cing /slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba
330b2(mdo sde): dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig/slad mi'i byang chub sems
330b3(mdo sde): dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa'
330b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par gyur cig/bla na med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du
330b5(mdo sde): bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang /brtson 'grus
330b6(mdo sde): la blang ba ma mchis pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /shes rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/sems can 'phags
330b7(mdo sde): pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs
331a1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /log par lta ba rnams dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs shing nyam nga ba thob pa rnams dang /lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems
331a2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par gyur cig/bdag gis sems can re re'i don
331a3(mdo sde): du'ang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bzhag pa'i slad du bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba ma nor med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la spro bar gyur cig/
331a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /yi dgas rnams dang /gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang /mi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la'ang spro bar gyur cig/ji ltar
331a5(mdo sde): sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon 'jog po ltar sems can thams cad la'ang de bzhin du gyur cig/chad pa stong pa lta bu dang /sems kyi rgyud
331a6(mdo sde): tshig pa'i 'dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/bdag gis srid pa tha ma pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba gcig gis
331a7(mdo sde): thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas na dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs par bskal pa'i mthi' bar du'ang lha'i bde ba skye ba dag don du mi gnyer bar bdag gis yun ring
331b1(mdo sde): po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas bdag sangs rgyas re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
331b2(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag bgyid par gyur cig/sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan ngag rtogs par gyur cig/
331b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig/de bzhin du bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
331b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig/'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis
331b5(mdo sde): na'ang bdag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor bar gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /mngon par shes pa dag la'ang sbyor
331b6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis dge ba rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig/bdag gos
331b7(mdo sde): sems can sred med kyi bu dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /tshangs pa'i bar dag la dad pa rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig
332a1(mdo sde): bzhin du nam mkha' lding rnams la'ang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang /brgya byin gyi bar la'ang brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis dge ba'i spyod pa dag la
332a2(mdo sde): sbyor bar gyur cig/sems can ltogs pa rnams la'ang rang gi sha dang /khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la'ang
332a3(mdo sde): rong gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su nyams pa
332a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi don du stobs po che'i shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi srid du gtum pa dang /brlang ba dang /mi bzang
332a5(mdo sde): pi sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dag nod par gyur cig/bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis
332a6(mdo sde): pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste/bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
332a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus no bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis
332b1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te
332b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams dang /nor bdun dang bral ba rnams
332b3(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang /mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /lam dran pa'i bar gyis bcom pa
332b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /nyam nga ba thob pa gang dag dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis
332b5(mdo sde): dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du stsol la 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par
332b6(mdo sde): gyur cig/bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de'ang bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar dgyid par gyur
332b7(mdo sde): cig/shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang gyur cig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
333a1(mdo sde): 'bul bar yang gyur cig/de'i tshe na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs
333a2(mdo sde): dang /bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur cig/sa non par yang gyur cig/bdag gis sems can du dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang dag
333a3(mdo sde): par 'dzin du stsol cing slob du stsol bar yang gyur cig/de dag kyang ji ltar mtsham pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang 'dzin par gyur cig/gang gi tshe bskal
333a4(mdo sde): pa bzang po la bab ste/rgyal po nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de'i tshe bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
333a5(mdo sde): gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig/de'i tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
333a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por mA lags pa'i drung du mchis par gyur cig/mchis nas kyang mchod pa sna tshogs
333a7(mdo sde): bgyid par gyur cig/zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang gyur cig/rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig/tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dag la mngon par
333b1(mdo sde): brtson par yang gyur cig/chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig/de'i tshe sems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa
333b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /lta ba'i lam du zhugs pa rnams dang /mchims ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /nyam nga ba chen po thob par
333b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag la'ang chos ston par gyur cig/bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig/rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe na bdag lhun gyis grub
333b4(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur gyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la sbyor bar
333b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/dus de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig/sems can rnams kyi
333b6(mdo sde): che lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du gyur pa na bde ba dang /dbang phyug dang /rigs dang /gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing ser sna can du gyur te/snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud
333b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can 'dod chags bdo ba/zhe sdang bdo ba/gti mug bdo ba/nga rgyal bde ba/sdig pa dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna bdo ba/chos ma legs pa la 'dod
334a1(mdo sde): chags kyis chags pa/chos ma lags pa'i longs spyod 'tshol ba/log par lta ba/phyin ci log tu mthong ba/'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba/
334a2(mdo sde): par mi 'dzin pa/mar mi 'dzin pa/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa/bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa/bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa/
334a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi blta ba/bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mi brtson pa/theg pa gsum don du mi gnyer ba/legs par spyod pa
334a4(mdo sde): gsum la mi brtson pa//nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi brtson pa/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa/phyin ci
334a5(mdo sde): log bzhis nyams pa/rgud pa bzhi lo gnas pa/bdud bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa/chu bo bzhis ded pa/sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung byar
334a6(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so//dbang po drug gi dregs pas myos pa/log pa brgyad la zhugs pa/'dod pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa/bgu la nyal kun nas slong ba/lha dang mi'i
334a7(mdo sde): dpal dang /'byor pa don du mi gnyer ba phyin ci log gi lta ba can/lom ngan pas bcom pa/mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/dam pa'i chos spong ba/'phags
334b1(mdo sde): pal skur pa 'debs pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/khwa ltar mu cor smra ba/byas pa mi bzob/dran pa nyams pa/dge ba la snang ba/shes rab
334b2(mdo sde): 'chal pa/thos pa nyung ba/tshul khrims 'chal pa/tshul 'chos pa/ser sna can/phan tshun mi snyan pa brjod pa/gcig la gcig mi gus pa/le lo can//
334b3(mdo sde): dbang po ma tshang ba/nyam chung ba/gos ma mchis pa/mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa/bsam pa dang dran pa'i snying po nyams pa/nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa/
334b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs par gyur pa/mdog ngan pa mi sdug pa/ngo tsha ma mchis pa/khrel ma mchis pa/gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa/gang dag snga dro gcig la lus dang ngag dang
334b5(mdo sde): yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mang du spyod pa de dag la bstod cing ther zug tu blta ba'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang /
334b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'chums pa'i sems dang /sdang ba'i sems dang /gnod sems kyi sems dang /khon du 'dzin pa'i sems dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems
334b7(mdo sde): dang /rnyog pa'i sems dang /rtsub pa'i sems dang /'khrugs pa'i sems dang /ma dul ba'i sems dang /gnod pa'i sems dang /rgod pa'i sems dang /chos
335a1(mdo sde): ma lags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang /khyad par la mi gnas pa'i sems dang /phan tshun nongs pa rtsom pa'i sems dang /'jungs pa'i
335a2(mdo sde): sems dang /gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang /chos yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /mi brtson pa'i sems dang /chos rnams la nongs par brtson pa'i
335a3(mdo sde): sems dang /mi dge ba skyed pa'i sems dang /mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mi 'tshol ba'i sems dang /sbyin gnas ma lags pa'i sems dang /kun tu sbyor ba dang //
335a4(mdo sde): 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang /nad dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba la yid rton pa'o sems dang /kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnos pa'i
335a5(mdo sde): sems dang /sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan skyel bar bgyi ba'i sems dang /lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i
335a6(mdo sde): sems dang /phan tshun mi snyan pa rjod pa'i sems dang /gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang /phan tshun 'tshe ba la dbang bgyid pa'i sems dang /zhe sdang yang
335a7(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang /gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /'dod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems dang /thams cad yongs su
335b1(mdo sde): 'dzin cing 'jungs pa'i sems dang /byas pa mi bzo ba'i sems dang /gzhan gyi chung ma brnab pa'i sems dang /gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i sems dang /smon lam
335b2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang de'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de sems can dmyal ba'i
335b3(mdo sde): sgra dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sgra dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dang /nad kyi sgra dang /rga ba'i sgra dang /'chi ba'i sgra dang /gsod pa'i sgra dang /mi khom
335b4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang /rtag tu sgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang /khu sgo dang /khong sgril dang /'ching ba dang /btson ra'i sgra dang /chod pa'i sgra dang /gnod pa'i sgra dang /mi snyan pa dang /gshe
335b5(mdo sde): ba dang /spro ba'i sgra dang /khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang /tshogs 'byed pa'i sgra dang /chom rkun gyi sgra dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang /mu ge'i sgra dang /'dod pa
335b6(mdo sde): la log pararo g.yem pa'i sgra dang /brdzun du smra ba'i sgra dang /ltas ngan gyi sgra dang /phra ma'i sgra dang /tshig rtsub po'i sgra dang /tshig kyal pa'i sgra dang /phrag dog drang ser
335b7(mdo sde): sna'i sgra dang /kun tu 'dzin pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /ngar 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /sdug pa dang /mi sdug pa'i sgra dang /'dod pa dang mi 'dod/
336a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang /nyo tshong gi sgra dang /gcig gis gcig 'khol zhing 'tshe ba'i sgra dang /mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang /dring ba'i sgra
336a2(mdo sde): dang grang ba'i sgra dang /tshe ba'i sgra dang /bkres pa dang skom pa'i sgra dang /ngal ba dang chad pa tshol ba'i sgra dang /zhing las kyi sgra dang /bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su
336a3(mdo sde): skyo ba'i sgra dang /nad sna tshogs kyis nyen po'i sgra dag ste/sems can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so//de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams
336a4(mdo sde): mi mjed ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa/sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag gis kun tu bltam par
336a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/ji ltar bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /dul ba dang //
336a6(mdo sde): yang dag par sdom pa dang /dge ba'i las kyi bya bo dang /'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'grogs la/mun khrod nas mun khrid du mchi
336a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de dag ni de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so//sems can de dag gis las kyi
336b1(mdo sde): rkyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te/sa gzhi ba tsha can du 'gyur/sa gzhi kor
336b2(mdo sde): ma dang /gseg ma dang /rdul dang /ri rang rod can du 'gyur/sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu mchu ring dang /sbrul dang /gcan zan khro bo dang /bya gdug pa dag gis kun tu
336b3(mdo sde): gtam par 'gyur/dus ma legs par rdul gyis 'khrigs pa'i bser ma ldang bar 'gyur/dus ma lags par ri ma mchis pa dang /lan tshwa dang 'dris pa dang /mi bsil
336b4(mdo sde): ba'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur zhing /de ltar sa la lo thog dang /sman dang /rtswa dang /shing ljon pa dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /
336b5(mdo sde): nor rnams dang /sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /longs spyod dang /nye bar spyad pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang /rnyog pa can dang /rung rung po dang /rtsub
336b6(mdo sde): pa dang /dug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang slar zhing rgya cher rtsub pa dang /gdug pa dang /khro ba dang /gtum pa dang /brlang ba dang /
336b7(mdo sde): 'jungs pa dang /gshe ba dang /gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang /'jigs pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur
337a1(mdo sde): zhing sha 'tshal ba dang /khrag 'tshal ba dang /ri dgas kyi pags pa 'tshal ba dang /mtshon cha thogs pa dang /srog chags 'gums pa la brtson
337a2(mdo sde): pa dang /byad gzugs dang /rigs dang /rgyud dang /dbang phyug dang /bstan bcos dang /yi ge dang /rta rtsal dang /mda' gzhu dang /mtshon cha thogs
337a3(mdo sde): pa dang /'khor dang /ser sna dang /dregs nges par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi dka' thub dang /brtul zhugs ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par
337a4(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe na/bdag 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te 'khor los sgyur ba'i
337a5(mdo sde): rigs rgyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i rigs su btsun mo dam pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig/de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad
337a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par 'gyur zhing /steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang /'og tu ni
337a7(mdo sde): gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par gyur cig/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can gang dag sems
337b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi rnams su skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong zhing rnyog
337b2(mdo sde): pa dang /kun tu 'tshal bar gyur cig/'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal zhing tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi
337b3(mdo sde): ba de'i sems skyed par yang gyur cig/dang por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di'ang skyed par gyur cig/gang gi tshe bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
337b4(mdo sde): thams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston cing sems mnyam par bzhag nas zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig/bdag gis sangs
337b5(mdo sde): rgyas nyid thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor
337b6(mdo sde): bu'i snying po yang dag par ston po la sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyel mo klung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig/zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams thams
