345a5(mdo sde): chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/gzugs dang gzugs ma mchis pa'i dregs pas mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni btang snyoms brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos
345a6(mdo sde): bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni yang dag par ma lags pa brjod pas chos bstan par
345a7(mdo sde): 'tshil bar gyur cig/theg pa chen po de'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa
345b1(mdo sde): brjod pas chos brtan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjed pas chos ston par 'tshal bar gyur cig/thos pa nyung ba rnams
345b2(mdo sde): kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis shing thos pa 'dzin pa chud mi za ba brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/lta ba ngan pa nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pas
345b3(mdo sde): chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/smon
345b4(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa'i yongs su dag pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyis ni bsam
345b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/rnam par 'dres par spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa brjod pas chos bstan
345b6(mdo sde): par 'tshal bar gyur cig/zad pa'i sbyor ba drod nyams pa rnams kyis ni bcos ma mo lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu
345b7(mdo sde): sbyangs pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni brten pa mo mchos pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/de bzhin du sbyar te/nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams
346a1(mdo sde): kyis ni dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang /dge ba mi bskyed pa rnams kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang /bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod
346a2(mdo sde): pa dang /don dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni mngon par 'phags pa brjod pa dang /nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis ni bral
346a3(mdo sde): brjod pa dang /lam mi mnyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par ldog par brjod pa dang /theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
346a4(mdo sde): kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang /'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa dang /dge ba dang /sa dang /ye shes mi rtogs pa rnams kyis nA ma
346a5(mdo sde): rmongs pa brjod pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhon dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa dang /gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni
346a6(mdo sde): 'od zer thogs pa med pa brjod pa dang /las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang /'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa rnams kyis
346a7(mdo sde): ni seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang /bdud bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems
346b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang /rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ri bo'i phung po brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas zil gyis non pa rnams
346b2(mdo sde): kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang /shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /gti mug gi mun par mchis pa rnams kyis ni nyi
346b3(mdo sde): ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang /zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang /bdag la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sred med
346b4(mdo sde): kyi bu brjod pa dang /blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis ni snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /spyi gtsug bltar gda' ba rnams kyis ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang /sngon gyi
346b5(mdo sde): dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni snying po can brjod pa dang /mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams
346b6(mdo sde): kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang /chos thams cad smon pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang /sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni spyod pa dang ldan pa
346b7(mdo sde): brjod pa dang /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni shes rab sgron ma brjod pa dang /phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni skye la
347a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa brjod pa dang /chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang brale ba rnams
347a2(mdo sde): kyis ni mig mi 'dzums pa brjod pa dang /dmigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bskor bar
347a3(mdo sde): 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang /rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rig pa la brten pa'i rjes su mthun pa brjod pa dang //
347a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu ther zug tu blta ba rnams kyis ni legs par bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni rkyen dang
347a5(mdo sde): ldan pa brjod pa dang /tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thog pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams
347a6(mdo sde): kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang drang yang du 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang /chos
347a7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang /shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /lam rnam par 'khrugs
347b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni ci'ang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
347b2(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi mA ni shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang /
347b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'tshol ba rnams kyis ni mnyam pa brjod pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su mi rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba
347b4(mdo sde): brjod pa dang /shes pa ma bsgoms shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems pa
347b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni bsnyad pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /phan tshun
347b6(mdo sde): legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis ni rab rib mi mchis pa brjod pa dang /dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang bathod pa rnams kyis ni bsod nams che ba brjod pa dang /
347b7(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo'i tshor rab tu 'bab pas chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi sprin brjod pa dang /dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen bkod pa brjod
348a1(mdo sde): pa dang /shes pa nyams pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni dpe ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba can thams cad kyis ni
348a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa dang /chos thams cad gzhan ma lags par sems pa rnams kyis ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang /dri bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su
348a3(mdo sde): ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni rnam par nges
348a4(mdo sde): pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang /mdo sde thams cad la rnam par nges
348a5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod pa dang /rnying par 'gyur ba dang /mthun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa rnams kyis ni chos thams
348a6(mdo sde): cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
348a7(mdo sde): pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa brjod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par mi brtson pa rnams
348b1(mdo sde): kyis ni ye shes thob par brjod pa dang /nye du la yang dag par ston pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba brjod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams
348b2(mdo sde): kyis ni dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni mi tshems pa brjod pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis
348b3(mdo sde): ni mi zad pa brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang /mnyan pa dang lta ba don ma mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod
348b4(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyun 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i
348b5(mdo sde): ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mtha'
348b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang /thug pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa/rgyu ma mchis pa/dang ba drung
348b7(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin can te/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo
349a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po'i yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig/des
349a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po 'tshal bar gyur cig/smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur cig/
349a3(mdo sde): brosam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig/'di lta ste/lus mtshon dang dpe byad rnams kyi sku brgyan par gyur
349a4(mdo sde): cig/ngag legs par smras pas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ting nge 'dzin tshig ma mchis
349a5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du thos pas brgyan pa dang /gzungs bskyed pa ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pas brgyan pa dang /'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du yid kyi brgyan cing mya ngan las
349a6(mdo sde): 'das pas brgyan pa dang /dam bcas pa la brten pa'i slad du bsam pas brgyan pa dang /dam bcos pa nyams su lon pa'i slad du sbyor bas brgyan pa dang /sa nas
349a7(mdo sde): sar 'phar ba'i slad du lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyan pa dang /dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du sbyin pas brgyan pa dang /legs par thos pa khong du chud
349b1(mdo sde): pa dri ma ma mchis pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa dang /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i slad du bzod pas brgyan pa dang /tshogs thams cad nye bar
349b2(mdo sde): bsags pa'i slad du brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du/bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa
349b3(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig/sems can thams cad yang dag par skyob pa'i rjes su mchis pa'i
349b4(mdo sde): slad du byams pas brgyan pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du snying rjes brgyan pa dang /chos thams cad la the tshom ma mchis par
349b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i slad du dga' bas brgyan pa dang /mthon dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang /mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse
349b6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang /longs spyod mi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i slad du bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang /sems can thams cad
349b7(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang /sems can thams cad kyis chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa
350a1(mdo sde): dang /shes rab kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan par gyur cig/don dang /chos dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /spobs pa so so yang
350a2(mdo sde): dag par rig pa thob pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan par gyur cig/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas
350a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rjes su thob pa'i slad du yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems
350a4(mdo sde): can rnams la chos ston pa'i slad du chos kyis brgyan par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
350a5(mdo sde): thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du 'od kyis brgyan pa dang /khyad par lung ston pa'i slad du kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes
350a6(mdo sde): su ston pa stsol ba'i slad du rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan po dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa
350a7(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang /gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye
350b1(mdo sde): shes thob pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing thams cad kyis mi choms pa'i slad du dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying
350b2(mdo sde): por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag la'ang bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas
350b3(mdo sde): dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang dag par bsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur cig/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la gzhan
350b4(mdo sde): gyi ding mi 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
350b5(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar yang gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/bla na med pa'i theg
350b6(mdo sde): pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi
350b7(mdo sde): dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/rtsub pa/sdig pa 'tshil ba/khre khro dang /dmu rgod kyi
351a1(mdo sde): rgyud can/blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la'ang bdag gi sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig/sems can le lo can
351a2(mdo sde): gyi bar dag la'ang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig/de na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen por gyur pa de dag
351a3(mdo sde): la'ang bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
351a4(mdo sde): pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig/yang de ni sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg po pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa 'am/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyon
351a5(mdo sde): cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la 'grod par 'gyur zhing /slad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa
351a6(mdo sde): drag la 'du sbyor bar gyur cig/rnam par 'tsho ba la dga' ba rnams ni srog gcod pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma
351a7(mdo sde): byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/chos ma lags pa lo 'dod pas chags pa rnams ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig
351b1(mdo sde): phan tshun brdzun gyi tshig smra ba rnams ni brdzun du smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni chang dang bcos pa'i chad myos par 'gyur ba/
351b2(mdo sde): bag med pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/sems can gang dag nongs pa lnga po thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni nongs pa lnga po spong zhing dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god
351b3(mdo sde): par gyur cig/sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni bdag gis nyin zhag gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims
351b4(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
351b5(mdo sde): ba la nye bar sbyar bar bgyi zhing /rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i bzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god par gyur cig/sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams yongs
351b6(mdo sde): su 'tshol bar 'tshal ba de dag ni bdag gis dge ba'i chos rnams la nye bar bsgrubs nas tshangs par sbyor ba thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/sems can mtshams ma
351b7(mdo sde): mchis pa bgyid pa dang kun nas 'dzin pa'i rgyud can gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don dang /tshig dang /yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gi cho 'phrul rnams kyis
352a1(mdo sde): chos smyon gyur s+ho//drang bad+ma//khams dang /sgyum dang ga ga pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag ma mchis pad+mad /stong bar rnan
352a2(mdo sde): 'du /dan padu/bdang/sa pa dang /gas pa ma mchis pa'i g+ha khyer mdun las 'angs pa la rab tu 'god par /de ltar ba
352a3(mdo sde): 'khor bani pa dge sbyong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge ba sta dang /dge basbyin ma dag la chos ston por myur stig/gang dag rtsod pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dag la bdag gis
352a4(mdo sde): chos kyis brtsad pa'i bsten bcos rab tu ston par gyu/gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams lnga mngon par mi dga' ba de dag la bdag gis zhal te bgyid pa'i lus ston par
352a5(mdo sde): rgyur tog/kha rten la mngon par dga' ba rnams la ni stong bya nyid kyi bsamu gtan gyi gyi gcig gi sgra rnam par grolnga pa'i lam ston par gyur cig/sems can ra ro ba din kyi snang
352a6(mdo sde): du'ang ba dgu dpag tshad 'brum drug mang po dag tu drug pa sa mche bar 'gyur zhing /don dang /tshig dang /yi ge dang /thabs dang /rgyu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mang ci
352a7(mdo sde): dreg gis skye ba mamachis shing spro bar bgyid pa'i'i byung ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar la 'gong par gyu phyini/ting rje dzin gyi stobs kyis bdag go cha'i 'du byed
352b1(mdo sde): ji tsam pa'i lnga tshwa 'dor bar gyur cig/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe na rang gi sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing /sems
352b2(mdo sde): can rnams la snying rje'i slad du bdag ni slad kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur
352b3(mdo sde): cig/yang lo lnga brgyar ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brlan gnas par gyur cig/sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams las rin po
352b4(mdo sde): che rnams dang /ril mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa bgyid par spro ba skye bar 'gyur bya dang /tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang /phyag gcig tsam dang /bskor
352b5(mdo sde): ba gcig tsam dang /thal mo sbyor ba gcig tsam dang /me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum
352b6(mdo sde): po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ji
352b7(mdo sde): skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam/tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag kun chub par bgyid dam/klog gam/gzhan dag
353a1(mdo sde): la'ang ston par 'gyur pa dang /gang dag gis thos nas sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur zhing /tha na dam pa'i chos smra ba la me tog gcig tsam dang /phyag
353a2(mdo sde): gcig tsam gyis mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ji tsam na dam pa'i chos
353a3(mdo sde): nub ste/chos kyi sgron ma ni gum/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni 'gyel bar gyur pa na bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i ngog sa la lhags par
353a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na rin po ches phongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/de dag nor bu bai DUr+ya tog gi blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur te zhugs ltar gda' zhing
353a5(mdo sde): kun tu gnas par gyur cig/de'ang de nas mngon par 'phags te/gong du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas me tog sna tshogs kyi tsher rab tu 'byebs
353a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing /me tog man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dang /pa ri ya tra ka dang /many+dzu sha ka dang /many+dzu sha ka chen po dang /mdog mdzes dang /mdog mdzes
353a7(mdo sde): chen po dang /ma na bar+Na dang /zla ba dri med dang /'dab brgya pa dang /'dab stong pa dang /kun tu 'od dang /kun tu dri ba dang /shin tu mdzes pa dang /rtag tu 'bras
353b1(mdo sde): byabu rgyas dang /snying dang mig mngon par dga' ba dang /skar 'od dang /skar mdog dang /kha dog mtha' yas dang /dri mtha' yas dang /me tog de lta bu dag gi me tog gi char chen
353b2(mdo sde): po mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/me tog gi char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dadruge
353b3(mdo sde): 'dun gyi sgra dang /dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i sgra dang /'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dang /rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i
353b4(mdo sde): sgra dang /tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /tshangs par spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang /zhal ta bgyid pa'i sgra dang /klog pa'i sgra dang /nang
353b5(mdo sde): du yang dag 'jog gi sgra dang /tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang /mi sdug pa'i sgra dang /dbugs rgyu ba dang /rngub pa'i sgra dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
353b6(mdo sde): mched kyi sgra dang /ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang /rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched kyi sgra dang /nem mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang /zil gyis gnon pa'i
353b7(mdo sde): skye mched kyi sgra dang /zad par gyi skye mched kyi sgra dang /zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra
354a1(mdo sde): dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra dang /nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba
354a2(mdo sde): dang /theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis thos par gyur nas/rang rang gis
354a3(mdo sde): sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /sems can chen po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas/de dag de nas babs te
354a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor zhing rab tu 'grod par gyur cig/de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang thos par
354a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing /de dag kyang sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /dga' ba dang /rtsed mo dang /yid bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rgyun chad par
354a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/de dag thams cad kyis kyang rong rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas 'jig rten gyi
354a7(mdo sde): khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang nam
354b1(mdo sde): mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing /'di lta ste/dngul dang /'gron du dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /

354b3(mdo sde): par gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad na thab mo dang /'thub po dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa dang /mu ge dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /tshig rtsub
354b4(mdo sde): cing bslang ba dang /dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang /nang ma mchis pa dang /thab mo dang /'thab pa dang /

355a1(mdo sde): an+da rnyil dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing /de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/'di lta ste/me tog man+da ra ba dang /

355a3(mdo sde): kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar gyur cig/
355a4(mdo sde): yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig/de bzhin du gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na'ang sku
355a5(mdo sde): gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i bar du'ang
355a6(mdo sde): ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
355a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba dgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i
355b1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byung gi bar du'ang /bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po ngag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/bdag
355b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
355b3(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du stsal cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang /bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe
355b4(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas
355b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig/bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab
355b6(mdo sde): tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang /gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems

356a1(mdo sde): khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad
356a2(mdo sde): du gang yun ring po ni bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/bskal pa bzang po de la bab pa nA/rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'dri zhes bya ba
356a3(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//bdag cag ni sems kyi
356a4(mdo sde): rgyud tshig pa/mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa mtshams med pa byed pa/log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par
356a5(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na de'i phyir bdag cag de ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing /rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyis 'khor lo bskor
356a6(mdo sde): la/'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye blo khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag motho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gi bsngags
356a7(mdo sde): pa brjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang brjod par gyur cig/gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gis
356b1(mdo sde): bsngags pa dang /grags pa dang /snyan pa thos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na

356b3(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po

356b6(mdo sde): zhing /de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang /nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /mi dge ba'i blor dag dang 'grogs
356b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/
357a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang /nyon mongs pa bango ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/

357a3(mdo sde): sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa
357a4(mdo sde): de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
357a5(mdo sde): pa ma tshogs dag mdzad de/de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phral pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas/nged cag bla na med pa yang
357a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing /pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam
357a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig/de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs/

357b2(mdo sde): ces gsol to/25 btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bdag giso ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang /thab mo dang /snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i

357b5(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thog pa lta na byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi bgyi ste/btsun pa bcom ldan
357b6(mdo sde): 'das de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so//yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang mi 'tshal/lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid
357b7(mdo sde): kyang mi 'tshal/lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi 'tshal/lhar skye ba'ang mi 'tshal/dri za dang /lho ma yin

358a6(mdo sde): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing dag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i sems can dmyal

358b2(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na'ang de'i slad du bdag gum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing /bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra

358b4(mdo sde): lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang
358b5(mdo sde): dag par 'tshal bar gyur cig/bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong
358b6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /ma nor
358b7(mdo sde): med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las yang dag par sogs par 'gyur bo rnams dang /sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
359a1(mdo sde): dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par
359a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'am/kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing
359a3(mdo sde): bdag gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /
359a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang /mya ngan las 'das po'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar bar
359a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang /
359a6(mdo sde): 'phangs pa dang /myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du tsha ba dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /ngu 'bod dang /bsdus
359a7(mdo sde): gzhom dang /thig nog dang /yang gsos kyi bar dag la'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o//de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o///
359b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la'ang brjod par bgyi'o//de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la'ang brjod par bgyi'o//de bzhin du grul bum dang /sha za dang /lha ma yin
359b2(mdo sde): dang /nam mkha' lding dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o//gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams
359b3(mdo sde): sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang /long ba dang /lce ma mchis pa dang /lag pa ma mchis
359b4(mdo sde): pa dang /rkang pa ma mchis pa dang /dran pa ra tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ji ltar sngar smos pa
359b5(mdo sde): bzhin du'ang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur
359b6(mdo sde): blta na/'khor bar sems con rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams dang /skye mched dang /phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smras
359b7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs
360a1(mdo sde): de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyamasas myong bar gyur cig/ji ste bdag gis sngar smyos pa'i bar gyi thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu du
360a2(mdo sde): 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dpeng du gyur cig/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grwa sa mam+b+hachis
360a3(mdo sde): dgazhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis dbang du 'gyur zhing
360a4(mdo sde): ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rdo thog cing bdag bskal pa bzang
360a5(mdo sde): po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
360a6(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur ba stan bdag zin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang
360a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jog rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'jug bzhin du ya ni
360b1(mdo sde): lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa thob pa dang /sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /smon lam chen po zab mo
360b2(mdo sde): btab pa ni legs so legs so//lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing mtshams med pa byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang
360b3(mdo sde): 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no//ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems
360b4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sman dang /skyabs dang /dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so//sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyod kyi bsam
360b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig/rgyal po bdud rtsi dag po nyid kyang ngu zhing
360b6(mdo sde): bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po//khyod ni bde la mi gnas te//khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan//khyod ni bdag gi mtshan
360b7(mdo sde): ma yin//de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/sems can tshogs pa dag la khyod ma chagaso//dbang po ta thul rnams las dbang rta thul//dbang
361a1(mdo sde): po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de//gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du 'gyur//de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/sems can bye ba
361a2(mdo sde): stong phrag mang po rnams//dge ba'i don du kun nas 'dus pa dag/mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi//khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed//byang chub sems
361a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa//brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang //mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog/phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis//de phyir khyod la mchod par
361a4(mdo sde): 'os//byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/snying rje chen pos sems can la//de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin//khyod ni dus 'di zong nas kyang /
361a5(mdo sde): mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so//ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba//de
361a6(mdo sde): ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas//khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la//byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan//byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/
361a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par//sems can la brtse gzhan med do//gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog/khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan//spos kyi ser
361b1(mdo sde): ges smras pa/khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni//bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe//sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing //khyod kyi glags dang snyan pa 'thob//byang chub sems/
361b2(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing //log rgyas shin tu nyaming ba//sho za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i//sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar
361b3(mdo sde): gyur//mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing //nyon mongs 'dam du bying gyur la//mtshams med pa dag byed pa po//sems rgyad tshig rnams bzung
361b4(mdo sde): brur gyur//spos kyi glang pos smras pa/khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba//ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin//dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i//sems rgyud
361b5(mdo sde): tshig rnams bzung bar gyur//rin po che tog gis smras pa/ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang //snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po//'phags lo skur pa 'debs byed pa//
361b6(mdo sde): sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur//'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa/khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du//sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba//chang
361b7(mdo sde): ba stong 'drar gnas gyur pa//sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur//lag na ut+pa las smras pa/khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang //brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom//
362a1(mdo sde): skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa//sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur//ye shes grags pas smras pa/nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang //nyon
362a2(mdo sde): mongs rlung gis dreng po dag/ye shes chu yis zhi byas te//bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom//gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa/ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin//nyon mongs
362a3(mdo sde): dra ba rab bcom ste//nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i//brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la myeng //ut+pa lo zla bos kyang smras pa/ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas//brtson
362a4(mdo sde): 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos//srid pa'i 'ching bas rab bsdams pa//khams gsum po dag grol bar byed//dri med dbang pos smras pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
362a5(mdo sde): yul gyi/snying rje chen po dag bstan pa//snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba po//khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo//stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/nyan
362a6(mdo sde): mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus che//byang chung gang dag khyod la rten//khyod kyis nyon mongs brtsad nas gcang //smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur//skar ma skyong gis
362a7(mdo sde): kyang smras pa/ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba//dri med smon lam btab pa yis//byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi//sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro//byang
362b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/kye ma shes sgron sems can
362b2(mdo sde): rnams//nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom//khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can//sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad//rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
362b3(mdo sde): dang /lha dang /dri za dang /mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te don dang /tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshogs su bcad
362b4(mdo sde): pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa
362b5(mdo sde): dang /de nas de'i mod la sa cher g.yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa'ang g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun
362b6(mdo sde): tu rab tu g.yos/'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ldog/rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg cing /kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs
362b7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
363a1(mdo sde): drag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu'ang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab
363a2(mdo sde): par gyur te/'di lta ste/me tog man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dang /'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi tsher de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to//de nas byang chub
363a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis so/
363a4(mdo sde): g.yos pa de mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing /me tog gi
363a5(mdo sde): char chen po'ang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus so//yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
363a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che ngasags pa de na bcom
363a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' dpag/
363b1(mdo sde): tu med grangs med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
363b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang /zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ran chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin
363b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab por gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang
363b4(mdo sde): lags/rkyen ni gang lags/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
363b5(mdo sde): gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba
363b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhis la byang chub sems dpa' yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang /gzungs
363b7(mdo sde): kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to//de na byang chub sems dpa'
364a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/
364a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa bshad pa dang /srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lami btab
364a3(mdo sde): cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang /'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'ibar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas
364a4(mdo sde): na/gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang /
364a5(mdo sde): mtshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
364a6(mdo sde): gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mI dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
364a7(mdo sde): rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo
364b1(mdo sde): sbyar zhing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par byed do//sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa
364b2(mdo sde): nyon to//gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i ltu nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/phyogs
364b3(mdo sde): bcu'o 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do//
364b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sa par bya ba dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
364b5(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa nges pa bstan par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi rdzogs nas bsdu
364b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
364b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/btsun pa
365a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang /'khrug pa badro zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung ste/
365a2(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing /sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung
365a3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang
365a4(mdo sde): chub kyi spyod pa spyod pa lags/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni ngo gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
365a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta
365a6(mdo sde): ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng lce ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
365a7(mdo sde): de'ang nyon cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa
365b1(mdo sde): khyod la 'dri bar mdzad de/me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di'ang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje
365b2(mdo sde): tshon po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sgras gong bar gyur te/des na khyod kyis thams cad du
365b3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ljon pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la'ang
365b4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs
365b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu'ang /yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras
365b6(mdo sde): kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro//gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
365b7(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la
366a1(mdo sde): bkod par gyur te/de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyis lung
366a2(mdo sde): bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro//gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
366a3(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
366a4(mdo sde): nas/de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang spros shig/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems
366a5(mdo sde): dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang /bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
366a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs
366a7(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba spring zhing me tog zlab mdag mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de'ang blta ba'i srad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so//rigs kyi
366b1(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng la/der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi
366b2(mdo sde): sgo bstan pa'i spyod nga 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig/rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che'i tog dang /zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba
366b3(mdo sde): las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs te byang chub sems dpa' drung phyur phrag dgu dang /bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bsags
366b4(mdo sde): pa nas 'phags nas/'di lta ste dper na glog bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
366b5(mdo sde): dag rtog gi dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la bder dong ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pA rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs
366b6(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsalA te/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze la
366b7(mdo sde): thams cad dong ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong po dang /byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin
367a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa blta snyam mo//de nas
367a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyir phyogs te/bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces smras so//skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
367a3(mdo sde): zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur te/skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba'ang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa
367a4(mdo sde): bzhin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu medo grangs med pa dog nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog
367a5(mdo sde): mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang /bram ze la me tog bskur ba dang /yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba'ang ji
367a6(mdo sde): ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//de bzhin du lho phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na 'jig
367a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ba gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis bsgyings pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
367b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i
367b2(mdo sde): gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to//'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/cig shos ni seng ge rdo rje'i tog
367b3(mdo sde): ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/btsun pa bcom
367b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen no gang lags zhes bya ba'i byar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//de bzhin
367b5(mdo sde): du sbyar te lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs
367b6(mdo sde): med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
367b7(mdo sde): zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po
368a1(mdo sde): thul ba yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to//de na byang chub sems dpa'
368a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/skyes
368a3(mdo sde): bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan las cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab pa ji ltos gyur ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i
368a4(mdo sde): bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na
368a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen
368a6(mdo sde): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to//do na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
368a7(mdo sde): po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/cig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la btsun pa
368b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos
368b2(mdo sde): pa bzhin no//yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa don 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug
368b3(mdo sde): mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa
368b4(mdo sde): gsum gyis chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/cig shos ni rnam par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i
368b5(mdo sde): bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khrims me tog kun tu rgyas
368b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba zhig yad de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig
368b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la
369a1(mdo sde): gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/cig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga'
369a2(mdo sde): ba rnams 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yas
369a3(mdo sde): shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
369a4(mdo sde): kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/de na de
369a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston
369a6(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang /gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang
369a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to//de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan po gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje
369b1(mdo sde): chen po yongs su drasgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang /
369b2(mdo sde): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs
369b3(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma
369b4(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang /mtshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub
369b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /de
369b6(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag
369b7(mdo sde): byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do//sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung
370a1(mdo sde): bstan pa nyan to//gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des
370a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos shing 'gul ba dang /mi
370a3(mdo sde): tog gi cher dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sang
370a4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi
370a5(mdo sde): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod
370a6(mdo sde): pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gi shogs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to////bam po bcu gnyis pa//rigs
370a7(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang /
370b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
370b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur
370b3(mdo sde): cing /sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji
370b4(mdo sde): srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal
370b5(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
370b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa

371a1(mdo sde): tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma
371a2(mdo sde): med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

371a5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

371a7(mdo sde): sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcugatsong btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom
371b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis

371b3(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal
371b4(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar ngag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas

371b6(mdo sde): smros shig/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
371b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis
372a1(mdo sde): legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing /me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de'ang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag

372a7(mdo sde): po ga la ba der dong ngo //yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg po chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
372b1(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bla drug dang /lha rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur te/'di lta ste dper na/bu ram shing gi
372b2(mdo sde): tshal lam/'dam bu'i tshal lam/til gyi zhing ngam/'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs
