372b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
372b7(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de
373a1(mdo sde): drag phul nas smras pa/skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pAr snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur zhing
373a2(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te/yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no//me tig gang yin pa de dag sangs
373a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong po dag tu char bzhin du rab tu 'bab pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos
373a4(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /snang ba'i sgra dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /stobs kyi sgra dang /mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang /mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /mngon par
373a5(mdo sde): 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang /skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /zhi ba'i sgra dang /nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /byams pa chen po'i sgra dang /
373a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i sgra dang /mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang /dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang /theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi sgra ste/me tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i
373a7(mdo sde): sgra de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba/chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/gang dag
373b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /smon lam
373b2(mdo sde): gyi dbang dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du/
373b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems
373b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la'ang mchod pa byas nas chos nyan pa'i
373b5(mdo sde): phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod de//rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa
373b6(mdo sde): de dag gis mchod pa byas te gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs
373b7(mdo sde): pa rin po'i tshe'i snying po ting nge 'dzin glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
374a1(mdo sde): bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang /shing ljon pa rnams dang /rtsa dang /shing dang /sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo //
374a2(mdo sde): sems can gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po//kha cig ni dkar po/kha cig ni bcing kha
374a3(mdo sde): kha cig ni dmar po/kha cig ni nag po/kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang /kha cig ni me lta bur/kha cig ni nam mkha' lta bur/kha cig
374a4(mdo sde): ni smig rgyu lta bur/kha cig ni chu lta bur/kha cig nI ri lta bur/kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/kha cig ni me tog lta bur/kha tsag ni nam mkha'
374a5(mdo sde): lding lta bur/kha cig ni seng ge lta bur/kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/kha cig ni skar ma lta bur/kha cig ni bya rgod lta bu dang /kha cig ni wa lta bu dag tu
374a6(mdo sde): kun tu snang ste/chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kun tu snang ngo //rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang
374a7(mdo sde): dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku'ang mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze
374b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu de na sems can
374b2(mdo sde): gang drag sa dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang /'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku'ang de ltar mthong ste/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
374b3(mdo sde): che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
374b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can babrang ba las yang
374b5(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang /'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te legs so legs so//bram ze 'di lta ste dper na me tog gi shing phun
374b6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog sna tshogs dang /dI sna tshogs dang /reg pa sna tshogs dang /'dab ma sna tshogs dang /sdong bu sna tshogs dang /rtsa ba sna tshogs dang /sman gyi yo byad
374b7(mdo sde): kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do//de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/kha cig gis ni dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang nge lhan
375a1(mdo sde): ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te/de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed la/de na sems
375a2(mdo sde): can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i de bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur/yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa
375a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brla rtswa bzhi po dag gis gtses pa ru gyur pa de dag gis de bsdams na ni nad thams cad
375a4(mdo sde): las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang /de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang /brgyal ba dang /smos pa dang /rengs pa dang /sems rmugs pa dang /sems rnam par
375a5(mdo sde): g.yengs pa dang /dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po mkhrang
375a6(mdo sde): ba sra ba rdo rje las grub pa 'jam pa sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/'dab ma ni gser/ze'u 'bru ni rdo'i snying po//ze ba ni mu tig dmar po//'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong //rgyar ni dpag
375a7(mdo sde): tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing lhung
375b1(mdo sde): de lhan ner 'gyur la/bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag na sems can gyi khams gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang /nang
375b2(mdo sde): kyis nyen pa dang /yan lag nyams pa dang /myos pa dang /brgyal ba dang /smyos pa dang /gnyid log pa dang /dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang /sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i
375b3(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang
375b4(mdo sde): dag shi nas yun ring po ma len zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis phog gam/dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing yang phyis
375b5(mdo sde): langs te mdza' bshes dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas
375b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun ring por gnas
375b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/bram rdo me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di'ang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o//ji
376a1(mdo sde): ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas lhang nge lhan ne/shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/kha cig
376a2(mdo sde): gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nod sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu
376a3(mdo sde): dam pa byung ba yin no//ji ltar nyi mo shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha phye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ner gyur nas/nad sna tshogs kyis nyon pa'i sems can rnams kyi nod nye bar
376a4(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste/thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams
376a5(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang /khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
376a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
376a7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung /kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa yin no//skyes
376b1(mdo sde): bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa/gdul sla ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
376b2(mdo sde): bdag yongs su dazung bas na de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no//de dag ni snying rje chen ngos
376b3(mdo sde): sems can tshad med grangs med dpog tu med pa dag yongs su bzung zhing /de ltar sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tshim par byas kyang /nga'i sems skad cig gcig tsam
376b4(mdo sde): yang 'gyod par ma gyur pa la ltos/der ngas smon lam 'di lta bu'ang btab ste/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
376b5(mdo sde): lta na/bdag gi bsam pa 'di'ang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ji ltar bdag gis gling gcig tu rang gi lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
376b6(mdo sde): zhing rdul med lhun po spos 'di'i gling thams cad du'adra lo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de lta bu'i lus 'byung bar gyur cig/gling gcig tu lo khri'i bar du ji lta ba de bzhin du gling thams
376b7(mdo sde): cad du'ang rang gi sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang /mig dang rna ba dang /sna dang mchu dang lce dang skra dag gis sems can thams cad tshim par byas shing /theg pa gsum po dag yang dag
377a1(mdo sde): par 'dzin du bcug par gyur cig/mi rnams dang gnod sbyin dang /srin po rnams dang /drud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang /gang drug shAza zhing khrag
377a2(mdo sde): ba so so'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /phan gu shin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar de dag kyang bdag gis tshim par byed par gyur ci//ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning gcig tu rang gi
377a3(mdo sde): lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyid dag tu'ang rang gi sho dang khrag dang pags pa dang /
377a4(mdo sde): mig dang lce'i bar drug dang /de lta bu'i lus kyis bskal pa chen po grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /de dag de lta bu'i lus thob nas/rlung gi lus dang srog gis
377a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig/gal te bdag sems can rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir/rang gi lus de lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar mi byed dam/ji ltar
377a6(mdo sde): bdag re zhing sems pa'i bdag gi smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na/gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs
377a7(mdo sde): te 'tsha zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang
377b1(mdo sde): rgyurgya bar ma gyur cig/bdag 'khor ba na 'khor bar tshe/sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par ma gyur cig/chos kyi sgra'ang mi thos/dge 'dun gyi sgra'ang mi thos/pha rol tu phyin pa'i
377b2(mdo sde): sgra'ang mi thos/bdud kyi dpung pham pa'i sgra'ang mi thos/mi 'jigs pa'i sgra'ang mi thos pa nas/'khor ba na dge ba'i sgra'i bar yang thos par mi 'gyur zhing /rtag tu mnar med pa'i
377b3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po ni gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu'ang btab bo//ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gleng thams cad kyi gling re rer yang de lta bu'i lus ngag yongs su
377b4(mdo sde): btang zhing /rang bI sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas pa de bzhin du/phyogs bcu'i gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang de lta bu'i lus dag yongs
377b5(mdo sde): su btang ste/rang bI sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byos so//rigs kyi bu de'i tshangs rgyun ma chad par mig dag yongs su btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi phung po'ang dzam+bu gling 'di
377b6(mdo sde): nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i mthar thug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ltos/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs
377b7(mdo sde): pa'i lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bsdus pa yin no//sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad
378a1(mdo sde): la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'tshol ba ma yin te/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su
378a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no//gang drug nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod
378a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi ye shes dang /bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no//gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/dge ba'i rtsa
378a4(mdo sde): ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/bud med rnam par spangs pa/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas
378a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
378a6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis ches ston par gyur cig/bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/yun
378a7(mdo sde): ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang /gdul sla ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu
378b1(mdo sde): 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang /bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa'ang ma yin la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o//rigs
378b2(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/sor mo lnga las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/kha dog du ma/kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu
378b3(mdo sde): dkyi'o//'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can+da zhes bya ba yod
378b4(mdo sde): de/'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu po mdog ngan pa/mi sdug pa/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo//de na de bzhin gshegs
378b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang /
378b6(mdo sde): mthe bo can gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang /sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis
378b7(mdo sde): chos ston to//rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /mi de dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
379a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa
379a2(mdo sde): 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/srog chags
379a3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod do//sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
379a4(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag
379a5(mdo sde): pa dag yongs su bzung ngo //kha cig gis ni yongs su mo dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo //de na sems can chen po des nga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
379a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag sde rab tu gnas par byas nas/der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar
379a7(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo//de bzhin
379b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa des kyang nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge pa'i
379b2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems
379b3(mdo sde): can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang /sems kyi rgyu tshig pa dang /'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes
379b4(mdo sde): bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhin dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang
379b5(mdo sde): legs so zhes pho nya btang ste/snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so//nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
379b6(mdo sde): chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/de
379b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/des dang po
380a1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i
380a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo //des dang po gang
380a3(mdo sde): dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas
380a4(mdo sde): pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro//bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dong ba
380a5(mdo sde): dag na sems can tshe ring ba/bsam pa yongs su dag pa/bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga'
380a6(mdo sde): ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dran pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur
380a7(mdo sde): pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs paro chos ston pa la ltos/skyes bu dam pa khyod
380b1(mdo sde): kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing sdigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams med pa byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su
380b2(mdo sde): rlung zhing smon lam khyod par can btab pas ni/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams nad zil gyis mnan to//byang chub sems dpa' grang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /rlung
380b3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su sbyangs pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can posam pa dge
380b4(mdo sde): pa shin tu dul ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyus
380b5(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no//bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/
380b6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa dang /sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /byang chub thob nas nyan
380b7(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang /byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/
381a1(mdo sde): des ni byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/pad+ma dkar po lta bu'ang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/bram ze 'di lta ste
381a2(mdo sde): dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gis phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon
381a3(mdo sde): mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang /bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos
381a4(mdo sde): po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par smon pa dang /sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
381a5(mdo sde): pa byed par smon pa dang /byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang /byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig par
381a6(mdo sde): maro sgrub par smon pa ste/bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
381a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po rnams zhes bya'i/me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o//bram ze 'di lta ste dper na khyod
381b1(mdo sde): ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes
381b2(mdo sde): pa yin no//gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams med pa byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs mo lnga
381b3(mdo sde): bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs
381b4(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/pho nya dag kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so//'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson
381b5(mdo sde): par gyur to//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs po'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed
381b6(mdo sde): gnyis pa la bab pa ni bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing dga' ba dang /'chi ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'jig rten ldongs
381b7(mdo sde): pa/'dren pa med pa/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing /sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa/nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/mtshams med pa byed pa/'phags pa
382a1(mdo sde): la skur pa 'debs pa/dam pa'i chos spong ba/ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs
382a2(mdo sde): pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog/chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/dpung sgyur ba'i bdud dang /
382a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcol te/phyogs bcu'i sang sa rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa drug tu smras khyab par byas nas/khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur

382a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad mod pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa

382b1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par gyur to//skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus las skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis
382b2(mdo sde): smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' dge byed par 'gyur te/sngor ji skad smos pa de bzhin du yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro///

382b4(mdo sde): kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing /byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang /grogs byed par gyur nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/khyod srid pa tha mar
382b5(mdo sde): gyur pa na bdag khyod kyi phar gyur cig/skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag go mchog tu 'gyur zhong khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
382b6(mdo sde): tu lung ston par gyur cig/gzhan yang de ni rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i 'o zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/bskal pa grangs mod pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar

383a1(mdo sde): rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod la bsnun pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar

383a3(mdo sde): pha rol sems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas/khyed kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/bdag
383a4(mdo sde): cag shes rab dang ljon pa dang /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nyan thos zung du gyur cig/gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod lta mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//snying
383a5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas srid pa tha mi'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig/gzhan yang ri rtse'i lha mo nges pa king+ku ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/snying rje
383a6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe robs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cing /khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par

383b1(mdo sde): kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag
383b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig/khyod kyis chos bstan
383b3(mdo sde): pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig/chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig/'chi ba med pa'ang rtogs par gyur cig/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs

383b6(mdo sde): bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig/bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig/rtag

384b1(mdo sde): bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i

386a6(mdo sde): gri drung du srong mo pa gang dag nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/skom dag blangs par gyur pa dang /bdag gis sug pa nas thu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas
386a7(mdo sde): kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/gal te 'khor ba las yongs su thar par mi
386b1(mdo sde): bgyid dam/nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/theg pa chen pos lung ston par mi bgyid na/bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
386b2(mdo sde): na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
386b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang
386b4(mdo sde): ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rtse 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang
386b5(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dro pa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye me snyed las
386b6(mdo sde): shin tu lhag pa snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyang nas/'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer so sor rtog pa
386b7(mdo sde): zhes bya bar skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
387a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag maHzhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cing /lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas
387a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegaso pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang
387a3(mdo sde): phyaphyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni wa stong du gnas par gyur to//dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong
387a4(mdo sde): du gnas par gyur to//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos
387a5(mdo sde): kyi tshul dang /dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas pa na dge slong dang /dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal pa/sdig pa'i chos dang ljon pa/mi mthun par spyod pa/mchod
387a6(mdo sde): rten gyi nor 'phrog pa/ngo tsha med pa rnams dang /chos kyi mched pa gcod par byed pa/ngo tsha med pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang /mngon du gyur
387a7(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dngo /nad kyi gsos sman dang /yo byad gcod cing gong zag gir yongs su bzung ste/bdag spring
387b1(mdo sde): par byed pa'am/khyim pa la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho des theg pa gsum
387b2(mdo sde): po dag gis rim gyis lung ba ston to//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la ngur smrig dmar po bgos pa thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir/
387b3(mdo sde): mi ldog par lung bstan to//dge slong ngam/dge slong ma'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma grang su dag snga ma kho na bzhin du ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang ston por
387b4(mdo sde): 'du shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang byang
387b5(mdo sde): chub kyi spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
387b6(mdo sde): che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di lta bu lags te/ji srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa
387b7(mdo sde): nas/byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i bar du bdag gis sems can gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang /
388a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar 'gyur ba dang /rab tu 'god par 'gyur ba'am/tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i sems
388a2(mdo sde): can de dag las sems can 'ga' tsam zhig bdag gis theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par ma gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
388a3(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/bdag kyang
388a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar ma gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bla ni med pa'i ye shes thob nas kyang
388a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag bdag gis bstan pa la chos gos ngur smrig bgos par gyur pa las ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa'am/nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba la zhugs par gyur pa
388a6(mdo sde): 'am/dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul par gyur cing /nongs pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma 'am/gang
388a7(mdo sde): dag skad cig gcig tsam bdag la ston pa'i 'du shes sam/gus pa'i sems bskyed par gyur pa'i sems can de dag las btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis tha na
388b1(mdo sde): sems can 'ga' tsam zhig spangs shing theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par ma gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas
388b2(mdo sde): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos
388b3(mdo sde): dur smrig dmar po lha dang mi rnams kyis gus par bgyis pa dang /bla mar bgyis pa dang /ri mor bgyis pa dang /mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ba mthong mthag tu ngur smrig mgul
388b4(mdo sde): nathogs par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/sems can gang dge bza' ba dang /btung ba dang bral zhing bkres pa dang /
388b5(mdo sde): skom pas gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /tha na gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gang dag tha na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar
388b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba thams cad kyang bza' ba dang /btung ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/lha 'am/gnod sbyin nam/srin po'am/klu'am/
388b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin nam/nam mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am ci 'am/lto 'phye chen po 'am/grul bum mam/sha za'am/mi 'am/sems can gang dag phan tshun zhe 'gras shing
389a1(mdo sde): 'khon bcugs mang por gyur pa rnams dang /phan tshun 'gyed cing g.yul ngor zhugs te/g.yul spyod par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang bdag gi chos gos ngur
389a2(mdo sde): smig rjes su dran par gyur na/sems can de dag snying rje'i sems dang /'jam pa'i sems dang /khon med pa'i sems dang /las su rung ba'i sems su gyur cig/
389a3(mdo sde): sems can gang dag g.yul ngo 'am/'gyed pa 'am/'thab pa 'am/rtsod pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba dang /gus par bgyi ba'i slad du ngur smrig gi
389a4(mdo sde): dum bu 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang /'khrul pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba ma mchis par gyur cig/g.yul ngo
389a5(mdo sde): dang /'gyed pa dang /thab mo dang /rtsod pa de dag las kyang legs par yongs su thar bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig
389a6(mdo sde): dmar po 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan par ma gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/bdag gos
389a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par rngo mi thog pa dang /bdag gis chos rnams bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /bdag gis gzhan mu stegs can
389b1(mdo sde): rnams tshar gcod par rngo mi thog pa'i bar du gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du de
389b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib pa bas par 'gyur zhing /mthar yang sangs
389b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur legs so//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag
389b4(mdo sde): g.yas pa brkyang ste/phyag gi mthil gyis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba/bzang

389b7(mdo sde): su bkab tsong phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mi thal gyis byugs pa dang /lung bstan 'di legs so zhes bya ba byin pa nas mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba skyes nas
390a1(mdo sde): /che lo nyi shu lon pa lta bu'i chang tsam du gzhon nur red //rigs kyi bu gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /dri za dang /mi dang /
390a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur cing /me tog dang rol ma'i sgra dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
390a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa byas te/bsngags pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs kyis bstod nas thal mo sbyor te 'khod do//theg
390a4(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar po las lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'i///bam po bcu gsum pa//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
390a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i
390a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la gus pa dang bcas pas yongs su zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
390a7(mdo sde): lom ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan legs na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
390b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
390b2(mdo sde): bstan pa dang /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lugs/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo tshogs
390b3(mdo sde): ji lta bu dang ldan na bstan par gnas pa lags/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa ji lta bus ni brgyan pa legs/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
390b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod
390b5(mdo sde): kyi zhu ba bzang /spobs pa dge ste/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyed sems
390b6(mdo sde): can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang /gtsos spros byed pa rgya chen po skyes pa yin te/legs so legs so//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs
390b7(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar
391a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa yin no//rin chen phyag rgya zhes
391a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do//seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/de la gnas nas ting nge
391a3(mdo sde): 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed do//zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed do//zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge
391a4(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do//chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad khong du chud
391a5(mdo sde): par byed do//phyag rgya rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni tong nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta bar byed do//chos kyi dbyings su rnam par song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
391a6(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par 'gro bar byed do//nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rgyal mtshan
391a7(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed do//rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed par byed do//chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la phyag rgyas
391b1(mdo sde): 'debs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po shin tu brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po nyid du rab tu gnas par byed do//'od zer 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
391b2(mdo sde): gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od zer 'gyed par byed do//stobs kyi brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la stobs dang brtson 'grus su byed do//yang
391b3(mdo sde): dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad las gyen du 'phags par byed do//nges pa'i tshig ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig la
391b4(mdo sde): 'jug par byed do//tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ming gi rjes su 'jug par byed do//phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni
391b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed do//chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba rjes su rtogs par byed do//phyag rgya yongs
391b6(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par byed do//chos thams cad la dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad las dben pa'o chos nyid la
391b7(mdo sde): rjes su 'jug par byed do//brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed par byed de//chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin
392a1(mdo sde): thams cad la mi g.yo ba nyid du gnas par byed do//chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad sdud cing
392a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'du bar byed do//chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'byung ba dang /'jug pa'i rlom sems med par byed
392a3(mdo sde): drodo//nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nam mkha' ltar khyab par byed do//chos thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni
392a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par byed do//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin par byed do//chos thams
392a5(mdo sde): cad ro gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bcud 'dzin par byed do//rin chen rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni yo byad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar
392a6(mdo sde): byed do//chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med par ston par byed do//rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
392a7(mdo sde): ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi mi lhan ne lhang nger byed do//chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed do//
392b1(mdo sde): tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ting bye dzin gyichos rnams nam yang 'tshal bar mi b+hed du//gnas la brten pa mad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin ma
392b2(mdo sde): da la/gnas pa'i chos nam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur snying po
392b3(mdo sde): med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed //sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams spong bar byed do//
392b4(mdo sde): gzugs mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni gzugs kun tu snang bar byed do//dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la skyon ma bzhin du byed do//chos
392b5(mdo sde): thams cad mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes mu med par sten par byed do//glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad lo shes pa mu
392b6(mdo sde): med pa ston par byed do//'od thams cad byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'od byed pa'i sgo nye bar ston par byed do//khams kyi mtha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting mi
392b7(mdo sde): 'dzin mtha' med pa thams cad rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar ston par byed do//ting nge 'dzin dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi chos rnams la stong pa nyid
393a1(mdo sde): rjes su thob par byed do//lhun po ltar bkra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad gsog nyid du kun tu ston par byed do//'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
393a2(mdo sde): ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel bar byed do//chos thams cad kyi brda'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid du yang drug par ston par byed do//dga'
393a3(mdo sde): ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dga' ba rab tu thob par byed do//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams
393a4(mdo sde): cad la ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa ston par byed do//glog 'gyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi zad pa nyid ston par byed do//chos thams cad la rnam par
393a5(mdo sde): g.yeng ba med cing rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi shes pa rdul dang bral ba nye bar ston par byed do//mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni
393a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa med pa dang /zad pa med pa ma yin pa yang dag par ston par byed do//chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
393a7(mdo sde): gyis ni chos thams cad mig yor lta bur ston par byed do//gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes 'bor bar byed do//zad pa dang bral ba'i
393b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par med pa dang /nyams pa med par ston par byed do//mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la g.yo bar mi byed
393b2(mdo sde): 'gul bar mi byed/'phro bar mi byed do//rnam par 'phel pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la shes bya rnam par 'phel bar yang dag par
393b3(mdo sde): rjes su mthong bar byed do//nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od zer gyi sgo dag 'gyed par byed do//zla ba dri ma mod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin
393b4(mdo sde): thams cad la snang bar byed do//snang ba dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par byed do//bya ba dang mi bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
393b5(mdo sde): gyis ni bya ba dang mi bya ba byed cing ye shes rtog kyang yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad nges par 'byed par byed cing gang la 'byed
393b6(mdo sde): pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni sems g.yo bar mi byed/'gul bar mi byed/snang bar mi byed cing gnod par 'gyur
393b7(mdo sde): ba'ang med la/de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no snyam du'ang mi sems par byed do//kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang ba yang dag par rjes su
394a1(mdo sde): mthong bar byed do//rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas pa nyid kyis rab tu gnas par byed do//rin chen
394a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rin po che brtsegs pa lta bur kun tu snang bar byed do//chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin
394a3(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed cing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//
394a4(mdo sde): dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la dga' ba spong bar byed do//chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yi ge mi mnyam pa nyid rab tu
394a5(mdo sde): 'thob par byed do//yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs par byed do//dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos
394a6(mdo sde): thams cad la dmyigs pa rnam par gcod par byed do//'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la 'gyur ba myi dmigs par byed do//rang bzhin rnam par
394a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la phan 'dogs pa mi dmigs par byed do//gnas med par rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas mi dmigs
394b1(mdo sde): par byed do//rab rib dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mun pa'i yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do//yon
394b2(mdo sde): tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la bsngags pa spong bar byed do//sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la sems
394b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba mi dmigs par byed do//byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad rtogs par byed do//dran pa rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams
394b4(mdo sde): cad la spobs pa grangs med pa thob par byed do//de byed pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do//ye
394b5(mdo sde): shes tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni khams gsum thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do//shes pa nye bar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad rnam par gcod pa
394b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//ye shes rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phro ba nyid rjes su thob par byed do//gnas med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
394b7(mdo sde): gyis ni chos thams cad gnas su gyur pa med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos 'ga' yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes
395a1(mdo sde): su mi mthong bar byed do//rnam par sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsgrub par yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//srid pa'i/
395a2(mdo sde): gzhi thams cad rnam par sel ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i ye shes 'jug cing gang la 'jug pa 'ga' yang mi rnyed par byed do//
395a3(mdo sde): brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni sgra dang brda thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed do//sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang
395a4(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzi brjid kyis lam me lhan ne lhang nger byed do//ye shes mchog gi
395a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid ston par byed do//mngon par shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin
395a6(mdo sde): gyis ni chos thams cad la mngon par rig pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos dang ting nge 'dzin
395a7(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyis mchog dang ldan par byed do//sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa yang dag par rjes
395b1(mdo sde): su mthong bar byed do//byed rgyu mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la zad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//gzungs kyi gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams
395b2(mdo sde): cad dang /chos thams cad 'dzin cing yang dag pa nyid dang /log pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//'gag pa dang 'gal ba rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams
395b3(mdo sde): cad dang mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dus byas kyi dri ma dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su
395b4(mdo sde): mi mthong bar byed do//snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la snying po med pa mi dmigs par byed do//zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams
395b5(mdo sde): cad la yon tan yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed do//snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed
395b6(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do//mnyam pa nyid rnam par snang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rtse gcig pa nyid rab tu thob
395b7(mdo sde): par byed do//nyon mongs pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par byed do//rlung
396a1(mdo sde): gi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas par mi byed do//de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
396a2(mdo sde): nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed do//lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la 'jig tshogs mi dmigs par byed do//ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig
396a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' ltang+ge gyur po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la ngag gi las mi dmigs par byed do//nam mkha' ltar tshugs pa med la rnam par grol
396a4(mdo sde): zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur te/de ni theg pa chen po la yang
396a5(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags rnam
396a6(mdo sde): par dag pa'i sgo sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
396a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshon dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su
396b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
396b2(mdo sde): gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro//byang
396b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar
396b4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su
396b5(mdo sde): rung bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa'i
396b6(mdo sde): sems med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo ba med par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
396b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro
397a1(mdo sde): baspong bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
397a2(mdo sde): kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin po thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas de'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las
397a3(mdo sde): byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i chags ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi
397a4(mdo sde): tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
397a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i tshogs ni/lus dang /tshor ba dang /sems dang /chos rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag
397a6(mdo sde): par spong ba'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad sgom par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs
397a7(mdo sde): nilus dang sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur
397b1(mdo sde): ro/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs
397b2(mdo sde): ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang
397b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing mtho ris su skye ba thob par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig
397b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ston pa'i tshogs ni shes pa gzhan la rag ma las par byed par
397b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad kyi sgo yin par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
397b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs ni tshogs thams cad mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur ro//byang
397b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar thos
398a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro///
398a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
398a3(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams
398a4(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo yang dag par sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
398a5(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po la rnam par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
398a6(mdo sde): po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan ji lta bus brgyan na bzod pa yongs
398a7(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/don dam pa mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'bad pa don yod pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /khams gsum pa thams cad
398b1(mdo sde): dang /sems can thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos mi 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ste/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang gi sems chos thams
398b2(mdo sde): cad la nam mkha' dang lag par mnyam pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa'i rgyun yin no//ji ltar na bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa dang /
398b3(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang /snying rje dang /sems can med pa nyid dang /dga' ba dang /yid byung ba dang /btang snyoms dang /gang zag med pa nyid dang /sbyin pa dang /dul ba'i sems
398b4(mdo sde): nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /bzod pa dang /bzod pa'i sems nyid dang /brtson 'grus dang /dben pa'i sems nyid dang /bsam gtan dang //
398b5(mdo sde): nges par sems dpa'i sems nyid dang /shes rab dang /rgya che ba'i sems nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /dran pa med pa dang /yid la byed pa med pa'i sems dang /yang
398b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i spyod pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /chos thams cad 'gro med pa'i sems nyid dang /dad pa dang /thogs
398b7(mdo sde): ba med de'i sems nyid dang /dran pa dang /rang rlung gi sems nyid dang //ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sems nyid dang /shes rab kyi dbang po dang /dbang
399a1(mdo sde): po med pa'i sems nyid dang /stobs dang /mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang /byang chub kyi yan ldag dang /blo rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid dang /lam+bu dang /skom
399a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems nyid dang /zhi gnas dang /nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /lhag mthong dang /rmongs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa dang /shin tu yongs
399a3(mdo sde): su shes pa'i sgom pa'i sems nyid dang /sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang /mun pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /chos yid la byed pa dang /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang /
399a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang /gnas pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid dang /dam pa'i chos
399a5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang /zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang /mtshan yongs
399a6(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i sems nyid dang /bzod pa thob pa dang /dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /'jug pa dang ldog
399a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems nyid dang /byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang /khams gsum gyi snying po len pa'i sems nyid dang /sems can thams cad la bdud tshar bcad pa'i sems dang /sems can
399b1(mdo sde): thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems nyid dang /byang chub dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gtogs pa'i sems nyid dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /chos thams cad
399b2(mdo sde): bskor ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa dang /'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems nyid kyi chos de la gang rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ba'am/
399b3(mdo sde): rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs shing /rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos la mos par byed pa'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na gang dag phyogs bcu nas sngon gyi
399b4(mdo sde): tshul bye ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la lhags pa'i byang
399b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sa ya phrag drug dang bzhi 'bum po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
399b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed
399b7(mdo sde): kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyis ni phyir ma ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to///
400a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha'
400a2(mdo sde): dag yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'ang mchog tu dga'
400a3(mdo sde): nga dang rab tu dang ba des gzhon nu lo nyi shu lon pa lta bur reng nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu bdud rtsi dag pa de'ang du stong
400a4(mdo sde): dang /khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang /gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te/mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang /
400a5(mdo sde): thos pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa dag gis mngon par brtson par byas par gyur to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des
400a6(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas mthar gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bklags zhing kun chub par byas so//rang sangs rgyas
400a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri lung mnos shing bklags te kun chub pa'i bar du byas so//de bzhin du bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i gtam la'ang lus dran pa nye bar bzhag
400b1(mdo sde): pa'i gtam 'bum lung mnos shing bklags te kun chub par byas so//tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang /sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang /chos dran
400b2(mdo sde): pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam 'bum yang lung mnos te bklags shing kun chub par byas so//khams kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /skye mched kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /'dod
400b3(mdo sde): chags kyi kun tu sbyor ba spong ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /zhe sdang gi kun tu sbyor ba spong ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /gti mug gi kun tu sbyor ba spong ba'i rten cing 'brel bar
400b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
400b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyi gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing bklags te kun chub par byas so//de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas chos kyi phung po 'bum phrag bcu'i bar dag kyang bzung zhing
400b6(mdo sde): bklags te kun chub par byas so//rigs kyi bu ji tsam gyi dus gzhan zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po phung po'i lhag ma med
400b7(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des rol mo'i sgra dang /me tog dang /phye ma dang /me tog phreng
401a1(mdo sde): dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag gis
401a2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas shing spos chu sna tshogs kyis bkrus nas/sku gdung gzhag pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya rgyar ni dpag tshad phyed yod pa'ang
401a3(mdo sde): brtsigs/de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du rol mo'i sgra dang /me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rin po
401a4(mdo sde): che dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi mchod pa byas nas der yang sems can dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod
401a5(mdo sde): de zhag bdun po de dag 'das nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu mngon par byung ste/skra dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/yang dag par dang
401a6(mdo sde): pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byas te/lo khri'i bar du dam pa'i chos 'dzin
401a7(mdo sde): par gyur nas/der yang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//gsum la skyabs su 'go ba
401b1(mdo sde): la'ang rab tu bkod do//dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la'ang bcud de rab tu bkod do//des
401b2(mdo sde): yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag mang po dag mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa la nges par sbyar cing nges pa dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la'ang nges par sbyar//
401b3(mdo sde): phung po rnams ngag lta bur gyur par yongs su shes pa la'ang nges par sbyar/skye mched de rnams grong stong pa lta bur yongs su shes pa la'ang nges par sbyar/chos thams cad rten cing 'brel
401b4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'o zhes 'dus byas shes pa mthong ba yongs su shes pa lo'ang nges por sbyar/chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang /mig sgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bur yang bstan/skye ba
401b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i 'gog pa dang /zhi ba dang /rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /mchog dang /gya nom pa'i 'gog pa mya ngan las
401b6(mdo sde): 'das pa yongs su shes pa'ang bstan te/'phagaso ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu bkod nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to//sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'
401b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa la snga ma bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus pa dag la rus pa'i mchod pa byed
402a1(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/de'i tshe na sems can de dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po de'i rus bdag la mchod pa byas so//gang gi nyin mo snying rje chen po
402a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po 'che ba'i dus byas par gyur pa de'i nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i dam pa'i chos kyang nub ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
402a3(mdo sde): po de dag gis ni smon lam gyi dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu skye ba yongs su bzung ste/kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes so//kha cig ni mi
402a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du/kha cig ni klu rnams kyi nang du/kha cig ni lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du/kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas sna tshogs dog tu skyes so//rigs
402a5(mdo sde): kyi bu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po'i 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khro 'das pa de na 'jig
402a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yang dag 'dren ces bya ba yod de/de na mi rnams ni tshe lo brgyad cu thub la/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gtum po/lag pa khrag gis gos pa/sdig pa la zhen pa/
402a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad lo brtse ba med par zhugs pa/mar mi 'dzin pa/par mi 'dzin pa/'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba sha stag ste/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
402b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren der gdol pa'i rigs su skyes par gyur te/de'ang lus shin tu ring bar gyur cing /shin tu stobs dang ldan
402b2(mdo sde): pa/shin tu shugs dang ldan pa/shin tu dran pa dang ldan pa/shin tu spobs pa dang ldan pa/shin tu mgyogs pa dang ldan par gyur nas/des stobs kyi shugs brtan pas
402b3(mdo sde): sems can dag bzung ste smras pa/kye sems can dag khyed cig gal te ma byin par len pa spong ba dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar byed na
402b4(mdo sde): ngas khyed cag ga srog sbyin par bya zhing /'tsho ba'i yo byad dag kyang sbyin par bya'o//kye gal te mi spong na ngas srog dang phral te 'gro'o//de nas sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te
402b5(mdo sde): smras pa mgon po khyod kyi tshig gis bdag cag de deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ma byin par len pa nas log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar bgyid do//gdol pa stobs can de song nas
402b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /rgyal pos bkrabs pa dag la bsgo ba/kho bo'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad du zas dang /skom dang /bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /btung ba dang /gos dang /mal
402b7(mdo sde): tshe dang /spos dang /'gron bu dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang man shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul dang /sa le sbram dag dgos kyis
403a1(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po dag kho bo la phul cig/gdol pa stobs can des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /
403a2(mdo sde): de nas mi de dag kyang tshe lo lnga brgya thub par gyur to//de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang /de nas rgyal po'i blon po de dag gis gdol pa stobs can de rgyal po'i
403a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis ring po ma lon par yul der
403a4(mdo sde): rjes su bstan te/brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul bas yul gnyis par rjes su bstan nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs ring po ma lon par dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du stobs kyi 'khor los
403a5(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bar du gyur to//gang gi tshe rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal srid bzung nas/de'i 'og tu sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba yang
403a6(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du btsug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /log par lta ba'i bar dag spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de yang dag pa'i lta
403a7(mdo sde): ba'i bar dag la rab tu bkod do//sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do//de nas rgyal po bsod
403b1(mdo sde): nams stobs kyis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod cing theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du sgra dbyangs rjes
403b2(mdo sde): su bsgrags pa/slongs mo pa gang su dag zas 'dod pa dang /rin po che'i bar dag 'dod pa de dag thams cad tshur shog shig dang /ngas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgrags
403b3(mdo sde): so//de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lhags nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs la slongs mo byed par gyur pa dang /rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis
403b4(mdo sde): kyang de dag las brtsams te sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byin no//de nas 'tsho ba po rdul dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi drung du song ste smras pa/rgyal po
403b5(mdo sde): chen po gal te khyod bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhed cing sbyin pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar mdzad la/rgyal po chen po
403b6(mdo sde): gal te khyod kyis bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur no na rgyal po chen po khyod rgyal ba 'jig rten gyi sgron mar 'gyur legs so//rgyal pos smras pa khyod ci 'dod//
403b7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs kyis smras pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen por rab tu 'joms pa'i rigs sngags 'chang nyid 'tshal na/cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa'i slad du mi
404a1(mdo sde): gson po'i pags pa'ang 'tshal/mig kyang 'tshal te/de'i slang du bdag khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis nas gsol ba bgyid lags so//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po song
404a2(mdo sde): nams stobs 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob nas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag cig dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod cing //
404a3(mdo sde): theg pa gsum po dag 'a'ang nges par sbyar te/bdag gis sbyin pa'ang dpag tu med pa zhig byin na/da ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po len par byed pa zhig ste/bdag gi dge ba'i
404a4(mdo sde): bshes gnyen yin no snyam nas rgyal pos smras pa/ngas khyod la sha'i mig tha mAl pa 'di sbyin par byas dga' bar gyis shig/des ni bdag gis bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyan thob par
404a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rang gi pags pa 'di'ang sbyin par byas des ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig/rigs
404a6(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis lag pa g.yas pas rang gi mig go nyis phyung ste 'tsho ba pa la byin nas gdong khrag gis yog bzhin du smras pa/'di na gang dag 'dir lhags
404a7(mdo sde): pa dang /nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /gnod sbyin mthu chen po rnams dang /mi 'am ci gang yin pa rnams dang /lha ma yin gang yin pa rnams
404b1(mdo sde): dang /'byung po gang yin pa rnams dang /mi gang yin pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/bdag gis sbyin pa byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge bas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur nas/bdag gis
404b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi zad pa las sgrol zhing bla na med pa'i zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par gyur cig/yang smras pa/gal te bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag /
404b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lta na/ji srid du 'tsho ba pa 'di'i rig sngogs de grub par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bdag gi srog gi dbang po 'gag par ma gyur cig/bdag gi
404b4(mdo sde): dran pa'ang nyams par ma gyur cig/bdag 'gyod par yang ma gyur cig/rigs kyi bu rgyal pos pags pa'ang khyer cig ces smras pa dang /'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs des mtshon rnon po blangs
404b5(mdo sde): te/rgyal po gson po'i lus las pags pa bshus nas pags pa khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs so//de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi srog gi dbang po'ang ma
404b6(mdo sde): 'gags dran pa'ang ma nyams/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de'ang mi myong la/de la skad cig tsam yang 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur to//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i
404b7(mdo sde): dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na gzhan du mi blta ste/ngo de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i yab snying rje
