434a1(mdo sde): par sgrogs zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
434a2(mdo sde): pa klu dbang rin chen ngos zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon shing 'bras bu dpag med rin po che zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos sprin sgra dbyangs dbang phyug zla ba
434a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi gdon dag g.yos shing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
434a4(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang /snyan pa dang /grags pa brjod par mdzad pa dang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
434a5(mdo sde): nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dge kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes
434a6(mdo sde): dri mi med pa drug thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi blangs
434a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdud 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa
434b1(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs parin chen rib zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston par gzugs te/bcom ldan 'das derang du sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing spyad pa
434b2(mdo sde): spyod pa na ngas rnams cad kyi dang por blan med du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub yang dag par 'dzin du lkug pa nas de meng snar gyis pa'i bar dag bzhin no//sa sa rgyas kyi
434b3(mdo sde): rnams kyang de bzhin du sbya te/de bzhin gshegs pa byer mchog gi mdzo ces bya byu /de bzhin gi shegs pa dbyangs mi khyen mdzod ces bya ba dang /bzhugags pa dang /na
434b4(mdo sde): phyi dang /tshangs da'i me tog dang /sku mchog rnam par gnon dang /chos kyi shugs kyi sgron ma dang /lhun po phrag med pa sgra dbyings rnam par grogs pa'i rgyal pa dang /tshangs pa'i dbang
434b5(mdo sde): podabyang sA dang /de bzhin du nub phyogs lcogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa gang ngag gi mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pus yongs su bsgrags pa
434b6(mdo sde): de dog gi gdan dag g.yo sa shong /de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas kyi pa nye byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog
434b7(mdo sde): mdzes dri ma med pa dag rdzogs te/sangs rgyas kyi ning mi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khod pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro//de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /de bzhin du steng dang /
435a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'og dang /de bzhin du shar b+h+yo dang /de bzhin du snron bu dang /de bzhin du nub byung nga /de bzhin du rgyu shar ni phyogs rnams su 'ang snga ma bzhin
435a2(mdo sde): du sbyar te brjod par bya'o//ying bcom ldan 'das shrIHthub pas bka' stsal gi rigs kyi grangs sangs rgyas kyi na 'dinasu byung shar mo phyogs 'gos su sangs rgyas kyi ning dbyed khrim
435a3(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phyag dgu bcurtsa brgyad 'das pa dri na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu
435a4(mdo sde): sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de 'ang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /byang chub sems de pa'i spyad pa spyod pa nangs thams cad kyi dang por
435a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas/thams cad kyi dngo por sangs rgyas bcom ldan
435a6(mdo sde): 'das bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes po dge gi thad du dul na sa dor dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo//glang gi tshe de'i mtshan yengs
435a7(mdo sde): su bsgrags pa de'i tshe gdan g.yos pa nas kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /dad pa dang /gzugs dang /sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis
435b1(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro//'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig
435b2(mdo sde): 'khrugs med rtse mo zhes bya ba dang /gcig shos ni sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod ces bya ba zhig yod de/de bzhin gshogs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i
435b3(mdo sde): rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du deng la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs
435b4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub po la sbyin mi mnga' 'am/thugs bde 'am/bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol cig/de gnyis kyis gsol ba/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
435b5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' thams cad yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/de nas dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga'
435b6(mdo sde): tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na/bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags/de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na
435b7(mdo sde): go skabs med do zhes de skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis
436a1(mdo sde): go skabs yangs pa yin te/sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad
436a2(mdo sde): pa dang /bsgrub pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang /sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag
436a3(mdo sde): las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no///
436a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na/'dul ba'i sems can lnga gzigs shing ri brag
436a5(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po'i mig ces bya ba'i gnas shing sA la'i phrug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gi
436a6(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sA la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te/de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma

436b1(mdo sde): bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri de gang yin pa de logs su

436b3(mdo sde): pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin te/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis mai tig zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la/lho nub kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gis

436b5(mdo sde): cig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po des me tig zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te byang chub sems drapa' 'khrug/

437a1(mdo sde): thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchis lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa

441a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te/da yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o//gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /
441b1(mdo sde): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /gzhan dga' 'ang ba na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rgya tshor yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma nA za na bris te 'chang/
441b2(mdo sde): bar byed na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta
441b3(mdo sde): ma yon no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lho dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang /gnod sbyin dang //
441b4(mdo sde): klu dang /dri za dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /sha zo dang /mi 'am ci dang /lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang //nad
441b5(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'thab mo dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /dus ma yin pa'i
441b6(mdo sde): char pa dang /'chi ba dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /bde bar bya ba dang /lo legs par bya ba dang /nad med
441b7(mdo sde): pa tshogs par bya ba dang /skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med cing bde bar bya ba dang /nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /ngan
442a1(mdo sde): song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba dang /theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /bzungs dang /
442a2(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang /rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang /bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs
442a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan
442a4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /'khor mang por bya ba dang /mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro//ngas chos kyi
442a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'dri su'i lag tu gtad par bya/su zhig lnga brgya pa tha me lo nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing /chos ma yin pa lhur len po'i sems can rnams
442a6(mdo sde): dang /tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par 'gyur/ches me yin pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams dang /'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis
442a7(mdo sde): non pa rnams dang /chos log pas yongs su dkris pa rnams dang /sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams kun tu skyo ba med par 'gyur zhi shu snyam du dgongs pa dang /thams
442b1(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po zhes bya ba zhig kyang
442b2(mdo sde): 'dug go//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang /bcom
442b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la/lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag
442b4(mdo sde): gi rna lam du sgrogs shig/de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed du chu gcig/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
442b5(mdo sde): bdag smon lam gyis bskal pa chen po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa nas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa smod pa na/bdag gis sems
442b6(mdo sde): can bsring ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la'ang rab tu bkod lags te/bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga brgya pa
442b7(mdo sde): tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yings
443a1(mdo sde): /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /suM ran+d+ra bo d+hi dang /pradz+nyA barba dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsAb
443a2(mdo sde): rje la shes rje la sogs pas bus te gtan la ya ga/ma
